story:
Short Summary

We are a group of high school seniors at The Bay School of San Francisco. Each Bay senior completes a Senior Signature Project, which is a project chosen by the senior and is similar in scope to an undergraduate thesis. For the past year or so, we've been researching 3D printing technologies and have noticed a gaping hole in the current industry. Namely, there are no consumer model printers that use selective laser melting (SLM) technology. This technology is used for industrial applications to print sturdy metal parts. We want to bring SLM 3D printing into the homes of individual designers, engineers, makers, and artists.

To do this, we will design and build an SLM 3D printer specifically designed to be easy to reproduce and use. We will open source both the plans and the software for the printer. The Bay School allocates a limited amount of funds for each Senior Signature Project. Our project requires additional funds because our budget exceeds that limit. That's where you come in.

What We Need & What You Get

We need about $5000 in funding in order to build our prototype. This will cover material costs and manufacturing costs. In addition, we need about $2000 to cover the cost of the printing material (stainless steel powder) to test the printer, showcase its capabilities, and fulfill all of the perks.

As a gift for donating, we will allow you to submit your 3D models for us to print. This will also serve to show people the power and accuracy of this technology. We will print just about anything that you want, with a few exceptions. The rules are as follows:

  1. No hollow cavities. Given the way our printer will work, they will end up full of steel powder with no good way to empty it.
  2. No ultra thin (<.5 millimeters) walls.
  3. The resolution of the printer is 100 cubic microns. You shouldn't have to worry about this for most objects, but it's something to keep in mind.
  4. All items have to conform to the IndieGoGo rules (http://www.indiegogo.com/about/terms), as well as all local, state, and US laws.
  5. In order for us to fulfill your perks, you must give us an STL file(s) to print, and a valid shipping address (with the country included). Please make sure to pick the correct perk for your shipping address. 

If you need inspiration for things to print, we have a large list of ideas here.

The Impact

SLM 3D printers have the potential to revolutionize the way we view consumer products. Unfortunately, the vast majority of people who would benefit from the use of an SLM 3D printer can't get access to one. 

That's what this project is seeking to change.

Currently, most consumer products are made and distributed through manufacturing firms. A designer comes up with a product, and then either tries to pitch it to an existing company or start their own. Either option takes lots of time and money and serves only to put up barriers between product designers and the end user. Then, months later, the product gets shipped to stores and online retailers, where a user can then buy it. That's a minimum of two middlemen between the designer and the user, costing both of them time and money. 

Now imagine what would happen if everyone had access to a 3D printer. The process would look something like this: 

  • A designer comes up with a product, then posts it online, either for free or for a small fee. 
  • Then, a user can download the design and print it on a 3D printer, either their own, a friend's, or maybe even some future equivalent of Kinko's. 

You may be wondering why we're making this printer as opposed to any of the other consumer 3D printers that have flooded the market in the past few years. The key difference between our printer and the other 3D printers is that they print primarily in two materials, plastic and resin. Those are great for proof-of-concept prototypes, but they aren't strong or durable. Our printer prints in stainless steel and can be modified to print in most materials that can be both powdered and melted. We believe that this can turn home 3D printing from a niche toy into a household appliance.


Other Ways You Can Help

First of all, we'd like to thank you for reading this far. We appreciate your interest.

If you can't donate but still want to help out, we invite you to share our campaign with your friends and family. If you belong to a Makerspace or other community of Makers, tell them as well. We need all the support we can get.

If you happen to have any of the following items and are willing to donate them, please contact us at HephaestusSLM@gmail.com

  • 60W or higher near-infrared (808nm would be ideal) diode laser
  • a 2V driver for said laser

a 2V driver for said laser

story:
Retractwinder version 2

Patent No: US 9,016,607 B2

Multi-Stage Retractable Cord Winder Device

World's First and Only Retractable Cable Organizer




Retract all your regular Smartphone charging cables and earphone

The Regular Retract Winders instantly stores with retractable features for small earbuds with mics, most regular USBs charging cables. Comes with 2 colored covers other than white and a carabiner for easy attachment.
Physical Dimension: Height 7cm x Width 5cm x Thickness 1.7cm, Weight: 35g

Auto wind and make almost any cord or cable retractable

The Large Retract Winders is ideal for most types of chargers, gaming cables, smart phone or tablet chargers, USB cords, cables and cords up to 100" in length. It comes with 2 colored covers other than white and a carabiner for easy attachment.
Physical Dimension: Height 9.5cm x Width 5.5cm x Thickness 2.8cm, Weight: 70g



Funding Required

  • We have developed a more sturdy and robust retract mechanism for version 2
  • We only need a minimum $500 to change to mold that holds the spring structure
  • Design Patent is pending in USA and Globally

Risks & Challenges

  • As we have great success and sales of Retractwinder version 1, 2 years ago, there will be no risks in enhancing version 2.

story:
A 3d printed easy to assemble clock ……

The idea behind the clock is to make a simple yet elegant 3d printed and easy to assemble clock. It can be put together even by a grade 4 student. The clock consists of a simple stepper motor driven mechanism controlled by an Arduino based micro controller

Why Indiegogo?

In the past we have sold a few beta kits to interested people but it was difficult and time consuming for us to assemble every PCB manually . The indiegogo campaign will help  us to get PCBs and other accessories manufactured in bulk .  It also helps procuring small motors in bulk and brings the cost down.



Rewards

the basic kit is meant for people with a 3d printer who want to build their own clock.



A choice of four colors is available . The colors can be chosen after backing the project.


Techs

Assembly diagram.


Technical specs

  •  Size                      15 x 18.5 x 4.3 cm
  •  Weight                 0.9 kg
  •  Power                   18v 0.5 amp
  •  Power adapter    220v input 18v 1 amp output


Featured

           hack-a-day                                                                                       3ders.org

Timeline


  • Champaign start June 2016
  • Champaign end July 2016
  • Manufacturing  start August 2016
  • Shipping units December 2016


How can you help ?

You may not fancy my clock, but you may know someone who would ? Please share the information. Let him/her know about this IndieGoGo campaign.

Do you know a geek who likes clocks ? Can you think of a better gift than the HOLO Clock?

Spread the word, share this campaign to your network (and real-life) friends.

I also need your help to tell me how to improve this clock.  Tell me what you'd like to have.  Tell me what you like, what you don't like, and what you'd like to have changed.  I'll see if it's possible.

I would appreciate your valuable suggestions to improve my existing model of the kit .

Thank you so much for your interest in my clock. I'm sure you'll enjoy having it .


Thank you! 

Thanks for reading this far and taking  interest in my project.  I really hope you can back me and I'm looking forward to hear your comments.  I'm very excited about the prospect of sending this  clock world wide.
story_txt:
A 3d printed easy to assemble clock ……
The idea behind the clock is to make a simple yet elegant 3d
printed and easy to assemble clock. It can be put together even by a grade 4 student.
The clock consists of a simple stepper motor driven mechanism controlled by an Arduino based micro controller





Why Indiegogo?

In the past we have sold a few beta kits to interested people but it was difficult and time consuming for us to assemble every PCB manually . The indiegogo campaign will help  us to get PCBs and other accessories manufactured in bulk .  It also helps procuring small motors in bulk and brings the cost down.

story:
Update:

We just received a great review from Forbes!  Check it out here: Forbes reviews the S-Mount

"Testing showed the tablets were secure and that it was almost impossible to pull a tablet off the S-Mount when exerting downward or shear force. However, when the tablet was removed using a pealing motion it came off the mount quite easily."

Doug Olenick - Forbes Magazine



THE INTUITIVE SLIM DOCKING STATION...

The S-Mount is an easy way to wall mount, use, and show off any tablet or smart phone.  Remove your device instantly, then slip it into your favorite carrying case. 

With super easy installation, you can quickly free your home from clutter.


How easy is it to install?  VERY easy!  Check out the installation in under a minute!



Our VERY high strength Neodymium magnets are located behind the rubber face, these grab onto the thin metal adapter that is attached to the tablet (This will not hurt the tablet).  The rubber face protects the tablet from scratching, but also provides the benefit of keeping the tablet from sliding, or being easily moved from side-to-side, up or down...yet it can be pulled straight outward.

The metallic pad that is attached to the rear of the tablet is very thin (so you can use your carrying case).  It is attached to the tablet with 3M double sided adhesive, this is very strong and will not fall off, yet it can be removed if desired.  The metallic pad is attracted to the magnets in the wall plate, which holds the two together.



Looks like a wall plate

Designed to blend easily into any home, the finished installation is a very clean appearance.


Super Thin!

The S-Mount is easily installed on any surface, allowing control where you want.  At only 1/4” thick, the tablet looks like is floating just slightly off the wall, for a very clean appearance. 



Tablet can go in any direction

The high power magnets, combined with the custom rubber face, allows the panel to be placed at any angle and then easily rotated.


Super Safe, your tablet will NOT fall off!

A custom rubber face protects your device from slipping and keeps it in place, plus it's easy to clean. 


Mount Anywhere, even on a mirror!

The options for attaching your tablet are endless.  


Fits ANY tablet or smart phone!

Continue to use your favorite case!


"Testing showed the tablets were secure and that it was almost impossible to pull a tablet off the S-Mount when exerting downward or shear force. However, when the tablet was removed using a pealing motion it came off the mount quite easily."

Doug Olenick - Forbes Magazine


"Overall, the S-Mount is quite effective with its assigned task and if a tablet owner is looking for a simple way to secure a tablet to a wall this could be a good option."

Doug Olenick - Forbes Magazine






Dimensions:  2.75”(70mm) wide x 4.55” (115.5mm) Tall x 0.25” (6.35mm) Deep

Construction Material:

  Main Body – PVC Plastic

  Face – Custom Rubber

  Other - parts made of steel zinc or powdercoated

Magnets:  Neodymium rare earth

Adhesive: 3M


Although there are always risks in any project, this is a very solid item.  All of the development is 100% complete, vendors are sourced, and prototypes of the various parts are tested and approved.  At this point we need to start tooling for the metal and plastic parts, from there it's an easy process to final production.  

We have a history of designing, developing, and bringing products to market, so your investment is solid.


May 2011: Idea formulated

March 2012: Drawings started

February 2013: First prototype developed

March 2013 to October 2014: Prototypes developed and tested, field samples tested, 45 different revisions!  

October 2014 to January 2015: Vendors chosen and pre-production samples received

February 2015: Photography, videos and artwork

April 2015: Indiegogo Launch

May 2015: Tooling begins.  Parts acquisition non-tooled parts

June 2015: First off-tool samples

August 2015: Production Begins 

August 2015: First shipments made


Where is this made?

The units are designed and assembled in the USA.  The parts are sourced from the USA and other countries.

How can I ask a question?

We would be happy to help, just send us a note!

How can I buy multiple units?

Simply multiply the number of units that you want by the cost.  We do have discounts for 3 and 10 packs.

What is the S-Mount mount in the videos?

These are hand made prototypes of the final design.  The production versions will look even better as they will be created with professional tooling.

How long did you spend developing the S-Mount mount?

I started with the idea four years ago.  Over 45 different prototype variations, and hundreds of designs were completed to get to this final product.

Will the magnets hurt my tablet?

No, the magnets will not interfere with any part of your tablet or phone and will not erase the memory.

How much weight will this design hold?

We do not have an exact weight specification, although we have tested the design with large 12.2” tablets and they held VERY firm.  The tablet is EXTREMELY hard to slide do to our proprietary rubber surface, yet can be removed by simply pulling outward. 

Can the tablet fall off the mount?

Anything is possible with enough force.  We have used this design with large 12.2” tablets, and were very aggressive in trying to get them to “pop-off” with HARD button pressing, they stayed put with no issues.

What if I have more than 1 tablet and want to use the mount for both of them?

We sell extra metallic adapter pads for only $4 each on Indiegogo, this will allow you to add a tablet.

Is the metallic adapter pad that goes on the rear of the tablet reusable?

No.  It uses a strong adhesive that will not hurt the tablet, but the metallic pad will bend upon removal.  We sell extra replacement metallic adapter pads for only $4 each on Indiegogo.

What if I move and want to remove the S-Mount?

If using the 3M double stick tape, simply use a putty knife to slowly pry it from the surface. If you screwed it to the surface, peel back the rubber and unscrew the mount.  A small amount of patch/paint to cover the holes and you are good to go. 

Will it work if I mount it at an angle?

Yes it will work on any surface at any angle.

Can I pick up the S-Mount mount locally?

No, at this time we do not offer local pick-up

How much is shipping?  (We are looking into reducing the cost, any excess will be refunded to you at time of shipment)

NO INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING AT THIS TIME, SORRY!

United States:

1 Units = $3

 3 packs = $8

10 packs = $12

Canada:

1 Units = $15

 3 packs = $30

10 packs = $42

Sorry, No International at this time

When will it ship?

We are expecting the first orders to ship August 2015 

Can I get a refund?

Yes. We understand that things come up in life and decisions change. After the campaign ends simply contact us and we will issue the refund.

What if I don’t like it?

No problem…although we are sure you will be very satisfied.  Within 30 days of receiving the S-Mount, contact us and we will issue the refund.

Is it patented?

Yes, several US and International patents are filed.

story:
Rebel or Conform.

Ever looked at those incredible RAW video cameras and dreamed of using one? I think everyone who has seen the footage coming out of those cameras has felt the same way. But, one look at the price, and you begin to realize that it's way out of reach for the rest of us in the 99%.

Recently, some reasonably priced cameras have made a lot of news, because of their low price and great quality. But trying to obtain one is a different matter. Of the two most notable cameras, one has a nine month back order time, and the otherI has yet to deliver the first camera. Hardly ideal.

So what can we do about this?

How about we build our own?

Yes, you heard me correctly. We are going to BUILD a RAW video camera. And it's going to be state of the art.

  • 8 and 12 bit raw files
  • 1080p
  • 60 fps
  • $1500 - $2500 including a lens

Sound impossible? It's not. And we're going to show you how to build it, shoot with it, and grade the footage.

How is this possible?

All cameras are basically made of three parts: a lens, a camera sensor, and a processor that converts the images into files that you can view and edit. Building a RAW camera is simply a matter of replicating that process.

We take a machine vision camera (a fancy name for industrial cameras) and mate it with a fast, wide angle lens, and route the output from the camera to your choice of computer. Yes a computer...but you wont find this to be a problem - the cables we are using can be upwards of 30 feet long!

Our camera captures the RAW data, then the capture application on the computer debayers it...and produces DNG files that can be edited in Davinci Resolve, Adobe Premiere, Final Cut, or Lightroom.

There has to me more, right?

Sensor choice and lens choice are the reasons that this fundraiser is happening. We have seen footage from the manufacturer...and we know the two sensors we are candidating for our prototype are fantastic. In this initial fundraiser, we are seeking to complete the budget prototype. If our goal is totally blown away, we will add a sensor for testing that costs an additionl $500, as well as adding a miniature pc (4"x4") that mounts to the camera monitor to be used as a capture device, so you can be as mobile as possible. You are going to have to deal with some sort of cable, but as we said, a 30 to 45 foot cable gives you a lot of flexibility, and the smaller overall size of the camera itself will have great advantages when being rigged on motorized sliders or remote controlled gimbal mounts.

How You Can Help and What's In It for You.

We need to meet our initial funding goal in order to procure the camera sensors for verification and implementation in the proof of concept. We also need additional funds in order to do a range of lens testing. Your contributions will make that happen.

Backers will be able to choose what level of reward they want:

  • Postcards captured directly from the Frankencam Igor, our code name for the basic version of the DIY RAW Video Camera
  • A detailed guide to procurement and construction of the camera, as well as the suggested vendors who WILL have the cameras in stock when you call them
  • A detailed video tutorial on grading the RAW DNG files the camera will capture
  • A stock footage collection captured from the camera
  • Early access to footage tests

We've tried to select a range of appealing items for the backers. The construction guide will be the most sought after item, of course. DIY is the whole point of this campaign.

Don't Have Any Money but Still Want to Help?

We understand...there always seems to be one more hand out towards us than we are able to manage - but you can still help. In short, we would be forever indebted to you if you would push the news of this project out to everyone you can think of that would be interested. Don't be offensive, but please try to make them see the democratizing function of this campaign. If we wait on hitting the lottery before we try to get into the world of RAW video, we'll likely never enter it. It's time to rebel. Conformity is for the rest of them.

Thanks so much for your time and interest!

Jarrett Towe

story:
No Jedi mind trick. BodyWave allows you to control apps on your iPhone, Android, or PC by mind alone.

BodyWave allows to you control your iPhone or Android by mind alone from just a wrist band device. It’s no Jedi mind trick. It’s the real deal.

"The technology is complicated, but the implications are staggering" -- TIME magazine

"Game your way to razor sharp attention skills" -- Popular Science

"A player wearing the BodyWave would wait to see a light indicating full concentration before making a putt. Whether the resulting putt would be considered cheating or attaining perfect focus is an open question" -- TIME magazine

"Twelve-year-old Nikolas Hufen can control computer games with his mind" -- Journal Times

"BodyWave Mind-Reading Technology Helps Users Understand Brain Activity, Concentration" -- Huffington Post

What Can BodyWave Do for You? 

Your brain is the most powerful and valuable asset you possess. Everything in our lives is governed by the brain. Everything. It's our inner universe™. Yet we can't control it when we're under stress, distracted, or overhwelmed. BodyWave will not only help you explore this universe, but manage it for peak performance. Your brain, only stronger. Your mind, only more powerful.

This is just the beginning! We're developing apps to turn your cell phone on or off by mind alone. External control of home electronics is just around the corner as well -- all from your brain and off the wrist!

We also think that 3D control on X, Y, and Z axises are just around the corner too. Think: forward, back, left, right, up, and down. Think it and it's done.

Here’s how BodyWave can benefit you.

Train your brain to be a better athlete

 

Reduce stress and anxiety

 

Increase work place performance and your career path

 

Our Story & Where We Are Today

As a former educator, I dedicated myself to finding a solution for people with attention deficit or ADHD. In my quest for a solution, I discovered that NASA was using brain wave feedback technology to train astronauts to achieve better attention on long missions. Over 11 years, our focused team enhanced the feedback technology and constructed many prototype units to develop Play Attention, a complete education attention training system that has improved the lives of thousands of people worldwide.

We've had a lot of momentum with the Play Attention system. Professionals use it in doctors’ offices, psychologists' offices, traumatic brain injury hospitals, universities, schools, homes, and learning centers. In recent years, special versions utilizing the BodyWave arm band have been developed for specific industries and applications such as:

  • NASA
  • NASCAR
  • The nuclear power industry
  • Educational training for ADHD
  • Olympic teams

These projects are just the tip of the iceberg!

Project Goals

The use of headsets in monitoring brain waves has been around for decades, but no one wants to wear a silly headset to interface with their computer, smart phone, or tablet.

Making brain wave monitoring usable and discreet has been a tremendous challenge and the greatest barrier to ubiquitous use. We saw a critical challenge in producing a body-based brain monitor. We did it with BodyWave, an armband or ankle worn device that monitors brain activity through the body. Its industrial design doesn’t get us to the critical level of making it discreet and usable by everyone.

So, our challenge is to miniaturize our industrial model down to a wristband device that will control applications on one’s iPhone, PC, Android, or tablet via Bluetooth. We can already do this with our industrial model, but mass producing the wristband is obviously the next step to brain/computer interfaces and the future of human/machine computer use. 

 

  • Want to control animations on your iPhone or Android? Can do!
  • Train your brain for peak performance? Absolutely!
  • Data tracking to guide you to your personal goals? You bet!
  • Meditate? Control stress? It’s all at your fingertips – or should we say wrist!

The BodyWave Solution 

BodyWave is a wristband brainwave monitor that allows you to control apps and games on your iPhone, Android, or PC all by mind alone. It also teaches you to  reduce stress, improve memory and even pay attention! To do this, BodyWave monitors your brainwaves in real-time and sends them to your smart phone or tablet via Bluetooth. These data are translated into apps showing you how well your brain is performing and also translates your brainwaves into instructions to interact with apps on your iOS or Android device.

Real time brain activity through the body

Your brain is your most valuable asset. Brain fitness is as important or more important than physical fitness. Here's what's cool about BodyWave: every time you use BodyWave with one of our applications, you’re strengthening your brain. Your mind faster, stronger, more focused, and able to do things you never thought imaginable. All of our apps record your data to provide you with easy to read progress reports for continued success.

How does it work?

BodyWave measures electrical activity in the brain commonly referred to as brain waves. The brain continuously produces four or more distinct speeds or frequencies of brain waves. Although these different brain waves are produced simultaneously and in combination, a person’s state of consciousness depends on the dominant (strongest) frequency band at each time. These brain waves are a wealth of information.


BodyWave uses 3 little sensors to monitor the tiny electrical outputs generated by your brain’s activity even though it's far away from you brain.  You don't wear a silly looking headset you wouldn't get caught dead in!

Think heart rate monitor when you go jogging. Now think brain monitor as you work, play, or relax. As your brain shifts between states like attention, stress,  and relaxation, BodyWave's algorithms show you those changes in real time, just like a heart rate monitor can provide information about your physical activity. Just as you use a heart rate monitor to improve your fitness, BodyWave can help you improve your brain fitness. And much more.

 The fact that no intrusive or invasive headset must be worn to collect brain activity makes BodyWave incredibly useful to achieve peak performance, meditation, or to use it with one’s Droid or iPhone totally discretely -- even while sitting on a crowded train -- if we move it to the wristband form factor.

The BodyWave Team 

Peter Freer, MEd, BSEd, created, patented, and produced BodyWave technology. U.S. Patent No. 8,209,004 on June 26, 2012. Mr. Freer has presented at the National Space Society on behalf of NASA. He has also presented the technology to the International Atomic Energy Agency at the United Nations in Vienna, Austria. He is co-author of a white paper on human performance management with the scientists of the IAEA.

Our passion is to see BodyWave become the ubiquitous computer/brain interface that will optimize human performance, reduce stress, and eventually allow mental control of one’s PC, tablet, iPhone, or Android device. Freer’s work in the fields of ADHD and human performance have led to many features in the media.

 

                   Read the Time Article Here                     Read the PopSci Article Here.

 

What else comes with BodyWave?

A meditation app, a stress reduction app, and a peak performance app are currently available. The meditation app will transport you mentally to a peaceful place where you control your mind -- it doesn't control you. The stress reduction app will allow you to shrug off the pressures of the day and leave you feeling refreshed. The peak performance app will get you ready to take that exam, knock that job interview out of the park, or deliver the presentation like a pro. We're developing even more right now.

We'll also provide a competition portal where you can match minds with your friends. Let's see who has the most powerful mind among us!  We'll introduce our game, Klobber, where you can elminate your foes by smashing them with a virtual telephone pole, car, boulder, and more! Many other games to come to pit yourself against a global audience!

Our full health application will track your cognitive performance throughout the day and provide you with data that will improve your life. Additionally, the health app will use our patented process to help you improve your brain by increasing your attention, filtering out distractions, increasing your memory, reducing anxiety, and developing a positive outlook.

Why We Need Your Help

Right now the system is more expensive than it should be for ubiquitous use. We understand that we must have a grass roots movement to improve the technology, make it less expensive, and introduce it to the public for ubiquitous use. While the sports arm band is a vast improvement over awkward headsets, we want the BodyWave’s benefits to be available to everyone. The future of BodyWave brain to computer interface is to place the technology into every electronic device that interacts with humans from automobiles to televisions. 

What Will Your Pledges Be Used for? 

We are going to take the arm band and miniaturize it to a wristband form factor. This will allow you to wear the BodyWave more frequently, even less intrusively and it will be better suited to a wide range of activities and environments.

We will reduce the costs of the unit by designing it for mass production and utilization of less expensive off the shelf parts where appropriate. By integrating it into a watch/wristband design, a flex-circuit board will be needed instead of the traditional hard circuit board. To reach the $199 price point, we need high volume assembly.
story_txt:
No Jedi mind trick. BodyWave allows you to control apps on your iPhone, Android, or PC by mind alone.
BodyWave allows to you control your iPhone or Android by mind alone from just a wrist band device. It’s no Jedi mind trick. It’s the real deal.
"The technology is complicated, but the implications are staggering" -- TIME magazine
"Game your way to razor sharp attention skills" -- Popular Science
"A player wearing the BodyWave would wait to see a light indicating full concentration before making a putt. Whether the resulting putt would be considered cheating or attaining perfect focus is an open question" -- TIME magazine
"Twelve-year-old Nikolas Hufen can control computer games with his mind" -- Journal Times
"BodyWave Mind-Reading Technology Helps Users Understand Brain Activity, Concentration" -- Huffington Post

What Can BodyWave Do for You? 
Your brain is the most powerful and valuable asset you possess. Everything in our lives is governed by the brain. Everything. It's our inner universe™. Yet we can't control it when we're under stress, distracted, or overhwelmed. BodyWave will not only help you explore this universe, but manage it for peak performance. Your brain, only stronger. Your mind, only more powerful. 
This is just the beginning! We're developing apps to turn your cell phone on or off by mind alone. External control of home electronics is just around the corner as well -- all from your brain and off the wrist!
We also think that 3D control on X, Y, and Z axises are just around the corner too. Think: forward, back, left, right, up, and down. Think it and it's done.
Here’s how BodyWave can benefit you.Train your brain to be a better athlete

 
Reduce stress and anxiety
 
Increase work place performance and your career path

 
Our Story & Where We Are Today
As a former educator, I dedicated myself to finding a solution for people with attention deficit or ADHD. In my quest for a solution, I discovered that NASA was using brain wave feedback technology to train astronauts to achieve better attention on long missions. Over 11 years, our focused team enhanced the feedback technology and constructed many prototype units to develop Play Attention, a complete education attention training system that has improved the lives of thousands of people worldwide.
We've had a lot of momentum with the Play Attention system. Professionals use it in doctors’ offices, psychologists' offices, traumatic brain injury hospitals, universities, schools, homes, and learning centers. In recent years, special versions utilizing the BodyWave arm band have been developed for specific industries and applications such as:

NASA
NASCAR
The nuclear power industry
Educational training for ADHD
Olympic teams
These projects are just the tip of the iceberg! 
Project Goals
The use of headsets in monitoring brain waves has been around for decades, but no one wants to wear a silly headset to interface with their computer, smart phone, or tablet.
Making brain wave monitoring usable and discreet has been a tremendous challenge and the greatest barrier to ubiquitous use. We saw a critical challenge in producing a body-based brain monitor. We did it with BodyWave, an armband or ankle worn device that monitors brain activity through the body. Its industrial design doesn’t get us to the critical level of making it discreet and usable by everyone.
So, our challenge is to miniaturize our industrial model down to a wristband device that will control applications on one’s iPhone, PC, Android, or tablet via Bluetooth. We can already do this with our industrial model, but mass producing the wristband is obviously the next step to brain/computer interfaces and the future of human/machine computer use. 
 

Want to control animations on your iPhone or Android? Can do!
Train your brain for peak performance? Absolutely!
Data tracking to guide you to your personal goals? You bet!
Meditate? Control stress? It’s all at your fingertips – or should we say wrist!
The BodyWave Solution 
BodyWave is a wristband brainwave monitor that allows you to control apps and games on your iPhone, Android, or PC all by mind alone. It also teaches you to  reduce stress, improve memory and even pay attention! To do this, BodyWave monitors your brainwaves in real-time and sends them to your smart phone or tablet via Bluetooth. These data are translated into apps showing you how well your brain is performing and also translates your brainwaves into instructions to interact with apps on your iOS or Android device.
Real time brain activity through the body

Your brain is your most valuable asset. Brain fitness is as important or more important than physical fitness. Here's what's cool about BodyWave: every time you use BodyWave with one of our applications, you’re strengthening your brain. Your mind faster, stronger, more focused, and able to do things you never thought imaginable. All of our apps record your data to provide you with easy to read progress reports for continued success.
How does it work?
BodyWave measures electrical activity in the brain commonly referred to as brain waves. The brain continuously produces four or more distinct speeds or frequencies of brain waves. Although these different brain waves are produced simultaneously and in combination, a person’s state of consciousness depends on the dominant (strongest) frequency band at each time. These brain waves are a wealth of information.

BodyWave uses 3 little sensors to monitor the tiny electrical outputs generated by your brain’s activity even though it's far away from you brain.  You don't wear a silly looking headset you wouldn't get caught dead in!
Think heart rate monitor when you go jogging. Now think brain monitor as you work, play, or relax. As your brain shifts between states like attention, stress,  and relaxation, BodyWave's algorithms show you those changes in real time, just like a heart rate monitor can provide information about your physical activity. Just as you use a heart rate monitor to improve your fitness, BodyWave can help you improve your brain fitness. And much more.
 The fact that no intrusive or invasive headset must be worn to collect brain activity makes BodyWave incredibly useful to achieve peak performance, meditation, or to use it with one’s Droid or iPhone totally discretely -- even while sitting on a crowded train -- if we move it to the wristband form factor.

Peter Freer, MEd, BSEd, created, patented, and produced BodyWave technology. U.S. Patent No. 8,209,004 on June 26, 2012. Mr. Freer has presented at the National Space Society on behalf of NASA. He has also presented the technology to the International Atomic Energy Agency at the United Nations in Vienna, Austria. He is co-author of a white paper on human performance management with the scientists of the IAEA.
Our passion is to see BodyWave become the ubiquitous computer/brain interface that will optimize human performance, reduce stress, and eventually allow mental control of one’s PC, tablet, iPhone, or Android device. Freer’s work in the fields of ADHD and human performance have led to many features in the media.
 
                   Read the Time Article Here                     Read the PopSci Article Here.

The meditation app will transport you mentally to a peaceful place where you control your mind -- it doesn't control you. The stress reduction app will allow you to shrug off the pressures of the day and leave you feeling refreshed. The peak performance app will get you ready to take that exam, knock that job interview out of the park, or deliver the presentation like a pro. We're developing even more right now.
We'll also provide a competition portal where you can match minds with your friends. Let's see who has the most powerful mind among us!  We'll introduce our game, Klobber, where you can elminate your foes by smashing them with a virtual telephone pole, car, boulder, and more! Many other games to come to pit yourself against a global audience!

Additionally, the health app will use our patented process to help you improve your brain by increasing your attention, filtering out distractions, increasing your memory, reducing anxiety, and developing a positive outlook.

We understand that we must have a grass roots movement to improve the technology, make it less expensive, and introduce it to the public for ubiquitous use. While the sports arm band is a vast improvement over awkward headsets, we want the BodyWave’s benefits to be available to everyone. By integrating it into a watch/wristband design, a flex-circuit board will be needed instead of the traditional hard circuit board. To reach the $199 price point, we need high volume assembly.

story:
If you missed our Indiegogo campaign, please go to our website to order your GateKeeper GK-Chain:
www.gkchain.com


Many features, 1 device, and useful to everyone. A versatile Bluetooth 4.0 proximity tracker that performs item loss prevention, item locating, auto locks and unlocks your Mac or PC. Syncs with your smartphone for even more functionality. The GateKeeper (GK-Chain) is just the start of an amazing proximity technology product.




Jump to:

Featured|Problem|Solution|Application|Finder App|Specs|Timeline|Perks 





  • Never lose or leave your phone, keys, or valuables behind EVER again
  • Save time by automatically locking and/or unlocking your computer
  • Increase security with 2-factor authentication

Instead of typing in your password every time, the GK-Chain unlocks your computer when you approach, and locks when you leave.  Or, if you want additional security, you can set the GK-Chain to actually require the key and the password.

The GK-Chains also serve as Bluetooth 4.0 trackers. Using our free companion app, you can find your GK-Chain with a Bluetooth 4.0 enabled smartphone. This way, you'll have a little more help finding your lost keys, wallet, bag, even your luggage at the airport. The GK-Chain app will alert you when your bag is at hand.

We wanted to provide PC and Mac users both additional security and convenience. It's a great item for anywhere that you'd use your PC.

The GK-Chain tracks the location of the key using a proprietary signal strength algorithm and locks/unlocks your computer based on where you are.

Is it secure? Yes! GK-Chains use a modulating, encrypted connection to enable only a unique key to interface with the lock. The password is encrypted and still stored on your PC, not the GK-Chain – So no one can steal it.


We've been working on the GK-Chain for a while. After several rounds of PCB designs for the locks and the keys, the manufacturer is preparing for the first production line NEXT MONTH!

The GateKeeper software is currently being beta-tested. It currently works on Windows 7 and Windows 8. We're working on the Mac OS version of the software and will have it ready by the end of the campaign. So you Mac users - please do contribute to our campaign!!



We  are working with a manufacturer to produce the GK-Chains. We have worked with this manufacturer on another project - the SunFriend UVA+B monitor.  We have been extremely happy with the manufacturer's commitment and the quality of their work. SunFriends are now selling on Amazon!

We are starting production of the GK Chains. The production run will be in June/July with expected delivery of the first 2000 devices by end of July. These will be used to fulfill the Indiegogo orders.




FAQS

1. Do the GK-Chains work? Or is this just an idea concept?  

They work! There might not be any fireworks or special effects, but the GK-Chain will definitely lock your computer. Convenience.  

AND the BEST PART - we never forget our phones or our keys anymore...

2. Is the distance adjustable?  

Yes. The distance can be changed with the attached software. You can make the GK-Chain activate when you enter the room, or you can change the distance so you have to be very close to your computer.  

3. What if I want multiple USB locks for multiple computers?

This can be done!  Each GK-Chain comes with 1 lock, but if you would like more, please add $10 for each extra USB lock.  Send us a message letting us know you would like another lock.

4. Does it take a long time to set up?  

Less than a minute. After connecting the GK-Chain lock to your PC, it takes a moment to connect. There's a simple, one-time setup after that where you type in your password. And also download our app to sync with your phone.

5. Does it do anything else?  

Actually, it does! The GK-Chain has a KeyAlert app! You run the app on your phone and the phone will beep if it's too far away from your keys. This could cut down on those times where you get up and accidentally leave your keys behind.  We're working on EVEN MORE applications!

7. What colors does it come in?

Black, silver, green, blue, and orange.

story:
NIFTYX Awesome Bracelet has come to the latest model, the Double Wrap. NAB has always be the most favorite products among our customers, they like the hand feeling, the touch, the way it disguises as a bracelet, of it.  

We want to do beyond just these things. Thus we created a Double Wrap version. You can select your sizes, color and connector type(Lightning, Micro USB, Type C).

  

 

NIFTYX Awesome Bracelet aka NAB offers you the most handy solution for the device charging. You no longer have to worry about leaving your charging cable behind & run out of juice when you are in emergency. 

It is able to fast charge your devices to provide the fastest charging solution. And it also allows you to sync your devices as well so you can just carry our bracelets for most of the uses.
story_txt:
NIFTYX Awesome Bracelet has come to the latest model, the Double Wrap. NAB has always be the most favorite products among our customers, they like the hand feeling, the touch, the way it disguises as a bracelet, of it.  We want to do beyond just these things. Thus we created a Double Wrap version. You can select your sizes, color and connector type(Lightning, Micro USB, Type C).
NIFTYX Awesome Bracelet - Double Wrap  
NIFTYX Awesome Bracelet - Double Wrap w Buckle(Add-on) 
NIFTYX Awesome Bracelet aka NABNIFTYX Awesome Bracelet aka NAB offers you the most handy solution for the device charging. You no longer have to worry about leaving your charging cable behind & run out of juice when you are in emergency. It is able to fast charge your devices to provide the fastest charging solution. And it also allows you to sync your devices as well so you can just carry our bracelets for most of the uses.  Feedback from customers
 
 

 

What is NIFTYX Awesome Bracelet?Charging Cable + Leather Bracelet :)
When will I get to select the color, size, connector type?You will receive a survey after the 11 days of your pledge.
What sizes are available?Basically we offer 3 wrist sizes for NIFTYX Awesome Bracelet. Small - 7" or below Medium - 7" - 8" Large - 8" - 9"
by adding a buckle on, you could adjust the bracelet 1" more or remain the same size. Small with buckle - 7" or below / 8" or below Medium with buckle - 7" - 8" / 8" - 9" Large with buckle - 8" - 9" / 9" - 10"
e.g. If you have a wrist size of 6" then you should get a SMALL/SMALL with buckle.If you have a wrist size of 10" then you should get a LARGE with buckle.
Do I need a buckle?It's up to you whether or not to get the buckle. It can allow you to increase 1 inch of the size of the bracelet. Also it can provide you extra security to the bracelet to rest on your wrist, also our backers found it nice to have it with the bracelet.
Do you offer warranty on your products?Yes, all products will be offering 1 year warranty.

story:
Don't speak english? Read this in your language:
Français | Español | Português

Jogabo is like “Foursquare meets Nike+" for soccer.

Our mission at Jogabo is to inspire and empower the world to play soccer, in an exciting and social new way...

Jogabo provides you with insights about you and your friends’ soccer playing activity, your stats and the overall soccer community around you.

It makes soccer an entirely new social experience, inspiring you to play more and encouraging you to join unique games you would otherwise be unaware of.

We want to make the game more BEAUTIFUL and more SOCIAL, the way we believe it was meant to be and take it even further.

Why should we stay so blind about our playing history? Why should we only depend on a few friends to play? Why should we limit ourselves to certain playing days and times? Why should we feel obliged to join leagues to guarantee ourselves regular playing time?

Whether you record your stats in an organized game in the app or you simply check-in to any game you already play in, Jogabo will let you track all your games and stats.

You no longer have to be a pro-athlete to get your stats. Jogabo lets you track your activity and stats so you can visualize your performance and record all your soccer history. Just like being in the MLS, EPL or in a World Cup.

Log your practices, games with friends, random pickups or even league games you play in. Our main check-in feature makes logging your games and stats quick and easy. Before you know it, you’ll have a complete picture of your soccer playing history.

For the first time you are going to have access to a complete picture of your playing history. Jogabo allows you to analyze that history and discover playing habits you would otherwise never know about.

Use the Jogabo insights out of simple curiosity to discover some fun facts about your game. Or use it to compare your stats against past performances, see your progress and achieve personal goals. Are you on a goal scoring streak? What is the most consecutive weeks you have played in a row? How is your hustle evolving?

A little friendly competition can be just the thing to keep you on your toes and keep you motivated to play. Bring your friends, teammates and other players in on the fun by connecting with them on Jogabo even if they are not playing in the same games or even in the same city. Compare stats, share progress, and cheer each other on.

Soon you’ll be able to set your groups and your leaderboard will keep you all on your toes, so you’ll always know how you stack up, no matter where you play.

Friends will help keep you motivated. Stoke the competition by sending direct messages.

When you're looking for a game, Jogabo shows you personalized game recommendations or players looking to play based on your friends and your playing history.

When traveling, discover the best places to play and immediately take part in the local community. Find the most relevant game for you wherever you are based on your current location.

Everywhere you go there are hundreds or game happening, plenty of which missing players. You are just not aware of them, even when your friends are playing in them. The app will notify you when games around you are missing players or when your friends are playing.

The beautiful game is all about the people you play with. Follow your friends and players you enjoyed playing with so you can keep up to date with their activities and banter with them even when they are in other cities.

When you had a good game, you want the world to know about it! We’ll already share your achievement in real-time to your followers but with your permission, we will also allow you to push it out to your social networks. 100th goal celebration anyone?

Find out when people you follow or have already played with join games or are looking for extra players. Suddenly, all sorts of new playing opportunities are right there for you to take advantage of.


SO EASY, GAMES ALMOST ORGANIZE THEMSELVES !

Celebrate your progress and stay motivated by earning Jogabo badges for daily, weekly, even lifetime achievements. When you achieve a new goal, or your activity is extra impressive, we’ll award you with a badge! Score.

Knowing how close you are to reaching your goals gives you the motivation to reach them and aim higher.

To start, pledge now and get the Early Backer Badge on your profile in the App so that everyone knows that Jogabo exist because of you!

The backer badge will be placed near your headshot on your profile and in other places around the app. It is a little bit like the “verified” on Twitter and Facebook.

  • Early notification (Think Speedy boarding on airplanes)
    When a new public game is created, an spot opens up in a game in your area or someone drops out of a game where you are on the waiting list for, you will receive a notification before non premium members.
  • More detailed stats
    You will get to compare your stats back for longer period of times. We will also give you an in depth breakdown analysis of your stats (find out who you play with the most, who you tend to win or lose with, how your stats look like by position or field size...).
  • Get an early access to all our new features!
    We will be rolling out improvements and new features on an ongoing basis. Being a premium member will give you early access to all of those as they come out. You will even be able to give us early feedback and actually shape the future of the app.

So keep an eye out here as we will describe other premium features when we unlock new stretch goals.

Remember back in the days when Facebook was only available to a few Universities? Well while the others will be talking about Jogabo on Facebook and Twitter, you will have it in your hands and you will be taking it out for a spin.

GET THE EARLY ACCESS
WE WANT YOUR FEEDBACK TO IMPROVE JOGABO

As part of the deal, you will be allowed to invite your friends to the app and really establish yourself as an early adopter.

The app won’t be 100% finished and there will be things that aren’t just like we would like them but that’s part of the excitement. You will actually see things before they are finished and you will be able to influence how the features will work.

There are many charities that use soccer as a tool for social change, but unfortunately many of us soccer players are completely unaware of them and their amazing work. From Africa to right in our own backyards, they are working on preventing the spread of HIV, ending homelessness and many other worthy causes... all via the universal vehicle of soccer.

So for us, making every game count takes on a whole new meaning: what if every soccer player could have a social impact while playing the game they love so much?

That’s why we are making it possible for you to dedicate the games you play and your stats to a cause. We see this as a way for you to become an ambassador for some of these charities and to raise awareness about them to your followers on the App and your friends on social networks.

We are building Jogabo for the entire soccer community. For the casual player looking for a kickaround and in need of motivation, but also the competitive player always looking to play more and to keep track of their progress. Whether you are just a player or the guy that always organizes. Whether you play pickup, casual games with friends or regular league games.

Oh and did we tell you that it will be available worldwide... yeah that’s right! So go ahead and travel the world with your cleats, those games will count too. One game, one love, one community... anywhere you go!

A special “Backer” badge on your profile page in the app so that everyone knows Jogabo exists because of you. As a huge thank you, we will also add you to the list of backers on the recognition page of our website, on our Indiegogo timeline and give you a social media shoutout.
We'll give you early access to the mobile web version of the app at the end of the campaign and 2 years of premium features once we introduce them (approx. value $100). You'll also get a Jogabo wristband which will give you special treatment if you ever play in a game with any of the founders or future Jogabo employees + BACKER
Add $3 to ship outside the US
The debut issue of the brand new "Eight by Eight" magazine along with some swag including: a nicely printed postcard version of the Özil cover, stickers and a hacky sack. Heck, we'll even throw in a discount code for a 1 year subscription + EARLY USER
This is a high quality ball by Senda Athletics that has been branded for Jogabo. These guys make top quality Fair Trade soccer equipment that connects and benefits athletes, and promote sports as a tool for development. The beautiful game takes on a whole new meaning when you know your ball was made in fair and safe working conditions and not in a sweatshop. This is not just marketing swag, this is a high quality game ball on par with the best from Nike, Adidas and the likes. Comes with the early access to the mobile web version of the App + BACKER

Specs: Size 5, hand stitched, 1.2 mm thick PU Cover material, Butyl bladder
A limited edition high-quality Jogabo T-shirt that only you and the likes of Thierry Henry, Cesc Fabregas or Eric Cantona will ever own ;) + EARLY ACCESS
Add $10 to ship outside the US
A set of 12 Grassroot Soccer branded bibs so that every game you play helps raise awareness about an amazing cause. Grassroot Soccer is a charity using soccer in fight against the spread of HIV in Africa. Their ambassadors include Thierry Henry, Robert Pires, Alex Song, Bacary Sagna, Freddie Ljungberg and Oguchi Onyewu + SUPPORTER
Add $15 to ship outside the US
A limited edition Jogabo ball by Senda Athletics. All of Senda’s balls are top quality and certified Fair Trade + GOOD ORGANIZER
A set of 3 soccer culture t-shirts specially designed and produced by Bumpy Pitch FC, Futbola Culture and Onelove FC around the concept “Never Stop Playing”. Wether you play of not, if you are a fan of the beautiful game you will be able to wear your passion out + SUPPORTER
Add $15 to ship outside the US
We will name the "10 games played in" badge for the city of your choice after you. Everytime a player reaches 10 games played in your city, they will get a notification explaining the reward and your name will apear in their feed making your a local superstar + SUPPORTER (ask about your city before pledging)
You believed in the vision from the very beginning, want to get involved and have a strong impact on the project. We will send you personal updates about our progress and answer all the questions you have. We will also make a thank you call with you and add your name in a special section of the website. + SOCCER HIPSTER
A special private dinner with at least one of the founders and special guests which will include either current or past MLS and NWSL players, international pro players and soccer celebrities. We will pay for dinner, get some pictures taken and both the guests and us will give you a shoutout on social media. Locations include San Francisco, Los Angeles, New York and Montreal. As more and more of our ambassadors signup, we could add more cities. (ask before pledging and tell us which city you would be interested in) + SOCCER HIPSTER

Oh yeah, keep an eye out here as we will be introducing some pretty exciting stretch goals as we get closer to reaching our initial goal. But first let's make sure we get this project funded so we can develop the solid base of the app.

Mehdi, Jeremy and PG

We are a team of 3 co-founders, amazing interns and countless hardcore supporters, all passionate about soccer, design and technology. You will always find us either playing soccer on the San Francisco fields (or around the world actually), engaging with users, supporting amazing charities and their causes or hard at work building Jogabo at our PARISOMA co-working space.

We have played the game since we were kids, worked in soccer and founded previous soccer startups. We have built websites, mobile apps and even physical products, from a simple bottle opener, a sports team organization app, to part of a space station coupling mechanism. But what we are passionate about is soccer, so we decided to dedicate our lives to making the game more beautiful.

For the past year, we have met players face to face, from the townships of Cape town, the parks of London, the canchas of Madrid, the streets of Buenos Aires, all the way to good old San Francisco. We have already built multiple working prototypes on the web and we just completed an HTML5 version of the app that we use to test and iterate feature ideas. The design of the app is now 95% complete so we are pretty much ready to go.

We have quit our respective jobs and put in all of our personal funds into this project. Our lives have basically revolved around Jogabo since we started. We have been at it all day, every day pretty much. We wouldn’t have done it if we weren’t passionate but we need your help now.

We plan on launching the native apps in January but our backers will able to start using the HTML5 app in Beta at the end of the campaign. Here is what we have left on our plate before then:

  • Iphone and Android native app development - We are going to integrate our HTML5 app, on both IOS and Android so you can download it from you phone store and leverage some native features like push notifications, access to your phone camera or contact book.
  • Performance improvement of the app - we want it to be snappy and quick because like most people we don't like to wait.
  • Full coverage testing to reduce future bugs - this is nerds stuff but we have to get it done so that nothing breaks in the future.
  • Broader support for other platforms for the mobile version. Right now it looks pretty good in Safari mobile and most Android browsers but we need to make sure it works on most other browsers like Chrome and Firefox.
  • UI/UX Design iterations to improve the user experience. Some of the flows require more user testing to get them just right, and here what we really need is more "real world" testing. These will be small details but it's what makes the difference.

A few months ago we released a video called the Future of Soccer, and you were thousands asking us how you could get involved to help make this happen.

You were players, passionate about the beautiful game. Men and women from all over the world. You were amateurs, ex pros and even international superstars.

That’s why we are starting this Indiegogo campaign. We believe that beyond the app, Jogabo is a movement. So we wanted to make YOU part of this great journey, this adventure to change the way we play the beautiful game.

  • When is the app going live?
  • What phones will it be available for?
  • How much will the app cost?
  • Will I be able to access the app from my computer?
  • Will this be available in my city?
  • It looks like it’s all in English for now. Will it be available in other languages?
  • What's the difference between HTML5 and iOS/Android native app?
  • What if nobody is playing around me with Jogabo? What if there are no game organized in my city on the App?
  • Will I be able to use it even if I play in a league or a club?
  • How will the stats thing work?
  • What about the goalkeepers and defender?
  • Won’t people just cheat and lie about their stats?
  • How will you measure “hustle”?
  • I couldn't care less about stats. Why would I want to keep track of them?
  • Is this only going to be for soccer?
  • How do you pronounce Jogabo?
  • I love your project, but don’t have much money to pledge, how can I help?
  • I don’t really play soccer, why should I fund your campaign?
  • What is Indiegogo?
  • Who made the music I can hear in all the Jogabo videos?
When is the app going live?

The official launch of the native iOS and Android App is planned for January. This will be the basic version for our initial goal. That said, our Indiegogo backers will get early access to the HTML5 (mobile web) version as soon as the campaign is over if we reach our initial goal. This won’t have all the features yet but pretty much everything you will need to use it and get the experience.

What phones will it be available for?

The money raised from the initial goal on Indiegogo will allow us to build a native App for iOS and Android. But since we are also building a mobile web version, you’ll be able to access it from any devices (windows phone, blackberry...) through your browser and it will feel just like that app, with a few things missing. We are building it with the latest phone capabilities in mind and are really pushing the limits of these technologies so it might not be as snappy on some of the older phones.

How much will the app cost?

You are going to like this one.....absolutely nothing. It’s free! Not that we think it is worth $0 but we believe that access to the core of the app functionality should stay open to all. In the future though, we will add some premium features to the app which will only be available for paying customers.

Will I be able to access the app from my computer?

Kind of… you will be able to interact with the game page, handle your RSVPs and perform some sharing from your computer when opening invitation links via email. It will be a bit like Instagram at the beginning but this is for the short term. We do have plans for a more complete website later on.

Will this be available in my city?

Heck yeah. It will be available worldwide, just like Foursquare. You will be able to add your own venues/fields wherever you are in the world.

It looks like it’s all in English for now. Will it be available in other languages?

We are building it in English but it’s ready for multi-language support. All we need is to translate it and make sure it all looks good so Spanish, French and Portuguese will be next up pretty quickly. We actually built an application that will help us crowdsource the translation of the app so if you feel like helping… giddy up!

What's the difference between HTML5 and iOS/Android native app?

An HTML5 app is essentially a web app built with JavaScript, to allow the app to perform dynamically. It works interactively to make it feel like an "app", but it is running in a web browser. Because it is running in a browser, it has some limitation on what the app is capable of doing, and can not access some api (push notifications, contact book, ...).

A native app is an app written to a specific platform like iOS or Android. Native apps have access to all the features exposed by the native APIs, which is typically most of the functionality of the device. It is "Native" because the code you write is essentially written for that platform.

What if nobody is playing around me with Jogabo? What if there are no game organized in my city on the App?

Don’t worry, the whole idea behind the new app is that it can be used even if you are the only one using it in your city. You will be able to track your activity and stats of the games you are already playing in, just like when you Check-in on Foursquare. You can also invite your friends easily so you can banter with them and maybe whoever organizes your games can start setting them up using the app. If you are in this situation, you should be proud. It means you are a pioneer and you will have started the local community in your city.

Will I be able to use it even if I play in a league or a club?

Yep. Every game! The idea is that it lets you track all your soccer activity so you can look back and discover all sorts of playing habits and stats.

How will the stats thing work?

Some stats will need to be entered manually (the number of goals you scored for instance) but we are working hard to make it really easy and fun to do so. Some will be tracked automatically, and some will be tracked as you play but you will have to wait and see to learn more about this last past… Ooooh the secret stretch goals ;)

What about the goalkeepers and defender?

Jeremy himself is a goalie, so rest assured we didn’t forget about this. There are other stats that are relevant for players in those positions like “WDL ratios”, “Goals for/against” and we are always open to suggestions for more as we keep improving the product (clean sheets?). We have talked about a “Fantasy style” point system as well but one step at a time.

Won’t people just cheat and lie about their stats?

Like any system, it can be gamed. The way we see it is that most people will use it to track their real stats and compete with their friends and most people don’t lie to themselves or their friends. We weren’t going to sacrifice the user experience just to prevent some outliers from cheating but there are some things we will be able to do in the future.

How will you measure “hustle”?

Hush, hush for now... Keep an eye open for the stretch goals!

I couldn't care less about stats. Why would I want to keep track of them?

Fair enough but we think this app might change your mind actually. Friendly competition is a great way to motivate yourself and we will try to make it fun. Once you get your first MVP/MOTM, you will see, it gets a little bit addictive.

Is this only going to be for soccer?

Yeah, that’s right... soccer only. We want to make it awesome for one sport not so-so for a bunch of them. There are many other reasons for our choice and we will write a blog post about them soon.

How do you pronounce Jogabo?

Give it a try!

I love your project, but don’t have much money to pledge, how can I help?

We surely could use your help to spread the word to your friends and on social networks by sharing the link of the campaign. If you are up for more, we’ve actually put together an ambassador program so you can help throughout the campaign. Check it out here http://bombonera.jogabo.com

I don’t really play soccer, why should I fund your campaign?

Our mission goes beyond soccer. In an era when everything is digital and happens online, we want to bring people together in the real world. We believe that our app can improve the lives of people by making them more social and healthy. We also support and work closely with charities supporting causes such as homelessness, HIV/AIDS, education… We believe that our app will empower players to help raise awareness and funds for such charities through their playing.

What is Indiegogo?

Indiegogo is a crowdfunding platform. Here is a simplistic way of explaining it:

We have a cool project that we dedicated time and money to get where we are. We need financial support to complete it. You like our project. You make a pledge to support us. You pick a cool reward in exchange. We finalize our App. We launch it. We send you the reward you chose. We thank you for making it possible (because you are awesome!). You feel part of the adventure and made a difference.

Who made the music I can hear in all the Jogabo videos?

It's our dear friend Allure, an electro producer from Paris. You can listen to his album on iTunes and find him on Facebook.

(Press: Please download our Media Kit here)
story_txt:
Don't speak english? Read this in your language: Français  |  Español  |  Português 
Jogabo is like “Foursquare meets Nike+" for soccer.

Our mission at Jogabo is to inspire and empower the world to play soccer, in an exciting and social new way...
Jogabo provides you with insights about you and your friends’ soccer playing activity, your stats and the overall soccer community around you.
It makes soccer an entirely new social experience, inspiring you to play more and encouraging you to join unique games you would otherwise be unaware of.
We want to make the game more BEAUTIFUL and more SOCIAL, the way we believe it was meant to be and take it even further.





Why should we stay so blind about our playing history? Why should we only depend on a few friends to play? Why should we limit ourselves to certain playing days and times? Why should we feel obliged to join leagues to guarantee ourselves regular playing time?





Whether you record your stats in an organized game in the app or you simply check-in to any game you already play in, Jogabo will let you track all your games and stats.

You no longer have to be a pro-athlete to get your stats. Jogabo lets you track your activity and stats so you can visualize your performance and record all your soccer history. Just like being in the MLS, EPL or in a World Cup.

Log your practices, games with friends, random pickups or even league games you play in. Our main check-in feature makes logging your games and stats quick and easy. Before you know it, you’ll have a complete picture of your soccer playing history.



For the first time you are going to have access to a complete picture of your playing history. Jogabo allows you to analyze that history and discover playing habits you would otherwise never know about.

Use the Jogabo insights out of simple curiosity to discover some fun facts about your game. Or use it to compare your stats against past performances, see your progress and achieve personal goals. Are you on a goal scoring streak? What is the most consecutive weeks you have played in a row? How is your hustle evolving?




A little friendly competition can be just the thing to keep you on your toes and keep you motivated to play. Bring your friends, teammates and other players in on the fun by connecting with them on Jogabo even if they are not playing in the same games or even in the same city. Compare stats, share progress, and cheer each other on.

Soon you’ll be able to set your groups and your leaderboard will keep you all on your toes, so you’ll always know how you stack up, no matter where you play.
Friends will help keep you motivated. Stoke the competition by sending direct messages.



When you're looking for a game, Jogabo shows you personalized game recommendations or players looking to play based on your friends and your playing history.

When traveling, discover the best places to play and immediately take part in the local community. Find the most relevant game for you wherever you are based on your current location.

Everywhere you go there are hundreds or game happening, plenty of which missing players. You are just not aware of them, even when your friends are playing in them. The app will notify you when games around you are missing players or when your friends are playing.




The beautiful game is all about the people you play with. Follow your friends and players you enjoyed playing with so you can keep up to date with their activities and banter with them even when they are in other cities.

When you had a good game, you want the world to know about it! We’ll already share your achievement in real-time to your followers but with your permission, we will also allow you to push it out to your social networks. 100th goal celebration anyone?

Find out when people you follow or have already played with join games or are looking for extra players. Suddenly, all sorts of new playing opportunities are right there for you to take advantage of.



SO EASY, GAMES ALMOST ORGANIZE THEMSELVES !

Celebrate your progress and stay motivated by earning Jogabo badges for daily, weekly, even lifetime achievements. When you achieve a new goal, or your activity is extra impressive, we’ll award you with a badge! Score.
Knowing how close you are to reaching your goals gives you the motivation to reach them and aim higher.
To start, pledge now and get the Early Backer Badge on your profile in the App so that everyone knows that Jogabo exist because of you!

The backer badge will be placed near your headshot on your profile and in other places around the app. It is a little bit like the “verified” on Twitter and Facebook.



Early notification (Think Speedy boarding on airplanes)When a new public game is created, an spot opens up in a game in your area or someone drops out of a game where you are on the waiting list for, you will receive a notification before non premium members.

More detailed statsYou will get to compare your stats back for longer period of times. We will also give you an in depth breakdown analysis of your stats (find out who you play with the most, who you tend to win or lose with, how your stats look like by position or field size...).

Get an early access to all our new features!We will be rolling out improvements and new features on an ongoing basis. Being a premium member will give you early access to all of those as they come out. You will even be able to give us early feedback and actually shape the future of the app.

So keep an eye out here as we will describe other premium features when we unlock new stretch goals.

Remember back in the days when Facebook was only available to a few Universities? Well while the others will be talking about Jogabo on Facebook and Twitter, you will have it in your hands and you will be taking it out for a spin.

GET THE EARLY ACCESSWE WANT YOUR FEEDBACK TO IMPROVE JOGABO
As part of the deal, you will be allowed to invite your friends to the app and really establish yourself as an early adopter.
The app won’t be 100% finished and there will be things that aren’t just like we would like them but that’s part of the excitement. You will actually see things before they are finished and you will be able to influence how the features will work.




There are many charities that use soccer as a tool for social change, but unfortunately many of us soccer players are completely unaware of them and their amazing work. From Africa to right in our own backyards, they are working on preventing the spread of HIV, ending homelessness and many other worthy causes... all via the universal vehicle of soccer.
So for us, making every game count takes on a whole new meaning: what if every soccer player could have a social impact while playing the game they love so much?

That’s why we are making it possible for you to dedicate the games you play and your stats to a cause. We see this as a way for you to become an ambassador for some of these charities and to raise awareness about them to your followers on the App and your friends on social networks.



We are building Jogabo for the entire soccer community. For the casual player looking for a kickaround and in need of motivation, but also the competitive player always looking to play more and to keep track of their progress. Whether you are just a player or the guy that always organizes. Whether you play pickup, casual games with friends or regular league games.
Oh and did we tell you that it will be available worldwide... yeah that’s right! So go ahead and travel the world with your cleats, those games will count too. One game, one love, one community... anywhere you go!



A special “Backer” badge on your profile page in the app so that everyone knows Jogabo exists because of you. As a huge thank you, we will also add you to the list of backers on the recognition page of our website, on our Indiegogo timeline and give you a social media shoutout.
We'll give you early access to the mobile web version of the app at the end of the campaign and 2 years of premium features once we introduce them (approx. value $100). You'll also get a Jogabo wristband which will give you special treatment if you ever play in a game with any of the founders or future Jogabo employees + BACKER
Add $3 to ship outside the US
The debut issue of the brand new "Eight by Eight" magazine along with some swag including: a nicely printed postcard version of the Özil cover, stickers and a hacky sack. Heck, we'll even throw in a discount code for a 1 year subscription + EARLY USER
This is a high quality ball by Senda Athletics that has been branded for Jogabo. These guys make top quality Fair Trade soccer equipment that connects and benefits athletes, and promote sports as a tool for development. The beautiful game takes on a whole new meaning when you know your ball was made in fair and safe working conditions and not in a sweatshop. This is not just marketing swag, this is a high quality game ball on par with the best from Nike, Adidas and the likes. Comes with the early access to the mobile web version of the App + BACKER
Specs: Size 5, hand stitched, 1.2 mm thick PU Cover material, Butyl bladder
A limited edition high-quality Jogabo T-shirt that only you and the likes of Thierry Henry, Cesc Fabregas or Eric Cantona will ever own ;) + EARLY ACCESS
Add $10 to ship outside the US

Grassroot Soccer is a charity using soccer in fight against the spread of HIV in Africa. Their ambassadors include Thierry Henry, Robert Pires, Alex Song, Bacary Sagna, Freddie Ljungberg and Oguchi Onyewu + SUPPORTER
