There are other stats that are relevant for players in those positions like “WDL ratios”, “Goals for/against” and we are always open to suggestions for more as we keep improving the product (clean sheets?). We have talked about a “Fantasy style” point system as well but one step at a time.


Won’t people just cheat and lie about their stats?
Like any system, it can be gamed. The way we see it is that most people will use it to track their real stats and compete with their friends and most people don’t lie to themselves or their friends. We weren’t going to sacrifice the user experience just to prevent some outliers from cheating but there are some things we will be able to do in the future.


How will you measure “hustle”?
Hush, hush for now... Keep an eye open for the stretch goals!


I couldn't care less about stats. Why would I want to keep track of them?
Fair enough but we think this app might change your mind actually. Friendly competition is a great way to motivate yourself and we will try to make it fun. Once you get your first MVP/MOTM, you will see, it gets a little bit addictive.


Is this only going to be for soccer?
Yeah, that’s right... soccer only. We want to make it awesome for one sport not so-so for a bunch of them. There are many other reasons for our choice and we will write a blog post about them soon.


How do you pronounce Jogabo?
Give it a try!


I love your project, but don’t have much money to pledge, how can I help?
We surely could use your help to spread the word to your friends and on social networks by sharing the link of the campaign. If you are up for more, we’ve actually put together an ambassador program so you can help throughout the campaign. Check it out here http://bombonera.jogabo.com


I don’t really play soccer, why should I fund your campaign?
Our mission goes beyond soccer. In an era when everything is digital and happens online, we want to bring people together in the real world. We believe that our app can improve the lives of people by making them more social and healthy. We also support and work closely with charities supporting causes such as homelessness, HIV/AIDS, education… We believe that our app will empower players to help raise awareness and funds for such charities through their playing.


What is Indiegogo?
Indiegogo is a crowdfunding platform. Here is a simplistic way of explaining it:
We have a cool project that we dedicated time and money to get where we are. We need financial support to complete it. You like our project. You make a pledge to support us. You pick a cool reward in exchange. We finalize our App. We launch it. We send you the reward you chose. We thank you for making it possible (because you are awesome!). You feel part of the adventure and made a difference.


Who made the music I can hear in all the Jogabo videos?
It's our dear friend Allure, an electro producer from Paris. You can listen to his album on iTunes and find him on Facebook.



(Press: Please download our Media Kit here)

story:
Technology:

Here are some of the pictures of our early prototypes:

This was the first prototype without GPS. Among not having GPS the other issues was that the battery was too small to allow the device to hold a charge for 60 days, 

Prototype number 2 we added GPS and connections to allow for a larger battery.


Prototype 3 we reduced the size of the overall unit. We added a couple more features like microphone and speakers for audible alerts. The battery that will power the unit is a 15000mAh Lithium Polymer battery capable of keeping the battery charged for 60 and also give you a full charge on your smart device. It was a huge task for us to be able to design this in a way that you can also use it as a charger for your other devices without affecting the 60 day battery life for the device.


Where are we at in the development now? Now we are adding in the  accelerometer to tell the device to shut off while it is in the aircraft. We are also in final design on the water and shockproof housing for the device. The final product with housing should be ready in less than 30 days. Which means we are running ahead of schedule and might possibly be able to move our delivery time up!

The Story

We would like to first thank you for showing enough interest in KONAS. 

My name is Michael Konas, My wife and I started KONAS six years ago in Riga, Latvia. 

KONAS started as a small leather artesian company. We focused on very high quality bags, luggage and shoes.

About 2 years ago we were on holiday and our bags were lost, really lost and never found. This had a prolific effect on our holiday and as you can imagine it put a strain on our relationship. 

While we were at dinner towards the end of our holiday were discussing how horrible it was not to have our belongings and that they would probably action them off to the lowest bidder.

This is when our holiday turned around because we both agreed that we never want anyone else to go through the same issues.

We spent the next two years researching materials, luggage, wheels, handles, attachments, linings, we built and tested numerous luggage using all kinds of materials until we found the right combination of everything.

We then assembled an IT team to see if we could build a traceable piece of luggage. The answer was yes.

We are now in the process of developing the tracking device and the application for any smart device so you will never, ever lose your luggage again. You will have more information than the airlines as to where your luggage is.

Not to mention. We have done so much research and believe in our product so much that we know it will last for generations and we stand behind that promise by offering a double lifetime guarantee. No other luggage company in the world offers a guarantee even close. So keep your luggage and then give it to you kids! We will take care of the rest!

Prior to reaching out to the crowdfunding community we spent over $150,000 in R&D. The money put into date is our own, no investors and no debt on our company. The money we spent to date has been developing the tracking chip. Of course there are sever tracking devices out there but the one developed works on three technologies. The technologies are WiFi, GSM (like your mobile phone) and GPS. Why three different technologies? We wanted our products be more than just lost luggage from the airlines. We wanted to be a means of tracking you loved ones when they go off on an adventure where there is no cell communication. We wanted to make it possible to track your belongings if you sea freighted around the world. We also wanted to make it possible for two or more adventure seekers to find each other if they got separated simply by exchanging serial numbers in the app. KONAS is much more than tracking your luggage with the airlines.


As well as the tracking chip we also had to develop a waterproof case to house the chip, artificial intelligence that would allow the chip to decide which technology to use and also to turn it's self off while in flight to meet FAA regulations. The built in accelerometer also tells the tracking device when to turn its self back on. We also had to design the luggage and backpacks in such a way that the tracing device is safe and secure and also easy to reach for  recharging the 60 day life battery, while maintaining the standard of ultralight gear.

What We Need & What You Get

Where does all the money go? Let us answer that but first let me tell you where KONAS is today.

We now have our full production facility for both the tracking chip and the luggage. We have two distribution centers, our main plant in Riga, Latvia and our distribution center in Dubai, UAE.

The money we are seeking now will go directly to finishing the application for your smartphone, mobile device and desktop. Why does it take 50,000 to build an application? It doesn't! We ran the production margins thin so that we could bring you the best perks at the best price. This means that many more perks must be taken so that we can reach our development cost, not to mention the taxes and other cost associated with fund raising. We also did not want to put ourselves in a situation where we offer perks that are financially impossible to execute on. 

Here is the breakdown:

$30,000 - Goes to completing and testing the APP

$20,000 - Goes to fulfilling the perks

So what do you get? When you purchase a set of luggage from KONAS this will literally be the last set of luggage you will ever purchase. We have spent a lot of time developing our luggage and we are the only company confident enough to offer a double lifetime warranty. See our FaQ's. You will also be the only people to have this model. After our campaign we are destroying the molds so this is a very limited edition model.

What about backpacks? We have developed super strong, light weight gear. We are all backpackers and travelers at KONAS (except our IT guy ;) but we love him anyway) we know what is necessary and how much abuse these packs will take. We offer a 5 year warranty on our backpacks, all of our backpacks feature rip stop, most with hydration systems and ultralight material.

What else? You will be getting KONAS products at a highly discounted price for this campaign. We will not offer these prices again. This pricing structure is set up for us to finalize our products and ship to you! All of the items that we offer on this page are limited edition. They will also sport the Indigogo logo so you can always remember that you were a founding member of KONAS. 

Here is the big one. The application. We are going to try and keep this a free service although the cost of purchasing data packages through carriers is very expensive. Our chips constantly ping GSM towers and satellites depending on the situation which combined with several thousand devices doing this at the same time equals a pretty big data plan! For those who helped KONAS to get to the final stage of production and delivery, you will receive this service free for life unconditionally. Even if we have to make it paid service in the future, you will still have it free.

You will also remain our our founder’s page life. We will not take this page down it is our way of thank you and staying humble by remembering how we reached this level. 1-65$ you will be listed on our bronze section, 150-400$ you will be listed as a gold founder and everything above 400$ you will be listed as a platinum founder!

The Truth

In 2012 the airlines were responsible for losing more than 26,000,000 pieces of luggage.

2 years later that number has increased to 40,000,000 by the year 2019 the number of bags lost but the airlines is expected to reach in excess of 70,000,000.

The problem is worsening and costing the airline industry a total of $2.6 billion just to track down the owners. This is a direct influence in the rising cost of airline travel.

The stress and cost impact on the airline passengers is something that you cannot put a number too. The feeling of not having your luggage or even not knowing where it is can be terrifying.

What's the Risk

We have spent that last two years in R&D to get to this point and minimize the risk.

Is there still a risk? Yes. 

With any venture there is inherent risk. The risks we face are not getting the funding which will not stop us but will add a tremendous amount of time to our development time.

If we do reach our funding goal our biggest risk is, not delivering on time. In software development you can always run into a snag. We have mitigated this risk by employing some brilliant minds from Harvard and MIT. We will keep you informed the whole step of the way. If we reach our goal we will deliver on our promise no matter what it takes. We take our reputation very seriously not to mention our future.

As far as production is concerned. We already have our production line set up and capable of producing several thousand pieces of luggage per month.  We will limit our limited edition run to only those who support us on Indigogo. 

Schedule:

To finish the application and software we need three months which puts us in November. The luggage, backpacks and tracking chip will take us 50 days, which we will run simultaneously with the software development. We are shooting to have everything delivered by Christmas this Year! Is it worth the wait? Yes if you want the best gear on the planet with the best warranty on the planet!

Tell a Friend

Purchasing a perk is not the only way that you can support KONAS and get rewarded!

If you spread the word about how great KONAS is and 5 people purchase a medium size piece of luggage we will send you a cabin bag for free (you just pay for the shipping).

If 10 people you recommend buy a medium piece of luggage or larger package then we will send you a full set (you just pay for the shipping).

If you are a super start and get 20 people to purchase a medium size bag or larger package we will send you a full set of luggage and three backpacks of your choice! NOW GET OUT THERE AND SPREAD THE WORD!!!

We appreciate all of your support and hope by offering you great perks we can show you how grateful we are.


FaQs

When I buy KONAS luggage or backpacks with smart phone tracking do I have to pay a monthly or yearly subscription to use the GPS tracking application?

No. Once you purchase one of our products, the application and tracking service is free for life.

Where do you produce your luggage?

Our parts are all manufactured in different parts of the world. The final assembly and testing is done in our factory in Riga, Latvia

Where do you ship?

We ship globally

Why is the estimated delivery date December 2014?

Although we are at the tail end of our development of the software and hardware, we still need a little time to perfect everything and make sure that when we do deliver your products they are perfect so you will never have to worry about your bags. This is much better for you to have a company with your best intrest in mind than a company that is rushing to deliver to get the sales

Where will my product be shipped from?

Europe, Eastern Europe, North America, South America, Australia, New Zealand  will be shipped from our factory in Latvia

Middle East, Africa, Asia, India will be shipped from our Dubai distribution center

Can I buy from a store near me?

Not yet. For now the only way you can purchase is on Indigogo and then our web store once our Indigogo campaign is over we will launch our web store.

Can I become a dealer?

Yes. If you have a brick and mortar store and would like to become a dealer please contact us dealer@konasbags.com

We will send you a dealer application with the minimum order requirements

If I have a web store can I become a retailer?

We will consider it. Please send an email to dealer@konasbags.com

Can I become a distributor?

If you are currently a distributor and would like to become a distributor for KONAS. Please send us an email to distribution@konasbags.com  we will send you an application and minimum order requirements

Why do you not have a large selection of luggage and backpacks?

Our goal is to make the best luggage and backpacks on the market while giving you the best warranty on the market. We can only do this if we focus on a couple of products at a time. As we grow we will offer a wider selection but we promise never to do this at the cost of delivering you a less than perfect product

What is your warranty?

Our luggage has a double lifetime, unconditional warranty. Our backpacks have a 5 year warranty please see our warranty section and if you should ever have an issue with one of our products please send us an email to warranty@konasbags.com we will respond within 24 hours (time differences) and we will rectify your problem immediately

What is planned next?

We have something really amazing coming up! We can't tell you now but in the near future we will tell the world. This is the next coolest thing in the luggage industry besides being able to finally track your luggage.

Below you will find all the publications that KONAS has been in.

story:
Hello Indiegogoers!

We are happy to introduce the MyPowerPebble for emergency charging On-The-Go! Many of you out there may have seen or maybe even already have a battery back up power supply for your phone.  The problem most of the time is that they are big, heavy and an extra thing to carry around that is just not practical to have with you at all times.  In addition, they normally have all these cables you carry with you to make sure you can connect it to your phone.  If you forget or lose your cable, you are still without power!   Well, we set out to make a COMPACT, EASY TO USE, SLEEK and JUST PLAIN SEXY On-The-Go charger that you wouldn’t even know was in your pocket till you need it. No extra wires to make it fit your phone.. just plug it into your phone at the time you need it most for a boost of power to get you through that important moment when you need your phone most! 

  • No Missing Calls Because of a Dead Battery!
  • Don’t Drop that Important Call Because Your Battery Died!
  • Fits into your pocket or purse so you have it when you need it!
  • Add 3-5 Hours of Talk Time or up to 20 Hours of Music Time
  • Use while you talk on the phone!


Custom Skins!

CUSTOMIZE!  MyPowerPebble will be the FIRST one on the market with SKINS to customize! We are planning on offering multiple different Skin Packs for you to choose from to make your MyPowerPebble the way you want it!


Custom BRANDING!

We will also be the only one on the market that you can customize for your company or organization! We already have the ability to put any logo on the front with a small set up fee and small printing fee for awesome branding and promotions. 


What We Need & What You Get

Here's the Deal:

  • We already have made the main product! It has been molded, created and tested and is in production.  We are ordering our first shipments to arrive in the US now!
  • We have already created our first TV commercial for the product. 
  • NOW, we want to take the product to the next level with awesome packaging for big chain retail stores and do a large marketing push... YOUR INDIEGOGO support will aide in this! 

Why MyPowerPebble over others? 

Like many of you, we have purchased other products that have back up power for our phones but found that for one reason or another, we did not carry them with us. It doesn't matter if its because its too big, bulky, ugly, heavy, or have too many parts you can lose, the point is.. you don't have them with you so they can not do what they are intended to do!  MyPowerPebble is that perfect balance of Sleek & Stylish Compact Design with the right amount of power to get you through the important times when you need it most.  Why? Because you will have it with you, since it’s small and comfortable to put in any pocket or purse.  And since you can customize it with your choice of Skin or even Brand it with a company logo... we believe this to be a fantastic product that will be used as intended! 

THE PERKS

We are offering below retail deals and INSANE deals on volume orders and Custom Branded orders! Check out the Perks… Pick one and Join us!


FAQ – Frequently Asked Questions

·  Can I use my phone while it is being charged by MyPowerPebble? YES! Just Plug It In And KEEP ON TALKING, Playing games or listening to music!

·  How does the MyPowerPebble hold up in my pocket or purse? Quite well actually! It is made of strong plastic and  the top has a magnetic connector so you don’t lose it in your pocket or purse!

·  How much Power does it hold? It means it charge your phone enough to power it for 3-5 hours or talk time and up to 20 hours or music play. It will not fully charge your phone.. but it will get you through the unfortunate times when your phone would have died on you!

· Can we ship them outside the US? YES - Outside US Shipping - additional $10 for Canada/Mexico and $15 for WorldWide. For multiple and larger orders different prices apply.. look at the perks for more info or message us. :)

·  Got any other questions? Message us!

About Us

We design products that not only solve problems… but solve them with style! We’re a team from Southern California that thrives on the creative process and taking our projects to a higher level that meets and exceeds the expectation of the upwardly mobile and exciting people that make up this amazing world of ours!

We choose to lead, follow and learn along side everyone out there that feels we have not yet done it all and knows that there is much yet to be discovered. 

If you agree with these basic principals then you are a welcome asset to our team and ask you to join us by supporting this project! 


Other Ways You Can Help

Help us promote! Do you run a blog, have lots of FB or Twitter friends? Share our page with everyone! 

Do you own a store and want to cary our product? Message us! Or.. Do you know decision makers at retail stores that might want to cary our product? Message us!

of you out there may have seen or maybe even already have a battery back up
power supply for your phone.  The problem most of the time is that they
are big, heavy and an extra thing to carry around that is just not practical to
have with you at all times.  In addition, they normally have all these
cables you carry with you to make sure you can connect it to your phone.
 If you forget or lose your cable, you are still without power!  
Well, we set out to make a COMPACT, EASY TO USE, SLEEK and JUST PLAIN SEXY
On-The-Go charger that you wouldn’t even know was in your pocket till you need
it. No extra wires to make it fit your phone.. just plug it into your phone at
the time you need it most for a boost of power to get you through that
important moment when you need your phone most! 

No
     Missing Calls Because of a Dead Battery!
Don’t
     Drop that Important Call Because Your Battery Died!
Fits
     into your pocket or purse so you have it when you need it!
Add
     3-5 Hours of Talk Time or up to 20 Hours of Music Time
Use
     while you talk on the phone!

Custom Skins!CUSTOMIZE!  MyPowerPebble will be the FIRST one on the market
with SKINS to customize! We are planning on offering multiple different Skin
Packs for you to choose from to make your MyPowerPebble the way you want it!
Custom BRANDING!We will also be the only one on the market that you
can customize for your company or organization! We already have the ability to
put any logo on the front with a small set up fee and small printing fee for
awesome branding and promotions. 

What
We Need & What You Get
Here's
the Deal:

We
     already have made the main product! It has been molded, created and tested
     and is in production.  We are ordering our first shipments to arrive
     in the US now!
We
     have already created our first TV commercial for the product. 

NOW,
     we want to take the product to the next level with awesome packaging for
     big chain retail stores and do a large marketing push... YOUR INDIEGOGO
     support will aide in this! 
Why
MyPowerPebble over others? 
Like
many of you, we have purchased other products that have back up power for our
phones but found that for one reason or another, we did not carry them with us.
It doesn't matter if its because its too big, bulky, ugly, heavy, or have too
many parts you can lose, the point is.. you don't have them with you so they
can not do what they are intended to do!  MyPowerPebble is that perfect
balance of Sleek & Stylish Compact Design with the right amount
of power to get you through the important times when you need it most.
 Why? Because you will have it with you, since it’s small and comfortable
to put in any pocket or purse.  And since you can customize it with your
choice of Skin or even Brand it with a company logo... we believe this to be a
fantastic product that will be used as intended! 
THE
PERKS
We are offering below retail deals and INSANE deals on volume
orders and Custom Branded orders! Check out the Perks… Pick one and Join us! 

FAQ
– Frequently Asked Questions
· 
Can I use my phone while it is being charged by MyPowerPebble? YES! Just Plug It In
And KEEP ON TALKING, Playing games or listening to music! 
· 
How does the MyPowerPebble hold up in my pocket or purse? Quite well actually!
It is made of strong plastic and  the top
has a magnetic connector so you don’t lose it in your pocket or purse!
· 
How much Power does it hold? It means it charge your phone
enough to power it for 3-5 hours or talk time and up to 20 hours or music play.
It will not fully charge your phone.. but it will get you through the
unfortunate times when your phone would have died on you! · Can we ship them outside the US? YES - Outside US Shipping - additional $10 for Canada/Mexico and $15 for WorldWide. For multiple and larger orders different prices apply.. look at the perks for more info or message us. :)
· 
Got any other questions? Message us!

About Us
We design products that not only solve
problems… but solve them with style! We’re a team from Southern California that
thrives on the creative process and taking our projects to a higher level that
meets and exceeds the expectation of the upwardly mobile and exciting people
that make up this amazing world of ours!
We choose to lead, follow and learn along side
everyone out there that feels we have not yet done it all and knows that there
is much yet to be discovered.  
If you agree with these basic principals then you are a welcome
asset to our team and ask you to join us by supporting this project! Other Ways You Can Help
Help us promote! Do you run a blog, have lots of FB or Twitter friends? Share our page with everyone! Do you own a store and want to cary our product? Message us! Or.. Do you know decision makers at retail stores that might want to cary our product? Message us!

story:
Short Summary

We have improved sublimation technique so we can have full body printing in Phone and Tablet cases with perfect results at half the actual market price.

We need to set up our factory and implement a webstore.

Everyone can design cases and sell to the world, winning some money, without the problems associated with producing. You design, we sell, we produce it and you win money.

Our brand is art4tech.

My name is Paulo Pereira, and i'm the owner.

I was a managing director in a Portuguese Bank and i'm recently unemployed.

I'm creating this project so that other people can design cases and sell them to the world, winning some money in this hard times we live in.

We need contributors funds so we can invest in the machinery, in blank cases, to produce the molds and to design and implement our online store, so we can share it to the world.

 

What We Need & What You Get

The funds we colect will be used in the following way:

- 3 sublimation machines;

- 2 epson printer prepared to sublimation;

- Implementation of the webstore (multivendor) with an adapted online designer;

- Producing molds for main phone and tablet models;

- Producing blanks to work with;

- Initial payment to new factory site.

We will print cases like:

 

The machines we will use are

 

We will give back the funds in the following way, depending on the value (see Perks for details)

- Websore page with initial store members (founders);

- A phone or tablet case, produced with your image, or with our image, shipped to your address;

- Each time we sell a case designed by a founder member, you win twice the standard commisions, winning over 2€ each time a case is sold.

 

The Impact

With your funds we will be able to implemnt all in 3 months.

Help us create a word market for designer phone and tablet cases, were you make the designs and the cases are sell at a low price, considering cases actual market prices.

We will be able to help unemployed people and others. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute to the project, please help spread the word.

Please share it and use the social buttons to help us to reach the world.

story:
Our Story

The Fayetteville Free Library is excited to offer a new public service—the FFL Fab Lab. What exactly is a fab lab? According to Neil Gershenfeld, the Director of MIT’s Center for Bits and Atoms and author of Fab: the Coming Revolution on Your Desktop-From Personal Computers to Personal Fabrication, a fab lab is “a collection of commercially available machines and parts linked by software and processes developed for making things (Gershenfeld, 12).” At the foundation of the FFL's Fab Lab will be a MakerBot Thing-o-Matic 3D printer, made available to the library through a generous donation from Express Computer Services.

The Impact

Over the past fifty years, the manner in which we process information has changed. New technological developments have changed the way we interact with information, allowing us to become "creators" rather than just "consumers." There are few places that currently provide FREE community access to new, innovative creation technology like 3D printers. The public library provides a safe and accessible space where anyone in the community can interact, understand and develop through use of this technology.The FFL is encouraging local innovation, collaboration, and education through offering this new public service. We are documenting the process so that other libraries across the country can replicate it, making their own free, public access Fab Labs.

What We Need

We are asking for $20,000. This money will go towards purchasing more technology for the FFL Fab Lab (more MakerBot's, a CNC Router, Lazor Cutter, and MAC Lab), ABS plastic for our MakerBot (to help keep this service FREE for the public), as well as bring in experts to give lectures and share their experience. The FFL has already recieved first round approval for a NY State Library Construction Grant for $250,000 to renovate the East wing of the library. We also won an Innovation Award of $10,000 from the Contact Summit on October 20th.  This project is happening now and your support will not only ensure it's success but help us spread the word to other libraries across the country. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please spread the word! Share this campaign with your friends and family—tweet it, facebook it, G+ it. Be a library hero. Support the future of libraries. Become a Maker.

story:
Short Summary

We are a small team with a dream. We wish to start an AFFORDABLE 3d printing service. A 3d printing service is a website and/or company that accepts 3d files and uses 3d printers to build a physical model of the object that you can touch and hold. There are many 3d printing services online but none of them are reasonably priced. Because it is such a neat Idea and there are a small enough amount of them to keep the demand high, they are able to charge exorbitantly high fees for their services. We plan on charging little more than the cost for the plastic to make the models out of. On another note, I have wished for a personal 3d printer for a very long time.

What We Need  

If we make our $2500 goal it will go to:

$2000 for 2 3d printers

$500 to have a website designed to sell services from

$1500 is the bare minimum we can make it on. Plastic to make the models from will cost us at least $20 a pound and to keep up with demand we would have to get additional printers so the higher over the goal we can get, the better! $5000 would be wonderful, 10,000 even better.

If we do not reach our goal we will explore alternate routes to getting the necissary funds. Your contributions will be used to supplement those funds if it comes to that. All backers will have the option of recieving a one time email letting them know when the website is up (this doesnt mean monthly and this doesnt mean we will give it out. You will recieve ONE email if you choose to).

What You Get

Fun Prizes!

Read the perks panel for more detail.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

If you agree with this cause please, by all means, spread the word! We won't be able to make it without all the help we can get.

Also, remember to use the Indiegogo share tools! :)

 

Don’t know how to make 3D Models? No problem! Plesio offers  free pre-designed models. Still want to be creative? Check out the project of our friends at NEMOART http://igg.me/at/nemoart/x/2854534 They are releasing an intuitive tool for 3D modeling on your smartphone- So simple a baby could do it!

Thanks, Colton

story:
Are you tired of carrying around different charging cables to keep your mobile gadgets charged?  Is your backpack pocket full of tangled cables that are headache to use when you need them?  People carry around more gadgets than ever to complement the mobile lifestyle.  Apple, Android, Windows phones, iPad and tablets, e-books, power banks, portable speakers have become common-carry items for many people.  We have recognized this problem and have dedicated ourselves to solve it.  Scroll down to find out more.






If you are familiar with the Apple’s implementation of its Lightning connector, you would know by now that you NEED an Apple certified connector to properly charge your Apple device. Apple controls its certified products from the development phase right to the release based on its strict performance standards.  Our Universal Charging Cable is guaranteed to work with all iDevices and previous, present and future versions of iOS.

 
“Made for iPod”, “Made for iPhone” and “Made for iPad” mean that an electronic accessory has been designed to connect specifically to iPod, iPhone or iPad, respectively, and has been certified by the developer to meet Apple performance standards. Apple is not responsible for the operation of this device or its compliance with safety and regulatory standards. Please note that the use of this accessory with iPod, iPhone or iPad may affect wireless performance. iPod, iPhone, iPad, iPod classic, iPod nano and iPod touch are trademarks of Apple Inc, registered in the U.S and other countries. Lightning is a trademark of Apple Inc.


Our Universal Charging Cable provides 3 certified charging tips for all the popular mobile gadgets available - Lightning, MicroUSB and 30-Pin connectors - compatible with but not limited to : iPhone 6S/6/5S/5/5C/4S/4/3GS/3G/1, iPad Air 2/1, iPad mini 3/2/1, iPad 4/3/2/1, iPod touch 5/4/3/2/1, iPod nano 7/6/5/4/3/2/1, iPod classic, Android smartphones and tablets, Windows smartphones, Kindle and e-books, power banks, portable speakers, modern digital cameras with microUSB charging port and more.   The charging tips are conveniently detachable from the cable for various applications.  We are proud to say that this is the only 3-in-1 charging cable in the market with Apple MFi certification, as we have worked closely with our factory and the Apple’s engineering team to develop a product that meets Apple’s strict performance standards.


The tips are conveniently detachable.

Our Universal Charging Cable can sync most smartphones and tablets to your computer.



We were very focused on delivering a highly durable cable that can withstand day-to-day beating.  In order to do that, we used the highest-grade thermoplastic polyurethane (TPU) commonly used for its durability, flexibility and the ability to retain its shape (does not stretch).  Below are some of the reasons why we picked TPU, according to PROSPECTOR.

  • Tough and durable, unparalleled with their abrasion resistance
  • Well suited for both soft and rigid applications
  • Offer good color stability with UV additives
  • Formulated for applications calling for good-to-excellent transparency
  • Recyclable
  • Resistant to oil, grease, fuel, solvents and chemicals
  • Cut and tear resistant
  • Offer low temperature flexibility and fatigue resistance
  • Resistant to creep in load bearing applications
  • Available in halogen and non-halogen (fire retardant) grades
  • Depending on the grade, capable of being injection molded, extruded, blow molded, calendared, slush molded or thermoformed
  • Readily available in a variety of hardnesses, ranging from 50 Shore A to 85 Shore D
  • Fungus and microbial resistant, especially polyether TPUs
  • Good for applications calling for ultrasound transparency
  • Suited for both soft and rigid applications
  • Light weight (especially as a metals replacement)
  • Provided with good elasticity qualities
  • Hydrolytically stable and naturally antimicrobial (polyether TPUs)
  • Assured to provide good color stability with UV additives
  • Capable of offering excellent adhesion strength to many different substrates in overmolding soft-touch applications



We also designed the cable with the steel-braid inside and the tin-foil insulation for maximum durability.  This is also a part of the requirements in Apple MFi guideline.



Our Universal Charging Cable is compatible with but not limited to : iPhone 6S/6/5S/5/5C/4S/4/3GS/3G/1, iPad Air 2/1, iPad mini 3/2/1, iPad 4/3/2/1, iPod touch 5/4/3/2/1, iPod nano 7/6/5/4/3/2/1, iPod classic, Android smartphones and tablets, Windows smartphones, Kindle and e-books, power banks, portable speakers, modern digital cameras with microUSB charging port and more.  Please inquire us if you have questions about our cable’s compatibility with your device.




 

*Our Universal Charging Cable will charge only one device at a time.








With a solid background in design with bachelor’s degree in Digital Arts from University of Oregon, Peter has acquired diverse entrepreneurial skillsets over 6 years in the consumer electronics field, from print, package design, web application, mobile application development to sales, marketing, distribution and retail.

Situated in Italy, Giuseppe has over 10 years of experience in the consumer electronics field. His extensive production expertise extends to a large network of industry-leading factories located globally. One of Giuseppe’s strongest skillsets is his ability to predict the trend, plan and develop a product that stays ahead of the market.

* Video credit and huge thanks go out to a big contributor, mentor, artist, designer and friend Salvador Juarez for directing and editing the video.



After an extensive market research, we have found that there is not a single 3-in-1 cable with MFi certification on the market. Our target was to develop a form-factor that could be certified - it meant that we would have to find a solution within using the adapters because sharing one PCB board of different connectors were strictly prohibited from Apple.

Then, we got our initial sketch into the industrial design quickly.  We have gone through several concepts to finalize on the latest design.  At this stage we added the detachable functionality of the adapters to make the cable even more versatile.

After finalizing the design and mechanics of the cable, we visited our MFi partner factory to submit the product plan to Apple and fine-tune the specifications.

MFi manufacturing involves impeccable quality control.

Laser soldering (above) is required for MFi manufacturing.

story:
#1 Carrying your charger

 

#2 Cable Damage and Fraying

#3 Keeping your Cable Organized

 

 

 

 

 

 

 Please help us spread the word! We know not everyone owns a MacBook, so even if you can't use a Side Winder, you can help us spread the word on Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest or Linkedin. We can't do this without you! 

 

         


 

      

 

   

 

 

 

 

 

 Once a we had a basic functional design, we began prototyping. Working our 3D printer to the bone with over 40 Days of continuous printing, we printed out over 30 prototypes and began testing and running focus groups to improve the initial design.

 

 

 

 

 

Visit our website at www.fusereel.com

 

 One day while studying for an upcoming manufacturing test, I noticed every table was covered in an ugly mess of chargers. I immediately closed my books and laptop and drove straight to Home Depot, found an electricians fish tape, taped in my MacBook charger, and Fuse was born. 

I later converted my college house basement into a makeshift workshop. Fueled by many nights of energy drinks, and Top Ramen, The Side Winder went from idea to reality. After competing in various business and engineering competitions, we gained enough traction to dedicate ourselves full-time in bringing this product to life. 

 

All apple logos are owned by apple. Fuse is not endorsed or affiliated with Apple Inc.
story_txt:
Keep your charger organized everywhere you go  #1 Carrying your chargerThe MacBook charger was not meant to be carried. It is bulky, clunky and extremely difficult to store #2 Cable Damage and FrayingOver 60% of MacBook chargers fray within the first 3 years of use. Improper winding and storing cause the charging cables to bend, twist and eventually fray to the point of uselessness#3 Keeping your Cable OrganizedThe charging cable is capable of reaching 12 feet to an outlet. Unfortunately, you rarely need the full 12 feet of cable. This causes a bundled mess of unnecessary cords.    The Side Winder Allows the user to easily wind the MacBook charger Adjustable length control allows you to be organized whether you are 6 inches or 12 feet from the outlet The Side Winder's patent pending design eliminates cable damage and fraying Please help us spread the word! We know not everyone owns a MacBook, so even if you can't use a Side Winder, you can help us spread the word on Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest or Linkedin. We can't do this without you!                      Step 1: Insert the charger Step 2: Wind The Side Winder Step 3: GO!  The Side Winder Requires the extension cable (NOT INCLUDED)
MacBook Air Owners Watch this video!!!!!


What's the Difference between the Magsafe model and the USB-C Model?


  Once a we had a basic functional design, we began prototyping. Working our 3D printer to the bone with over 40 Days of continuous printing, we printed out over 30 prototypes and began testing and running focus groups to improve the initial design.3D Printing Prototypes Preliminary testing and CAD modeling  Over 30 Prototypes were created to perfect the final Side Winder   Visit our website at www.fusereel.com  One day while studying for an upcoming manufacturing test, I noticed every table was covered in an ugly mess of chargers. I immediately closed my books and laptop and drove straight to Home Depot, found an electricians fish tape, taped in my MacBook charger, and Fuse was born. I later converted my college house basement into a makeshift workshop. Fueled by many nights of energy drinks, and Top Ramen, The Side Winder went from idea to reality. After competing in various business and engineering competitions, we gained enough traction to dedicate ourselves full-time in bringing this product to life. The Fuse booth and BYU's Student Innovator of the Year Competition All apple logos are owned by apple. Fuse is not endorsed or affiliated with Apple Inc.

story:
Hi there!

 

We're Mario and Dennis, and we are making Zoftilo Voice Chat. If you're reading this, you have probably used some, or many of the available voice chat software today. Some better some worse. Our main goal with this project, is to create a voice chat client and server, that is easy to use, free for personal usage, and at a minimum capable of running on Linux, Mac OS X, and Windows.

 

Introduction

We are two swedish guys developing softare on our spare time. We simply love playing online games, as well as developing games and applications. We have used many "VOIP" voice over IP applications over the years. And of course rented servers for our gaming needs. Sometimes ending up abit frustrated, not able to find a simple solution working on several platforms. We wish people to be able to play games and collaborate in any project, while talking to their friends using the operating system of their choice! It's also very important to us, to support Linux as a viable gaming platform in the future.

 

 

 Linux and Mac Lobby Screen Shots

 

Zoftilo Voice Chat one small step towards gaming and collaborating over multiple platforms.

Some of the many features will include:

  • Voice over IP communication with groups
  • Password protected server
  • Remote server administration
  • Server controls codec & sound quality
  • Push to Talk and Voice Activation
  • SpeeX codec at 8Khz, 16Khz, 32Khz
  • Dynamic limits for login attempts
  • Dynamic channel creation
  • Password protected channels
  • User comments
  • Mute sound and microphone
  • Noise Reduction with highpass filter
  • Dynamic Sound effects
  • Color Selections

 

What We Need & Why

The money will cover our costs for hardware, development tools and keeping them up to date. This means: software, development licenses, computer hardware, and additional assets. If you are generous we will try to make Zoftilo client versions for Android and IOS. Anything extra goes into developing games for Linux and Mac OS X. If there is (against all odds) anything left after that, we will probably have to buy something nice to our very patient wifes and children, who lets us spend so many hours in the evenings, with what we love to do.

Planned beta release is end of may 2013.

 

What if we don't reach our goal?

If we don't reach our entire goal with this campaign. We will still finish Zoftilo. And we will still try to finish it for as many platforms as possible. However, it will take longer, and we will not be able to make client versions for Android and IOS.

 

The Impact

Your support means:

Helping us create Zoftilo, will not just support a free multi platform voice chat, you will also encourage and help us creating future multiplayer games for Linux, Mac OS X, and Windows. Our long term goal, and great passion, is to make Linux known as a strong and viable gaming platform.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some of you just can’t afford to contribute with money, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help! What you can do is:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about our Zoftilo campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Share this page on facebook and any social media available.

Spreading the word is just as important!

 

Contact email:

mario at noobzoft dot com

dennis at noobzoft dot com

story:
Dont have money? You can still help! Share with a post in facebook or tweet. And you'll get color-scheme themes corresponding those networks! Pay with Tweat or Facebook post

Today we have so many internet services for so many tasks

Sometimes it becomes really hard to keep track on the important stuff. It seems like our private information is located everywhere, and it’s so easy to get lost in this mess.

Imagine Wikipedia but for a social network. Open, free, and powered by its users. We believe that your private information must always be under your full control. We believe that a web service must be a just a tool and it must have absolutely no power over its user. It must serve people not control them. And such a project can only be funded by people.

Unfortunately developing such project is not cheap, but we will try our best to keep within the minimum budget possible. However, more money, more possibilities we will have.

Meomni in Details

Meomni web application for existing social networks. All the messages, photos, videos will be hosted by such networks, while Meomni will only unite them under our simple interface and will give you:

Meomni Client

Meomni web application for existing social networks. All the messages, photos, videos will be hosted by them. Meomni will only unite them under our simple interface and will give you:

  • One unified interface for existing social networks and web services.
  • Merged news and post feed of your friends and groups from all networks.
  • United messaging system for existing social networks and web services.
  • Chat with everyone you know from different chat systems.
  • United photo and video interface for existing social networks and web services.
  • Music player with an option to stream music from a cloud storage of your choice.
  • RSS reader. Subscribe for your favorite websites.
  • Color schemes. Completely change the way Meomni looks.
  • Widgets. Anyone can make their custom widgets.
  • Everything will be module-based and you guys can develop your own modules to enhance Meomni functionality.

This will be our platform from which we can launch our Dream goal.

Meomni Social

Our own over-the-top secure social network. It will include everything from Meomni Client, plus:

  • We will develop our own secure end-to-end messaging system.
  • All the private information will be encrypted, we will not be able to read it.
  • Option for you to delete all your private information.
  • Option to disable your chat history on your account and on others (your messages will not be saved in your friends’ chats)
  • You can mark messages individually to be self-deleted from History after being read.
  • And finally you can move your personal data from our servers to third party servers. (this feature will be discussed later)

How money will be spent?

Every cent will be spent on development. Later when the project is released, we will allow our users to decide where to invest one-third of the money. It will be named "User-Will-Development". As you can see, our moto “power to the users” works even here.

Final words

Our goal is to create a big and powerful but absolutely harmless service, like a blue whale. The service which can't do harm even if "bad" guys take control over it. 
Your data will always be encrypted, what our servers see is only 0s and 1s. Decryption takes place only on your device. In the event of your traffic interceptiont your data remains encrypted. Such method is called Zero-Knowledge Privacy.

And remember we are not forcing you to use our messaging system. We will do our best to make possible for you, to change messaging provider on any other you want. In this way Meomni will serve you only as interface, and you know what? We are totally fine with that!

story:
My name is Derrick Samuels. I been inventing and creating tech devices and platforms since 2004. I’m fascinated with technology and how it can benefit people. My area of expertise is gaming, but I often venture into an array of other technological areas. In 2012 I was working on my OTON X game console, which can create game levels or games without programmer’s coding. So one day I wanted to take a picture of the OTON prototype consoles from various angles. I wanted a full 360 degree view in one continuous shot. Right at that moment I had an idea! What if I could design a device that would hover to provide a hands-free perspective while taking pictures or videos, support PC functions, and just for kicks, support video augmentation and virtual reality gaming? The OTON AyR was born! Now here’s where you come in. To reach the full 360 AyR hover version, we must build the base model we are proposing. Today, we are offering the OTON AyR PC for developers and early adopter units on IndieGogo.com. 

·  Cloud PC
·  Reminder virtual assistance alerts
·  Built-in rear HD projector
·  Compact unit—one piece for easy storage
·  Cloud storage
·  Camera

·  Take photos
·  Record videos
·  Sync with your mobile

·  Watch movies on any surface when a TV isn’t present
·  Watch video anywhere without a monitor (PC monitor not required)
·  Talk to friends and project the conversation on the wall
·  Play instant 2D games levels created by OTON AyR creation engine

The OTON AyR can also serve as a cloud-based PC. The system allows you to store and upload data to the cloud. Easily store your most important documents, videos, and photos in one place. The OTON AyR design gives the unit flexibility to be mobile for on the go usage. 

A portion of the money will be used to build a few prototypes and complete the development software. We already have the parts and the engineer to build units. The rest of the money will go toward paying the engineer, plus any additional costs resulting from prototype development. 

We plan to finish the production of the basic OTON AyR PC for developers in April 2014; we left enough time before the release date to solve any unexpected problems. Our current team has over 10 years of manufacturing and developing experience. Our talented team has a diverse set of skills and, if needed, will do a great job in problem solving. Our goal is to have units ready in 2014 for our financial backers.

We guarantee that if we don’t ship your AyR on the date promised we will give you a second AyR  FREE!  A 2 for 1 deal GUARANTEED!!!

story:
You’ve got the latest iPhone only to realize that you are unable to use your wired headphones and speakers when it’s being charged. Fortunately, a brilliant solution is on its way.

Duo 2.0 is the only cable you ever need to help you get out of this dilemma. With the groundbreaking integration of the charging cable and a Lightning socket, Duo 2 is not just a charging cable but also an audio transmitter. You don’t need to throw the dice to choose between charging and music from now on, Duo 2 allows you to do both in one go!

There is indeed a wealth of splitters out there aimed to solve the listening and charging dilemma with the new iPhone, yet they’re far from ideal as all of them require an additional cable to make things work. Such cumbersome approach simply ruins the minimalist design of iPhone.

Compared to other adaptors and cables, Duo 2 is far more handier and portable than those on the market; not to mention it’s made out of top-notch materials. It offers you the most convenient way to charge and listen to music at the same time. With Duo 2, you can embrace the simplicity of life!

"We tried it for a while and we totally loved it. It keeps fast charging and the audio doesn’t lose its quality. "

by No Place Called Home click to see>

“A worthy investment for iPhone users... I really like that it gives you the option to charge your phone and not have your listening experience interrupted.“

by Mac Sources click to see>

 

“Duo 2 was not as easy as splitting the Lightning cable. It had to support things like remote control and handsfree calling.”

by Gadget Guy click to see>

“This is a permanent solution, makes the Duo 2 a particularly nice choice if you listen to music for long periods of time, like on transatlantic flights or in noisy offices.

We’re happy to recommend the Duo 2 to any iPhone X, iPhone 8 or iPhone 7 users.”

by xsreviews click to see>

 

“Charging was flawless whether we used our MacBook Pro, the standard Apple iPhone power cube or our Belkin Power Rockstar 10000 battery pack... In all cases the audio played perfectly with excellent sound quality ."

by Apple Tech Talk click to see>

We design Duo 2 to be your ultimate solution for non-stop music while charging. It is inherently multifunctional to facilitate you switching between volume and phone calls. And the integrated DAC allows you to enjoy 24-bit high-quality music anywhere, anytime.

With the unique integration design, Duo 2 enables you to conveniently use the headset while feeding your new iPhone via a single line.

 

You can freely play, pause, skip track, or adjust the volume by clicking the control button on your handset.

Adopt 48 kHz, 24-bit audio output to deliver the highest-fidelity sound from your devices.

Duo 2 is also a multifunctional cable so you can charge and sync with ease.

Nylon fabric coated cable, Duo 2 is tangle-free and durable. Never worry about wearing out your cables!

Duo 2 supports Apple Lightning to 3.5mm headphone jack adapter, you can enjoy music with your favorite earphones!

 

We are Vinpok team, a group of passionate tech lovers who have years of experience in design, marketing and manufacturing. We aim to provide premium accessories and electronics for your computers, tablets and mobile devices. Our product concept starts with the idea of providing ultimate convenience to Apple users, since the removal of headphone jack on iPhone 7. Many manufacturers have tried to take advantage of Apple’s loophole, but none of them are able to take Apple user out of the listen-or-charge dilemma. So here we are. With Duo 2, you can play music while charging your phone with a single compact cable. A perfect demonstration of Less is More.

 

Share Duo 2 With Your Friends!

 

FAQ

Will Duo 2 support my device?

Duo 2 works perfectly with iPhone 7/7 plus, iPhone 8/8 plus and iPhone X. For devices earlier than the iPhone 7 and iPads, the Duo 2 works like a premium Lightning charging cable but does not support headphones.

What’s the shipping cost?

Vinpok offers free shipping for worldwide orders except for the remote area. 

 

When will you ship the item? 

You’ll find your estimated shipping time via View Order Details. To do that, please login to your Indiegogo account and click your name at the top right of the page. In the menu that drops down, choose My Contributions, then click on View Order Details. You'll now see all of the details of this contribution

 

Do I have to pay VAT and duty?

For backers living in countries with import duties and taxes, these costs will have to be covered by the backers at delivery. We'll try our best to avoid duty and VAT. However, we cannot reassure that you won't pay VAT and duty. 

 

Remote area shipping cost.

Shipping costs do NOT include extra costs that may incur for shipment to areas defined by DHL as remote. Customers may check here: http://raslist.dhl.com/jsp/first.jsp with your city’s postal code (make sure you use your city’s postal code, otherwise, it will not be accurate)

 

Do you got a customer service email?

hi@vinpok.com

 

Risks and Challenges

Time is always the most challenging part when trying to bring a product to life as there are so many procedures that must be managed. However, with this being our second Indiegogo campaign, we can confidently say that we are already familiar with the Crowdfunding process. Most importantly, the electronic product design and production are no strangers to us. We believe that our experienced team can well mitigate all potential risks in this journey. And will strive for excellence from project planning, production to order shipping. If there’s any obstacle, we will definitely keep you in the loop. Thanks for believing in us!

 

 

What’s the warranty period for Duo 2?

 

We offer a 1-year manufacturer warranty for Duo 2 backers. Our support staff is always available to help as well, so if you're having issues using your product please let us know and we'll take care of it.

Our support staff is always available to help as well, so if you're having issues using your product please let us know and we'll take care of it.

story:
A year ago we launched on Kickstarter with Vufine, the world’s first truly affordable wearable display and, thanks to our backers, had a remarkable campaign. The best part: we delivered Vufine to our 1400 backers. We believe in making our technology as simple as possible to help users take advantage of their favorite devices hands-free and at an affordable price.

 

 

Introducing Vufine+

Built upon the invaluable feedback from our backers, we’re back with Vufine+: the next evolution in wearable displays. Vufine+ has a larger, more versatile display and a totally redefined docking station. Like our first unit, Vufine+ is able to connect to most major smartphones, laptops, tablets, drones and cameras to provide a second monitor or mirrored display for the user. This connection is achieved through the included micro-to-full HDMI cable and, depending on the device, appropriate HDMI adaptor.

 

 

 

The Screen:

With Vufine+ we wanted to make the screen larger and more versatile. Our first campaign taught us just how many users were connecting Vufine with tablets or with smartphones displaying in portrait. With Vufine+ we made sure that no matter what device you’ve connected you are getting the largest display possible.

 

Display Modes:

Vufine+ offers 3 different display modes to allow users to optimize the display no matter what device they are using. The new Zoom Mode has increased the size of portrait displays and 4:3 landscape displays by 77% and the new Fit Mode expands 16:9 landscape by 33% with the Standard Mode designed specifically for unaltered 16:9 viewing.

  • Fit: The new Fit Mode has increased landscape by 33%
  • Zoom: The new Zoom Mode has increased the size of portrait displays by 77%
  • Standard: Designed specifically for unaltered 16:9 viewing. 

The Docking Station: 

Lastly, we completely redesigned the docking station. We know a new, larger display is only as good as the ability to position it to comfort. The new docking station utilizes a ball joint and pivoting arm to allow users a whole new way to adjust Vufine+ to ensure the best, most comfortable viewing angle.

By retaining the shape of Vufine, we were able to make Vufine+ compatible with all of the current Vufine accessories so users are able to further personalize their viewing experience. The Vufine+ package includes both the new and traditional magnetic docking stations with additional accessories available to purchase when we collect backer survey information through Backer Kit after the campaign ends.

 Colors:

Vufine+ is available in four limited edition colors through Kickstarter. So, whether it’s simply a favorite color or a diehard team allegiance, Vufine+ is all about you.

 

About Us:

Vufine, Inc. was founded in February 2015 by Goro Kosaka to create a simple, wearable display that utilized the functionality of current technology. Run by a small, talented group of likeminded individuals, the Vufine team is well versed in both the wearable market and myriad challenges facing a Silicon Valley hardware start-up. Since their first Kickstarter campaign the team has been hard at work improving the Vufine wearable display and are proud to come back to the community that made it all possible with Vufine+.

 

 

Risks & Challenges: 

Considering our experience and our track record, we are very confident in our ability to deliver the best product to our backers on our current timeline. We are a different company than when we first came to Kickstarter. We know where to anticipate delays because we’ve experienced them before; we have a strong, working relationships with our manufacturer because we built the original Vufine together.

But, if there is one thing our last Kickstarter campaign taught us, it was just how many little things can go wrong when producing tech hardware - and how those seemingly little things can create costly delays.

This time we’re further along in the manufacturing and have already begun tooling for the new docking station. Additionally, by maintaining the external form factor of Vufine, we’re able to reuse tooling and drastically accelerate our production schedule.

Should we encounter any unforeseen delays, you will be the first to know. You can look through our previous campaign's updates to see just how we handled delays to our previous backers - 100% transparency is the least we can give to our backers for bringing us this far.

story:
My laptop has reached its limit. When I'm rendering a video it either blue screens or overheats and powers off. Sometimes it would render videos successfully, but now it doesn't even last 10 minutes. I have been using this laptop to make videos for the past four years and was planning on buying a new PC to replace it. However, I recently moved across the country from Seattle to Atlanta and the expenses took a huge toll on me. I was hoping that this laptop would last me until I was able to get back on my feet financially, but unfortunately it started to give me too many problems before that could happen.

I want to continue making videos for all of you to enjoy. I have been using my sister's computer to accomplish that. However, I can't use her computer all day and that limits me to how much I can do. I would really appreciate any help you guys are willing to give. Even if you can't help, I'm really grateful for all the support you guys have given me over the past years. Thank you so much for everything.

Sincerely,

Giancarlo

story:
Before you read on any further, why not listen to our Podcast with Crowdfunding Cast; nobody says it better than the Inventor himself! Just click the link to listen http://crowdfundingcast.tk/?p=171

Its been a long ten years but by the skin of our teeth we have finally developed prototypes for a wearable communication device for children. 

Although it appears that there are plenty of devices available to service this market, there is nothing out there that kids would enjoy owning. We want to do something about that and have some fun! 

We were even able to secure a few patents along the way.

The Loc8er:Mobile product is designed to enable parents to have contact with their children while at the same time addressing concerns about mobile phone safety.

  • It offers voice communication to a list of pre-set numbers. Simply download the Loc8er app to your mobile phone and instantly connect to your child’s Loc8er:Mobile. From here you can manage your child’s pre-set call list to ensure that they don’t receive any unwanted calls or texts and set call time limits to prevent any unexpected call charges. 
  • Set up parameters around local parks and play areas to alert you when your child leaves the area, or watch your children walk home from school or a friend's house and see that they get home safe. 

  • Set up alerts for your child if they need you in an emergency; to either call numbers in sequence until the call is answered or call a specific family member, friend or carer if you're not going to be available. 

  • Activate or deactivate alerts to suit your own needs, for instance, removal alerts to tell you if the device is released, cut off or slipped off, or set timers for the device to switch off during school hours and turn back on again after school. 

  • Most importantly; fun games for children, in a cool design. Location based games using GPS, such as treasure hunts. Reward games for checking in at certain leisure facilities to encourage physical activity. Interactive games with friends and the inclusion of Oyster cards for traveling to and from school.

  • We made 15 proof-of-concept prototypes (AS SHOWN BELOW) in 2007 to prove the technology could co-exist (it looks more like 1977 than 2007!) HOWEVER!! The new designs are infinitely more futuristic.  Visit loc8ermobile.com where you and your kids can add to the final product design - we want your input!  Ultimately, you, the people, will have an input in to our design! (And by people, we mean kids!)


Progress so far

We have taken the product to network operators, they like it and want to go ahead with trials. If this is successful then we can start selling through their retail stores and they will help us provide the service. 

So now, we need to make 30 units for the trials and fund the business in getting to market. 

This is where you come in...
We need to raise $10,000 to develop the product for trials with the Network Operators.  Once trials are completed, the minimum order will be 15,000 units.  This will help us to grow the business over two years of trading to the point where it has 40,000 customers.

By helping us, you can be one of the first owners (well, your children will) of a Loc8er:Mobile. 


Where the money goes

The bulk of the money will go towards designing the product that will be put forward for trials with Network Operators, with whom we have had a relationship for 10 years. 

1) Product and Software Development
We have developed and tested prototypes and now need to prepare the product for mass production and develop the software to provide the service. 

2) Prepare for Launch
While we complete the final version of the product we will build on our existing relationships with mobile network operators. Our projections are based on selling 40,000 units in the first three years, a single network operator could deliver this figure easily. We will encourage retailers to run pilots too. We will also be running our own trials with customers, and starting to build awareness in the marketplace.

With your support we will endeavour to have your child wearing a Loc8er:Mobile by November 2015. 

The Team

You've already met Dean in the Video, he's the inventor. Back in 2004 he had the idea for Loc8er after a string of child abductions in the UK. 


We ran market research projects consisting of focus groups, surveys and interviews to discuss issues around child safety and the need for child safety products. Although there appeared to be plenty of devices available to service this market, parents weren’t buying the products and we wanted to know why. 

It quickly became clear that there was a substantial market but the products available were not designed with children in mind. The biggest criticism of all was that none of the products would directly appeal to children, and this would limit their desire to have one. “There is nothing in it for them”. 

We set about designing the product with the help of local schools working and saving to get the product made. With the help of a few Savvy investors and brave friends we raised enough money to develop and test prototypes. 

During this time Loc8er picked up industry interest, and we have been fortunate enough to attract support from Siemens and network operators. 

Its a big task ahead of us, global child safety coupled with mobile phone technology has the potential to grow fast.  

But with thorough knowledge of the industry, the support of key backers and your help we are ready to go to the next step. 

A bit about Dean
Dean is ex British Parachute Regiment,  after leaving the army he spent some time as an amateur boxer, winning the England ABA Nationals (Novice) in 2001. He now teaches boxing and personal training, but Loc8er is his ultimate passion and he absolutely will not stop! 

A bit about me
I was a vet nurse after leaving school, but decided to move into dog grooming so I could work for myself. I had a great Salon which I was able to sell so I could move to London. 

In London I worked in publishing in sales and marketing until Dean had the idea for Loc8er and we moved to Edinburgh to oversee the development of the product. 

    There are Other Ways You Can Help Us:

    • Get the word out there and make some noise about our campaign 
    • Sharing on Twitter and Facebook
    • Tell everyone you meet!
    • Don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools...


    We are totally dedicated to this product. We appreciate your support!

story:
Short Summary

I've been developing software since the late 70's and always have something new and interesting. I've covered everything from water cooled mainframes to iPhones. I've been focusing my attention on tech matters with the LDS church the last 18 months, and recently came up with this idea. It is totally free to use, but I have to finance the final development of the project.

What We Need & What You Get

We only need to raise a small amount of money to pay for our time not spent on making a living while we build this, and this is "what" this is:

  • An electronic church bulletin that you can view on your phone, tablet, computer, laptop, whatever. It is a responsive design, so it displays correctly on anything you put it.
  • Increases the available space to put class information, announcements, whatever you need. Especially to help out visitors that don't know everything that everyone else already knows.
  • Integrate hot links so tapping on a hymn in the program, brings up the hymn. Tapping on an email address, brings up your email, a phone number, dials it, and a location will bring up a map of that location.
  • Reduce wasted paper
  • Create programs quickly and easily for anything, like Baptisms, Relief Society, Priesthood, you name it.
  • Archive of past programs

The Impact

This will just make it way easier to get the information you need and not wonder where the heck is the "Mission Viejo Stake Center" for example. I assume you will still have a paper program, but this is a first step in a new direction. We are getting a lot of interested Bishops already. Check out this link for a prototype http://www.smga3000.com/BookOfMormons/SantaMarg...

Other Ways You Can Help

Donate whatever you can, even if it is just a dollar. Please pass the word around. This is going to be totally free and easy.

story:
Hi, I'm Mike.

I'm Mike Lerner. I've been a professional photographer for the past 5 years, and before that, an enthusiast since I could pick a camera up. 
What I am coming to you with is something, that I think, can change the way photographers and videographers can buy and sell gear to each other worldwide, and hopefully one day, rent gear from each other locally.  This idea is LensShare. Let me tell you a little more about it. 

What We Need & What You Get

What do we need the money for?

  • Approximately 80% of the funds are going to an agency in Los Angeles to build the app. It is a trusted, boutique app building agency which has a great client list and people to bring LensShare to life.  The other 20% will go to expenses in working on the app alongside the build team and marketing. 
  • The Perks! I honestly wanted to make the perks as simple as possible and wanted to keep the highest donation at $100. I know us freelancers struggle sometimes, so If you only can afford $1, that's fine, but if you really want to get in early, $100 gets you to be a beta tester.
  • If we don't reach the goal, 100% of whatever is raised is going to be used to build LensShare. Even if it's just enough to get a commitment to build, that's what we'll do and I'll take care of the rest. Not meeting the goal is NOT  failure. 
  • We want to be as transparent as possible. If you have any questions don't hesitate to ask!





The Impact

The main reason I am doing this crowdfund is this: I want LensShare to be for photographers and videographers BY photographers and videographers. 

We can change the way people buy gear! Isn't that exciting??? Imagine a place where every visual creative can come and list and buy gear without any of the hassles of the traditional ways of doing so. Now imagine that place is in your pocket and you can carry it with you everywhere! No more doing business on Craigslist, no more posting on facebook! This could be it. With your help we can make it happen!


Please visit our website and send us a message!
