story:
Dear Friends!!!  

We would like to welcome you to the world of spy devices!!!
 Please, visit our new project PEEK-I!!!
and to kick-off we offer you an exclusive early bird proposal:
 BUY double Peek-I for the price of a Single Peek-I!
The offer is valid until March 22, 2014 

http://www.indiegogo.com/projects/spy-cam-peek-i/x/4720890

We will make your life much easier! Wise Button is a universal helper of your dream. We've managed to design it in the best possible way. It is a universal remote control and also a brilliant tracking device.



Wise Button is compatible with any operational system: Android, iOS, Windows Phone.You can connect this universal button to your smartphones, tablets, music players, PCs and laptops – literally anything.

It is very small and handy; you can easily attach it to your keys or handbag. Wise Button is designed to function for 1 month without recharging. You can always recharge it using Micro USB cable - and this device will serve you for many years.

Using the Wise Button, you can control your devices remotely.

 Wise Button helps you browse through your photo gallery, video files or websites without touching the device itself. You can even make presentations using the Wise Button. You want to skip a song  playing on your stereo in the other room or play it once again? Wise Button can do it for you. You can also use it with your built-in camera and take pictures, film videos or record sound remotely.

Wise Button is great for security. You’ll never lose your device again – this button has a special regime that alarms you when the connected device is more than 20 feet away from you.

In the morning you don’t remember where did you put your phone in the evening? Just press Search on your Wise Button – and the phone will reveal itself.

This search works both ways – you can always find the button from the connected device. Attach the Wise Button to anything you don’t want to lose – and you’ll always be able to find it.

If you want to keep track of several items from your device, we have special Wise Button Stickers that can be used exclusively for tracking. It works as a Bluetooth tracking device within 150 feet. The dimension of Wise Button Sticker are:

diameter is 35mm and hight is 7mm.

Put this Sticker on your kid’s bag, on your pet’s collar, on your wallet, keys – anything that is precious to you.  And you’ll never lose it.

Wise Button Sticker works without recharging for 3 months. You can always recharge it using Micro USB cable - and this device will serve you for many years.

We’ve developed special software for the Wise Button. It is very simple, even kids can use it. You can use a set of common functions or adjust them to your needs the way you want.

Check out the design of the Wise Button. We’ve developed it in the most demanded and modern way. The young people will certainly like the Wise Buttons in juicy bright colors that accentuate their individuality.

For business persons that are used to the strict classic style, we have black, silver and golden Wise Buttons that mark the status of their owner. These buttons have metal cases and genuine leather holders.
story_txt:
Dear Friends!!!  
We would like to welcome you to the world of spy devices!!!  Please, visit our new project PEEK-I!!! and to kick-off we offer you an exclusive early bird proposal: BUY double Peek-I for the price of a Single Peek-I! The offer is valid until March 22, 2014 
http://www.indiegogo.com/projects/spy-cam-peek-i/x/4720890






We will make your life much easier! Wise Button is a universal helper of your dream. We've managed to design it in the best possible way. It is a universal remote control and also a brilliant tracking device.

Wise Button is compatible with any operational system: Android, iOS, Windows Phone.You can connect this universal button to your smartphones, tablets, music players, PCs and laptops – literally anything.It is very small and handy; you can easily attach it to your keys or handbag. Wise Button is designed to function for 1 month without recharging. You can always recharge it using Micro USB cable - and this device will serve you for many years.Using the Wise Button, you can control your devices remotely. Wise Button helps you browse through your photo gallery, video files or websites without touching the device itself. You can even make presentations using the Wise Button. You want to skip a song  playing on your stereo in the other room or play it once again? Wise Button can do it for you. You can also use it with your built-in camera and take pictures, film videos or record sound remotely.Wise Button is great for security. You’ll never lose your device again – this button has a special regime that alarms you when the connected device is more than 20 feet away from you.In the morning you don’t remember where did you put your phone in the evening? Just press Search on your Wise Button – and the phone will reveal itself.This search works both ways – you can always find the button from the connected device. Attach the Wise Button to anything you don’t want to lose – and you’ll always be able to find it.If you want to keep track of several items from your device, we have special Wise Button Stickers that can be used exclusively for tracking. It works as a Bluetooth tracking device within 150 feet. The dimension of Wise Button Sticker are:diameter is 35mm and hight is 7mm.Put this Sticker on your kid’s bag, on your pet’s collar, on your wallet, keys – anything that is precious to you.  And you’ll never lose it.Wise Button Sticker works without recharging for 3 months. You can always recharge it using Micro USB cable - and this device will serve you for many years.We’ve developed special software for the Wise Button. It is very simple, even kids can use it. You can use a set of common functions or adjust them to your needs the way you want.Check out the design of the Wise Button. We’ve developed it in the most demanded and modern way. The young people will certainly like the Wise Buttons in juicy bright colors that accentuate their individuality.For business persons that are used to the strict classic style, we have black, silver and golden Wise Buttons that mark the status of their owner. These buttons have metal cases and genuine leather holders.

story:
We are proud to present a small and innovative device that will allow you to double the battery life of your smartphone. Thanks to its smart electronics and its awesome design you won’t need to take care about the battery of your smartphone anymore.

   

Witty is a beautiful plug-in adapt to every USB charger, where behind a fresh and endearing design lies an innovative technology.

With its electronic flow controller it allows you to intelligently manage the charging of your smartphone by disconnecting it via an electromechanical switch when the charge is complete, in order to preserve the useful life of your battery.

 

 

 

                                                  
 

We at Witty care about the environment and for this reason we have chosen to make it in ABS, a material that can be recycled.

If only 10% of the world population would use Witty, we could obtain a reduction of thrown away batteries for 11.500 Tons a year.

 

Here you can see the life's difference between a device charged with help of Witty and one without. Let’s make an example considering that as Apple says “A battery capacity under the threshold of the 80%” has to be changed. 

 

 

With a 3000mAh battery, the annual degradation is about 12%. Damage that leads the remaining capacity to 2640mAh after one year, to about 2323mAh after two, 2044mAh after three, 1799mAh after four and to about 1583mAh after five years. On the other hand, with Witty a 3000mAh battery will get an annual degradation of only 6%. Improvement that would be reflected into the remaining battery capacity year by year. 2820mAh after one year, 2650mAh after two, 2491mAh after three, 2342mAh after four and about 2201mAh after five years.

                                                    

 

Thanks to the intelligent charge controller, Witty is able to monitor the current flow and understand when your smartphone's battery is charged. Thus, when the current absorbed by your smartphone drops below a certain threshold, Witty will disconnect your phone from the battery charger through its electromechanical switch.

Theoretically,to properly charge the smartphone battery up to 100% is need a voltage of 4.2V.In reality,the manufacturers overload the batteries with voltages up to 4.36V in order to have a more performing smartphone in the morning. This, however, leads to a fast aging of the battery capacity. As you can see in Table I, it is noted that when you charge the battery at 4.2V we can enjoy about 500 charging cycles, while overloading it at 4.25V the number of cycles is reduced to 350, in which however you have a 5-10% more charge per cycle.

In Picture I, you can graphically see how end-of-charge voltage greatly affects battery capacity. [Tables courtesy of BatteryUniversity]

 

 

Witty does not prevent the battery from reaching the end-of-charge voltage set by the manufacturer but avoids it from being subjected to this voltage for all the hours in which the smartphone is left charging with the 100% battery. Therefore, Witty eliminates most of the overcharge by avoiding premature aging.

Here you can see a test lab made with an iPhone updated to iOS 13.3. [ITA Subtitles Version]

                                                  
 

Sony on its website :“ Remember that the battery will be damaged if you leave your device charging for a long time after reaching 100%”.

 

 

 

Unofficial batteries do not allow high performances. They also may have insufficient safety provisions and rely on charger to finish charging. Witty helps your brand to perform over time.

 

 

A non performing battery leads us to replace it after less than a couple of years. An original smartphone's spare part can cost up to 75€ and 105€ for iPad.

After  20,000€ collected we will add a new reward with CORAL Witty .

        

                                                       

Our Mission

For two years we have proposed to improve the quality life of smartphone users and to reduce the enormous pollution due to the excessive amount of battery thrown away and not disposed of by developing a product that combines an innovative technology to an incredible design.

 

Why Indiegogo?

We have choosen Indiegogo to launch our product and to build a well-structured company. Our team and our providers are ready to work but we need your help to get started and to make Witty a reality.

 

Risks and Challanges

Every new adventure presents risks and challenges, in particular when a crowdfunding campaign is created for the first time, but since our team is made up of Industrial, Electronic and Management Engineers, with great experience in the sector, we have previously analyzed every possible inconvenience, creating an efficient and sustainable supply chain, ready to meet customer needs. Risks are just related to manufacturers and lead time of components, but we have already started with the orders of the firsts parts.

story:
A mobile phone basically combines multiple devices into one portable device, but the various charging accessories required completely defeat the purpose of having an all-in-one device. This is why we set out to design one portable device that encompasses multiple charging solutions for any situation.

While working on what was soon to be ChargePool, we realized that our device was “pooling” in multiple sources of energy to keep the phone charged, and the name “ChargePool” came to life.

Our first prototype was made of corrugated board that was taped together. It was the size of a rock, yet it did not have a place for the wires within.

 

 

One year--dozens of prototypes, tons of discussions (arguments),
some intense engineering and design--later,
ChargePool was finally pocket friendly, and it did everything we wanted it to do. 

Today, we are proud to present one portable device
that combines multiple charging solutions, ChargePool.

 

 

Participate in the ChargePool referral contest

 

Step 1: In order to take part in the referral contest, you must have an Indiegogo account and back Chargepool.

*Due to Indiegogo’s privacy policy, Chargepool will ONLY receive the name and email address of people who back their campaign.

Step 2: Simply log in to Indiegogo, if you have not already, or create an account by signing up with the usual process. Then, visit the campaign page on Indiegogo and look to the right of the main video for the “Link” button (See image below)

Step 3: Click the “Link” button. You will then see a popup with your unique link (See image below). Copy your unique share URL and use your unique URL to share the campaign on social media, email your friends and contacts, write a blog post, etc. Continue promoting this contest and ChargePool with your unique link to get rewarded. 

The rewards: 

  •  Get $10 Cashback for every purchase your referral makes
  •  Get $175 Cashback on successful referral of 15 Chargepool devices.

Once the campaign is over, we will have detailed information on how many ChargePool devices were purchased through your referral URL. We then issue you a refund via Paypal (or other payment methods).

 

Tracking the Campaign: 

  • Log into your Indiegogo account.
  • Click on your user name the top right of the page.
  • Select the “My Profile” option.
  • Click on the tab that says “Referrals” for the latest totals of referrals and contributions.
  • Count the number of funders.

Thank you for sharing our campaign and helping us reach our goals.

 

 



We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project
and helping us make ChargePool a reality. 

We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge,
so even if you can’t give a dollar or purchase a ChargePool,
if you’re a supporter of ChargePool, you can help us spread the word
on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!

story:
Tired of losing your charger or never having it around when you need it most? Forget to charge up your battery case, and now your phone is dying and the battery case is serving no purpose other than bulking up your pocket? Same with us here at EZ Charge Case! We grew tired of the agonizing problem of a dying phone and no charger, or a missing charger. So, we created the perfect solution; a charger that is always in your pocket. Our EZ Charge Case Pro contains a plug, 28" USB cord, and a 2000 mAH backup battery. We also created a simpler and cheaper alternative; the basic EZ Charge Case contains the same bells and whistles, just without a backup battery. Take the case where or when you need a charger, it's perfect for travel!

 

 

We understand how important it is to have a case be as thin as possible. So, we worked diligently to design and incorporate the thinnest AC outlet plug possible. 

We also understand the hesitation in trusting our cord to be durable. Instead of 3rd-party sourcing an existing cord during production, we spend a little extra to ensure the strength and durability of our cords by manufacturing our own, designed to work efficiently with the case. If you are to run into any trouble with your cord, we guarantee a full refund!​

 

 

 

 

Check out what people have to say about the EZ Charge Case:

 

"What sets EZ Charge Case apart from conventional smartphone battery cases can be quantified in a handful of ways"- Techstartups.com

 

 

EZ Charge Case is approved by Apple, so your device is safe with our built-in charging technology. Essentially, EZ Charge Case is the only charger you will ever need to use, conveniently always with you! The case is made for iPhone 6/s, 6/s Plus, 7, and 7 Plus.

 

EZ Charge Case vs. EZ Charge Case Pro

 

The EZ Charge Case Pro is simply the EZ Charge Case, but with a 2000 mAH backup battery included. Both versions are available under perks for a special Indiegogo price.

 

EZ Charge Case

Available in white, grey, and black

 

 Carry a charger everywhere. This is the only case that contains a plug, USB, and 28" of cord.

 

 

 

 

​

EZ Charge Case Pro

 

Carry a charger, and extra charge, everywhere. This case contains a plug, USB, 28" of cord, and a 2000 mAH backup battery. Charge up your phone and the in-house backup battery whenever convenient. It's like a Mophie mixed with an EZ Charge Case!

 

 -BATTERY CASE With Built In Charger- 

 

 

Simply use the integrated charger to charge up your phone, and the EZ Charge Case Pro will do the rest! Once your device reaches full battery, the case will begin charging up the backup battery. Simply flip the on switch when your device is running low on battery, and the 2000 mAh backup battery will begin transferring power to your device.

 

The Team

EZ Charge Case is centralized by two young and driven entrepreneurs, Parker Rosen (CEO) and Robby Hoffman (CSO). Although the founders are young, they have surrounded themselves with experienced entrepreneurs and business professionals who have taken avid roles in helping to grow the company. Parker Rosen, CEO of EZ Charge Case, was an entrepreneur student at Indiana University before coming home to Orange County to work on the company. Robby Hoffman, CSO of EZ Charge Case, was a finance student at the University of Arizona before also coming home to Orange County.

  • Michael Sawitz- CEO of Faststart.Studio: "As the founder and operator of an incubator, I get to see hundreds of concepts and thousands of entrepreneurs each year. Rarely do I meet startup founders who are as committed and who can execute as well as Parker and Robby. I predict that the EZ Charge Case will be a very successful consumer product." Michael has been a huge help in accelerating the progression of the company. He put the team in front of the right people and without his help, the company wouldn't be where it is today.
  • Michael Hong- CEO of Tandem Design: One of the greatest connections made was to Michael Hong, the CEO of a product development company in Santa Monica, CA. Michael's team worked with Parker and Robby to design what they believed to be the perfect case. From conceptual sketches to the prototype, Tandem Design did it all.
  • Special thanks to Jeff Murphy for his graphic design and banner work for our company.

(Robby Hoffman, Parker Rosen, and Michael Hong at the Tandem Design Studio in Santa Monica, CA)

story:
Ever wanted to use your phone while you were charging it?

People frequently use their phone or tablet while they are charging it. The electrical outlet is hardly ever in a convenient position, and you probably know what it's like to sit in an awkward position because your cord isn't long enough. 


Click HERE for more information


The Couchlet™: 

Power where you want it.

Presenting the USB Couchlet™, the USB port that is exactly where you need it. 

Sitting on the couch while your phone is charging? 
The Couchlet™ nests between cushions. 

Having trouble reaching your charger from the bed? 
The Couchlet™ has a folding arm that wedges under your mattress. 

The Couchlet™'s wedge-shaped design means that it fits between or under cushions and mattresses so that you can barely even see it. The fold out leg gives you extra stability and the ability to slide the Couchlet™ onto the outside of your furniture. 

Each Couchlet™ comes with a detachable 6-foot USB cable that uses your current wall charger for power. The Couchlet™ is low voltage, so it's just as safe as the charging cord that comes with your phone.


As Seen On


Features



Orientations

Use the Couchlet™ folded or unfolded.

Couch

Bed
Wedge the Couchlet™ between couch cushions or next to the armrest. Use the folding elbow if you need extra stability, but most cushions hold the Couchlet™ nice and tight.
 Slide the Couchlet™ under the mattress or between the mattress and boxspring using the folding elbow. It can also be wedged under horizontally in the folded position.

Specifications

Dimensions: 6.25" x 2" x 0.75"

Arm: 5 in. long

2 USB Ports

Includes a 6-foot USB cable

Estimated Shipping Date: December 2015

Project Development

When we were brainstorming product opportunities, we realized that all of us have experienced cramped muscles, awkward stretching and texting with our phone two feet from our face. A few of us had even rigged up an elaborate system of cords or power strips in our couch and on our bed. We knew there had to be a better way to solve this issue. It needed to be sturdy, compatible with any device, have a long cord, and be slim and easy to slide in between seat cushions. Thus the Couchlet™ was born!

Why we are crowdfunding

Crowdfunding will allow us to produce Couchlet™ ourselves, rather than licensing it to another manufacturer. This active oversight on our behalf will allow us to make sure that the Couchlet™ lives up to our vision and standard of quality. We will use the funds to pay for the tooling for the plastic components and pay for the cost of manufacturing, shipping, and fulfillment.

About the team

The Couchlet™ was developed at Trident Design, LLC, an award winning product design and commercialization firm based in Columbus, Ohio. We work with inventors, startups, and corporations to develop and market products ranging from housewares to consumer electronics to medical devices. Serial entrepreneur and professional inventor, Chris Hawker, founded Trident with a simple philosophy: “When egos drop away, the best idea wins”. To date, his team of dedicated designers, engineers, videographers, and ping pong fanatics have brought more than 80 inventive products to the market.

Known for iconic products such as the PowerSquid and the Onion Goggles, Trident has also designed some of the most popular and successful crowdfunded products, the Beluga Razor (raising almost $200K), and the Quickey (the most-funded multi-tool of all time exceeding 5,538% of its goal).

Visit www.trident-design.com for more information.

Risk and challenges

Couchlet™ is a high design product that demands high quality. It has several components that are being produced by different suppliers and must come together to create the final product. We are on a mission to set ourselves and our backers up to win through production, quality control, and logistics systems. However, there are always risks. Here are the places we see the biggest ones:

Manufacturing

There are so many variables that almost always you hit bumps in the road. We have commercialized well over 80 products, and all of them have had tough moments. In the “real” world, products are in development for often up to 2-3 years before they launch. Crowdfunding has created a unique situation where consumers are expecting things to hit very tight deadlines that truly are difficult to perfectly predict. We have done our best to account for unexpected delays, and will do our best to handle the bumps, but there is always a chance we could hit a snag bigger than we plan for.

Product Adjustments

We have made prototypes of the Couchlet™, but as it makes its way to final production release, there may be adjustments to the design required by manufacturing and cost considerations. We are committed to providing an awesome product that our backers love. We will let you know of any changes that we need to make and why.

Fulfillment timing

Once the product is ready for production we have to get them made and shipped to us before we can ship them to our backers. Depending on our volumes, and acts of God, we may experience delays in getting all the units shipped. We will scale up with the intention of shipping all of the units from the campaign between November and December, but there is a limit to how high our capacity can go with our selected supplier. In addition, customs can slow things down, as well as defective shipments. We will keep you apprised as things develop and let you know where things stand. We appreciate your support more than we can say, and also thank you for your patience as we work hard to fulfill our perks.

FAQs

  • Where is Couchlet™ made?
    Couchlet™ was designed in Columbus, Ohio. It will be manufactured in China. 
  • When are the perks expected to ship?
    We expect to begin shipping in early December 2015. Not all perks will be shipped this soon, as we will ship in the order that purchases are received.
  • What is the Warranty?
    We provide a limited warranty that guarantees you receive your Couchlet™ free of manufacturing defects.
  • Can I change or cancel my perk?
    Indiegogo policy dictates that campaign owners have no ability to adjust your perk selection. That means we cannot upgrade your perk, we cannot change your perk and we cannot cancel your perk. Please note that contributions made on indiegogo are also non-refundable.
  • How much will shipping cost?
    Shipping will cost approximately $3 per unit domestically for up to 10 units. Shipping to Canada and Mexico will cost approximately $10 for the first unit and $3 for each additional unit. International shipping will cost approximately $15 for the first unit and $3 for each additional unit. Shipping will be handled at the end of the campaign.
  • How do I contact the Couchlet™ campaign managers?
    You can email us at info@trident-design.com with Couchlet in the subject line somewhere.
  • Is there any risk or fire hazard associated with this product?
    The Couchlet™ is low voltage, so it is just as safe as the USB charger that comes with your phone.
  • How does the Couchlet charge two devices with one cable?
    The Couchlet™ has two USB hubs, so if two devices are plugged in the power will be split in half. If you are charging an iPad, you will want to use your iPad cable to ensure that you have enough power to charge it. If only one device is plugged in, the power will not be split and the device will charge at normal speed.

Referral program

Earn 1 FREE Couchlet™ when you refer 4 Couchlet™ purchases!

(Limited to earning 4 FREE Couchlets)

How it works:

  1. Simply log in to Indiegogo if you have not already, or create an account by signing up here.
  2. Then, visit this page on Indiegogo and look below the main video to share and copy your unique URL.
  3. Copy your unique URL link to post around the Internet and save it for later by clicking the "Link" icon or begin sharing on social media by simply clicking the "Facebook" or "Twitter" buttons with your URL pre-loaded.
  4. When you click on any share tool on the campaign page, then you’ll automatically get a post or tweet that’s ready-to-go with your personal URL.

How to track your results:

  1. Log into your Indiegogo account.
  2. Click on your user name beside the search box at the top right of the page.
  3. Select the “My Profile” option.
  4. Click on the tab that says “Referrals” for the latest totals of referrals and contributions.
  5. Count the number of funders.

Contact

For press and bulk order inquires please contact us at info@trident-design.com. For press materials visit our press kit. To see more information on Trident Design, visit www.trident-design.com.
story_txt:
Ever wanted to use your phone while you were charging it?People frequently use their phone or tablet while they are charging it. The electrical outlet is hardly ever in a convenient position, and you probably know what it's like to sit in an awkward position because your cord isn't long enough. 
Click HERE for more information

The Couchlet™: Power where you want it.Presenting the USB Couchlet™, the USB port that is exactly where you need it. 

Sitting on the couch while your phone is charging? 


The Couchlet™ nests between cushions. 


Having trouble reaching your charger from the bed? 
The Couchlet™ has a folding arm that wedges under your mattress. 

The Couchlet™'s wedge-shaped design means that it fits between or under cushions and mattresses so that you can barely even see it. The fold out leg gives you extra stability and the ability to slide the Couchlet™ onto the outside of your furniture. 

Each Couchlet™ comes with a detachable 6-foot USB cable that uses your current wall charger for power. The Couchlet™ is low voltage, so it's just as safe as the charging cord that comes with your phone.




As Seen On






Features









Orientations
Use the Couchlet™ folded or unfolded.






















Couch


Bed



Wedge the Couchlet™ between couch cushions or next to the armrest. Use the folding elbow if you need extra stability, but most cushions hold the Couchlet™ nice and tight.


Slide the Couchlet™ under the mattress or between the mattress and boxspring using the folding elbow. It can also be wedged under horizontally in the folded position.








Specifications

Dimensions: 6.25" x 2" x 0.75"
Arm: 5 in. long
2 USB Ports
Includes a 6-foot USB cable

















Estimated Shipping Date: December 2015


Project Development
When we were brainstorming product opportunities, we realized that all of us have experienced cramped muscles, awkward stretching and texting with our phone two feet from our face. A few of us had even rigged up an elaborate system of cords or power strips in our couch and on our bed. We knew there had to be a better way to solve this issue. It needed to be sturdy, compatible with any device, have a long cord, and be slim and easy to slide in between seat cushions. Thus the Couchlet™ was born!






Why we are crowdfunding
Crowdfunding will allow us to produce Couchlet™ ourselves, rather than licensing it to another manufacturer. This active oversight on our behalf will allow us to make sure that the Couchlet™ lives up to our vision and standard of quality. We will use the funds to pay for the tooling for the plastic components and pay for the cost of manufacturing, shipping, and fulfillment.




About the team

The Couchlet™ was developed at Trident Design, LLC, an award winning product design and commercialization firm based in Columbus, Ohio. We work with inventors, startups, and corporations to develop and market products ranging from housewares to consumer electronics to medical devices. Serial entrepreneur and professional inventor, Chris Hawker, founded Trident with a simple philosophy: “When egos drop away, the best idea wins”. To date, his team of dedicated designers, engineers, videographers, and ping pong fanatics have brought more than 80 inventive products to the market.
Known for iconic products such as the PowerSquid and the Onion Goggles, Trident has also designed some of the most popular and successful crowdfunded products, the Beluga Razor (raising almost $200K), and the Quickey (the most-funded multi-tool of all time exceeding 5,538% of its goal).
Visit www.trident-design.com for more information.

Risk and challenges
Couchlet™ is a high design product that demands high quality. It has several components that are being produced by different suppliers and must come together to create the final product. We are on a mission to set ourselves and our backers up to win through production, quality control, and logistics systems. However, there are always risks. Here are the places we see the biggest ones:
Manufacturing
There are so many variables that almost always you hit bumps in the road. We have commercialized well over 80 products, and all of them have had tough moments. In the “real” world, products are in development for often up to 2-3 years before they launch. Crowdfunding has created a unique situation where consumers are expecting things to hit very tight deadlines that truly are difficult to perfectly predict. We have done our best to account for unexpected delays, and will do our best to handle the bumps, but there is always a chance we could hit a snag bigger than we plan for.
Product Adjustments
We have made prototypes of the Couchlet™, but as it makes its way to final production release, there may be adjustments to the design required by manufacturing and cost considerations. We are committed to providing an awesome product that our backers love. We will let you know of any changes that we need to make and why.
Fulfillment timing
Once the product is ready for production we have to get them made and shipped to us before we can ship them to our backers. Depending on our volumes, and acts of God, we may experience delays in getting all the units shipped. We will scale up with the intention of shipping all of the units from the campaign between November and December, but there is a limit to how high our capacity can go with our selected supplier. In addition, customs can slow things down, as well as defective shipments. We will keep you apprised as things develop and let you know where things stand. We appreciate your support more than we can say, and also thank you for your patience as we work hard to fulfill our perks.

FAQs


Where is Couchlet™ made?Couchlet™ was designed in Columbus, Ohio. It will be manufactured in China. 

When are the perks expected to ship?We expect to begin shipping in early December 2015. Not all perks will be shipped this soon, as we will ship in the order that purchases are received.

What is the Warranty?We provide a limited warranty that guarantees you receive your Couchlet™ free of manufacturing defects.

Can I change or cancel my perk?Indiegogo policy dictates that campaign owners have no ability to adjust your perk selection. That means we cannot upgrade your perk, we cannot change your perk and we cannot cancel your perk. Please note that contributions made on indiegogo are also non-refundable.

How much will shipping cost?Shipping will cost approximately $3 per unit domestically for up to 10 units. Shipping to Canada and Mexico will cost approximately $10 for the first unit and $3 for each additional unit. International shipping will cost approximately $15 for the first unit and $3 for each additional unit. Shipping will be handled at the end of the campaign.

How do I contact the Couchlet™ campaign managers?You can email us at info@trident-design.com with Couchlet in the subject line somewhere.

Is there any risk or fire hazard associated with this product?The Couchlet™ is low voltage, so it is just as safe as the USB charger that comes with your phone.

How does the Couchlet charge two devices with one cable?The Couchlet™ has two USB hubs, so if two devices are plugged in the power will be split in half. If you are charging an iPad, you will want to use your iPad cable to ensure that you have enough power to charge it. If only one device is plugged in, the power will not be split and the device will charge at normal speed.

(Limited to earning 4 FREE Couchlets)

story:
UPDATE - Manufacturing Teaser (May 26, 2016) First Run will be through machining and inspection Tomorrow!


Funded on Kickstarter, moved to Indiegogo.

We at PenSe are super excited to announce that we have wrapped up a successful Kickstarter this morning!  Now we're hoping Indiegogo will help us raise more and do more, not just for a great new Apple accessory, but also for the greater good (learn more at bottom of page).  

Mission

PenSe's goal is to create something that is more than simply a pen case. PenSe is a "functional case" for the Apple Pencil. By definition, a functional case keeps a product safe, especially while it's in use, and is developed from the point of view of use. Anything else is just a sleeve or pencil bag.

Simple & Elegant

PenSe is a simple, elegant device that protects Apple Pencil and its components from both damage and loss. While the current iPhone, iPad and MacBook all employ an anodized unibody aluminum design, Apple’s Pencil does not. Its white silicon plastic body is far more susceptible to daily wear and accidental damage. PenSe’s anodized unibody aluminum design ensures a more portable and durable Pencil.

Magnetically Compatible

With fourteen high strength neodymium magnets, your Pencil isn’t going anywhere. PenSe allows you to attach Pencil to any magnetized surface on your iPad Pro, Apple Smart Cover, or new Smart Keyboard.

Protection

Designed to take a beating PenSe is machined from a single piece of cold rolled, aircraft grade aluminum. Its unibody design is extremely strong, abrasion resistant, and easy to grip. PenSe keeps Pencil safe while preserving the look and feel of an Apple product.

Superior Grip

PenSe makes the Apple pencil experience better, the added circumference weight and grip are remarkably satisfying, granting a greater degree of control.

Minimal

Convenient

 With PenSe Magnetically attached to your iPad, it's far less likely to be run into. And if someone does happen to catch your cord while charging, PenSe (much like Apple's Magnetic MacBook chargers) will simply disconnect, and save your iPad from crashing to the floor.

Precision Machining 

PenSe is CNC-machined on medical & aerospace grade Swiss lathes from one solid piece of 6061 T aluminum, right here in Massachusetts at a world renowned precision parts manufacturer. Our manufacturer's high performance standards ensure that all PenSe components fit together perfectly.

We take quality very seriously. With each PenSe component holding a minimum tolerance of one ten thousandth of an inch. Together with our CM we have arranged a barrage of quality control tests, to be performed on every component, during every batch and assembly.

Beautifully Bostonian
Pense was born in Boston, one of the great innovation capitals of the world. We took everything we love about this city and put it into our work, and thus the city is reflected in Pense. 

Pense is no stranger to coffee shops, cold winters, and weather-beaten hands.

 It blends seamlessly into the community of thinkers, and never feels out of place where creativity is flowing.



Rewards


Appostasy Inc. in addition to offering PenSe: Apple Pencil Case for pre order — raising brand awareness, finding new customers — and now we want to give something back.  We are featuring two new limited editions.  30% of the proceeds raised from these model's sales will be donated to their designated charity.  

The Electronic Frontier Foundation & Digital Freedom Pledge

PenSe supports the Electronic Frontier Foundation (EFF), an organization dedicated to user privacy, free expression, and innovation through impact litigation, policy analysis, grassroots activism, and technology development. A new $60 PenSe & Stylus, Anodized in Indiegogo's GOgentaand engraved with the "spying eye in cloud" icon.  We will donate 30% of EFF pledges to the  Electronic Frontier Foundation.  This pledge offers our supporters the opportunity to give to the EFF without the NSA finding out.

Bernie's Pledge

Who's feeling the Bern out there? As small business owners, with children to support, we are concerned about America's political future and believe that a Bernie Sanders presidency will offer us the best days ahead. So for $60, we are offering a new PenSe anodized in Bernie's own light blue.… Well, all but 1% will be anodized. This Laser engraved PenSewill read "IndieGo Vote for Bernie Sanders." (Yup, we will bern right through the anodization.)  Appostasy will be donating 30% of this special pledge to Bernie Sanders' campaign.*

We are making PenSe right here in America and it's something we are proud of. We want to continue to be proud of what "Made in America" means, for the next 4 years and beyond.  

*Each member of our Team can contribute up to $2700 to Sander's Presidential campaign  beyond this we will make arrangements accordingly.

 


Timeline

 Thank You Kickstarter! Thanks you for checking out our project. Please spread the word. 
Follow us on...

         Pinterest         Instagram           Facebook              Twitter 

PRESS

Interested in writing about us? Our Press Kit can be downloaded here. You can also email us at info@appostasy.com.

Risks and challenges

We have taken all of the necessary precautions to ensure that everything goes according to plan. We have a long standing relationship with a local Manufacturer and will keep our backers informed through out every step in the process.

We are making PenSe right here in America and it's something we are proud of. We want to continue to be proud of what "Made in America" means, for the next 4 years and beyond.  
*Each member of our Team can contribute up to $2700 to Sander's Presidential campaign  beyond this we will make arrangements accordingly.
 
Timeline


 Our Support Community Includes 

Artisan's Asylum 
 Gesmer Updergrove  
 Cambridge Trust 
 Canopy Somerville 
 Brick Co-Worker Shop 
 MIT Media Lab

Credit: Music in Video "Sail Boat" by The Underscore Orchestra
 Praise and Acknowledgements

 
 Thank You Kickstarter! Thanks you for checking out our project. Please spread the word. Follow us on...

 
         Pinterest         Instagram           Facebook              Twitter 

Give us a up vote on Product Hunt! 
 
PRESSInterested in writing about us? Our Press Kit can be downloaded here. You can also email us at info@appostasy.com.Risks and challengesWe have taken all of the necessary precautions to ensure that everything goes according to plan. We have a long standing relationship with a local Manufacturer and will keep our backers informed through out every step in the process.

story:
Ever felt stuck with busy, covered or dirty hands while wanting to control your devices? 

Meet Bixi, the first ultra-portable companion that senses your in-air hand gestures and commands your favorite smartphone Apps, LifX & Hue bulbs, Internet Speakers, GoPro and many other IoT devices.

Control fluidly your devices without putting your current activity on pause.

Just wave your hand and let the Magic happen!

 

You can control multiple actions of two apps or devices at the same time with Bixi. For example, you can be on your bike with Bixi on ‘Music’ & ’GoPro’ profiles and control both your songs and your GoPro with only gestures. Other such examples are:

  • Music & Lights control (Home)  
  • Reading & door-lock control (home)  
  • GoPro & Music control (on bike)  
  • Phone/SMS & Music control(In car)

 

 Fiddling with electronic devices on the road creates visual and cognitive distractions. With Bixi, you can drive safely and control your Music, Calls, Navigation, SMS, etc. without even looking at your phone. 

Control your GoPro from the handlebar of your bike and get status notifications at a glance. In early 2017, you can get turn-by-turn GPS navigation directions with the LEDs on Bixi while riding a bike.

 

 

 

 

 

One Bixi can control multiple devices at the same time. 

Some of the few devices & Apps Bixi works with -

Live Demo # 1

Easy Setup & Usage of LifX smart bulbs

 

Live Demo # 2:

Your car + your phone + Bixi + Hudway Glass = Cool futuristic Heads-Up display control

 

 

Live Demo #4:

Bixi partners with Drivemode App (for Android) to bring a distraction free in-car control of Music, Calls, SMS and Navigation. 

No need to look at your phone screen anymore!

 

 

Bixi works via Bluetooth Low Energy protocol and the Bixi App connects Bixi to other devices based on Wi-Fi or other protocols.  

You can control two devices or Apps at the same time. Simply choose them in the Bixi App, connect Bixi to your iOS or Android mobile phone and use the Bixi app to set up the device profiles you wish to use Bixi for.  

 

 

 

  

While voice control works, it is not without its limitations: 

  • Often requires a continuous internet connection
  • Often limited by language & accent constraints 
  • Not immune to loud music & background noises 
  • Most importantly, not secure. (Anyone can activate and accidentally/intentionally control your home including someone talking on TV!)

 

Our Journey so far....

 

 

 

 

  

 

 

  • Bixi is noted among ABI Research's 2016 'HOT TECH INNOVATORS' list. 
  • Consecutively in 2015 & 2016, Bluemint Labs has been selected as one of the top 28 tech startups in France & with official 'La French Tech' label. 
  • One of the winners of Samsung-Legrand Hackathon where Bixi controlled Legrand windows, lights & sockets via Samsung’s Artik Cloud. 
  • Grant award from BPIFrance. 
  •  

Did you know that "bixi" is the name of a Chinese Mythological turtle? Like a turtle, Bixi is compact, sturdy and has a hexagonal shape. 

Because Bixi is much more than a gadget, able to help you take full power of your connected life, we really wanted a design that gives Bixi, the look of a lovable companion. 

A turtle is said to be an intelligent and wise character, and Bixi follows this path by being the only ultra-portable solution that achieves complete gesture processing locally in the device.

 

ST is among the World leaders in low-power micro-controllers and sensors. Bluemint Labs is hosted by ST, Grenoble, France

A world leader in glass is protecting Bixi's Gesture sensing from scratches and falls with one of its best Gorilla® Glass 4.  

Bixi was selected to the 2016 HPE Milkshake Valley Startup acceleration program. 

One of the biggest and most renowned electronics device manufacturers in the world, Flextronics is currently working with us to setup the production line. 

Risks and challenges

From showing a working form-factor demo at CES Las Vegas in Jan' 2016 to getting close to shipping now, Bixi has come a long way. This has been made possible with a talented team, seed-funding and strong world leaders as partners for R&D and production.

At the time of launch of this campaign, we have already received first tooling results from manufacturing and they look good. We have sent those Bixis to our Alpha Testers across the world who have already appreciated the build quality.

We seem to be on-target for the first pre-series delivery early January. However, there are always risks that can delay the process of getting Bixi in (front of) your hands. These could be unexpected events on the production line such as delays by a supplier to deliver a component on time or some minor yet important product enhancements to be done.

Even when we start shipping, there's always a risk of the product getting stuck in customs, either when we are receiving the products from the factory or shipping them to you. We are taking measures though to prevent such issues.

We are committed to provide with you an exceptional user-experience with Bixi and are striving hard to achieve on time delivery. By pledging in our campaign, you have become part of our journey and we will be communicating regularly on the progress to get Bixi delivered to you.


FAQ

1. How does Bixi work?

Bixi connects via Bluetooth to a smartphone/ tablet/ computers. Using the Bixi App(IOS or Android) you can configure the Apps or connected devices you want to control. Each gesture matches a specific command on the connected device.

2. What technology behind bixi?

Bixi is based on next-generation Time-of-flight based optical sensors with milli-meter level precision.

3. Is there an app for Bixi?

There is an app for Bixi to help setup your Bixi device and other devices easily. Bixi App will be available in iOS and Android.

4. Which apps & devices are compatible with Bixi?

- All your music apps for main music/media controls

- Spotify

- Apple music

- Google music

- Tuneine

- Deezer

- Soundcloud

- Pandora

- Youtube, VLC, etc,

Other Devices & Apps

- Action Cameras - GoPro

- Automotive apps - HUDway & Drivemode.

- Browsers - Safari, Chrome

- E-Book Readers - iBooks and many android ebook readers

- Navigation - Open Maps & Google Maps

Smart Home Devices

- Music speakers - Bose Soundtouch Speakers

- Smart Lights - LifX bulbs & philips hue

- Nest thermostat

- Garagio smart garage doors

- Legrand smart blinds

- Apple TV, Android Smart TV, Sony TV

- Sonos Speakers

- WeMo

Smart Hubs

- Wink

- Smart Things

- Logitech Harmony

5. How many devices Bixi can control at a time?

You can control two devices or apps at the same time, switching from one to another with a simple gesture.

To take control of a new device/app, quickly reconfigure the Bixi app by picking a new device in the list. We have intentionally kept it to 2 and once users get used to bixi we can add option to switch among 3 devices.

We will also add the possibility to group devices together and put them in one of the 2 profiles switchable by bixi.

6. What are some examples of 2 relevant profiles stored on Bixi ?

As an example, you can be on your bike with Bixi on ‘Music’ &’GoPro’ profiles and control your songs and your GoPro with only gestures.

Other such examples are:

1. Music & Powerpoint presentation (office)

2. Reading & Philips Hue lighting control (home)

3. Navigation assistance & Music (on bike)

4. Music & Opening Garage door (In car)”

7. How to charge Bixi and what are the battery specifics?

Bixi is charged via a hidden micro-usb port hidden behind the removable outer ring. Bixi battery lasts around 1 month and more on a single charge lasting 1-2 hours.

8. How can Bixi have such a long battery life?

Bixi is always in a sleep mode until you place your stable hand above it and make a gesture, which help to avoid undesired gestures even if you move your hand accidently across bixi.

9. Will Bixi App consume a lot of my phone battery?

Bixi works on Bluetooth Low Energy protocol and the Bixi App is also made to not load the phone performance or battery wise. You can easily leave the Bixi app running in the background and not notice any tangible change in battery life.

10. What is the range of Bluetooth connection?

We have tested and seen Bixi control our phones with 25meters distance. With walls in between, it will be reduced. For an average apartment, Bixi should be able to cover the home.

11. Is Bixi waterproof ?

Bixi is splashproof

12. How resistant is Bixi?

Bixi is made from Corning's Gorilla Glass 4 which is shock/scratch resistant.

13. Opening up of Bixi API

In terms of API availability, we would release it in early 2017. We are already working with some Android App makers and have made the connectivity b/w Bixi and their App.

14. Bixi on IFTTT?

We have an IFTTT channel that allows users to connect Bixi with their devices. You can control your own Internet of Things device with Bixi if that device has a presence on IFTTT.

Check out some of our early recipes here - https://ifttt.com/bixi 

15. Which platforms or OS systems does BIXI support?

Bixi supports iOS, Android, Windows, Mac OS and Linux

16. Can Bixi detect normal hand gestures when moving affect and gesture commands?

Accidental hand moves across Bixi will not cause false gestures. We have taken care of it.. Bixi will activate itself only if sees a stable hand to start with

17. How many gestures does Bixi support ??

7 intuitive gestures to start with and then we will keep adding more like rotation gestures to enable/disable a group of devices together.

18. Can you setup your own gestures for different apps or are you set to the ones that you are given?

User defined gestures are not possible for the moment. We use machine learning algorithms to make sure that the available gestures are accurate. You can re-map existing gestures to the controls you want.

19. What apps and devices can you control while driving?

With Bixi, you can drive safely and control your Music, Calls, Navigation, SMS, Heads-Up Display App, etc. without even looking at your phone. It's not only safer but also a much smoother experience.

For example, once configured, you can swipe right to call home, double-tap in air to accept a call (Android only), wave down to play/pause music and single-tap to switch from one use case to another (like music to phone).

20. Do you plan adding other devices and apps?

Our mission is to continually extend the number of apps and devices through natively integrating them with Bixi.

At the end of the campaign we'll open a special community page to let you propose a specific integration and upvote the ones that you prefer.

21. How is Bixi able to control Wi-Fi based objects like Philips Hue, Lifx, GoPro etc?

Bixi connects via Bluetooth low-energy to your phones/tablets & PCs. Control of wi-fi based objects like lights, gopro uses the Bixi-App running in background on your phone as a bridge.

The App is continuously listening but does not consume power due to the use of the latest Bluetooth Low Energy 4.1 protocol.

22. Can Bixi work under powerful direct light on it ?

Yes it works very well in powerful direct light - kitchen light and even power sun light. Check out the demo video on the kickstarter page.

23. Can Bixi work in complete darkness ?

Yes Bixi equally works well in complete darkness. Check out our demo video on the kickstarter page.

24. How do i change from one fucntion to another (one app to another / one device to another / one app to another device or vice-versa)

You can change from one function to another using a simple gesture.
story_txt:
Ever felt stuck with busy, covered or dirty hands while wanting to control your devices? Meet Bixi, the first ultra-portable companion that senses your in-air hand gestures and commands your favorite smartphone Apps, LifX & Hue bulbs, Internet Speakers, GoPro and many other IoT devices.Control fluidly your devices without putting your current activity on pause.


Just wave your hand and let the Magic happen!



 

 




 

 

You can control multiple actions of two apps or devices at the same time with Bixi. For example, you can be on your bike with Bixi on ‘Music’ & ’GoPro’ profiles and control both your songs and your GoPro with only gestures. Other such examples are:

Music & Lights control (Home)  
Reading & door-lock control (home)  
GoPro & Music control (on bike)  
Phone/SMS & Music control(In car)

 

 Fiddling with electronic devices on the road creates visual and cognitive distractions. With Bixi, you can drive safely and control your Music, Calls, Navigation, SMS, etc. without even looking at your phone. 

Control your GoPro from the handlebar of your bike and get status notifications at a glance. In early 2017, you can get turn-by-turn GPS navigation directions with the LEDs on Bixi while riding a bike.

 

 

 

 
 
One Bixi can control multiple devices at the same time. 
Some of the few devices & Apps Bixi works with -
 

 
Live Demo # 1 
Easy Setup & Usage of LifX smart bulbs

 
Live Demo # 2:
Your car + your phone + Bixi + Hudway Glass = Cool futuristic Heads-Up display control
 

 
Live Demo #4:
Bixi partners with Drivemode App (for Android) to bring a distraction free in-car control of Music, Calls, SMS and Navigation. 
No need to look at your phone screen anymore!

 

 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

Bixi works via Bluetooth Low Energy protocol and the Bixi App connects Bixi to other devices based on Wi-Fi or other protocols.  

You can control two devices or Apps at the same time. Simply choose them in the Bixi App, connect Bixi to your iOS or Android mobile phone and use the Bixi app to set up the device profiles you wish to use Bixi for.  
 

 

Bixi Apps, iOS and Android are live now
Without a Bixi device you can still navigate the app and also configure smart-home devices to the Bixi App. Try out our apps today!! 

 



  

While voice control works, it is not without its limitations: 

Often requires a continuous internet connection
Often limited by language & accent constraints 
Not immune to loud music & background noises 
Most importantly, not secure. (Anyone can activate and accidentally/intentionally control your home including someone talking on TV!)

 

 
 
Our Journey so far....
 
Evolution from a mini-dustbin to a form-factor demo!
 
Our first set of Production compatible design
 
October'16: Bixi Alpha Testers across the globe
 
 
Production Update #1 (3/11/2016): This week, our manufacturing partner Flex assembled the first production quality Bixi. Our production assembly bench in being set up and test programs being optimized for quick testing of each piece. In order to ensure a sturdy, durable product we have subjected our beta units to tough tests such as drop tests on hard tiles and putting them in a hot temperature oven.  

Left : Bixi put in oven for high temperature test. Right : Bixi work bench at flex
Production Update #2 (27/01/2017): The production is progressing well. Few days back we received our first 200 Bixis from the production batch. The Bixis look good and work well. Check out the first look.
  

 
 


Bixi is noted among ABI Research's 2016 'HOT TECH INNOVATORS' list. 
Consecutively in 2015 & 2016, Bluemint Labs has been selected as one of the top 28 tech startups in France & with official 'La French Tech' label. 
One of the winners of Samsung-Legrand Hackathon where Bixi controlled Legrand windows, lights & sockets via Samsung’s Artik Cloud. 
Grant award from BPIFrance. 
 


Did you know that "bixi" is the name of a Chinese Mythological turtle? Like a turtle, Bixi is compact, sturdy and has a hexagonal shape. 

Because Bixi is much more than a gadget, able to help you take full power of your connected life, we really wanted a design that gives Bixi, the look of a lovable companion. 
A turtle is said to be an intelligent and wise character, and Bixi follows this path by being the only ultra-portable solution that achieves complete gesture processing locally in the device.
 
 
ST is among the World leaders in low-power micro-controllers and sensors. Bluemint Labs is hosted by ST, Grenoble, France

A world leader in glass is protecting Bixi's Gesture sensing from scratches and falls with one of its best Gorilla® Glass 4.  

Bixi was selected to the 2016 HPE Milkshake Valley Startup acceleration program. 

One of the biggest and most renowned electronics device manufacturers in the world, Flextronics is currently working with us to setup the production line. 
Risks and challenges
From showing a working form-factor demo at CES Las Vegas in Jan' 2016 to getting close to shipping now, Bixi has come a long way. This has been made possible with a talented team, seed-funding and strong world leaders as partners for R&D and production.
At the time of launch of this campaign, we have already received first tooling results from manufacturing and they look good. We have sent those Bixis to our Alpha Testers across the world who have already appreciated the build quality.
We seem to be on-target for the first pre-series delivery early January. However, there are always risks that can delay the process of getting Bixi in (front of) your hands. These could be unexpected events on the production line such as delays by a supplier to deliver a component on time or some minor yet important product enhancements to be done.
Even when we start shipping, there's always a risk of the product getting stuck in customs, either when we are receiving the products from the factory or shipping them to you. We are taking measures though to prevent such issues.
We are committed to provide with you an exceptional user-experience with Bixi and are striving hard to achieve on time delivery. By pledging in our campaign, you have become part of our journey and we will be communicating regularly on the progress to get Bixi delivered to you.

FAQ
1. How does Bixi work?
Bixi connects via Bluetooth to a smartphone/ tablet/ computers. Using the Bixi App(IOS or Android) you can configure the Apps or connected devices you want to control. Each gesture matches a specific command on the connected device.
2. What technology behind bixi?
Bixi is based on next-generation Time-of-flight based optical sensors with milli-meter level precision.
3. Is there an app for Bixi?
There is an app for Bixi to help setup your Bixi device and other devices easily. Bixi App will be available in iOS and Android.
4. Which apps & devices are compatible with Bixi?
- All your music apps for main music/media controls
- Spotify
- Apple music
- Google music
- Tuneine
- Deezer
- Soundcloud
- Pandora
- Youtube, VLC, etc,
Other Devices & Apps
- Action Cameras - GoPro
- Automotive apps - HUDway & Drivemode.
- Browsers - Safari, Chrome
- E-Book Readers - iBooks and many android ebook readers
- Navigation - Open Maps & Google Maps
Smart Home Devices
- Music speakers - Bose Soundtouch Speakers
- Smart Lights - LifX bulbs & philips hue
- Nest thermostat
- Garagio smart garage doors
- Legrand smart blinds
- Apple TV, Android Smart TV, Sony TV
- Sonos Speakers
- WeMo
Smart Hubs
- Wink
- Smart Things
- Logitech Harmony
5. How many devices Bixi can control at a time?
You can control two devices or apps at the same time, switching from one to another with a simple gesture.
To take control of a new device/app, quickly reconfigure the Bixi app by picking a new device in the list. We have intentionally kept it to 2 and once users get used to bixi we can add option to switch among 3 devices.
We will also add the possibility to group devices together and put them in one of the 2 profiles switchable by bixi.
6. What are some examples of 2 relevant profiles stored on Bixi ?
As an example, you can be on your bike with Bixi on ‘Music’ &’GoPro’ profiles and control your songs and your GoPro with only gestures.
Other such examples are:
1. Music & Powerpoint presentation (office)
2. Reading & Philips Hue lighting control (home)
3. Navigation assistance & Music (on bike)
4. Music & Opening Garage door (In car)”
7. How to charge Bixi and what are the battery specifics?
Bixi is charged via a hidden micro-usb port hidden behind the removable outer ring. Bixi battery lasts around 1 month and more on a single charge lasting 1-2 hours.
8. How can Bixi have such a long battery life?
Bixi is always in a sleep mode until you place your stable hand above it and make a gesture, which help to avoid undesired gestures even if you move your hand accidently across bixi.
9. Will Bixi App consume a lot of my phone battery?
Bixi works on Bluetooth Low Energy protocol and the Bixi App is also made to not load the phone performance or battery wise. You can easily leave the Bixi app running in the background and not notice any tangible change in battery life.
10. What is the range of Bluetooth connection?
We have tested and seen Bixi control our phones with 25meters distance. With walls in between, it will be reduced. For an average apartment, Bixi should be able to cover the home.
11. Is Bixi waterproof ?
Bixi is splashproof
12. How resistant is Bixi?
Bixi is made from Corning's Gorilla Glass 4 which is shock/scratch resistant.
13. Opening up of Bixi API
In terms of API availability, we would release it in early 2017. We are already working with some Android App makers and have made the connectivity b/w Bixi and their App.
14. Bixi on IFTTT?
We have an IFTTT channel that allows users to connect Bixi with their devices. You can control your own Internet of Things device with Bixi if that device has a presence on IFTTT.
Check out some of our early recipes here - https://ifttt.com/bixi 
15. Which platforms or OS systems does BIXI support?
Bixi supports iOS, Android, Windows, Mac OS and Linux
16. Can Bixi detect normal hand gestures when moving affect and gesture commands?
Accidental hand moves across Bixi will not cause false gestures. We have taken care of it.. Bixi will activate itself only if sees a stable hand to start with
17. How many gestures does Bixi support ??
7 intuitive gestures to start with and then we will keep adding more like rotation gestures to enable/disable a group of devices together.
18. Can you setup your own gestures for different apps or are you set to the ones that you are given?
User defined gestures are not possible for the moment. We use machine learning algorithms to make sure that the available gestures are accurate. You can re-map existing gestures to the controls you want.
19. What apps and devices can you control while driving?
With Bixi, you can drive safely and control your Music, Calls, Navigation, SMS, Heads-Up Display App, etc. without even looking at your phone. It's not only safer but also a much smoother experience.
For example, once configured, you can swipe right to call home, double-tap in air to accept a call (Android only), wave down to play/pause music and single-tap to switch from one use case to another (like music to phone).
20. Do you plan adding other devices and apps?
Our mission is to continually extend the number of apps and devices through natively integrating them with Bixi.
At the end of the campaign we'll open a special community page to let you propose a specific integration and upvote the ones that you prefer.
21. How is Bixi able to control Wi-Fi based objects like Philips Hue, Lifx, GoPro etc?
Bixi connects via Bluetooth low-energy to your phones/tablets & PCs. Control of wi-fi based objects like lights, gopro uses the Bixi-App running in background on your phone as a bridge.
The App is continuously listening but does not consume power due to the use of the latest Bluetooth Low Energy 4.1 protocol.
22. Can Bixi work under powerful direct light on it ?
Yes it works very well in powerful direct light - kitchen light and even power sun light. Check out the demo video on the kickstarter page.
23. Can Bixi work in complete darkness ?
Yes Bixi equally works well in complete darkness. Check out our demo video on the kickstarter page.
24. How do i change from one fucntion to another (one app to another / one device to another / one app to another device or vice-versa)
You can change from one function to another using a simple gesture.

story:
Cliquez ici pour voir la version en français !

We’d like to introduce you to FairPay


FairPay is for any of you, publishers and Internet users eager to build a more ethical economic system. We propose web users a catalog of sites partners to visit without moderation, anonymously and without advertising. To content publishers, we propose another way to earn an income directly related to the consumers’ interests.


Where does this project come from?


FairPay was born in the head of Nicolas Hoareau, a computer engineer and Internet enthusiast concerned about its development. In order to carry out this adventure, he's working with Guillaume Petit, an expert in system and network engineering, and Jérémie Fortin, who deals with the marketing and management side.

This team's ambition is to create an ethical system of the online information that serves users as well as Internet workers, motivated by three core values:

  • respect for privacy
  • equity
  • transparency


Why is action needed?


This approach comes from a simple observation: publishers mainly depend on an economic model based on adverting. And at the same time, they’re facing Internet users strongly opposed to ads crippling their navigation. These users are tired by what they are forced to see and they feel stalked, their personal data being stripped away from them.

Users' email addresses, social networks accounts and browser history have no secret for advertising agencies, as they use those to develop very personalized and invasive strategies.

To overcome this, people rely on ad-blockers. But this mechanism is harmful to publishers since it prevents them from fulfilling their contracts with agencies. They lose money and have no solution to offer to their audience. That's where FairPay comes into play.




How does it work?


Anyone can become a FairPay user by paying a monthly fee of 9.90 euros. By doing so, they gain full access to content published by partners.

Publishers who join FairPay become partners. In exchange for an income from the FairPay community they agree to disable all kind of advertising to FairPay users and to stop collecting any personal data from them. He gets log in thanks to a simple plugin to add to his browser.

FairPay vouches for compliance with these rules.

Almost all the money generated by these subscriptions - 90% - feeds a pool that pays partners each month in proportion to their traffic.

The remaining 10% are used by FairPay internaly (bank transaction fees, IT infrastructure costs and salaries).




Crowdfunding


Creating a crowdfunding campaign is a choice. FairPay is a project dedicated to the Internet community and we want to give it the ability to make it real. Let us know what you think about our approach.

Through FairPay we aim to give more independence to Internet users and publishers, so we find imperative to keep ours as well!

We need $50,000 to lay the foundations of FairPay, as stated in the following table:




Update on counterparties


Starting from $80 donation, you enter the Fresco FairPay. You might wonder where you are sent ... It's simple: the team's graphic designer is going to create a character inspired by Michael Martin (FairPay's mascot) based on your picture!

All characters will join an online wall of fame that we hope will quickly turn into a crowd of sponsors super classy.

This is our creative way to immortalize the impact you had on FairPay's history.


Français

FairPay est un internet sans publicité et sans collecte de données. Nicolas Hoareau, fondateur de la start-up FairPay, a réalisé cette vidéo pour mieux vous l'expliquer :


 


Nous vous présentons FairPay


FairPay est une start-up née à Sophia Antipolis. Ses créateurs travaillent à la construction d’un internet sans publicité et sans collecte de données. 

Cela s’adresse à chacun d’entre vous, sites internet et internautes désireux de bâtir un système économique plus éthique.

Nous proposons aux utilisateurs du web un catalogue de sites partenaires à visiter sans modération, de manière anonyme et sans publicité. Aux producteurs de contenus, nous proposons une autre manière de gagner un salaire, directement en lien avec l’intérêt du consommateur.


D’où vient ce projet ?


FairPay a germé dans la tête de Nicolas Hoareau, ingénieur en informatique passionné d’Internet et soucieux de son développement. Pour mener à bien cette aventure, il l’a partagée avec deux coéquipiers : Guillaume Petit, expert en développement systèmes et réseaux, et Jérémie Fortin, chargé des aspects marketing et management.

L’ambition de ce trio féru du web est de créer un système éthique de consommation de l'information en ligne. Un système capable de servir les utilisateurs ainsi que les travailleurs d’Internet, motivé par trois valeurs-clés : 

  • le respect de la vie privée
  • l’équité
  • la transparence


Pourquoi faut-il agir ?


Cette démarche part d’un constat simple : les éditeurs de contenus dépendent majoritairement d’un modèle économique axé sur la diffusion de publicités. 

Or, ils ont en face d’eux des internautes de plus en plus opposés à l’apparition de ces publicités intempestives et ciblées, parasitant leur navigation. Et ces internautes ne se sentent pas seulement gênés, ils se sentent traqués et dépouillés de leurs informations personnelles.

Leurs adresses e-mail, leurs comptes sur les réseaux sociaux et leur historique de navigation n’ont plus de secret pour les régies publicitaires. Elles s’en servent pour élaborer des stratégies toujours plus personnalisées et invasives.

Pour palier cela, les internautes utilisent des bloqueurs de publicités. Mais ce mécanisme est nocif pour les éditeurs car il les empêche de respecter leurs engagements vis-à-vis des régies. Ils perdent un argent considérable et ont peu de solution à proposer à leur public.

C’est là que FairPay intervient.



Comment ça marche ?


L’internaute qui rejoint la communauté FairPay devient un utilisateur. Il s’acquitte d’un abonnement mensuel de 9,90 euros. Il bénéficie d'un accès complet aux contenus des sites partenaires. 

Dans la pratique : il doit seulement ajouter un module d'extension (ou plugin) à son navigateur habituel.

Le site qui rejoint FairPay devient un partenaire. En échange de son revenu, il s’engage à n’afficher aucune publicité à l’utilisateur et à ne récolter aucune donnée le concernant. FairPay se porte garant du respect de ces règles.

Dans la pratique : il intègre un code à son site internet. 


Où va l'argent ?


La quasi-totalité de l’argent généré par ces abonnements - soit 90 % - nourrit une cagnotte qui rémunère les partenaires mensuellement au prorata de leur trafic.

Les 10 % restant vont au fonctionnement interne de FairPay (transactions financières, infrastructures et salaires).




Le financement participatif


La création d’une campagne de financement participatif est un choix. FairPay est un projet destiné à la communauté d’internet. C’est pour cette raison que nous souhaitons lui donner la possibilité de se l’approprier et de le faire exister. 

Et puisqu’à travers FairPay nous avons l’ambition de donner plus d’indépendance à l’utilisateur et au partenaire, il nous est impératif de conserver la nôtre.

Nous avons besoin de 50 000 dollars (car l'argent est collecté en dollars sur Indiegogo) pour faire l’acquisition d’infrastructures couteuses (des serveurs pour faire fonctionner le système informatique) et rémunérer des développeurs pour vous proposer ce qui suit :



Le point sur les contreparties


À partir de 80 dollars de donation, vous entrez dans la Fresque FairPay. Vous devez vous demander où on vous envoie... C'est simple : le graphiste du team va designer un personnage inspiré de notre cher Michel Martin (la mascotte de FairPay) à votre effigie ! 

Et comme nous sommes infiniment reconnaissants envers vous, nous intégrerons ce personnage à un wall of fame en ligne qui, nous l'espérons, se transformera rapidement en foule de donateurs aux looks très très classes. 

C'est notre manière créative d'immortaliser l'importance que votre geste a dans l'histoire de FairPay.
