story:
Simply put, the dbrand Grip is The World's Grippiest Phone Case. Using a combination of patented material science and strategically engineered grip extrusions, we've accomplished what no other phone case even set out to attempt: revolutionary grip.

 

  Who is dbrand? //

Since 2011, dbrand has operated as the global leader in device customization. Designed to customize your smartphone and add industry-leading scratch protection, skins – also known as vinyl wraps – are ultra-thin, precision-cut pieces of 3M vinyl. They're prototyped, manufactured, and shipped from our HQ in Toronto, Canada. Chances are, you've seen our skins featured on various literally every tech-focused YouTube channel on the internet.

  Revolutionary Grip //

With the dbrand Grip, you'll never drop your phone again. Using patented material science, every detail of the dbrand Grip is designed to make sure your phone stays where it belongs: in your hand.

Along the sides of the case, and on all four corners, you'll find confidence-inspiring grip features. They're made from a uniquely formulated material, engineered for ultimate grip... and strategically placed for maximum contact. Over time, this patented compound gets even grippier and forms to the way you hold your phone. Like your favourite pair of shoes, the dbrand Grip will evolve to a fit that's totally custom to you.

  Supported Devices //

Below is a list of devices we'll be supporting during this campaign. If your device isn't shown below, unfortunately, that means we won't be supporting it during this campaign. While we definitely plan to support more devices in the future, our sole focus right now is to get production completed and orders shipped as quickly as possible for these 21 devices.

If you've already placed an order for a dbrand Grip, visit https://dbrand.com/grip/my-order to select the device you plan to get a Grip for.

Apple
iPhone X
iPhone 8 Plus
iPhone 8
iPhone 7 Plus
iPhone 7
iPhone 6s Plus
iPhone 6s
iPhone 6 Plus
iPhone 6
Samsung
Galaxy Note 8
Galaxy S8+
Galaxy S8
Galaxy S7 Edge
Other
Pixel 2
Pixel 2 XL
Pixel
Pixel XL
OnePlus 5
OnePlus 3T
OnePlus 3
Nexus 6P

  Design Elements //

Carbon Composite //

Through 18 months of development, testing, and more testing, we've formulated a unique compound that makes up the rigid frame of the dbrand Grip. That compound, a unique blend of carbon fiber and plastic polymers, brings together the durability and flexibility of plastic, while maintaining the light weight and unparalleled strength of carbon fiber.

Oh – and in case you're wondering, the answer is "No": The carbon composite we've developed will have absolutely no negative interference with Radio, WiFi, GPS, NFC, or Qi Wireless Charging signals.

Tactile Buttons //

There's nothing quite as satisfying as the tactile click of a flawlessly engineered button. From the first day we embarked on this journey to develop the dbrand Grip, we knew the buttons needed to achieve perfection. Aside from your screen, what part of your smartphone do you interact with more than the buttons? It astonishes us that most case companies allow their products to reach customers in a state that will diminish that part of the user experience.

Simply put, the buttons on the dbrand Grip, made using the patented D3O® formulation, are the clickiest in the industry. No wear-in period is necessary – just pop on the dbrand Grip and enjoy buttons that are arguably even more satisfying than the stock buttons themselves. Don't believe us? Buy a Grip and find out for yourself.

Headphone Compatibility //

There's nothing worse than getting your dream phone case, then having to take it off every time you want to plug in your ATH-M50x headphones. While nearly all in-ear style headphones will be compatible with the dbrand Grip, unfortunately it simply wasn't possible to make a hole big enough to accommodate larger audio jacks (like those seen on the Audio-Technica line of over-ear headphones).

That said, this is dbrand. We always find a solution. Every dbrand Grip we ship includes a custom gold-plated headphone adapter. It's designed to fit perfectly within the headphone port on the Grip, and allows compatibility with any headphones on the planet.

Lens Protection //

The camera – it's one of the most important features on your smartphone. When designing the dbrand Grip, we purposefully extruded the back lip – ensuring that your camera lens remains clear of any surface you rest it on.

  Impact Technology //

This is real life and we're not going to pretend that grip is going to save you from forgetting your phone on your lap when you get out of the car. That's why we partnered with D3O®: the global leader in shock-absorbing technologies. Trusted by Adidas, Under Armour, Dr. Martens, and the US Military, their track record speaks for itself.

This D3O® impact technology is used nearly everywhere on the dbrand Grip. It lines the entire inner edge of the frame, ensuring your phone only ever makes direct contact with a shock-absorbing material.

Furthermore, because the D3O® material itself is naturally grippy and soft to the touch, we've engineered it into all exterior design features of the case. Ergonomic D3O® grip extrusions running along the frame of the case not only provide confidence-inspiring grip, but break in over time, like your favorite pair of shoes.

That's right – the more you use it, the more your Grip will truly become unique to you. Of course, the D3O® material is also used on the reinforced corners, ensuring any major drops have extra cushioning.

  The Science of D3O //

In its raw form, the patented D3O® material flows freely – like a very slow moving, thick liquid. Upon impact, the molecules in the D3O® material lock together to absorb and disperse the impact, as if nothing had ever happened. The result? Unparalleled drop protection that you'll simply never need.

  Customization //

As expected, the dbrand Grip can be fully customized - designed for compatibility with unique "Grip-specific" dbrand skins. From Carbon Fiber to Concrete, Marble to Matte Black, even Bamboo and Mahogany… you'll be sure to find a custom dbrand skin to fit your unique style.

Every Grip comes with a signature Matte Black skin. That said, if you want to further customize your Grip, simply select one of The Custom Grip™ perks and choose one of our four legendary skin packs.

 
 

  Delivery Timeframes //

Delivery... it's the pain point of nearly every crowdfunding campaign that's ever existed. As a company that already ships thousands of orders every day from our Toronto HQ, delivery is our expertise.

Manufacturing of the Grip is slated for completion by mid-February, at which point all 31,000+ units will be shipped from China to our warehouse in Toronto. All Grips will be shipped to Toronto via an express air service, rather than a slow sea freight.

Once the Grips arrive at our warehouse in Toronto, we'll immediately begin fulfillment. Fulfillment will be done sequentially, by device, in order of popularity. What that means is that the devices with the most Grip orders will be filled first. That sequence can be seen in the list shown on the right.

For a detailed breakdown of our manufacturing process, take a look at the 3rd Campaign Update. For a better understanding of our fulfillment process, as well as the rationale behind why we're filling orders in the sequence we are, take a look at our 4th Campaign Update.

As we go through the process of filling orders, we'll be sure to keep everyone posted on the status. As always, keep an eye on our Campaign Updates for the latest information. If you have any specific questions, feel free to post a comment in the comments section. Thanks so much for your support!

  Shipping //

All orders will be shipped using a door-to-door tracked service. For deliveries in the US and Canada, this means that once your Grip has shipped, delivery won’t take more than 2-4 days. For deliveries outside the US and Canada, we’re still working to determine the best service provider for your local area. The most likely solution for international deliveries will be FedEx, although some Gulf Region shipments may be better served by Aramex. Regardless of your delivery location, rest assured your package will have full tracking visibility.

As is the case with nearly every package you’ve ever received from an online purchase, duties and customs fees will be determined at the time of delivery, and charged by your local authority. Unfortunately, we have no control over that.

If you have any further questions about timelines, feel free to post a comment. We’ll be hanging out there all month!

  FAQ //

How do I select the device type I want a Grip for? //

Great question! We've developed a custom interface which allows Backers to select their device type. You can check it out at https://dbrand.com/grip/my-order.

I'm still not sure which device I need a Grip for, but it's definitely one from the list. Can I wait to make a selection? //

Of course. Until we start filling orders, you can change your device selection at any time.

If my device isn't supported on the list, can I still get a Grip during this campaign? //

Unfortunately not. With the 21 devices we're supporting during this campaign, our sole focus is to get production completed and orders shipped as quickly as possible. We'll definitely be supporting more devices in the future, but we won't be able to support additional devices during this campaign. If you purchased a Grip and your device isn't supported, the next step would be to select 'None of the above' from the device selection interface at https://dbrand.com/grip/my-order and follow the instructions on how to obtain a refund.

I ordered a Grip with a Custom Skin Pack. Can I change the Custom Skin Pack selection? //

Unfortunately, Indiegogo doesn't have any option for backers (you) or campaigners (us) to change Perk Options. If you need to make a change to your Custom Skin Pack selection, the only way to do is by getting a refund and placing another order. To get a refund, first log into your Indiegogo account. Next, click your name in the top right corner. Select 'My Contributions', then click 'View Order Details'. Finally, click the 'Request Refund' button. Once you've initiated the refund, it will be processed automatically. It can take up to 5 business days until the refund is reflected on your account statement, depending on the policy of your bank or financial institution.

Can I change my delivery address? //

You sure can. Changing your delivery address can be completed right here, on the Indiegogo website. Full instructions on how to make adjustments to your delivery address can be found here.

When will shipping begin? //

All the answers you're looking for can be found in the Delivery Timeframes section above.

What delivery provider are you using to ship the Grip? //

In Canada, we'll be using Canada Post Xpresspost. In the US, we'll be using a Priority 2-day USPS service. For International orders (i.e. outside of US and Canada), we'll either be using FedEx or Aramex. Regardless of where you're located, once the Grip leaves our warehouse, it'll be traceable all the way to your door.

Will my existing dbrand skin be compatible with the Grip? //

While technically all dbrand skins will be compatible with the Grip, we highly recommend using the skins that we've developed specifically for the Grip (i.e. the ones included with your order). These Grip-specific skins were designed not only to offer a much simpler installation (for those experienced with dbrand skins, that means no side or corner flaps), but they're also engineered to complement the Grip with an optimal fit. While dbrand skins are imperceptibly thin (0.23mm), even micro-millimeter changes in the device thickness can affect the intended fit and feel of the Grip. Once all campaign orders have been fulfilled, we'll be opening up a full customizer on our website, allowing customers to purchase any type of Grip-specific dbrand skin they want.

Why did you launch the Grip on Indiegogo? //

We're always looking for new and innovative ways to launch products. You're here reading this, so it must have worked.

What is the Grip made of? //

The dbrand Grip features an industry-first carbon composite frame, housing world-class shock absorbing technology from the material science experts at D3O®. The carbon composite frame has the flexibility and durability of plastic, while maintaining the light weight and unparalleled strength of carbon fiber.

Why is it called "Grip"? //

You're kidding, right?

Does the Grip come in any other colors? //

The case itself is available in only black. That said, as a skin company, we're all about customization. You can select a Custom Skin Pack with the Custom Grip perk and choose between Marble, Concrete, Black Dragon, Red Dragon, Bamboo, Mahogany, Black Carbon Fiber, and White Carbon Fiber skins to customize the look and feel of your device.

Can I still use my headphones with the Grip? //

Absolutely. Nearly every earbud-style headphone will fit without issue – and for those that don't (like the Audio-Technica M50x), we provide a custom head phone adapter to ensure full compatibility.

How do the buttons feel on the Grip? //

Unbelievable. We specifically engineered the buttons on the Grip to be ultra-tactile. Some would argue that the buttons on the Grip are even clickier than the stock buttons your device!

Will the Grip affect wireless charging or NFC? //

Not at all.

Will the Grip protect my camera and screen? //

Indeed it will. We've designed the Grip with an extended front and back lip, ensuring that any surface you rest it on will make no contact with the device itself.

Is the Grip waterproof? //

100%.

If I still have questions, whom should I contact? //

You can either post a comment or email grip@dbrand.com.
story_txt:
Simply put, the dbrand Grip is The World's Grippiest Phone Case. Using a combination of patented material science and strategically engineered grip extrusions, we've accomplished what no other phone case even set out to attempt: revolutionary grip. 
   Who is dbrand? // 

Since 2011, dbrand has operated as the global leader in device customization. Designed to customize your smartphone and add industry-leading scratch protection, skins – also known as vinyl wraps – are ultra-thin, precision-cut pieces of 3M vinyl. They're prototyped, manufactured, and shipped from our HQ in Toronto, Canada. Chances are, you've seen our skins featured on various literally every tech-focused YouTube channel on the internet.

   Revolutionary Grip // 
With the dbrand Grip, you'll never drop your phone again. Using patented material science, every detail of the dbrand Grip is designed to make sure your phone stays where it belongs: in your hand.
Along the sides of the case, and on all four corners, you'll find confidence-inspiring grip features. They're made from a uniquely formulated material, engineered for ultimate grip... and strategically placed for maximum contact. Over time, this patented compound gets even grippier and forms to the way you hold your phone. Like your favourite pair of shoes, the dbrand Grip will evolve to a fit that's totally custom to you.

   Supported Devices // 

Below is a list of devices we'll be supporting during this campaign. If your device isn't shown below, unfortunately, that means we won't be supporting it during this campaign. While we definitely plan to support more devices in the future, our sole focus right now is to get production completed and orders shipped as quickly as possible for these 21 devices.
If you've already placed an order for a dbrand Grip, visit https://dbrand.com/grip/my-order to select the device you plan to get a Grip for.


Apple
iPhone XiPhone 8 PlusiPhone 8iPhone 7 PlusiPhone 7iPhone 6s PlusiPhone 6siPhone 6 PlusiPhone 6


Samsung
Galaxy Note 8Galaxy S8+Galaxy S8Galaxy S7 Edge


Other
Pixel 2Pixel 2 XLPixelPixel XLOnePlus 5OnePlus 3TOnePlus 3Nexus 6P


   Design Elements // 
  Carbon Composite //  

Through 18 months of development, testing, and more testing, we've formulated a unique compound that makes up the rigid frame of the dbrand Grip. That compound, a unique blend of carbon fiber and plastic polymers, brings together the durability and flexibility of plastic, while maintaining the light weight and unparalleled strength of carbon fiber.

Oh – and in case you're wondering, the answer is "No": The carbon composite we've developed will have absolutely no negative interference with Radio, WiFi, GPS, NFC, or Qi Wireless Charging signals.
  Tactile Buttons //  

There's nothing quite as satisfying as the tactile click of a flawlessly engineered button. From the first day we embarked on this journey to develop the dbrand Grip, we knew the buttons needed to achieve perfection. Aside from your screen, what part of your smartphone do you interact with more than the buttons? It astonishes us that most case companies allow their products to reach customers in a state that will diminish that part of the user experience.

Simply put, the buttons on the dbrand Grip, made using the patented D3O® formulation, are the clickiest in the industry. No wear-in period is necessary – just pop on the dbrand Grip and enjoy buttons that are arguably even more satisfying than the stock buttons themselves. Don't believe us? Buy a Grip and find out for yourself.
  Headphone Compatibility //  

There's nothing worse than getting your dream phone case, then having to take it off every time you want to plug in your ATH-M50x headphones. While nearly all in-ear style headphones will be compatible with the dbrand Grip, unfortunately it simply wasn't possible to make a hole big enough to accommodate larger audio jacks (like those seen on the Audio-Technica line of over-ear headphones).

That said, this is dbrand. We always find a solution. Every dbrand Grip we ship includes a custom gold-plated headphone adapter. It's designed to fit perfectly within the headphone port on the Grip, and allows compatibility with any headphones on the planet.
  Lens Protection //  
The camera – it's one of the most important features on your smartphone. When designing the dbrand Grip, we purposefully extruded the back lip – ensuring that your camera lens remains clear of any surface you rest it on.

   Impact Technology // 
This is real life and we're not going to pretend that grip is going to save you from forgetting your phone on your lap when you get out of the car. That's why we partnered with D3O®: the global leader in shock-absorbing technologies. Trusted by Adidas, Under Armour, Dr. Martens, and the US Military, their track record speaks for itself.
This D3O® impact technology is used nearly everywhere on the dbrand Grip. It lines the entire inner edge of the frame, ensuring your phone only ever makes direct contact with a shock-absorbing material.

Furthermore, because the D3O® material itself is naturally grippy and soft to the touch, we've engineered it into all exterior design features of the case. Ergonomic D3O® grip extrusions running along the frame of the case not only provide confidence-inspiring grip, but break in over time, like your favorite pair of shoes.

That's right – the more you use it, the more your Grip will truly become unique to you. Of course, the D3O® material is also used on the reinforced corners, ensuring any major drops have extra cushioning.

   The Science of D3O // 

In its raw form, the patented D3O® material flows freely – like a very slow moving, thick liquid. Upon impact, the molecules in the D3O® material lock together to absorb and disperse the impact, as if nothing had ever happened. The result? Unparalleled drop protection that you'll simply never need.

   Customization // 

As expected, the dbrand Grip can be fully customized - designed for compatibility with unique "Grip-specific" dbrand skins. From Carbon Fiber to Concrete, Marble to Matte Black, even Bamboo and Mahogany… you'll be sure to find a custom dbrand skin to fit your unique style.
Every Grip comes with a signature Matte Black skin. That said, if you want to further customize your Grip, simply select one of The Custom Grip™ perks and choose one of our four legendary skin packs.




 




 



   Delivery Timeframes // 


Delivery... it's the pain point of nearly every crowdfunding campaign that's ever existed. As a company that already ships thousands of orders every day from our Toronto HQ, delivery is our expertise.
Manufacturing of the Grip is slated for completion by mid-February, at which point all 31,000+ units will be shipped from China to our warehouse in Toronto. All Grips will be shipped to Toronto via an express air service, rather than a slow sea freight.
Once the Grips arrive at our warehouse in Toronto, we'll immediately begin fulfillment. Fulfillment will be done sequentially, by device, in order of popularity. What that means is that the devices with the most Grip orders will be filled first. That sequence can be seen in the list shown on the right.
For a detailed breakdown of our manufacturing process, take a look at the 3rd Campaign Update. For a better understanding of our fulfillment process, as well as the rationale behind why we're filling orders in the sequence we are, take a look at our 4th Campaign Update.
As we go through the process of filling orders, we'll be sure to keep everyone posted on the status. As always, keep an eye on our Campaign Updates for the latest information. If you have any specific questions, feel free to post a comment in the comments section. Thanks so much for your support!



iPhone X


Pixel 2 XL


iPhone 7 Plus


iPhone 8 Plus


Galaxy S8 Plus


Galaxy S8


Galaxy Note 8


iPhone 7


iPhone 8


OnePlus 3T


OnePlus 3


iPhone 6s


iPhone 6


Pixel 2


OnePlus 5


Galaxy S7 Edge


Pixel XL


Pixel


iPhone 6s Plus


iPhone 6 Plus


Nexus 6P



   Shipping // 


All orders will be shipped using a door-to-door tracked service. For deliveries in the US and Canada, this means that once your Grip has shipped, delivery won’t take more than 2-4 days. For deliveries outside the US and Canada, we’re still working to determine the best service provider for your local area. The most likely solution for international deliveries will be FedEx, although some Gulf Region shipments may be better served by Aramex. Regardless of your delivery location, rest assured your package will have full tracking visibility.

As is the case with nearly every package you’ve ever received from an online purchase, duties and customs fees will be determined at the time of delivery, and charged by your local authority. Unfortunately, we have no control over that.
If you have any further questions about timelines, feel free to post a comment. We’ll be hanging out there all month!

   FAQ // 
  How do I select the device type I want a Grip for? //  Great question! We've developed a custom interface which allows Backers to select their device type. You can check it out at https://dbrand.com/grip/my-order.  I'm still not sure which device I need a Grip for, but it's definitely one from the list. Can I wait to make a selection? //  Of course. Until we start filling orders, you can change your device selection at any time.  If my device isn't supported on the list, can I still get a Grip during this campaign? //  Unfortunately not. With the 21 devices we're supporting during this campaign, our sole focus is to get production completed and orders shipped as quickly as possible. We'll definitely be supporting more devices in the future, but we won't be able to support additional devices during this campaign. If you purchased a Grip and your device isn't supported, the next step would be to select 'None of the above' from the device selection interface at https://dbrand.com/grip/my-order and follow the instructions on how to obtain a refund.  I ordered a Grip with a Custom Skin Pack. Can I change the Custom Skin Pack selection? //  Unfortunately, Indiegogo doesn't have any option for backers (you) or campaigners (us) to change Perk Options. If you need to make a change to your Custom Skin Pack selection, the only way to do is by getting a refund and placing another order. To get a refund, first log into your Indiegogo account. Next, click your name in the top right corner. Select 'My Contributions', then click 'View Order Details'. Finally, click the 'Request Refund' button. Once you've initiated the refund, it will be processed automatically. It can take up to 5 business days until the refund is reflected on your account statement, depending on the policy of your bank or financial institution.  Can I change my delivery address? //  You sure can. Changing your delivery address can be completed right here, on the Indiegogo website. Full instructions on how to make adjustments to your delivery address can be found here.  When will shipping begin? //  All the answers you're looking for can be found in the Delivery Timeframes section above.  What delivery provider are you using to ship the Grip? //  In Canada, we'll be using Canada Post Xpresspost. In the US, we'll be using a Priority 2-day USPS service. For International orders (i.e. outside of US and Canada), we'll either be using FedEx or Aramex. Regardless of where you're located, once the Grip leaves our warehouse, it'll be traceable all the way to your door. These Grip-specific skins were designed not only to offer a much simpler installation (for those experienced with dbrand skins, that means no side or corner flaps), but they're also engineered to complement the Grip with an optimal fit. While dbrand skins are imperceptibly thin (0.23mm), even micro-millimeter changes in the device thickness can affect the intended fit and feel of the Grip. Once all campaign orders have been fulfilled, we'll be opening up a full customizer on our website, allowing customers to purchase any type of Grip-specific dbrand skin they want. What is the Grip made of? //  The dbrand Grip features an industry-first carbon composite frame, housing world-class shock absorbing technology from the material science experts at D3O®. The carbon composite frame has the flexibility and durability of plastic, while maintaining the light weight and unparalleled strength of carbon fiber.  Why is it called "Grip"? //  You're kidding, right?  Does the Grip come in any other colors? //  The case itself is available in only black. That said, as a skin company, we're all about customization. You can select a Custom Skin Pack with the Custom Grip perk and choose between Marble, Concrete, Black Dragon, Red Dragon, Bamboo, Mahogany, Black Carbon Fiber, and White Carbon Fiber skins to customize the look and feel of your device. Some would argue that the buttons on the Grip are even clickier than the stock buttons your device!  Will the Grip affect wireless charging or NFC? //  Not at all. story:
DVD-o-matic

DVD-o-matic is a free, open-source program for converting video, sound and image files to Digital Cinema Packages (DCPs). It has been in constant development for the last year, and is in use by people all over the world.  People use it to ease their lives as projectionists, to improve presentation quality, to encode independent films for cinema presentation and many things besides.

Development is undertaken in my spare time, and although I sometimes receive donations, I derive almost no income from its development.  And this is fine!  It is nice to have created something that people can and do use, free from the shackles of proprietary costs and licensing.

 

The world's many operating systems

Currently, DVD-o-matic is released as source, and also in binary form for Linux and Microsoft Windows.  This is primarily because, thanks to the work of many open-source authors, both operating systems can be targeted using free software.

Mac OS X is a little different, however; it is really pretty much essential to have the real thing, both for development and testing.

 

A Mac OS X port

Several people have asked about the possibility of a Mac OS X port of DVD-o-matic.  This funding campaign is to make that possible.  In a nutshell, with the money I will buy a Mac Mini and port DVD-o-matic to work on it.  Henceforth, Mac OS X binary releases will be available as free downloads (alongside the existing Linux and Windows versions).


This is a "fixed funding" project; if you donate, and the campaign does not subsequently reach its goal, your money will be refunded by indiegogo.

story:
You can do just about anything from the comfort of your own smartphone these days - order a limo, buy shoes, watch the latest episode of Breaking Amish - pretty much anything your heart desires. But - as we discovered on a blustery night in a crowded DC bar - you can't request a song from a DJ. Over the next few hours (and countless IPAs), we set out to change that. Hey DJ was born. Over the next six months, we devoted ourselves to developing the concept and blueprint for Hey DJ.

Hey DJ allows you to request songs from the DJ in clubs, bars and restaurants, or anywhere a DJ performs. You can also tip the DJ, and even bid against or with other users to get your song played first. Hey DJ puts you in control of the music.

And all of you hard working DJs out there - you'll make more tips! Let's get this economy moving one request at a time.

Working with the good people at Objective Apps, we've created a wireframe blueprint for the project, and it's ready to move on to production. Hey DJ is ready to make the leap from great idea to great app.

That's where you come in.

We need the Indiegogo community to help us bring this product to life. We love this idea and think you will too. We're offering some solid rewards along with the bragging rights that come along with being an early adopter of the next big thing. Please check out our video and then show your support for Hey DJ. Let's get this party started.

 

A little bit about us:

Tom grew up outside Philly, earned his BA from Catholic University and his masters degree from Rowan University.  He's surfed his way from NJ to FL to CA and currently lives in San Diego.  He's an expert marketer, PR-man, and all around communications guru.  He's worked with clients such as the American Red Cross and the US Navy.

Dave also grew up in the Philadelphia area and now resides in our nation's capital. After earning an engineering degree from Vanderbilt University, he spent five years as a Naval officer on active duty, stationed in San Diego and Chicago, making two overseas deployments.  After the Navy, Dave earned an MBA from Kellogg and has worked in commercial real estate for the past nine years in various roles - including project manager, developer, and asset manager.  Once Hey DJ is built the first song Dave plans to request will be something by Toots and the Maytals or maybe some 3rd Bass.

story:
Our campaign has ended, but please visit www.cloudlocker.it for information on how you can own your own cloud. 


“For those for whom Google, Amazon, Microsoft and Dropbox’s server farms are too far away for comfort, CloudLocker gives you your own private cloud.” Forbes.com

 

What is CloudLocker?

CloudLocker is an actual mini server that:

  • Stores all your media
  • Gives you access anytime,anywhere
  • Works on all of your devices - desktop, laptop, iPhone, smartphone, iPad or tablet

Most importantly, it offers a private and secure alternative to public cloud storage. While online cloud storage services have become very popular in recent years, users are growing more concerned about potential security breaches and losing control of their personal data stored in the Cloud.

CloudLocker lets you keep your files in your possession, while also giving you all the convenience of cloud technology coupled with an innovative approach to sharing and control over your digital media. Watch the video here to find out more.

 

What's the Value of a CloudLocker?

It's Private: You own it. No one else can get to it without your permission.

It's Convenient: All your content is available to you on any device anytime, anywhere.

It's Safe: You can backup everything yourself - no worries, no hassles.

It's Easy: Simple setup and user-friendly features

It's Fun: You can enjoy all your movies, pictures and music no matter where you are or what device you use.

It's Economical: You get significant savings over online cloud services for similar capacity.

It's Limitless: Just add more storage through USB - endless capacity to store all of your digital media.

It's Fast: You'll be amazed at the transfer speed on your local network.

It's Unsurpassed: Not just a hard drive or NAS device! It's the future of cloud computing, and the future is now.

 

Which of these are on YOUR wish list?

I wish I could get to all my digital media anytime on any of my devices.

I wish I knew for sure that my files are always safe from prying eyes.

I wish I didn't have to spend the extra money to get more storage on the devices I want.

I wish I could send a hundred pictures all at once to family and friends as easily as sending a single photograph.

I wish I didn't have to use email attachments to share files with people.

I wish I could stream HD movies to my TV, smartphone or iPad without having to download them.

I wish I could let people view my shared files without letting them copy or download them.

Do you want it all? You've got it all with CloudLocker.

 

CloudLocker in the News: 


Worried About Your Data in the Cloud? Stop Whining and Get Your Own Cloud

 

 

IRS to America: Your Emails Are Ours 

 

 BYOD: Bring Your Own Device

 

CloudLocker Provides You With a Cloud Server at Home

 


Editorial: My Cloud

 

 Time For Our Own Personal Cloud Server, Apple

 

StoAmigo CloudLocker Storage with More Security Due  in June

 

 

We’re on a Mission to Provide Peace of Mind in the Cloud…

And we need your help to do it. Cloud storage has become a convenient and accepted way of storing and accessing all of our digital files. But there’s a huge downside to public cloud storage – the loss of privacy and control. Technology changes seemingly overnight, making it difficult for policies and laws to keep up. It seems every day we hear news about the uncertainty of our rights to privacy when we store our data online. Even Apple Co-Founder, Steve Wozniak, has spoken out about his concerns:

I really worry about everything going to the cloud. I think it’s going to be horrendous. I think there are going to be a lot of horrible problems in the next five years.

I want to feel that I own things. A lot of people feel, ‘Oh, everything is really on my computer,’ but I say the more we transfer everything onto the web, onto the cloud, the less we’re going to have control over it. (1)

And he’s not alone. Here is what the experts say about your rights to privacy in the cloud:

The Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Act Amendment Act (FISAAA) allows US authorities to spy on cloud data. This includes services such as Amazon Cloud Drive, Apple iCloud and Google Drive.

— “Experts warn on wire-tapping of the cloud,” BBC News

When we put stuff on someone else’s servers it is unclear who exactly can access our files and which policies will allow that access. What is clear is that in order to truly retain the rights to our own digital files, we need to keep them in our own possession. We all want to take back control of our files, but who wants to give up the anytime, anywhere access that cloud storage provides? We don’t. That’s why we created the CloudLocker project. It combines the best of both worlds – private, centralized storage for all of your files along with instant access from all of your devices, wherever you are.

 

You Have Your Right to Privacy - Now Use It

Our forefathers guaranteed our rights under the Fourth Amendment to privacy of the person and possessions against unreasonable searches. CloudLocker supports those rights by allowing you to keep all of your digital media in your possession, instead of putting it “out there” in a public cloud, without sacrificing the convenience of modern technology. Our CloudLocker project is underway and we need your support to allow everyone to enjoy their right to privacy. This is your chance to show your support for the continued development of new and innovative ideas and technology that provide more private and secure options for storing our growing amounts of data.  

Get one of the first-edition CloudLockers, complete with certificate of authenticity, and start safeguarding your files right away. Or make a donation to help us create and enhance the technology that guarantees you keep your right to privacy. Whatever you choose, we’re happy to have you participate in our campaign.

 

The Hidden Dangers in the Cloud

Our new white paper reveals five hidden facts about cloud computing. Some may surprise you. Some may scare you. You need to know all of them. This informative, easy-to-read white paper, Is Internet Privacy a Cloud Illusion? is available to download here.

 

Designed with Security & Privacy in Mind

Why should the law treat digital data stored in the 'cloud' any differently than papers stored in a file cabinet in our home? It doesn’t make any sense. 

–US Congressman Ted Poe (R-TX), “With cloud, privacy issues loom,” Politico

And we agree. That’s why keeping your files in CloudLocker is like keeping them in that locked file cabinet at home. CloudLocker is truly a mini cloud server that stays securely in your home or office. It allows you to return to keeping your files in your possession in a location you choose, while having all of the convenience of cloud computing technology.

 

CloudLocker Features & Benefits:

  • Small footprint — just 7.5” x 6” x 1”
  • Easy plug and play to home or office network
  • 250GB storage space with unlimited expansion available using USB storage devices
  • Access stored media via web or mobile applications with a subscription plan
  • Stream and enjoy media without downloading — save storage space on all devices
  • Tag files to create playlists, photo albums and multimedia lists to stream or share
  • Share files instantly with anyone — no login or accounts required for recipients
  • Control and protect shared media files with customized permission settings
  • Retract shared media at anytime
  • Receive notifications when shared files have been viewed, new files have been shared with you, and more…

 

Powered by User-Friendly Interface

  • Easy drag-and-drop uploading of all of your digital media files
  • No need to download files to devices – enjoy them straight from the security of your CloudLocker
  • Sync from CloudLocker to all of your devices
  • Multiple ways to easily share files

 

 

Amazing Sharing Controls

Simple permission setting controls let you set and modify permissions with just a click, even after the file’s been shared. Add customized messages, make shares private, enable or disable downloading or retract your share completely.

 

 

 

Say Goodbye to Email Attachments

Sharing our files via email attachments really means giving our files away. We’re all accustomed to attaching files to emails and sending them off to be downloaded onto the recipients’ hard drives or forwarded on to others. If you ever want to take back your file, you’re out of luck. CloudLocker eliminates this issue and puts you back in control of your files.  

When you share a file using CloudLocker, you are simply giving access to the original file stored on your CloudLocker. You can limit download permission, as well as retract the share completely at any time. It’s really a return to sharing in the old-fashioned sense, and you know exactly where your files are at all times.

 

Do You Know Your Social Media Rights?

Have you read the Terms of Service on your favorite social media sites? Policies vary by site, but this is another area of concern when it comes to your rights to privacy. Some of the policies that have come under fire in the recent past seem necessary in order for social media sharing to take place, as Facebook CEO, Mark Zuckerberg explains in a Facebook blog post:

When a person shares information on Facebook, they first need to grant Facebook a license to use that information so that we can show it to the other people they’ve asked us to share it with. Without this license, we couldn’t help people share that information. (2)

However, this still opens the door for uncertainty, because you have given up your rights to your own content.


CloudLocker allows you to retain the rights to your media when you share on social media sites. You post a link to the file that stays securely in your CloudLocker, so others don’t get the rights to your media. If you decide to retract your share, it is gone forever – even if others have shared it.

 

Never Leave Home Without Your CloudLocker

Take a look at some of our great mobile features that work with the files stored in your CloudLocker.

Who We Are:

We are an innovative group of experienced professionals trained in various disciplines – from artificial intelligence, programming and math to marketing and finance – who are dedicated to creating a better cloud. We are headquartered in the U.S. but we also have team members in Europe and Asia, all of whom have devoted themselves tirelessly for more than two years to engineering the software that drives the CloudLocker. Our goal is to take everything great about cloud computing and combine it with the protection, privacy and control that we all deserve. Everyone is excited because the First-Edition CloudLocker is in production and on schedule to be shipped in July. We’re also animal lovers who chose a Saint Bernard as our mascot because he exemplifies the canine traits we admire: loyalty and protectiveness.  

Meet Sto:

 

Why This Campaign?

The issues of Internet privacy and the security of our digital media are not just American problems, European problems, or Asian problems; they are worldwide problems. Privacy is one of the rare issues that unites people all across the globe. While we are pleased that the first phase of our mission is culminating in the introduction of the CloudLocker, we still have a long way to go. Jump-starting distribution of the CloudLocker will raise awareness not only of the privacy issues, but also of the possibility that new technology can offer real solutions.

Our project is a bold undertaking by our visionary founders. Developing software that tackles a basic fundamental right that has been eroded as technology advances is a humongous challenge. It takes an inordinate amount of talent, time and financial resources. Our goal is to speed up the production of our CloudLockers to a large volume to improve economies of scale and thus be able to deliver the CloudLocker affordably to everyone who wishes to own one. We strongly believe that there should be nothing standing in the way of people wanting to exercise their rights to privacy and control by owning a CloudLocker. We want people to know that, no matter where in this world they live, be it socialist, democratic or somewhere in between, they will eventually have a choice if they wish to protect their personal media and files, as the CloudLocker will be coming their way!  

We also envision developing an entire ecosystem on our platform that will allow people to perform what they are used to doing on the internet, but with a focus on security, privacy and control. While the funding we are seeking from this campaign is modest, it will go a long way in letting us get a head start in recruiting additional developers to speed up our next phase of software development while we market our first production of CloudLockers.
  

Share Instantly With CloudLocker's QR Code Dog Tags


For as little as a $5 donation, we'll send you a special dog tag from CloudLocker. You can wear it on a chain, put it on your pet's collar or give it as a gift. But it's not just a fashion statement; the custom QR code actually links to a file or folder that you’ve selected on your CloudLocker or in your online storage. Anyone can scan your code with a free QR code reader and instantly access your stored file(s).

Imagine the possibilities…instantly share photos, contact information, playlists – whatever you like. Take a look at our list of fifty ways to use your CloudLocker dog tag and watch our QR code video:

 

 

If you love animals as much as we do, consider our $10 "Be-A-Pal" perk package. This perk package gives you our QR code dog tag and also supports the efforts of The Animal Foundation with a $5 donation. You’ll also receive exclusive extras and a mention on our Be-A-Pal donors page. For more information on how you can protect your pet with a QR code dog tag, click here.

 

Be the First to Own a Certified First-Edition CloudLocker

 

Perks Packages

 

 *Shipping Information

Delivery of Perks Packages is expected in August 2013. Please use Paypal if you prefer a July delivery. Domestic delivery may take up to 7 days or more from the time of receipt of payment; longer for international deliveries. 

Please include shipping charges listed for your package at the time of purchase:

Pioneer Perk Package: $10 for US shipping, $20 for AK/HI, $45 for international.
Champion Perk Package: $10 for US shipping, $20 for AK/HI, $45 for international.
Ambassador Perk Package: $20 for US shipping, $40 for AK/HI, $90 for international.
President's Club Perk Package: $40 for US shipping, $80 for AK/HI, $180 for international. 

Please note: This is a US campaign, however we would like to accommodate international supporters. If you are located outside of the continental United States, please check with your country's customs department for any import duties or restrictions.

International shipping is by US Postal Service only. Charges are $45.00 per CloudLocker unit.

 

What else can you do to help?

We know it is not always possible to contribute funds, but you can help us spread the message. With the dawn of the internet, proliferation of social media and considerable use of the Internet for communications, people still have a choice if they want privacy and control over their digital media - to CloudLocker.it! Wouldn't it be great if this became possible in the near future, no matter which part of the world you live in? For those of us fortunate to have our forefathers hand us the Bill of Rights, let us help to preserve it for future generations. Please forward this link to your network of family, friends and acquaintances via Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn or any other social media outlet.

We thank you so much for your support.

 

Questions or Comments?

Please feel free to contact us at info@cloudlocker.it for any information on CloudLocker. We're happy to answer any questions you may have.

(1) "Apple co-founder Wozniak sees trouble in the cloud", by Robert MacPherson (AFP), August 5, 2012

(2) "On Facebook, People Own and Control Their Information", by Mark Zuckerberg, February 16, 2009

All CloudLocker functionality is available on our StoAmigo platform so you can easily test drive and see for yourself how convenient, secure and private our platform is.

Our campaign has ended, but please visit www.cloudlocker.it for information on how you can own your own cloud. 



“For those for whom Google, Amazon, Microsoft and Dropbox’s server farms are too far away for comfort, CloudLocker gives you your own private cloud.” Forbes.com

 
What is CloudLocker?
CloudLocker is an actual mini server that:

Stores all your media
Gives you access anytime,anywhere
Works on all of your devices - desktop, laptop, iPhone, smartphone, iPad or tablet

Most importantly, it offers a private and secure alternative to public cloud storage. While online cloud storage services have become very popular in recent years, users are growing more concerned about potential security breaches and losing control of their personal data stored in the Cloud.
CloudLocker lets you keep your files in your possession, while also giving you all the convenience of cloud technology coupled with an innovative approach to sharing and control over your digital media. Watch the video here to find out more.
 
What's the Value of a CloudLocker?
It's Private: You own it. No one else can get to it without your permission.
It's Convenient: All your content is available to you on any device anytime, anywhere.
It's Safe: You can backup everything yourself - no worries, no hassles.
It's Easy: Simple setup and user-friendly features
It's Fun: You can enjoy all your movies, pictures and music no matter where you are or what device you use.
It's Economical: You get significant savings over online cloud services for similar capacity.
It's Limitless: Just add more storage through USB - endless capacity to store all of your digital media.
It's Fast: You'll be amazed at the transfer speed on your local network.
It's Unsurpassed: Not just a hard drive or NAS device! It's the future of cloud computing, and the future is now.
 
Which of these are on YOUR wish list?
I wish I could get to all my digital media anytime on any of my devices.
I wish I knew for sure that my files are always safe from prying eyes.
I wish I didn't have to spend the extra money to get more storage on the devices I want.
I wish I could send a hundred pictures all at once to family and friends as easily as sending a single photograph.
I wish I didn't have to use email attachments to share files with people.
I wish I could stream HD movies to my TV, smartphone or iPad without having to download them.
I wish I could let people view my shared files without letting them copy or download them.
Do you want it all? You've got it all with CloudLocker.
 
CloudLocker in the News: 

Worried About Your Data in the Cloud? Stop Whining and Get Your Own Cloud
 

 
IRS to America: Your Emails Are Ours 

 
 BYOD: Bring Your Own Device
 

CloudLocker Provides You With a Cloud Server at Home 

Editorial: My Cloud
 

 Time For Our Own Personal Cloud Server, Apple
 

StoAmigo CloudLocker Storage with More Security Due  in June
 
 
We’re on a Mission to Provide Peace of Mind in the Cloud…
And we need your help to do it. Cloud storage has become a convenient and accepted way of storing and accessing all of our digital files. But there’s a huge downside to public cloud storage – the loss of privacy and control. Technology changes seemingly overnight, making it difficult for policies and laws to keep up. It seems every day we hear news about the uncertainty of our rights to privacy when we store our data online. Even Apple Co-Founder, Steve Wozniak, has spoken out about his concerns:
I really worry about everything going to the cloud. I think it’s going to be horrendous. I think there are going to be a lot of horrible problems in the next five years.
I want to feel that I own things. A lot of people feel, ‘Oh, everything is really on my computer,’ but I say the more we transfer everything onto the web, onto the cloud, the less we’re going to have control over it. (1)
And he’s not alone. Here is what the experts say about your rights to privacy in the cloud:
The Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Act Amendment Act (FISAAA) allows US authorities to spy on cloud data. This includes services such as Amazon Cloud Drive, Apple iCloud and Google Drive. 
— “Experts warn on wire-tapping of the cloud,” BBC News
When we put stuff on someone else’s servers it is unclear who exactly can access our files and which policies will allow that access. What is clear is that in order to truly retain the rights to our own digital files, we need to keep them in our own possession. We all want to take back control of our files, but who wants to give up the anytime, anywhere access that cloud storage provides? We don’t. That’s why we created the CloudLocker project. It combines the best of both worlds – private, centralized storage for all of your files along with instant access from all of your devices, wherever you are.
 
You Have Your Right to Privacy - Now Use It
Our forefathers guaranteed our rights under the Fourth Amendment to privacy of the person and possessions against unreasonable searches. CloudLocker supports those rights by allowing you to keep all of your digital media in your possession, instead of putting it “out there” in a public cloud, without sacrificing the convenience of modern technology. Our CloudLocker project is underway and we need your support to allow everyone to enjoy their right to privacy. This is your chance to show your support for the continued development of new and innovative ideas and technology that provide more private and secure options for storing our growing amounts of data.  
Get one of the first-edition CloudLockers, complete with certificate of authenticity, and start safeguarding your files right away. Or make a donation to help us create and enhance the technology that guarantees you keep your right to privacy. Whatever you choose, we’re happy to have you participate in our campaign.
 
The Hidden Dangers in the Cloud
Our new white paper reveals five hidden facts about cloud computing. Some may surprise you. Some may scare you. You need to know all of them. This informative, easy-to-read white paper, Is Internet Privacy a Cloud Illusion? is available to download here.
 
Designed with Security & Privacy in Mind
Why should the law treat digital data stored in the 'cloud' any differently than papers stored in a file cabinet in our home? It doesn’t make any sense. 
–US Congressman Ted Poe (R-TX), “With cloud, privacy issues loom,” Politico
And we agree. That’s why keeping your files in CloudLocker is like keeping them in that locked file cabinet at home. CloudLocker is truly a mini cloud server that stays securely in your home or office. It allows you to return to keeping your files in your possession in a location you choose, while having all of the convenience of cloud computing technology.

 
CloudLocker Features & Benefits:



Small footprint — just 7.5” x 6” x 1”
Easy plug and play to home or office network
250GB storage space with unlimited expansion available using USB storage devices
Access stored media via web or mobile applications with a subscription plan
Stream and enjoy media without downloading — save storage space on all devices
Tag files to create playlists, photo albums and multimedia lists to stream or share
Share files instantly with anyone — no login or accounts required for recipients
Control and protect shared media files with customized permission settings
Retract shared media at anytime
Receive notifications when shared files have been viewed, new files have been shared with you, and more…


 
Powered by User-Friendly Interface

Easy drag-and-drop uploading of all of your digital media files

No need to download files to devices – enjoy them straight from the security of your CloudLocker
Sync from CloudLocker to all of your devices
Multiple ways to easily share files

 

 
Amazing Sharing Controls
Simple permission setting controls let you set and modify permissions with just a click, even after the file’s been shared. Add customized messages, make shares private, enable or disable downloading or retract your share completely.
 
 
 
Say Goodbye to Email Attachments
Sharing our files via email attachments really means giving our files away. We’re all accustomed to attaching files to emails and sending them off to be downloaded onto the recipients’ hard drives or forwarded on to others. If you ever want to take back your file, you’re out of luck. CloudLocker eliminates this issue and puts you back in control of your files.

A Special Message From Sto:

story:
More!

You asked, we’ve answered.  You wanted greater integration,  so here you go: we are rolling out an exciting popSLATE roadmap, matching stretch goals and great new perks.  We’ve got 30 days, so let’s make this happen!

 

Press Coverage

WIRED: E Ink Case Turns the Back of Your Phone Into A Second Screen

CNET: PopSlate case adds second screen to iPhone 5

Engadget- Japan: iPhone 5 にE Ink 背面ディスプレイを追加する popSLATE ケース (動画) - Engadget

Daily Mail, UK: Revolutionary new case turns the back of your iPhone into a second screen

GQ: Popslate保护套_GQ男士网

Mashable: popSLATE Case Gives iPhone 5 a Second E-ink Screen

Engadget: popSLATE launches iPhone 5 case with four-inch E Ink screen

GIGAOM: popSLATE case add e-ink screen to the back of your iPhone

Gadgetsteria: Popslate iPhone Case Puts Rear Of Phone To Use With 4-Inch E-Ink Display

Slashgear: popSLATE iPhone 5 case comes with separate e-ink display

Ubergizmo: The popSLATE iPhone case adds a secondary e-ink display at the back

Neuerdings: Schwarz-weiß-Display für das iPhone

Design Envy: The Second Screen: popSLATE

 

  

The Second Screen Experience for your iPhone 5

popSLATE is an E-Ink screen in an iPhone 5 case.  That means it’s low-power, always-on, super-readable in direct sunlight, and totally customizable.  It’s a blank slate you can populate with the images you love. Now you can express yourself to the world, share cool stuff with friends, and always have your favorite app functionality at a glance.

 

Express Yourself

 

 

You can Pop just about anything to the back of your phone.  Snap a picture.  Grab images on the Web. Take iPhone screenshots.  Plug in to your other photo sharing platforms, like Instagram.  Receive pictures from friends.  You can Pop ‘em one by one, or quickly set up a slideshow.

 

Always-On Productivity

 

 

Don’t you hate it when your iPhone screen keeps turning off when you need to view something every few moments?  Or, you’re in a meeting and need something important from your iPhone, but you just can’t get away with looking at it on the sly? 

Since the popSLATE screen is ultra-low-power, it is always on.  This opens up a bunch of possibilities.  Urgent notifications, sports scores, maps, notes, calendar, talking points—you name it—will now be available at a glance. 

Micro E-Reader

Kindle? iPhone?  Who wants to carry both?  Get a popSLATE instead.  The E Ink screen is readable even in the brightest sunlight.  Try doing that with your glossy LCD screen.

Open API

We will be developing an API to let you build always-on applications. With popSLATE you will be able to create entirely new ways for people to interact with the phone.

  

Share With Friends

 

With the Popslate app, you can manage your digital image library, pass along cool things for your friends to Pop, and plug in to your other photo sharing platforms, like Instagram. 

 

How It All Works 

The popSLATE case includes the latest, ruggedized, E-Ink screen, so it protects your iPhone just like any ‘dumb’ case. In fact the screen is nearly indestructible.

The screen only uses power when the image changes so it sips negligible power from the phone. We use the lightning connector for both power and data exchange.  For shortcut navigation, we’re also integrating a tactile interface based upon the phone’s accelerometer. Double tap the back of your phone to cycle through images or accept Pops from your friends.

Then there’s popSLATE app on the iPhone side.  You can take pictures with the camera, browse the image gallery, manage your library, connect with other users, send/receive images and messages, and Pop what you want, when you want it.

 

Specs

Screen:  Ruggedized, 4” diagonal E-Ink screen

Case dimensions:  5.35'' x 2.56'' x 0.54''

Weight:  <75 grams

Case Color:  Black or White

Compatibility:  iPhone 5

 

Who We Are

We have been working for years creating mobile-social solutions that bring people together to accomplish cool things. In a different start-up, we helped pioneer digital medicine, delivering a system packed with smartphone-connected sensors and social tools, to help people manage their own health and wellbeing.  We have recruited a world-class team of hardware engineers, software developers and designers who have developed many connected consumer devices for the iPhone. We have dozens of patents and many years of start-up experience conceiving of and developing innovative products.  

 

How We’ll Use the Funds

We’ve prototyped Pop'ing images from an iPhone to an E-Ink screen. We have strong support from E-Ink and are working closely with them to integrate their newest display technology for our ultra-thin, ruggedized screen.

With your help, we’ll refine our design and transfer it to manufacturing, add new features to the app, and buy materials to start making product.  We’ve built complex mobile systems before and know what it takes to get it done.

Please help launch popSLATE.

 

Launch Journey 

Check out the graphic of the first week of launch. We would like to thank our supporters from all over the world.

FAQs 

How often can I change images on the popSLATE?

You can changes images anytime, anywhere. popSLATE is totally customizable so its up to you.

 

Where do I specify the color I want?

Please leave a comment with your color choice. By default, the case will be white.

 

How will popSLATE affect my battery life?

We are using the latest E-ink display technology and popSLATE only uses power when images change. That means a static image display draws nearly no power and can be displayed for a week. popSLATE will not affect your phone’s battery life.

 

Will the screen break if I drop my phone?

The popSLATE screen is made on a plastic substrate and laminated. It’s nearly indestructible.

 

How do I charge my phone with popSLATE?

There is a micro-USB charging port on your popSLATE that passes charge through to your phone so you don't have to take the cover off.

 

Does the popSLATE app integrate with other picture platforms?

We will initially be integrating with Instagram and over time will integrate with others as well.

 

Can I display color images?

The current version of popSLATE supports black and white images. There are some color technologies in the works and we hope to add color screens in early 2014.

 

Can I still access the headphone jack on the bottom of my phone?

There is a cut-out for the headphone jack so you will have no problems using the port.

 

How can I help make popSLATE even cooler?

Follow us on Facebook and Twitter and tell us all about your great ideas. We are also developing API’s so the community can build always-on applications and make popSLATE even more amazing. 

 

I want to get my hands on the API, how can I do that?

If you are a developer and interested in building apps using our API's, leave us a note in the comment section and we will sign you up in our developer community. We would love to hear how you would use popSLATE so comment/tweet/or email us.

Now you can express yourself to the world, share cool stuff with friends, and always have your favorite app functionality at a glance.
 
Express Yourself
 

 

You can Pop just about anything to the back of your phone.  Snap a picture.  Grab images on the Web. Take iPhone screenshots.  Plug in to your other photo sharing platforms, like Instagram.  Receive pictures from friends.  You can Pop ‘em one by one, or quickly set up a slideshow.
 
Always-On Productivity
 
 
Don’t you hate it when your iPhone screen keeps turning off when you need to view something every few moments?  Or, you’re in a meeting and need something important from your iPhone, but you just can’t get away with looking at it on the sly? 
Since the popSLATE screen is ultra-low-power, it is always on.  This opens up a bunch of possibilities.  Urgent notifications, sports scores, maps, notes, calendar, talking points—you name it—will now be available at a glance. 
Micro E-Reader
Kindle? iPhone?  Who wants to carry both?  Get a popSLATE instead.  The E Ink screen is readable even in the brightest sunlight.  Try doing that with your glossy LCD screen.
Open API
We will be developing an API to let you build always-on applications. With popSLATE you will be able to create entirely new ways for people to interact with the phone.
  
Share With Friends
 

With the Popslate app, you can manage your digital image library, pass along cool things for your friends to Pop, and plug in to your other photo sharing platforms, like Instagram. 
 

How It All Works 
The popSLATE case includes the latest, ruggedized, E-Ink screen, so it protects your iPhone just like any ‘dumb’ case. In fact the screen is nearly indestructible.
The screen only uses power when the image changes so it sips negligible power from the phone. We use the lightning connector for both power and data exchange.  For shortcut navigation, we’re also integrating a tactile interface based upon the phone’s accelerometer. Double tap the back of your phone to cycle through images or accept Pops from your friends.
Then there’s popSLATE app on the iPhone side.  You can take pictures with the camera, browse the image gallery, manage your library, connect with other users, send/receive images and messages, and Pop what you want, when you want it.
 
Specs
Screen:  Ruggedized, 4” diagonal E-Ink screen
Case dimensions:  5.35'' x 2.56'' x 0.54''
Weight:  <75 grams
Case Color:  Black or White
Compatibility:  iPhone 5
 
Who We Are
We have been working for years creating mobile-social solutions that bring people together to accomplish cool things. In a different start-up, we helped pioneer digital medicine, delivering a system packed with smartphone-connected sensors and social tools, to help people manage their own health and wellbeing.  We have recruited a world-class team of hardware engineers, software developers and designers who have developed many connected consumer devices for the iPhone. We have dozens of patents and many years of start-up experience conceiving of and developing innovative products.  
 
How We’ll Use the Funds
We’ve prototyped Pop'ing images from an iPhone to an E-Ink screen. We have strong support from E-Ink and are working closely with them to integrate their newest display technology for our ultra-thin, ruggedized screen.
With your help, we’ll refine our design and transfer it to manufacturing, add new features to the app, and buy materials to start making product.  We’ve built complex mobile systems before and know what it takes to get it done.
Please help launch popSLATE.
 
Launch Journey 
Check out the graphic of the first week of launch. We would like to thank our supporters from all over the world.


FAQs 

How often can I change images on the popSLATE?
You can changes images anytime, anywhere. popSLATE is totally customizable so its up to you.
 
Where do I specify the color I want?
Please leave a comment with your color choice. By default, the case will be white.
 
How will popSLATE affect my battery life?
We are using the latest E-ink display technology and popSLATE only uses power when images change. That means a static image display draws nearly no power and can be displayed for a week. popSLATE will not affect your phone’s battery life.
 
Will the screen break if I drop my phone?
The popSLATE screen is made on a plastic substrate and laminated. It’s nearly indestructible.
 
How do I charge my phone with popSLATE?
There is a micro-USB charging port on your popSLATE that passes charge through to your phone so you don't have to take the cover off.
 
Does the popSLATE app integrate with other picture platforms?
We will initially be integrating with Instagram and over time will integrate with others as well.
 
Can I display color images?
The current version of popSLATE supports black and white images. There are some color technologies in the works and we hope to add color screens in early 2014.
 
Can I still access the headphone jack on the bottom of my phone?
There is a cut-out for the headphone jack so you will have no problems using the port.
 
How can I help make popSLATE even cooler?
Follow us on Facebook and Twitter and tell us all about your great ideas. We are also developing API’s so the community can build always-on applications and make popSLATE even more amazing. 
 
I want to get my hands on the API, how can I do that?
If you are a developer and interested in building apps using our API's, leave us a note in the comment section and we will sign you up in our developer community. We would love to hear how you would use popSLATE so comment/tweet/or email us.

story:
A Beautiful Light

The first RoboSmart Light Bulb is a 40W warm light LED screw in light bulb that you can control directly from your iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch, or Mac computer throughout your home. We designed our bulb so it can be a direct replacement for a standard (US 120V) screw in bulb. Like a traditional incandescent light bulb, the Robo Smart light bulb illuminates radially filling a room full of light or completely illuminating decorative lamps.

 

What We Have Completed

We were motivated to design the hardware from the ground up. We were tired of all the existing LED bulb designs and wanted to create a bulb that was attractive and distinctive compared to the LED bulbs on the market. Then once we watched "How It's Made: Light Bulb", we realized that our design needed to be easy to put together. Our design effectively slides together for assembly and each part is designed to fit snuggly. We used computer aided simulation to run various thermal analysis to validate our design assumptions and then measured on CNC machined mock-ups to confirm our expected results.

  • Custom heat sink design - Complete

  • Unique LED mounting for uniform light distribution - Complete

  • LED selection for the best performance in light quality (3000K) and efficiency - Complete

  • Custom glass - Complete

  • Proto hardware board including LED control and Bluetooth Smart Radio - Complete

  • Antenna design - Complete

  • Complete main assembly of working functional RoboSmart Light Bulb- Embedded bulb software - Complete

  • iPhone App - Complete Submitted for Approval

 

EASY SETUP

No pre-configuration is necessary just screw in your RoboSmart Light Bulbs and start our app to control each RoboSmart Light Bulb. Starting the app commences a scan process allowing the app to find nearby RoboSmart Light Bulbs. The app then automatically connects to your bulbs and thereafter you can control them from the app.

 

ENERGY SAVING TECHNOLOGY

 

 

ROBOSMART CAN DO ALL OF THIS

On|OFF/Dimmer Switch, Auto-Timer, Proximity Sensor, Power Meter and your main light switches continue to work as usual

WIRELESS TECHNOLOGY

All of today's Apple iOS and OS-X products support both WIFI and BT 4.0 wireless technology. WIFI is the high performance, high power data pipe that is used to transfer video and internet traffic around your home. BT 4.0 is the power efficient, long range wireless interface used to directly exchange small amounts of data between devices. BT 4.0 has already become pervasive and our goal is to have a flexible lighting solution.

BT 4.0 technology (Bluetooth Smart) is a simpler protocol than WIFI or Zigbee (802.15.4) it will always be less costly for development and less likely to break since there are fewer parts. Setup is also simplified because it is just the iPhone and the bulb.

One of the benefits of BT 4.0 is that your iPhone directly communicates with each bulb, allowing the app to determine the distance to each light bulb.

MANUFACTURING AND TEST

Our operations team has vetted multiple suppliers during our prototype development. The glass, heat sink, insulator and LED plate will be manufactured by our Asian partners. Our PCB and final assembly will be done by our partners in Silicon Valley giving us total control over the initial production. We have designed and will implement custom test fixtures to be used in manufacturing test to ensure a reliable high quality product. 

 

Team Vision

Smart Home Labs is a tight group of Silicon Valley engineers with big ideas. Everyone deserves a better quality life through technology innovation. Our mission is to bring home automation technology to everyone creatively through the open source community, partners or in house development. Our first collaboration is the RoboSmart Light Bulb, that we believe will enable anyone with a Smart phone the ability to experience and benefit from the home automation revolution. 

 

How you can help

Your contribution helps us get our first production run complete and onto designing our next products to continue our goal to make home automation "JUST LIKE AIR" for everybody. Just like you breath without even thinking about it we want solutions that are secure and extremely easy to use. We believe Bluetooth Smart is the right technology at the right time to make this happen.

 

DEVELOPERS

The power of Bluetooth Smart is the simple programming model required for most Applications. Each bulb is a slave that has services and characteristics that are set by the Smart Phone App.  Smart Home Labs will publish a RoboSmart Programmer's guide with detailed explanations of the services and characteristics available to be programmed. In addition we will provide example source code of working applications for iOS, Android and Linux when the project is complete.

SO, IF YOU ARE GOING TO REPLACE YOUR INCANDESCENT BULBS OVERTIME, WITH LED BULBS, WHY NOT GET THE ADDITIONAL ADVANTAGE OF HAVING THE ROBOSMART LIGHT BULB.

 

WE THANK YOU FOR YOUR TIME      

WE APPRECIATE YOUR SUPPORT

story:
I'm Al Ellis, the inventor of ThriftyGrocer.

I have more than 35 years of product design, manufacturing and software consulting/support experience.   I'm the holder of 2 patents and 1 patent pending.

This idea started more than 18 years ago as a electronic device that people could use to enter and maintain their grocery list, while the cover of the unit would be used to organize and house their coupons. 
 
With the recent explosion of Smartphone and PDA devices, I've revamped the idea and added a few more features (such as meal planner and cost estimator) to now run as a mobile application.   I'm proud to say that ThriftyGrocer is now available on the iPhone/iPad, Android and Blackberry devices.  
 
With the "Application Development" phase completed,  I've now enter into the next phase of "Business Development" and for that, I need your help.   In this industry, Business Development personnel are consultants and experts that work with Retailers and Manufactures to help them with their promotions and redemption process.

In this economy, everyone is trying to save money and live better on budget.  ThriftyGrocer can help.   It save everyone (users, retailers and manufactures) money, time and help everyone lives better.

Your support will help me secure the necessary Business Development experts that I've already begun to engage.   With each retails and Manufacture, I will need APIs to pull in their product and coupon information.   The repository within which this data will reside is supported by programs that will match the products from your grocery list with the coupons lists of the manufactures.  This applies to items/ingredients that were added from the Meal Planner as well.

Please check the offers on this web page to see how you can acquire a lifetime subscription to the ThriftyGrocer for the special rate of $10.  Thank you for considering this special offer.

I realize that in this economy not everyone will be able to participate.  However if you see how ThriftyGrocer could be of benefit to others, please forward on the details for their support.  Please use the Indiegogo share tools to do so.

Thanks you for your time and consideration!

Sincerely,

Al Ellis
