story:
Tegware Bagel 360 

Folder style iPhone 6 case with detachable e-jot board cover. 


Material : PC (Poly Carbonate) 
Dimension :  70.3 x 146 x 13.8 (mm), 2.77 x 5.75 x 0.54 (inch)
Battery : Lithium Coin Battery 16 x 16 (mm)  / 3 V  / 55 mAh  
Built-in Stylus Pen included 
Designed in San Francisco Assembled in Korea
Release date  : Nov. 2014


Tegware Bagel 6

Diary style iPhone 6 case with detachable e-jot board. 

      

Magnetic clasp closure.  Space for carrying a credit card, access card, or other similar sized cards.

Material : PC + Nylon Fabric  
Dimension :  80 x 146 x 17 (mm), 3.15  x 5.75 x 0.67 (inch) 
Battery : Lithium Coin Battery 16 x 16 (mm)  / 3 V  / 55 mAh  
Original Stylus Pen included 
Designed in San Francisco Assembled in Korea
Release date  : Nov. 2014


Fun doodling, anytime 

Jot down anything. Erase it for another go.

You are free to jot down just about anything.

Tegware Bagel 360 and Tegware Bagel 6 will make doodling your favorite pastime. Tegware Bagel is so easy to use.   You can scribble anything and erase instantly with the simple push of a button. 

The compact case adds almost no extra weight or bulk to your phone.  This case packs the convenience of a notepad into a package you already carry with you.

If you're one of those people who can't seem to get by without pen and paper, you'll love the feel of our elegant, ergonomically designed stylus and e-jot board. 

Tegware Bagel provides the world's best natural handwriting experience, nothing like writing on smartphone or e-ink LCD.  Screens on smartphones have latency when you write, making the experience feel unnatural.  Tegware Bagel provides an experience closely resembling pen and paper.

Then again, if you're the type of person who prefers to go paperless and get by with just the phone, you know the pain of wanting a quick way to take notes.  With Tegware Bagel, there is no more waiting for your phone to power on just to jot down a quick note; no more putting someone on speaker phone just so you can use your phone to enter a phone number into your address book.

Those last little inconveniences are gone: now you go paperless but still enjoy the convenience that paper provides.  The e-jot board is always on, always waiting to help you when you just want to use a pen to do something quick.

And don't worry about the battery.  A single, non-replaceable battery lasts for an incredible 50,000 erases.  Use it 20 times a day, and it'll last for more than six years!

Tegware Bagel: It's easy, stylish, convenient, and fun. 

There is little to learn about this premium case before enjoying a wide spectrum of personalized experiences.  Just jot, draw or write.  Then push the button to erase.  Young and old and everyone in between will find it intuitive and super easy to use.

Extensive R&D led us to design a case that provides you with both style and comfort in a compact package.  

The materials were chosen with care to create a tactile experience you will love. 

Meanwhile, we pack so much more functionality into the size of regular diary style case while still providing you a comfortable experience using both the e-jot board and your phone.

Forget video games!  Now you can doodle or draw when you have a spare moment.  Play a game of hangman with a friend, or make a sketch of your surroundings.  Once you start using your Tegware Bagel, you'll find so many more ways to enjoy it.  Not everything needs an app - unleash your inner creativity instead, with the power of the blank page (or, rather, blank screen).

Just flip it open, it is ready to go.

All you need to do is slide out the stylus and start writing.  There is nothing to turn on, no manual to read.  It is always ready to go just like pen and paper.  Enjoy the ultimate natural handwriting experience that could not be matched in other devices.  Write down a phone number, a cool idea while on the street, or important appointments not to miss.  It is simply ready at all times.

Can you find anything simpler than this?  Compare it with your smart device:

World Class

Protection & Robustness like nothing else. 

Tegware Bagel 360 and Tegware Bagel 6 have both gone through the toughest set of tests to ensure their reliability and robustness.  The screen proved to be erasable over 50,000 times under extreme conditions.

We picked the most durable materials to withstand physical shocks and tough elements without compromising elegant style. Using our finest craftsmanship, we paid utmost attention to complete phone protection and access to all controls without hindrance.

Tegware Bagel 360 and Tegware Bagel 6 protect whether your phone is placed in a bag or your pocket.

Furthermore, Tegware Bagel 360 and Tegware Bagel 6 are ROHS certified for using non-toxic, environmentally friendly materials along with CE, FCC, VCCI, KC certificates that show world class features and quality.


Product Features 

Tegware Bagel 360 Kick Standing   

Tegware Bagel 360 rotational e-jot board 

 


How to detach and attach e-Jot board 

Tegware Bagel 360    

Dedicated stylus for Tegware Bagel 

               

 

Timeline 

October 2014  

  • Indiegogo campaign launch.  
  • Development finalized and components purchased.
  • Tooling and certification approval. 

November 2014  

  • Mass production.
  • Packaging & Shipping (By the end of November)

Perks 

Detailed color and material finishing are subject to change during mass production.


FAQ 

1.  Who are we?

Wire Factory, Inc., a San Francisco based startup with co-founders from companies like Frog Design, Microsoft, Nokia, Blackberry, and others.  Tegware Bagel is only the first of many products that may come from Wire Factory as we focus on enabling the smarter lifestyle - accessories that make life easier.  

2. What is Tegware?

Tegware is our brand.  Tegware distills Wire Factory's vision to make people's lifestyle smarter by integrating related technologies.  Just like we carefully extract the essence of existing technologies to create building blocks for a new category of products, we extracted "TEG" from the word "inTEGration".   "WARE" is our ingredient as well as creation. 

3. How does the e-jot board work? 

Tegware Bagel uses a pressure sensitive LCD featuring the BoogieBoard™ LCD eWriter Technology. You can control the thickness of the line as your write and it feels just like pen and paper. You can find more information about BoogieBoard™ LCD eWriter Technology through the link below. 

   http://www.myboogieboard.com/as/reflex-lcd-technology.html

4. Do I need a stylus to write on the board? 

You can basically use anything to jot on the e-jot board, including your finger unless it's too sharp. Tegware Bagel's ergonomically designed stylus will help you to write or draw with the utmost comfort. 

5. How do I erase e-jot board? 

Simply push the erase button, the e-jot board screen will be refreshed to a blank screen, ready to use again. 

6. What are my color options and how can I select my favorite? 

Tegware Bagel 360 has three colors: 

  • Gold 
  • Silver 
  • Space Gray

 Tegware Bagel 6 has three colors: 

  • Black
  • Blue 
  • Pink

We will send you a survey regarding your color choice after you support the project.  If you select a level of support that includes multiple cases, you will be able to select a different color option for each case, if you desire.

7. What's the shipping cost?

If you choose a level of support that features a single Tegware Bagel support (including Early Bird), shipping cost is fixed as $10 regardless of your region.   For support options that come with two or more Tegware Bagel cases, the shipping cost is free. Please refer to the perk table.  

8.  If I place an order, when can I expect to receive it?

Our plan is to have everything manufactured, packaged, and shipped by the end of November.  The products will be shipping from Korea, and we believe that shipping should take about one to two weeks to most locations.  Of course, depending on your location, your order may arrive faster or slower, so this is just our best estimate.

9. What's the difference between the Tegware Bagel 360 and Tegware Bagel 6?

Tegware Bagel 360 is a sleek and stylish iPhone 6 folder style case with a detachable hinge. The Patent-pending detachable hinge feature allows you to easily detach and attach the e-jot board.

Tegware Bagel 6 is diary style iPhone 6 case with a removable e-jot board.   Tegware Bagel 6 also provides a card slot for carrying card (ex, id card, credit card etc.) 

Both Tegware Bagel 360 and Tegware Bagel 6 use the same e-jot circuit components and same size battery. 

10. How long does the battery last and how do I charge it? 

You don't need to charge Tegware Bagel. Tegware Bagel does not consume power during writing. It only uses an extremely small amount of battery while erasing the screen. We adopted a Panasonic-made built-in coin battery (CR1616) for reliability. The battery lasts over 50,000 erases and is non-replaceable.  

11. How can I save my picture? 

Saving or connecting with iPhone is not available. You can take a picture with your phone's camera to save a drawing on the screen of the e-jot board.

12. Do you have any other Tegware Bagel models other than iPhone 6? 

We have considered creating an iPhone 6 plus model once we successfully launch Tegware Bagel 360 and Tegware Bagel 6. 

13. Why's the name Bagel?

Cause we love coffee and bagels in the morning : )  

Enjoy Tegware Bagel with your iPhone 6 !

The materials were chosen with care to create a tactile experience you will love. 




Meanwhile, we pack so much more functionality into the size of regular diary style case while still providing you a comfortable experience using both the e-jot board and your phone.

Forget video games!  Now you can doodle or draw when you have a spare moment.  Play a game of hangman with a friend, or make a sketch of your surroundings.  Once you start using your Tegware Bagel, you'll find so many more ways to enjoy it.  Not everything needs an app - unleash your inner creativity instead, with the power of the blank page (or, rather, blank screen).



Just flip it
open, it is ready to go.
All you need to do is slide out the stylus and start
writing.  There is nothing to turn on, no manual to read.  It is always ready to
go just like pen and paper.  Enjoy the ultimate natural handwriting experience
that could not be matched in other devices.  Write down a phone number, a cool
idea while on the street, or important appointments not to miss.  It is simply
ready at all times.


Can you find anything simpler than this?  Compare it with your smart device:






World Class

Protection
& Robustness like nothing else. 



Tegware Bagel 360 and Tegware Bagel 6 have both gone through the toughest set of tests to ensure their reliability and robustness.  The screen proved to be erasable over 50,000 times under extreme conditions.

We picked the most durable materials to
withstand physical shocks and tough elements without compromising elegant
style. Using our finest craftsmanship, we paid utmost attention to complete
phone protection and access to all controls without hindrance.




Tegware Bagel 360 and Tegware Bagel 6
protect whether your phone is placed in a bag or your pocket.



Furthermore, Tegware Bagel 360 and Tegware Bagel 6 are ROHS certified for using non-toxic, environmentally friendly materials along with CE, FCC, VCCI, KC certificates that show world class features and quality.





Product Features 

Tegware Bagel 360 Kick Standing   



Tegware Bagel 360 rotational e-jot board 


 



How to detach and attach e-Jot board 
Tegware Bagel 360    



Dedicated stylus for Tegware Bagel 




               

 

Timeline 

October 2014  


Indiegogo campaign launch.  
Development finalized and components purchased.
Tooling and certification approval. 


November 2014  


Mass production.
Packaging & Shipping (By the end of November)


Perks 





Detailed color and material finishing are subject to change during mass production.

FAQ 
1.  Who are we?
Wire Factory, Inc., a San Francisco based startup with co-founders from companies like Frog Design, Microsoft, Nokia, Blackberry, and others.  Tegware Bagel is only the first of many products that may come from Wire Factory as we focus on enabling the smarter lifestyle - accessories that make life easier.  
2. What is Tegware?
Tegware is our brand.  Tegware distills Wire Factory's vision to make people's lifestyle smarter by integrating related technologies.  Just like we carefully extract the essence of existing technologies to create building blocks for a new category of products, we extracted "TEG" from the word "inTEGration".   "WARE" is our ingredient as well as creation. 
3. How does the e-jot board work? 

Tegware Bagel uses a pressure sensitive
LCD featuring the BoogieBoard™ LCD eWriter Technology. You can
control the thickness of the line as your write and it feels just like pen and
paper. You can find more information about BoogieBoard™ LCD eWriter
Technology through the link below. 

   http://www.myboogieboard.com/as/reflex-lcd-technology.html
4. Do I need a stylus to write on the board? 

You can basically use anything to jot on
the e-jot board, including your finger unless it's too sharp. Tegware
Bagel's ergonomically designed stylus will help you to write or draw with the
utmost comfort. 


5. How do I erase e-jot board? 
Simply push the erase button, the e-jot
board screen will be refreshed to a blank screen, ready to use
again. 
6. What are my color options and how can
I select my favorite? 
Tegware Bagel 360 has three colors: 

Gold 
Silver 
Space Gray
 Tegware Bagel 6 has three
colors: 

Black
Blue 
Pink
We will send you a survey regarding your
color choice after you support the project.  If you select a level
of support that includes multiple cases, you will be able to select a
different color option for each case, if you desire.

7. What's the shipping cost?
If you choose a level of support that
features a single Tegware Bagel support (including Early Bird), shipping cost is
fixed as $10 regardless of your region.   For support options
that come with two or more Tegware Bagel cases, the shipping cost is
free. Please refer to the perk table.  
8.  If I place an order, when can I
expect to receive it?
Our plan is to have everything
manufactured, packaged, and shipped by the end of November.  The products
will be shipping from Korea, and we believe that shipping should take about one
to two weeks to most locations.  Of course, depending on your location,
your order may arrive faster or slower, so this is just our best estimate.
9. What's the difference between the
Tegware Bagel 360 and Tegware Bagel 6?
Tegware Bagel 360 is a sleek and stylish
iPhone 6 folder style case with a detachable hinge. The Patent-pending
detachable hinge feature allows you to easily detach and attach the e-jot
board.
Tegware Bagel 6 is diary style iPhone 6
case with a removable e-jot board.   Tegware Bagel 6 also provides a card
slot for carrying card (ex, id card, credit card etc.) 
Both Tegware Bagel 360 and Tegware Bagel
6 use the same e-jot circuit components and same size battery. 
10. How long does the battery last and
how do I charge it? 
You don't need to charge Tegware Bagel.
Tegware Bagel does not consume power during writing. It only uses an extremely
small amount of battery while erasing the screen. We adopted a
Panasonic-made built-in coin battery (CR1616) for reliability. The battery
lasts over 50,000 erases and is non-replaceable.  
11. How can I save my picture? 
Saving or connecting with iPhone is not
available. You can take a picture with your phone's camera to save a
drawing on the screen of the e-jot board.
12. Do you have any other Tegware Bagel
models other than iPhone 6? 
We have considered creating an iPhone 6
plus model once we successfully launch Tegware Bagel 360 and Tegware Bagel
6. 
13. Why's the name Bagel?
Cause we love coffee and bagels in the
morning : )  
Enjoy Tegware Bagel with your iPhone 6
!

story:
Virtual Reality 3D Headset for Smartphones.

The best Virtual Reality headset for consumers - for less than the cost of 2 movie tickets. 

Who Are We?

Smart Qi Power was started by mobile device fanatics to design and make products that are affordable.  We have already run several Indiegogo campaigns.  The just-ended ONE CARD Thin Chargers campaign was successfully funded at nearly $34,000.  
Our manufacturing partner will be building the headsets with our choice of top quality components.

story:
The future is upon us! Thanks to affordable quality electronics, we can have previously single-function objects become multifunction! We are here to take our completed, manufactured prototype through its final design phase. We need your help!

 

 

What is it?

The once mundane 'water bottle' has been transformed to be so much more!

When you're on the go, lugging around all your favorite gear can be restricting. Being light and agile means leaving good stuff behind. But not anymore! Introducing a brand new category - the SmartBottle!

Features:

Safety

The HYDRA is looking out for YOU:

1. The translucent, frosted fluid chamber refracts The HYDRA's BRIGHT, FLASHING RED light ensuring you'll be seen by approaching vehicles when biking or walking.

2. Wearing headphones isolates you from your environment - very dangerous when cycling! The HYDRA’s powerful built-in Bluetooth speaker pumps music into your vicinity, letting you retain an aural connection to the world (and any potential hazards) around you!

 

Detachable, Water-Resistant Bluetooth Enabled Speaker:

Connect wirelessly to any Bluetooth enabled audio device and enjoy your favorite music, podcast or audiobook through The HYDRA's compact-yet-powerful 3W speaker. Flip it, extend the rubber legs, and set it on a surface for even better audio quality!

No Bluetooth device? No problem! Connect via a standard headphone jack (cable provided) or tune in to local FM radio without the need for an accompanying audio player. No need to replace batteries, this speaker is rechargeable.

 

MICROPHONE!

The addition of a microphone has turned the bottle into a speakerphone! If your music is interrupted by a phone call, you can take the call, hands-free, and then get back to your tunes.

 

POWER BANK!!

Charge Up Your Phone or other Electronic Devices: The HYDRA ensures you’ll never get caught with a dead smartphone battery again! The dedicated 4000 mAh power bank (with 2.1a USB output) ensures you’ll always have power whenever and wherever you need it.

 

 

 

LIGHTING!!!

Light your Way: For safety and convenience The HYDRA features THREE powerful light choices: standard WHITE for illuminating the dark...

 

 ... or FLASHING RED to alert others to your presence... 

 

 

... or RAINBOW, color cycling to set the mood for your party.

 

Lightweight Design: The Hydra weighs just over one pound and is easily transportable.

 

 

Secret Storage: 

Use the Hydra’s hidden chamber to stash small loose valuables. The sealed, false rubber bottom will ensure that your keys and cash don’t take a walk without you.
 

Fluid Storage: 

Stay hydrated with 12 fluid ounces of your favorite beverage in the BPA-Free FDA approved bottle.

BIG BOTTLE!

 

The stock HYDRA bottle is 20oz - holds enough fluid for long trips! 

 

 

ADDED BONUS!

Regardless of how 'outdoorsy' you are, you likely spend much more time at home. So we thought, what might make this device useful around the house? 

Our answer? 

THE BEDSIDE COMPANION

When your device is not on a road trip, why not keep it on your bedside table, plugged-in so that it will be fully charged and ready for outdoor adventure at a moments notice.

The HYDRA has a beautiful lamp that will cycle through the colors of the rainbow. Add to that, The HYDRA SmartBottle: Nighttime Sleeper App and you've got sounds of the ocean surf, or summer rain, camping crickets, even light street noise to lull you to sleep. 

If you wake up in the middle of the night with dry mouth, The HYDRA is there to refresh you. The water is FREE. So is the App. Available for SOON on iOS and Android.

 

 

Colors!

We are currently going to make The HYDRA in FOUR different colors. 

You'll be able to pick your favorites, and mix-n-match with multiple bottles!

 

 

 

 

We need your help to take our fully-functioning prototype, that has all the internal components already in manufacturing, through a design update. The images above show the look of the update and the videos below show the physical device as it is currently. We are in the mold making phase now due to the fact that every feature has been improved from the state of the prototype - ALL new molds need to be made. It is very costly.

You can take The HYDRA wherever you go, keeping both electronic and creature comforts close at hand!

 

 

Take advantage of the SUPER EARLY BIRD SPECIAL and get yours for just $30.00

Risks & Challenges

 

All the electronic components, the circuit boards, the battery elements and lighting systems are fully tested, working and being produced for our prototype. We are here on Indiegogo to facilitate a final marketable design, and to carry us through the costly functionality improvements. We are working with a reputable manufacturing team and need your support to pay for the molds for the new design.

We know our backers will be getting a great product, at a great price, in record time (this campaign will ship within three months of closing. We mean it).

We don't need much, just some relief from the escalating costs in going from industrial design to ready-to-inject moldings. Please let us know you'd like this product and we'll ensure it's in your hands fast!

We are here on Indiegogo to facilitate a final marketable design, and to carry us through the costly functionality improvements. We are working with a reputable manufacturing team and need your support to pay for the molds for the new design.
We know our backers will be getting a great product, at a great price, in record time (this campaign will ship within three months of closing. We mean it).
We don't need much, just some relief from the escalating costs in going from industrial design to ready-to-inject moldings. Please let us know you'd like this product and we'll ensure it's in your hands fast!

story:
We are Beaucoupdeforce Solutions, LLC. We're a company passionate about people and solving their problems, 

We have developed an innovative product which provides a truly safe and sanitary solution for using public restrooms and porta potties... More than 400,000 people use public restrooms every day at roadside stops alone. Beaucoupdeforce has created a Flushable PLASTIC,biodegradable, toilet seat cover which can provide a complete barrier against all germs, liquids, and debris a person could encounter when sitting on a toilet seat. Paper covers have never protected anyone from anything... the Revolution is here... TIDY POTTY is here...

                     

       

  


          


WHEN DO YOU NEED A TIDY POTTY?

  • WORK (at the office, on the site, the employee restrooms)
  • SCHOOL (do you trust sending your child to school without one? college dorms)
  • AMUSEMENT PARKS (the carnival, or the all day parks
  • MALLS (now you don't have to stop if you're not finished)
  • CONCERTS, (need we say more?)
  • FESTIVALS ([2] words "Porta Potty")
  • TRAVELING (rest stops/truck stops, bus/train stations, the bus/train itself, airports, airplanes, other countries,other peoples homes)
  • SPORTING EVENTS (whether your playing or watching) ..

      No matter the situation or the occasion ... Always be prepared!

                     


WHY A TIDY POTTY & NOT A PAPER COVER?

   

BOTH THE TIDY POTTY AND PAPER COVERS, ARE THIN AND LIGHT, BOTH ARE FLUSHABLE AND BIODEGRADABLE,  AND ARE SAFE FOR REGULAR AND SEPTIC SYSTEMS ALIKE...THE SIMILARITIES END THERE.... 

THE TIDY POTTY IS DURABLE ,STABLE , HAS MORE COVERAGE AND PROTECTION INSIDE AND OUT OF THE TOILET SEAT, ITS ALSO A NON-POROUS (100% BARRIER) AGAINST EVERYTHING YOU SEE AND DON'T SEE ON THAT SEAT... DESIGNED TO BE CARRIED WITH YOU WHEREVER YOU GO , PACKAGED WITH ITS OWN TIDY WIPES, AND LAST BUT NOT LEAST , COMES IN VERY COOL, EXCITING COLORS, AND DESIGNS (SO YOU LOOK GOOD BOTH CARRYING, AND USING IT ) MOST IMPORTANTLY, IT WORKS !!!...

 PAPER IS FLIMSY, FRAGILE, POROUS(EVERYTHING SOAKS THRU) , BORING, AND JUST  PLAIN OLE DOESN'T WORK!!

                             


              

Our 1st REVOLUTIONARY product is the TIDY POTTY, a innovative, patented portable toilet seat cover, made of a unique water soluble, biodegradable, PLASTIC (not paper) material.

The TIDY POTTY was created to deliver a secure piece of mind that you and your family will be safe and protected from whatever you may encounter along the way.

                   


What truly adds to the awesomeness of this product, is the very unique patented ULTRA portable and fashionably discreet refillable dispensing device we call a TPD (Tidy Potty Dispenser). The cartridge consists of (3)Tidy Potty's, and is specifically  designed to be carried on your key-chain, lanyard, purse, you or your child's backpack, or a  tool belt.

As if that isn't enough, we have also designed this nifty dual duty dispenser to include a roll of (15) sanitary towelettes we call "Tidy Wipes". Now, you are fully armed!!  Allowing you and your loved ones the freedom, and peace of mind to go wherever, and whenever "nature calls".


Beautiful, but still Flushable!




If that still isn't enough?

What We Need: 

At this point We have completed the prototyping of this product and are preparing for our initial production run. We need to raise a minimum of $50,000 to get the ball rolling at the mass production level, so that we may bring this wonderful new REVOLUTIONARY product, not only to you,  We want to bring The Tidy Potty to the World and you can be a key part of that goal...


What You Get:

For helping us achieve our goal and for being an Early Backer, We are offering You over 50%-60% off of the retail price of this product, and some very Cool Limited Edition Perks,Not to mention being the first to have the piece of mind and security that comes with having a Tidy Potty in your pocket, purse, key-chain or backpack!!(at least 2 months before anyone else) We know We wont be successful without you, your support and shared excitement for this great new product... So we want you to reward and thank you for supporting us at this stage of our existence and


The Impact:

By pre-purchasing our product, you are not only going to be the 1st to own (about 2 months before anyone else) and benefit from the safety and security of the only flushable 100% barrier protection available, and receiving great perks and even more awesome (1) time only discounts... You are helping to bring this product to the World , by proving the need, value, and popularity of this one of a kind soon to be commodity item... You and only a few others will be able to say they played a key role in its existence in the marketplace...


You are witnessing, and participating in the emergence of a product rarely seen in its introduction into the market place, how many of us can say we remember when Kleenex, tampons, and condoms,even toilet paper (on or off the corrugated roll) came into existence? We tend to to take them for granted as if they have always been...NOW comes the long awaited next obvious evolution of a very ineffective and substandard product, The TIDY POTTY ...The 1st Flushable PLASTIC Toilet Seat Cover,designed to be carried with you wherever you go!

This is one of very few products that has the strong  potential to CHANGE the way we view and use public restrooms,(any restroom) even our own home bathrooms... You are witnessing and even have the opportunity to participate in this REVOLUTION ...


OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP:

We understand that everyone can't contribute by buying a Tidy Potty, contributions of  $1 are also accepted and greatly appreciated... But if you aren't in the position to give monetarily, that's OK, We definitely understand ....


But, if you love what We are doing, and want to see the Tidy Potty at every grocery store, pharmacy, Wal-Mart, Target and any other major retailer  so that it will be available when you are ready to buy and most importantly , when you NEED it...We need you to spread the word, to your friends family, and associates, even the share this link, like us on Facebook andTweet about us @tidypotty, (#tidypotty, #tidypottyrevolution) SHOUT IT OUT TO THE WORLD!!!!!  We would be eternally grateful and speak highly of you too!

 

Early drawings & concepts:


Q&A:


Q: Will the Tidy Potty be available free in public restrooms?

A: No, but it may be available in vending machines in the next few years.


Q: What is the fear of using public restrooms called?

A: "Sanity"... Just kidding, actually it's call Lutropublicaphobia.


Q: Do I have to keep buying dispensers?

A: Only if you want different colors and designs to go with your different outfits, because its refillable.


Q: Is the dispenser flushable?

A: No, but it is biodegradable, and if damaged or broken can be discarded safely, without causing harm to the environment.


Q: How many Tidy Potty's and Tidy Wipes come in a dispenser?

A: (3) Tidy Pottys and (15) Tidy Wipes comes in each pre-filled dispenser.


Q:How many Tidy Pottys and Tidy Wipes come in a refill pack?

A: (3) refill cartridges of Tidy Potty's totaling (9) Tidy Potty's + (3) refill cartridges of Tidy Wipes totaling (45) wipes . 


Any additional questions please ask in our comment forum, and if popular, we will add it to this Q&A...

You and only a few others will be able to say they played a key role in its existence in the marketplace...

You are witnessing, and participating in the emergence of a product rarely seen in its introduction into the market place, how many of us can say we remember when Kleenex, tampons, and condoms,even toilet paper (on or off the corrugated roll) came into existence? We tend to to take them for granted as if they have always been...NOW comes the long awaited next obvious evolution of a very ineffective and substandard product, The TIDY POTTY ...The 1st Flushable PLASTIC Toilet Seat Cover,designed to be carried with you wherever you go!
This is one of very few products that has the strong  potential to CHANGE the way we view and use public restrooms,(any restroom) even our own home bathrooms... You are witnessing and even have the opportunity to participate in this REVOLUTION ...OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP:
We understand that everyone can't contribute by buying a Tidy Potty, contributions of  $1 are also accepted and greatly appreciated... But if you aren't in the position to give monetarily, that's OK, We definitely understand ....
But, if you love what We are doing, and want to see the Tidy Potty at every grocery store, pharmacy, Wal-Mart, Target and any other major retailer  so that it will be available when you are ready to buy and most importantly , when you NEED it...We need you to spread the word, to your friends family, and associates, even the share this link, like us on Facebook andTweet about us @tidypotty, (#tidypotty, #tidypottyrevolution) SHOUT IT OUT TO THE WORLD!!!!!  We would be eternally grateful and speak highly of you too! Early drawings & concepts:Q&A:Q: Will the Tidy Potty be available free in public restrooms?A: No, but it may be available in vending machines in the next few years.Q: What is the fear of using public restrooms called?A: "Sanity"... Just kidding, actually it's call Lutropublicaphobia.Q: Do I have to keep buying dispensers?A: Only if you want different colors and designs to go with your different outfits, because its refillable.Q: Is the dispenser flushable?A: No, but it is biodegradable, and if damaged or broken can be discarded safely, without causing harm to the environment.Q: How many Tidy Potty's and Tidy Wipes come in a dispenser?A: (3) Tidy Pottys and (15) Tidy Wipes comes in each pre-filled dispenser.Q:How many Tidy Pottys and Tidy Wipes come in a refill pack?A: (3) refill cartridges of Tidy Potty's totaling (9) Tidy Potty's + (3) refill cartridges of Tidy Wipes totaling (45) wipes . 
Any additional questions please ask in our comment forum, and if popular, we will add it to this Q&A...

story:
True FullHD virtual reality has finally arrived.

We are the resolution freaks - our RiftUP! upgrade kit employs a 1920x1080 RGB LCD display. It offers comfort, clearness and a new life for your DK1 device. 

RiftUP! is all about immersive VR experience. Prototyping is done and we are ready for production. With your help, we can make this happen.

More info and post Indiegogo sales at http://riftup.rozsnyo.com RiftUP! homepage.

MTBS3D.com origin thread.

Level of detail comparison

Distinctive DK1 grid disrupts your smooth VR experince, whereas a much finer display lets you enjoy it on a completely different level. 

LCD vs OLED

OLED PenTile displays of today offer full resolution only in terms of green sub pixels. Reds and blues are there only in every other pixel. That is fine for compressed content (JPEG, videos) which is already color subsampled, but not so much for rendered content which bears much more information and detail.


RiftUP! uses LCD technology, which has a separate red green and blue subpixel in each pixel to deliver the best possible picture quality.

VR content moves a lot. In terms of motion blur we experience an improvement over DK1. Smaller pixels seem to transition faster.

Simple drop-in installation

  • Easy and reversible at any time
  • No additional cables, drilling or damage to your device
  • Will come with straightforward instructional video

RiftUP! kit contents

  • 5.9" display with protective foil
  • display interface board (goes into headset)
  • breakout board (goes into breakout box)
  • positioning frame (mechanical support of display)
  • conductive shielding tape

Our kit takes advantage of existing DK1 cable.

100% software compatibility

A lot of time has been invested to make sure, RiftUP! will be recognized as a VR display and handle content  accordingly.

  • All the VR software runs on RiftUP!
  • Custom SDK profile for optimal distortion and lens correction

Actuall VR mode comparison 

SightLine game startup screen, native resolution:

Are you a developer?

You can use RiftUP! in your own project! We made it simple by adding HDMI connector directly onto display board, bypassing the need of DK1 cable. We also provide a simple breakout board (in Standalone display kit) which combines HDMI+USB+Power into a single cable. 

  • 3D print or build your own compatible HMDs
  • Connect RaspberryPi or another computer
  • Add a touch layer and build your own mobile device

Who are we?

Core RiftUP! team members:

  • Ing. Daniel Rozsnyó, lead technician and CEO of ROZSNYō
  • Karel Hulec, virtual reality enthusiast, PR at ROZSNYō and founder of VR Union

story:
Twinkle Nail - Nail Art Wears IT Technology

Twinkle Nail : Self illuminated Nail Sticker via NFC of your smartphone or any NFC reader. 

Usually a Normal Nail. 

Twinkling when you get the phone call or passing by ID reader or NFC payment. 

* Thin and flexible material

* Doesn’t affect the shape and thickness of your nail.

* Stylish nail art can be complete.

* Waterproof 

* without inconvenience, you can enjoy your life

 

Technology 

* Can be attached to nails using Illumination Technology induced by NFC radio(13.56MHZ).

* ECO-item, does not require a separate power supply or battery received radio waves from RFID IC reader for light emitting. 

* Can make natural shimmer effect with thin and small design.

* Can express personality without regarding color and design of your nails


Package ( 1 Twinkle Nail package includes 2 x Twinkle Nail) 


How to apply on your Nail 

* Iphone is not supported 
* Android Smartphone supports NFC 
(Most of current Android phones are support NFC) 

Twinkle Nail Team 

lt's been more than a year to come up with final product. Now, we prepare the production and due to the minimum quantity of production, we decide to promote Twinkle Nail on indiegogo. Based on this start-up fund, our team will manage production and support more than 1 million Twinkle Nail monthly. ( There are discussion about few Million Twinkle Nail already.)  Starting from Twinkle Nail success, we will keep developing new products based on cosmetics + IT.  Your support will be the milestone for such convergence projects. 

/Twinkle Nail Team

story:
The following 2 models will ship 2 to 4 weeks after your contribution: 

  1. 8U for iPhone 5 to 6 (Lightning + USB 2.0)
  2. 308M for iPhone 4 to 6 (30 pin + Lightning) 

    UNiFLASH 8U - Lightning + USB 2.0


      The 8U easily adds up to 128 GB storage to any iPhone 5 to 6 Plus, iPad, iPod with the built-in Lightning connector.

      The 8U has unlimited storage because the built-in micro SD memory card slots works with quick swap 8 GB to 128 GB micro SD memory cards.

      It also has a USB 2.0 connector for fast transfer speed to / from Mac or PC.  A cable for USB to micro USB connector for use with Android phones or tablets is included at N/C.

      It is also compatible with the free i-Flash Drive HD apps and encrypts pictures and videos which can play straight from the 8U.

      Technical Specifications

      • Lightning  Connector
      • USB 2.0 Connector
      • Micro SD memory card slot (8 to 128 GB compatible)
      • Size: 62 x 28 x 10 mm
      • Weight: 15 grams 

    iFlash 308M - 30 Pin + Lightning 

    The 308M easily adds up to 64 GB storage to any iPhone 4S to 6 Plus, iPad, iPod with the built-in Lightning and 30 pin connectors.

    The 308M has unlimited storage because the 2 built-in micro SD and SD memory card slots work with quick swap 8 GB to 64 GB micro SD and SD memory cards.

    It also has a micro USB port for fast transfer speed to / from Mac or PC.  A cable for USB to the micro USB port is included at N/C.

It is also compatible with the free i-Flash Drive HD app and encrypts pictures and videos which can play straight from the 308M.   Our version can use up to 64 GB memory at once, while other cheaper versions can use only up to 32 GB.

Technical Specifications

  • Lightning and 30 pin Connectors
  • Micro USB Port
  • Micro SD and SD memory card slots (8 to 64 GB compatible)
  • Size: 60x 35 x 18 mm
  • Weight: 15 grams 


Both models $35* with FREE Shipping to anywhere in the world in 2 to 4 weeks after your contrihbution.

* Why are our versions not the cheapest online?
The circuit boards above show 100% new components and soldering done by robots.  The cheaper versions sold online are mostly soldered by hand and use recycled components which can break down faster.  Our manufacturing partner is 1 of the 2 largest factories of the i-Flash compatible drives in the world.

UNiFLASH in the news


**** UNiFLASH USB 3.0 shipping July 2015 ****


UNiFLASH USB 3.0 is the world's 1st and only external drive to offer unlimited memory for iPhone, iPad, iPod, and Android phone / tablet. 


No other drive has all 3 connectors built-in: 

  • Lightning (iOS)
  • micro USB (Android)
  • USB 3.0 (Mac/PC)

There's more:

  • File encryption security
  • Compatible with the free i-Flash Drive HD apps for IOS and Android
  • Link to Dropbox
  • Plug & Play Compatibility with Mac/PC

Copy, store, clone or backup all your videos, photos, contacts, everything: for security, privacy, convenience.  Plays and opens media files without needing to first be copied onto another iPhone, iPad, iPod, Android phone or tablet, even Mac or PC.

The UNiFLASH USB 3.0 Drive instantly adds up to 128 GB (and more) storage to any iPhone 5 to 6 Plus, iPad, iPod with the built-in Lightning  connector, or Android phone or tablet with the micro USB connector *.

Unlike other Flash Drives that cost more and have "fixed" memory, the UNiFLASH USB 3.0 Drive has unlimited storage because the built-in micro SD slot works with removable 8 GB to 128 GB micro SD memory cards.

The USB 3.0 connector provides for super fast transfer speed to / from Mac or PC.  The built-in micro USB connector means no extra cable is needed to work with any Android phone or tablet. 

This plug and play external drive is compatible with the free i-Flash Drive HD apps for IOS and Android and encrypts files for security, plus auto backup of contacts / calendar / photos/videos.  *Property of PhotoFast Co. Ltd.

Prevent Hacking 

All your important and private documents, photos, videos, music, contacts, and other files are NOT stored online, but are stored in the UNiFLASH USB 3.0 Drive memory in secured encrypted format.  For backup storage, you can also connect with your Dropbox account.

Your iOS, Android device, Mac, or PC can play videos, music, any files straight from the UNiFLASH 3.0 Drive - no need to download it first.   Save time, money, from needing to use internet, data network, iTunes, or Cloud access.

Beware of cheap versions 

Our manufacturing partner is the largest manufacturer of the iFlash Drive compatible series products in China.  They make their own PCB and use only new premium IC's.  Unfortunately, there is no protection against reverse engineering by other smaller factories and subcontractors that are using recycled components and dumping their versions online. 

But even with their cheap unreliable parts, the versions with USB 2.0 are not much cheaper in price.  So please before you hit Bid or Buy online, ask yourself if your files or phone are worth the extra few dollars.
The UNiFLASH USB 3.0 Drive is the only external drive with removable memory slot AND USB 3.0 connector with built-in micro USB connector. 

Cheap micro SD memory cards

There are also hundreds of sellers online offering unbelievable prices on 32 to 128 GB memory.  We got some to test and found that they were mostly fake (128 GB 100% fake) and failed to save files reliably.  Therefore, we are offering our own memory up to 64 GB.  The great thing is that unlike "fixed" memory drives, you can use as many 64 GB memory cards as needed, or wait until 128 GB prices come down.   2/2/2015 - we added 128 GB micro SD memory card as a separate perk.

File formats supported

  • Video
    .mp4, .m4v, .mpv, .mov, .mpg, .mkv, .wmv, .flv, .3gp, .gif
  • Audio
    .wav, .aac, .aif, .aiff, .caf, .m4a, .mp3
  • Images
    .jpg, .tiff, .gif
  • Documents
    .doc and .docx (Microsoft Word); .htm and .html (web pages); .pdf (Preview and Adobe Acrobat); .ppt and .pptx (Microsoft PowerPoint); .txt (text); .rtf (rich text format); .vcf (contact information); .xls and .xlsx (Microsoft Excel); .zip

Perks - FREE SHIPPING to any address in the world is included!

UNiFLASH USB 3.0 Drive - Early Bird

Drive Only (Black, Gold, White color) $50
  • with 16 GB Memory $60
  • with 32 GB Memory $70
  • with 64 GB Memory $90
All Micro SD memory cards are tested and shipped with the drive. 

Estimated shipping in July 2015.  On Time Guaranteed *

128 GB Micro SD Memory Card by itself $95


Transparency

This campaign and your feedback will help us finalize production plans and packaging designs.  For example, we need to figure out the ratio of each color casing to make, and possible additional color choices.

There are others that claim to have their own apps, but are actually offering the  i-Flash Drive apps for IOS and Android which are the property of PhotoFast Co. Ltd.  We feel that they deserve the credit for making available a bug-free. powerful product.

Risks and challenges

UNiFLASH has been in business since 2011 and specializes in private labeled electronics for companies in the USA and Europe.  This time, we decided to offer our own design under our own company and so it will not be found under any other brand - until someone reverse-engineers it.

We have the financing and purchase order in place for 5,000 units, and are running this campaign to help us finalize production plans and packaging designs.

The UNiFLASH USB 3.0 will be manufactured for us by the largest manufacturer of iFlash Drive compatible series products in China.  

*If we miss the July 2015 shipping date, we will gladly offer to refund you 100% via Paypal!

****************************************************************

story:
Pluto Wireless is a unique wireless power bank with a minimalist design, which delivers powerfully fast energy to go. Designed for an intuitive use this product is a divine statement about bringing order to complexity.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The device is compatible with iPhone and Samsung Fast Charge, working with a wide range of brands, including Samsung, Sony, LG, Nokia, Microsoft, Google and more. Among iPhones, the charger works with iPhone Xs/X, iPhone Xs Max, iPhone XR, iPhone 8 Plus, and iPhone 8.

 

Breakthrough wireless technology.

Here is the really smart thing that only Pluto Wireless does. Pluto Wireless can charge itself wirelessly when you place it on a Wireless Charging Base. Simplicity at its best.

Pluto Wireless can charge through phone cases up to 3mm thick, so there’s no need to pull your case on and off every time you want to charge.

Pluto Wireless has taken craftsmanship to new levels, following the curves of the design right up to elegant corners. Made with the essentials of good design, the device uses premium aluminum blended with luxurious fabric and high-end technology for a seamless, fast charging experience. The fabric is specially engineered to resist scratches, and colors and materials chosen after research to reflect light for the most appealing looks. Assembly without the use of screws lends the device an exceptional touch and feel.

Charge using the USB-A port while another device charges wirelessly.

Technically, Pluto Wireless satisfied strict standard expected of today’s gadgets. The case is 100% aluminum and comprises a 10,000mAh Lithium Polymer cell with 10W wireless output. Protection against overheating, overcharge, and surge protection is in-built. The device carries USB-C and USB-A ports, and features a cool LED charging indicator. An additional feature is priority charging, which allows the phone to be charged first and not the device when it is plugged into an adapter.

GREEN DESIGN — We innovate using biodegradable and recyclable packaging material that allow us to take care of the planet.

 

Want to write about PLUTO WIRELESS Download our Press Pack!

Any questions or concerns? Feel free to email us at joshua@earth.international

Facebook

Instagram

Twitter

 

Risks and challenges

It has taken 2 years to be where we are today, and it has been extremely challenging from a design and development perspective to achieve such great battery performance in a compact iconic design.

The research and development of the Pluto Wireless has reduced the risks substantially. Now, what is left is to bring everything together starting off with tooling (the molds for the Pluto). Some samples then ought to be tested to start production of the first batch.

Even though we have reduced the risk significantly, there are still inherent risks that we cannot ignore. The two main risks that we foresee are: the inner space of the product and shipment of individual products around the world.

To reduce the risk and challenges, we have collaborated with the best manufacturers and engineers in order to perfectly fit all the components inside the unibody case.

The last challenge is getting the individual product to each of our Kickstarter backers – with tighter restrictions on the shipping of singular products that contain batteries around the world today. Our in-house logistics team has spent a considerable amount of time searching to find a logistics partner that has a proven track record of dealing with this issue and we believe we have greatly reduced the challenges involved.

Technically, Pluto Wireless satisfied strict standard expected of today’s gadgets. The case is 100% aluminum and comprises a 10,000mAh Lithium Polymer cell with 10W wireless output. Protection against overheating, overcharge, and surge protection is in-built. The device carries USB-C and USB-A ports, and features a cool LED charging indicator. An additional feature is priority charging, which allows the phone to be charged first and not the device when it is plugged into an adapter.

GREEN DESIGN — We innovate using biodegradable and recyclable packaging material that allow us to take care of the planet.

 


 
Want to write about PLUTO WIRELESS Download our Press Pack!
Any questions or concerns? Feel free to email us at joshua@earth.international
Facebook
Instagram
Twitter



 
Risks and challenges
It has taken 2 years to be where we are today, and it has been extremely challenging from a design and development perspective to achieve such great battery performance in a compact iconic design.
The research and development of the Pluto Wireless has reduced the risks substantially. Now, what is left is to bring everything together starting off with tooling (the molds for the Pluto). Some samples then ought to be tested to start production of the first batch.
Even though we have reduced the risk significantly, there are still inherent risks that we cannot ignore. The two main risks that we foresee are: the inner space of the product and shipment of individual products around the world.
To reduce the risk and challenges, we have collaborated with the best manufacturers and engineers in order to perfectly fit all the components inside the unibody case.
The last challenge is getting the individual product to each of our Kickstarter backers – with tighter restrictions on the shipping of singular products that contain batteries around the world today. Our in-house logistics team has spent a considerable amount of time searching to find a logistics partner that has a proven track record of dealing with this issue and we believe we have greatly reduced the challenges involved.

story:
SUCCESS!

Thank you all so very much for our successful campaign!  450% of our goal with over 1,500 contributors!


We're working hard to ensure you get your iSmartAlarm home security system as soon as possible, and we're still on pace for shipping to begin at the beginning of the last week of April, 2013.


If you have a moment, check out the site we have set up at iSmartAlarm.com

If you haven't ordered yet, you can order from our site!

We're still working on the site, and it will go through lots of cosmetic and material changes in the coming weeks, but we would love any feedback at indiegogo@ismartalarm.com 

 

PLEASE REMEMBER - This Indiegogo campaign is for US and Canada consumers only.  We will be expanding internationally later in 2013, and as soon as we are able to support/ship to/sell in your country/region, we will make the announcements here and on our ismartalarm.com website.  Thanks again for your support!

Hi Everyone!  Thanks for taking a look at our campaign, and full steam ahead!  Make sure to check out some of the press we've gotten (bottom), and please please please check out the updated FAQ at the bottom for shipping information, timelines, and other details we were asked in the show and over email.  We update it constantly.  If you have any questions/comments/concerns/cupcakes, please email us at indiegogo@ismartalarm.com

Now on to the regularly scheduled program -

There are lots of options for home security services and "smarthome" products, but what we have always noticed is that a) They usually come with long-term contracts and monthly fees, b) They are expensive to buy and to have installed, and c) The amount of actual "control" the user has is limited by whichever big corporation makes the product and runs the monitoring center. 

We are a company of home-renters and home-owners.  We are people with families and we are single men and women.  We have pets.  We have children.  We have had our homes broken into, and we have had our belongings stolen.  We have realized we left the windows open after crawling into bed, and we have worried we forgot to close and lock the door after leaving the house to go to work.  We love technology, and we need safety.  We don't want to pay for monthly monitoring center or service fees, and we have no interest in signing 3-year contracts.

This is iSmartAlarm

We have based our programming and construction on four major tenets -

Unparalleled Intelligence

CubeOne - The brains of the system

  • Control the system from anywhere in the world - turn it on or off, watch through the directional camera, check family member statuses, and more
  • iPhone-enabled apps and state-of-the-art cloud technology
  • Real-time device management including on/off, battery status, status updates, user information, and more
  • Almost unlimited expandability for a variety of smart home applications

Outstanding Performance

  • Instant response time through phone call, voicemail, and push notifications
  • Real time camera monitoring with iCamera - anytime, anywhere, for any reason with the swipe of a finger
  • You can manage and save on energy costs by having a record and real-time examples of doors and windows opening and closing
  • Control for the whole family, or for only certain members.  You can set up emergency contacts, customized notifications, and more

Flexibility

  • All devices are mobile, light, and easy to use
  • You can add, remove, and move any of the devices - perfect for renters or if your concerns change
  • Say goodbye to running telephone lines throughout your house or drilling holes in your wall for installation
  • iPhone App is customizable to keep track of your home and your family, in the manner you prefer.  Use names, nicknames, pictures, and unique identifiers for every family member and device in the house

Cool

iCamera - Complete control and visibility at all times, from anywhere, with the swipe of your finger on your iPhone

  • The iSmartAlarm was made to match the style, simplicity, and unibody design of the iPhone
  • Form and function - There's no reason to sacrifice security for beauty, or vice versa
  • The level of control is completely up to you - Monitor constantly, or only when you want.  The choice is yours
  • Motion sensors, infrared cameras, door/window sensors, all at the touch of your finger with your iSmartAlarm app - How cool is that?

The quality of every piece that comes out for the line will be of the highest caliber.  We will make sure, through rigorous design and testing, that when we make and market a product, it will be something we want in our homes and will trust in our homes.  We want to keep the price low and the quality high.  We want to expand the product to include and run on Android and Windows operating systems, tablets and with wizard wands.  We want to offer different colors and customizable skins (mahogany?  Favorite college football team?  Hello Kitty?  R2-D2?)

Imagine the possibilities that can grow from the iSmartAlarm -

  • GPS pet tracker
  • Pet feeder automation
  • Remote door lock/unlock
  • Home temperature automation
  • Electricity savings by turning lights on and off or dimming them
  • Remote oven control
  • Sprinkler/yard automation
  • Remote heater/air conditioning control for the car
  • What else can you think of?  Let us know!

The packages will ship in April, and customers will have their choices of the packages that best suit their needs.  You'll be able to mix and match packages as well - Want more than one package?  You can use multiple, and the CubeOne CPU will automatically recognize all the devices.  Later on, you'll be able to buy the individual devices separately for low low LOW prices (That was my car salesman pitch).

BASIC PACKAGE

  • 1 CubeOne (CPU hub)
  • 1 Door/Window sensor
  • 1 Motion sensor
  • 1 Remote Tag (Remote control for home use or for use by children without an iPhone)
  • 1 iSmartAlarm sign for your yard or window
  • Free iPhone App, automated phone alert and push notifications

Exclusive Preferred Package for the IndieGogo Early Bird

  • 1 CubeOne (CPU hub)
  • 2 Door/Window sensor
  • 1 Motion sensor
  • 2 Remote Tag (Remote control for home use or for use by children without an iPhone)
  • 1 iSmartAlarm sign for your yard or window
  • Free iPhone App, automated phone alert and push notifications

Deluxe Package

  • 1 CubeOne (CPU hub)
  • 4 Door/Window sensor
  • 1 Motion sensor
  • 4 Remote Tag (Remote control for home use or for use by children without an iPhone)
  • 1 iSmartAlarm sign for your yard or window
  • Free iPhone App, automated phone alert and push notifications

Exclusive Premium Package for the IndieGogo Early Bird

  • 1 CubeOne (CPU hub)
  • 2 Door/Window sensor
  • 1 Motion sensor
  • 2 Remote Tag (Remote control for home use or for use by children without an iPhone)
  • iCamera (24/7 visibility of any room in the house, linked and stored through the Cloud)
  • 1 iSmartAlarm sign for your yard or window
  • Free iPhone App, automated phone alert and push notifications

We've built our prototypes and we've tested them to make sure they are up to our standards. But designing and building a prototype is one thing - Manufacturing, marketing, and getting the iSmartAlarm into lots of peoples' hands and homes is another.

We’ve figured out our raw material sources, manufacturing processes, and our supply chain and infrastructure. We need your help to take the next step. We need funds to put the iSmartAlarm into production.

We will run into challenges, sure. Everyone and everything does. But challenges bring solutions, and, many times, even more successful results. We are motivated, excited about the possibilities, and we hope you are too.

With your help, we can get past any issues we may run into with with advanced laboratory testing, meticulous and conscientious manufacturing procedures, and hiring the best people to help us grow.

FAQ

Where do you ship?

Right now we only ship to US (free shipping) and Canada (add $15 to your order).  We will be adding additional countries later, hopefully Q3/Q4 this year.  We've got to nail down wi-fi protocols, country-specific requirements (like 220v vs. 110v in US and Canada), shipping details, etc. 

What is required to use the iSmartAlarm system for my home?                 

Very simple - No telephone landline is required. All you need is an internet router with regular high speed internet services and your iPhone, and you're  good to go.

Where will I be able to buy the iSmartAlarm when it is released?

At first, to keep costs low, we are going to focus sales on our own online channels - the iSmartAlarm website, sites like Amazon, Yahoo! Products, etc.  As we grow, we will be able to branch out into brick-and-mortar box stores and Apple Stores (hopefully)

Does an iPhone come with the system?

No.  But let's face it, you probably knew the answer to that question.

What happens if I move, and want to take the system with me?

No problem, every device is detachable from the wall/door/window you placed them on, and completely mobile.  No hardwires, no drilling holes, no running ethernet cables all over the place.  You can move tomorrow morning and have the system up and running by lunch.

How are the devices powered?

The door/window sensors and the remote control/key fobs use button batteries (like watches), and the motion detector uses AAA.  The camera and the CubeOne plug into the AC outlet for now (may offer battery-backup later)

What's the battery life?

We've tested, based on approx 30 "uses" a day (door open/close, motion sensor detecting motion, that sort of thing), and the battery life for all the battery-operated devices is about 12-18 months, depending on how often they are used.  The app also keeps a running tab of estimated battery life, so with the app you'll know when it's time to change the battery.

Will the sensors work through walls?

Yes, it works through walls, with devices up to 100 feet away from the CubeOne.  Basically, as long as your laptop connects to your wi-fi, your iSmartAlarm devices will work there as well.

Will the iSmartAlarm package come with an instruction guide?  Will the iSmartAlarm App have a tutorial?  What if I get confused?

Don't worry, we'll have you covered.  Though we hope we have made it simple to use, you'll have the App, instruction manual, our website, and our customer service to help you if you need it.

What's the size of the devices?

The camera is a little under 5", the motion sensor is the same height as the camera, and the contact sensors a bit over 2".

Does the iSmartAlarm App work with Android?

Soon, it will.  We're expecting it to be ready and out very close to our shipping dates.  We're launching on the iOS and then expanding from there.  Being able to escalate Android development is one of the biggest reasons for our Indiegogo campaign!

Will there be a warranty or guarantee for the iSmartAlarm?

We know this sort of thing is very important, and we're working on it as a high priority. We can't make any promises, but we CAN guarantee you will receive a properly working iSmartAlarm package.  We'll work on the warranty aspects and post with updates.


Will we be able to add on additional devices at a later time?  Order a la carte?

Yup!  You'll be able to order each piece individually in April, and additional devices can be added to the CubeOne at any time.  For right now, you can add the $29 Package (for 2 additional Contact Sensors) and the $49 Package (for 2 additional Contact Sensors PLUS 1 more Motion Detector) to any existing package.


The camera in the (insert media source here) video from CES looks different.  What's up?

The camera shown at CES was the beta shell.  Check out the "Images" section for a picture of the "Jellyfish," the iCamera that will come with all Indiegogo premium package orders.

Press and Attention

TechCrunch - "Should brazen intruders disregard the (sign), the system can initiate taking successive photos of the perp and will send alerts to the smartphone owned by you or the vigilante of your choosing."

eHow Tech - Cool Tech Video - "Does an end-run around the traditional monthly fees type of home security system..."

CNet - CNet First Look Video

CrowdfundInsider Interview - "We just want to start with one particular product and do it really, really well."

CNet's Amanda Kooser - "Once you buy it, you own it. There are no contracts. That may be the most compelling argument in favor of this particular approach to home security. It definitely appeals to the do-it-yourselfer."

TrustedNerd.com - One of "Three projects on Indiegogo and Kickstarter you must back now"

TechCrunch - iSmartAlarm Home Security Demo Video

RealtyToday - "The product, which debuted at CES this year, offers a variety options including being able to see the movement, call 911 or just ignore it."

TUAW - "...this system might be attractive to those looking for an iOS-based security system."

EnGadget - iSmartAlarm Hands-On Demonstration Video

CNN Tech - "...inspired by the burglary of Steve Jobs' house this [last] summer."

Toronto Star - "The benefit...is not being forced to pay a security company a monthly monitoring fee, as well as the ability to take the devices with you when you move, as opposed to picking up a new bill for expensive installation services."

NY Daily News Editor's Picks - "A new home security system due to be showcased at this year's CES transforms the iPhone into an image-supported burglar alarm, enabling users to make rapidfire decisions about their home security from afar."

eHow- "Want a home alarm system but don’t want to pay a monthly fee? iSmartAlarm is a complete system"

BestTechie.com - "I'm normally not too excited by home security products, however that changed when I was recently introduced to a company called iSmartAlarm."

MacWorld - "iSmartAlarm's...low price and ease of use make it a compelling option in a realm dominated by costly installed systems. "

iDownloadBlog - "The system appears to be easily installed based on my hands-on experience at CES and allows monitoring and activation or deactivate through an iOS app"

SFGate - "The open-source system as currently designed is just for security, but down the line it could be expanded to include home automation features"

CBS News MarketWatch - "Buy the kit for $250 and your house will notify you via your phone if an intruder triggers the motion detectors or door alarms."

Technology Review - "iSmart Alarm Inc. unveiled a new iPhone-operated home alarm system which will allow users to monitor, arm and disarm their alarm systems from their iPhones"

Gadgmatic - "The best part about the iSmartAlarm is it’s connectivity via the iPhone App. You can effortlessly turn off and on your system. It will notify you if there is trouble in your home, automatically sending you five pictures of the intruders."

FierceWireless- "It's all built around a smartphone app and is intended to dramatically reduce the cost and complexity of established home security systems."

story:
What is Glasses TrackR

Glasses TrackR is a small tracking device designed for sunglasses and eyeglasses. Once you attach TrackR to your eyewear, your phone will automatically keep track of where your glasses are located for you. 


The device has been designed to sleekly slip onto any pair of glasses and remain hidden behind the user's ear & hair when worn. Stop losing moments looking for lost eyeglasses and worrying about losing your favorite pair of sunglasses with Glasses TrackR.


How Does it Work?

The Glasses TrackR device slips on to the back of any eyewear frames & attached via a comfortable neoprene slip. The user then downloads the TrackR App onto their iPhone or Android. From the app, the user can track where there glasses are and find their glasses in seconds using TrackR's unique two-way finder system.


Features


How Does it Attach?

Glasses TrackR uses a neoprene attachment to attach to virtually any pair of glasses.




App



The app for Glasses TrackR is available for both iOS and Android device (Please Check Compatibility below). The app enables you to customize rings for each device and can be used to track other TrackR devices such as Wallet TrackR and StickR TrackR. The app can also track non-TrackR proximity tags. We have tested the application to conserve battery life. Click the links below to see the app for yourself.



                                                   

   


Compatibility

iOS: iPhone 4s & later, iPad with Retina Display & later, iPod Touch 5th Generation & later

Android:  Android 4.3 & later, Samsung Galaxy S3, Samsung Galaxy Note 2, Samsung Galaxy S4 (Android supports only 1 device at a time!)


Timeline 

November - IndieGoGo Campaign

January - Showcase Glasses TrackR at CES 2014

January - Approve Evaluation Build Samples

March - Approve Production Build Samples

March - Production

April - Delivery to Customers

Timeline is subject to change and we'll make sure you are updated of any difficulties. We've gone through the manufacturing process many times now and have accomplished delivering quality product to customers every time.


FAQ

How long does the Battery Last?

Up to 6 months and the battery is easily replaceable.

What is the range?

The finding features work within 100 feet of the Glasses TrackR device. Outside of 100 feet, the app records where the glasses were left last & Crowd Source Tracking updates can be used to receive the latest GPS tracking info on your lost glasses.

How many people are in the Crowd Source Tracking Network?

Our Crowd Source Tracking Network is the largest out there thanks to our successful Indiegogo campaigns such as Wallet TrackR and Button TrackR.

How is Glasses TrackR different from other tracker devices

Glasses TrackR is the only intelligent item tracking device that has been specifically designed for glasses.  Besides beating competition in features, easy to replace batteries, Android and iOS app support, TrackR products have been already successfully released to customers and you can depend on TrackR to receive high quality products.

Is there a monthly subscription?

No monthly subscription required!

I am interested in Distribution.  Who should I email?

Please email sales (at) phonehalo.com.

I am interested in writing about Glasses TrackR.  Who should I email?

Please email press (at) phonehalo.com.

I have more questions about the product.  Who should I email?

Please email support (at) phonehalo.com.

I have questions for Chris.  How do I contact him?

I'm easy to get a hold of and look forward to hearing from you: chris (at) phonehalo.com.


Want to learn more?  Want images for your blog?  Visit http://www.GlassesTrackR.com
story_txt:
What is Glasses TrackR

Glasses TrackR is a small tracking device designed for sunglasses and eyeglasses. Once you attach TrackR to your eyewear, your phone will automatically keep track of where your glasses are located for you. 

The device has been designed to sleekly slip onto any pair of glasses and remain hidden behind the user's ear & hair when worn. Stop losing moments looking for lost eyeglasses and worrying about losing your favorite pair of sunglasses with Glasses TrackR.




How Does it Work?
The Glasses TrackR device slips on to the back of any eyewear frames & attached via a comfortable neoprene slip. The user then downloads the TrackR App onto their iPhone or Android. From the app, the user can track where there glasses are and find their glasses in seconds using TrackR's unique two-way finder system.

Features








How Does it Attach?
Glasses TrackR uses a neoprene attachment to attach to virtually any pair of glasses.














App



The app for Glasses TrackR is available for both iOS and Android device (Please Check Compatibility below). The app enables you to customize rings for each device and can be used to track other TrackR devices such as Wallet TrackR and StickR TrackR. The app can also track non-TrackR proximity tags. We have tested the application to conserve battery life. Click the links below to see the app for yourself.



                                                   
   

Compatibility




iOS: iPhone 4s & later, iPad with Retina Display & later, iPod Touch 5th Generation & later
Android:  Android 4.3 & later, Samsung Galaxy S3, Samsung Galaxy Note 2, Samsung Galaxy S4 (Android supports only 1 device at a time!)



Timeline
