story:
Innovative Bags for Smartphones with the Smartphone Photographer in mind

The PHONESLINGER by COSYSPEED is the Worlds First Set of Bags for Smartphone Photography and Videography.

  • PHONESLINGER Power comes with an integrated QI-Wireless Powerbank. It charges your phone (your phone must be able for QI-Wireless charging) all the time it's in the bag and you'll never run out of power + have your Phone accessible within a second and with one hand
  • PHONESLINGER Prime holds your Smartphone and up to 4 smartphone lenses like the popular Moment Lenses. Have your Phone and Mobile Lenses accessible within a second and with one hand
  • PHONESLINGER Outdoor is rugged and light weight and the safe place for your phone out in nature. Have your phone safe but always in reach within a second and with one hand

Smartphone Photography and Videography has come a long way and image quality reaches a level, that was reserved to professional cameras like DSLRs only a few years ago. Inbetween many Photographers and Videographers discovered their Smartphone as a serious tool for their personal and professional work. We thought it's time to support all you great Smartphone Photography Heroes with a series of functional, well designed and affordable bags for your creative tool of choice – your Smartphone. 

--------------------------------------------------------------

The PHONESLINGER Power 

The PHONESLINGER Power is for those Smartphone Photographers and Videographers who never want to run out of Power. You do extensive shootings on your trips around the world,  don't want to miss family memories or use your Smartphone to express your creativity in personal and professional projects? The extra juice of 8000 mAh of the integrated Powerbank gives you all the energy you need. All Smartphones with an integrated QI-Wireless Charging function can benefit from the QI-Wireless Powerbank that comes with the PHONESLINGER Power. Simply put your phone in the PHONESLINGER Power and it'll be charged. It's so easy!

 

Features PHONESLINGER Power

  • Quick, one-handed access
  • Fits any QI-Wireless able Smartphones from iPhone X to Galaxy Note 
  • FIDLOCK-Magnetic closure
  • Padding from robust but thin PE-Plastic Sheets 
  • Made from High-Quality, weather resist Duo-Tone Nylon D600 fabrics
  • Detachable loop on the back to attach to a belt or to the FLOWBELT
  • Hidden pocket for credit cards etc. on the inside
  • NYLON D200 pouch for the Powerbank
  • Soft touch material on the inside
  • Manufactured under SGS certification (www.sgs.com) for fair working conditions and environmentally friendly manufacturing
  • Colors: Steel Grey/Red and Charcoal/Black

Inner Dimensions

  • 165 mm (6.5") height x 32 mm (1.25") depth x 90 mm (3.6") wide

How it works

  • Put your Smartphone in the PHONESLINGER Power
  • Press on/off button on the Powerbank CS8000
  • Charging starts as soon as green LED indicator lights up :-)

​

 

Features Powerbank CS8000

  • Works on the QI-Wirelss Charging Standard with all Phones listed below:
  • Apple iPhone: 8, 8 Plus, iPhone X
  • Samsung Galaxy: Note 9, S9, S9+, Note 8, S8, S8+, S7, S7 Edge, Note 5, S6, S6 Edge
  • Sony: Xperia XZ3, Xperia XZ2 Premium, Xperia XZ2
  • LG: G7 ThinQ, V30, G6 (US version only), G4 (optional), G3 (optional)
  • Nokia: 8 Sirocco
  • Huawei: Mate RS Porsche Design
  • Microsoft Lumia: 1520, 1020, 930, 929, 928, 920
  • Google Nexus: 4, 5, 6, 7 (2013)
  • BlackBerry: Priv
  • Can charge your phone wirelessly
  • Can be charged wirelessly (Yes, you can put the Powerbank on a wireless charger and it will be charged)
  • Can be charged with regular phone chargers via Micro USB or USB C cable
  • Can charge other devices via cable with the standard USB connector on top
  • On/Off switch
  • Durable polycarbonate housing
  • High-Quality battery cells (ISO9000/ISO14000) from a top supplier
  • LED indicators for:
  • Charging status
  • Red LED shows divice is not charging
  • Green LED shows device is charging
  • 8000 mAh / charges your phone up to 2 times
  • Input: DC 5V/2.1A
  • Wireless Output: DC 5V/1.0A
  • USB Output: DC 5V/2.1A
  • Wireless recieving: DC 5V/0.75A
  • Dimensions
  • 135 mm (5.3") height x 18 mm (0.7") depth x 72 mm (2.8") wide
 

--------------------------------------------------------------

 

The PHONESLINGER Prime

The PHONESLINGER Prime is the perfect, safe and quick-access bag for the Lenses you bought for your Smartphone. It fits your iPhone X, iPhone 8 Plus or Galaxy Note or any other phone and up to 4 lenses, like the super duper Moment Lenses. It's so easy to have pro grade image quality and flexibility with Smartphone Lenses these days. The only limitaion though is the way you can access them. Don't dig in your backpack or messenger bag for your Smartphone Lenses, just use a PHONESLINGER prime and get ready within a second and with one hand.

Features PHONESLINGER Prime

  • Quick, one-handed access
  • Padding from robust but thin PE-Plastic Sheets
  • Fits up to 4 Smartphone Lenses like the Moment Lenses
  • Fits Smartphones (with case) from iPhone X to Galaxy Note 
  • Made from High-Quality, weather resist Duo-Tone Nylon D600 fabrics
  • Detachable loop on the back to attach to a belt or to the FLOWBELT
  • Soft touch material on the inside
  • 3 velcro dividers in the lens compartment
  • Manufactured under SGS certification (www.sgs.com) for fair working conditions and environmentally friendly manufacturing
  • Colors: Steel Grey/Red and Charcoal/Black

​Dimensions

  • Overall: 175 mm (7") height x 72 mm (2.8") depth x 100 mm (4") wide
  • Phone compartment: 165 mm (6.5") height x 12 mm (0.5") depth x 90 mm (3.6") wide
  • Lens compartment: 85 mm (3.4") x 85 mm (3.4") width x 40 mm (1.6") depth 

How it works

  1. Open Lens Compartment
  2. Grab Lens
  3. Attach to Smartphone
  4. Shoot :-)

​

 

--------------------------------------------------------------

The PHONESLINGER Outdoor

The PHONESLINGER Outdoor is the safe place for your phone when climbing in the Alps or Rockys, hiking adventure trails or riding wild trails on your bike. It's leight weight and robust and protects your phone from bumps into rocks or any kinds of rough situations. Attach it to the belt of your trousers, the waist belt of your backpack or your CAMSLINGER Outdoor. And have your Smartphone always ready with one hand in one second to grab the perfect photo.

Features PHONESLINGER Outdoor

  • Quick, one-handed access
  • Padding from robust but thin PE-Plastic Sheets
  • Fits Smartphones (with case) from iPhone X to Galaxy Note 
  • FIDLOCK-Magnetic closure
  • Detachable loop on the back to attach to a belt or to the FLOWBELT
  • Hidden pocket for credit cards etc. on the inside
  • Made from High-Quality, weather resist, super robust Nylon D900 fabrics
  • Soft touch material on the inside
  • Manufactured under SGS certification (www.sgs.com) for fair working conditions and environmentally friendly manufacturing
  • Colors: Blue and Grey

​Inner Dimensions

  • 165 mm (6.5") height x 14 mm (0.55") depth x 90 mm (3.6") wide

How it works

--------------------------------------------------------------

How to attach your PHONESLINGER Power, Prime or Outdoor to your belt

  • Open detachable loop on the back
  • Slide belt flap through your belt
  • Close loop with the Velcro pad and press buttons
  • You got it!

​

 

Features of the Belt Loop

  • Stabilizing PE-Plastic Sheet inside
  • 2-way-security with strong velcro pad and two press buttons

--------------------------------------------------------------

The BELTPAD

The BELTPAD extends the ability of the FLOWBELT to attach additional pouches or allows you to attach your PHONESLINGER Power, Prime or Outdoor on your belt in a lower position. This comes in handy when you are wearing a jacket. It comes with a thigh band so you can attach it to your thigh if needed.

Features BELTPAD

  • Offers one slot for PHONESLINGER bags or STUFFBAG
  • Padding from robust but thin PE-Plastic Sheets
  • Loops on the bottom to attach FLOWBELT to your thigh if needed (thigh band included)
  • Made from High-Quality, weather resist, Duo-Tone Nylon D600 fabrics
  • Manufactured under SGS certification (www.sgs.com) for fair working conditions and environmentally friendly manufacturing
  • Colors: Steel Grey / Red and Charcoal / Black

Dimensions

  • 175 mm (7") height x 80 mm (3,2") wide x 8 mm (0.3") depth

--------------------------------------------------------------

Schedule

March 2019 to May 2019 manufacturing 

May 2019 to June 2019 shpping to our US and EU warehouses

June 2019 shipping

--------------------------------------------------------------

Risks and Challanges

The production of the PHONESLINGER will be starting in the beginning of March and delivery is scheduled for June. As far as we can see there are no risks apart from delays in customs or similar issues on the way to our warehouses. 

--------------------------------------------------------------

Team

Thomas Ludwig, CEO and founder of COSYSPEED

Thomas Ludwig has had an advertising agency in Germany for almost 20 years and was working as development aid worker for the German Development Service in African countries. He is a photo nerd since many years and has a passion for street photography (but not much time for it). He lives with his family in Bonn/Germany.

Stefan Eggers, Social Media Manager at COSYSPEED

Stefan has a wide variety of skills and is a nerdy guy who is using Moment Lenses with great passion. It was Stefans inspiration that lead to the PHONESLINGER Prime. Stefan is a Brand Ambassador to Moment Lenses and lives in Bonn/Germany.

story:
ORDER YOURS NOW

www.tacticagear.com

 

Highest Funded Tool

A HUGE thank you to the backer community for making the Talon the highest funded multi-tool in crowdfunding history!

TALON TOP TEN

  • Lightweight – 40% lighter than titanium
  • Tough – strong as die cast metal
  • Tech Friendly – does not scratch your phone or camera
  • 17 tools in one – gets you out of trouble
  • Adaptable – swappable hex tools to customize your carry
  • Airplane Friendly – TSA compliant for carry-on
  • Compact – smaller form factor than a credit card
  • Advanced Material – composite used in aerospace and military
  • Pocket Friendly – perfect for everyday carry
  • Australian – designed + manufactured in Melbourne

Shipping Soon

Manufacturing has already started! Our first batch is already prepping for shipping – orders placed before Monday, Nov 28, 11AM PST. The next batch of Talons will be shipping in January, 2017. Placeholders will be available for download for stocking stuffers for 2nd batch.

A Tool When You Need It  

How often do you find yourself in need of a tool for a quick fix? A loose screw, a non-twist bottle, a package to open. Often, the tool you need is buried in a drawer or lost in the garage, turning a 20 second job into 5-10 minutes.

Or worse, you find yourself in a tricky tool situation away from home.

Talon is the tool you keep with you. It's lightweight, compact, versatile and just might be your new best friend.

 

Breakthrough in Design & Tech

Designed by Chijoff+Co, an internationally award-winning industrial design firm, the Talon is the perfect balance of design and function. Not only does the unique composite material make it ultra lightweight and strong, it's the secret to Talon's patent pending design.

 

The unibody Talon features a compartment that holds two hex bits. This is a design feature that is only possible with the advanced composite material.

Talon is truly unique. 40% lighter than titanium yet as strong as die cast metal and does not scratch your phone.

The Talon adapts to your needs and ensures you have the tools to tackle any challenges. The internal storage compartment allows you to pick and choose the tools you might need for your next outing. Maybe it's snowboarding, cycling or about town. It's your choice and the Talons got your back.

 

The Talon is a world first patent pending design with a number of unique features:

 All the tools you need    The Talon comes with 17 tools featuring metric and imperial wrenches and rulers, box cutter, bottle opener and comes standard with phillips and flat head hex drives. 

Adaptable
Swap out the hex drives for your next adventure. Whether you need allen head through to torx, the Talon holds any standard 1/4” hex drive to ensure it moves with you.

Integrated Socket
The Talon makes using the screwdriver a pleasure by putting you in control. The original socket design allows your hand to be positioned similar as you would with a regular screwdriver. A feature that many pocket tools can't do.  

Internal Storage
The Talon lets you store 2 standard hex drives within its body. A flexible elastomer keeps the tools locked in place and ready when you need them.  

Lightweight  40% lighter than titanium the Talon is perfect to go where ever you do. Compact Packing over 20 tools in a pocket sized carry.   

Unibody Design
The main body of the talon is made from a single material resulting in increased strength, stiffness and badassness.

Technology Friendly
The advanced composite material allows you to carry your talon without fear of scratching your latest phone or tablet (unlike other multitools).

TSA Compliant
The Talon complies to current TSA requirements for air travel.

The Talon pushes the limits of material technology and functionality. The patent pending design is only possible through the use of the advanced composite material. This super strong material enables the dual purpose storage compartment to function as a socket.

 

The Talon is made in Melbourne, Australia. We will be using the same factory that produces our current One bottle opener and have worked closely over the last few months on perfecting the design for manufacture. This collaboration ensures that everyone involved has a deep understanding of the project and the standards we expect. Having a local manufacturer means that that we have reduced the risks normally associated with overseas manufacture. No waiting on shipments, faulty products and delivery delays. We will be right there in front of the machine as they come off the line. It doesn't get any more personal than that.

Tooling commenced! Yes that's right. Normally campaigns wait till the funds are received but we made the decision to launch into the production process. As a result we are already a number of weeks into tooling the molds needed for production and expect them to be ready in the next few weeks. As a result we will be delivering the Talons in time for Christmas.

 

 

 

 

 

 

1. Pick your reward
2. Press the pledge button

 

After many years of designing award winning products for clients we are excited to be bringing original innovations through our own brand Tactica. It’s been 2 years since our first Kickstarter campaign and we are back with our newest innovation the Talon. We are a passionate group of designers with a diverse range of experiences and knowledge. We love the detail and work in great depth to design products from the ground up.

Australian – designed + manufactured in Melbourne
 Shipping SoonManufacturing has already started! Our first batch is already prepping for shipping – orders placed before Monday, Nov 28, 11AM PST. The next batch of Talons will be shipping in January, 2017. Placeholders will be available for download for stocking stuffers for 2nd batch.A Tool When You Need It  How often do you find yourself in need of a tool for a quick fix? A loose screw, a non-twist bottle, a package to open. Often, the tool you need is buried in a drawer or lost in the garage, turning a 20 second job into 5-10 minutes.Or worse, you find yourself in a tricky tool situation away from home.Talon is the tool you keep with you. It's lightweight, compact, versatile and just might be your new best friend. Breakthrough in Design & TechDesigned by Chijoff+Co, an internationally award-winning industrial design firm, the Talon is the perfect balance of design and function. Not only does the unique composite material make it ultra lightweight and strong, it's the secret to Talon's patent pending design. Holds 2 interchangeable hex bitsThe unibody Talon features a compartment that holds two hex bits. This is a design feature that is only possible with the advanced composite material.Talon is truly unique. 40% lighter than titanium yet as strong as die cast metal and does not scratch your phone.
 The Talon adapts to your needs and ensures you have the tools to tackle any challenges. The internal storage compartment allows you to pick and choose the tools you might need for your next outing. Maybe it's snowboarding, cycling or about town. It's your choice and the Talons got your back. The Talon is a world first patent pending design with a number of unique features: All the tools you need    The Talon comes with 17 tools featuring metric and imperial wrenches and rulers, box cutter, bottle opener and comes standard with phillips and flat head hex drives. Adaptable Swap out the hex drives for your next adventure. Whether you need allen head through to torx, the Talon holds any standard 1/4” hex drive to ensure it moves with you.Integrated Socket The Talon makes using the screwdriver a pleasure by putting you in control. The original socket design allows your hand to be positioned similar as you would with a regular screwdriver. A feature that many pocket tools can't do.  Internal StorageThe Talon lets you store 2 standard hex drives within its body. A flexible elastomer keeps the tools locked in place and ready when you need them.  Lightweight  40% lighter than titanium the Talon is perfect to go where ever you do. Compact Packing over 20 tools in a pocket sized carry.   Unibody DesignThe main body of the talon is made from a single material resulting in increased strength, stiffness and badassness.Technology FriendlyThe advanced composite material allows you to carry your talon without fear of scratching your latest phone or tablet (unlike other multitools).TSA CompliantThe Talon complies to current TSA requirements for air travel.The Talon pushes the limits of material technology and functionality. The patent pending design is only possible through the use of the advanced composite material. This super strong material enables the dual purpose storage compartment to function as a socket. The Talon is made in Melbourne, Australia. We will be using the same factory that produces our current One bottle opener and have worked closely over the last few months on perfecting the design for manufacture. This collaboration ensures that everyone involved has a deep understanding of the project and the standards we expect. Having a local manufacturer means that that we have reduced the risks normally associated with overseas manufacture. No waiting on shipments, faulty products and delivery delays. We will be right there in front of the machine as they come off the line. It doesn't get any more personal than that.Tooling commenced! Yes that's right. Normally campaigns wait till the funds are received but we made the decision to launch into the production process. As a result we are already a number of weeks into tooling the molds needed for production and expect them to be ready in the next few weeks. As a result we will be delivering the Talons in time for Christmas.      1. Pick your reward2. Press the pledge button  After many years of designing award winning products for clients we are excited to be bringing original innovations through our own brand Tactica. It’s been 2 years since our first Kickstarter campaign and we are back with our newest innovation the Talon. We are a passionate group of designers with a diverse range of experiences and knowledge. We love the detail and work in great depth to design products from the ground up.

story:
We're pushing forward!

Many thanks to all our contributors!  Despite not reaching our goal, BAS is pushing forward with the prototype of the Path To Zero app.  In fact, we're more committed than ever to developing an app that is up to the challenge of helping people take control of their energy needs while saving both time and money.  During the campaign, we were able to develop a wireframe of the on-boarding portion of the app, which we'll be using to help demonstrate our concept as we continue raising funds.  

Please get in contact with us, we'd love to hear from you!  You can always contact us through our websites, linked below, or by following the links on this site to Facebook and Twitter.

English site

Dutch site

Thanks again, and power to the people!

  

Power in the palm of your hand

Energy is a basic need. Without gas and electricity it is hard to imagine how we could continue to power our homes, businesses and communities.  Yet, today, scarce resources provide the energy we depend on; we are currently using fossil fuels 5 million times faster than the Earth produces them. 

Traditional energy providers make more money when their customers consume more energy, and the average consumer uses energy that comes mostly from the combustion of fossil fuels.  Put simply, this is a recipe for disaster. 

BAS Holding has a solution and we call it the “Path To Zero”.  Through the Path To Zero, we earn more money as our customers use LESS energy.  We call ourselves BAS because we believe this innovative business model truly Benefits All Stakeholders.  The Path To Zero works because when we provide our customers with gas and electricity we choose not to take a profit on this supply.  Instead, we take the potential profit margin and use it to help our customers invest in energy solutions that will lower their total energy consumption and switch their energy supply over to renewable sources.  BAS makes money by facilitating clean energy services and not by supplying dirty power.  

The Path To Zero is already working in the Netherlands where we started our business four years ago.  Now, we want to bring the Path To Zero to the world through a free mobile app.  The app will provide a single interface with all of the automated tools, or modules, needed to conduct energy scans, develop investment plans with customizable budgets, and then connect with local retailers and contractors in a digital marketplace.  The app will also allow you to monitor your progress and savings, share your success with friends and family, and have fun along the way to energy independence.

We’ve already started developing the user interface and the backend algorithm that will help people in energy markets all over the world make smart investments in their clean energy future. 

We are looking for your support to help push this project forward and to become part of the clean energy movement.

Please watch our video, share our story, and read on to learn more about how we’re making clean energy services available by putting power in the palm of your hand.


What We Need & What You Get

With the Path To Zero app, we are compressing years of expertise delivering clean energy solutions into a single application.  We are looking for $100,000 that will go toward building the following 5 modules:


The Energy Audit Module

This module carries out an automated energy audit for your building and home.  Depending on your energy goals, this can be a quick scan of a part of your building or a comprehensive and detailed audit.  Whatever your goals, the audit will produce a roadmap that shows how to achieve energy savings over a period of time. The audit will also take into account expenditures for your current and future supply of electricity and gas to ensure that your future supply will decrease over time on its way to zero.  During this process, the app will help you build a user profile so that you can  add more detail or update any recent changes.  The app will tell you when and where more information is needed to make smart decisions - saving you time and ensuring the most accurate results.    

Calculation Tool Module

This module will serve as the 'brain' of the Path To Zero and encompass the business intelligence and the data algorithms that our App will be based on.  Here we apply our expertise to match proven products and solutions with the information gained during your energy audit to deliver the following outputs:

A Path To Zero Plan: you will be presented with an clean energy investment roadmap consisting of all the major solutions pertaining to appliances, lighting, heating, insulation, and monitoring with an expected return on investment. All of the necessary maintenance, insurance, guarantees and administrative services will also be included.  Whether you are ready to take a few simple steps or make major building improvements, we have a plan for you!

Energy Budget: the App will calculate the fixed monthly energy budget that will be required for you to attain the optimal energy savings, much like a clean energy mortgage.  An initial investment can be used to accelerate your Path To Zero and achieve the maximum energy savings right away.  You will be able to adjust the budget at any time and watch how the priority of your investments and your path to energy independence change - putting you in complete control.

Marketplace Module

This module will consist of a database of all local suppliers and vendors. The App will link each of the solutions that are outlined in your Path To Zero plan to a supplier/vendor. All selected suppliers and vendors will have the opportunity to plug into this module and present their solutions with specific pricing and technical specifications. The module will then link you with the best suppliers. This way you will always get the lowest price and highest quality available with all measures and costs reported on a monthly or quarterly invoice.  The module will also be intelligent enough to continually monitor the real time pricing of energy and subsequently switch your energy supplier based on the lowest energy price at any given time (if this is possible in your region). 

Monitoring Module

This module is where we will monitor your energy consumption in real time.  This level of monitoring affords you intelligent insights with respect to where you stand on the Path To Zero roadmap.  You will also receive alert messages when your energy consumption is higher than personalised benchmarks set for daily, weekly, and monthly periods. You will be able to view any related invoices with as much detail as you desire i.e. energy budget, energy supply/consumption, and solution implementation costs.            

Gamification and Social Media Module 

This module will provide the opportunity to engage in social sharing and community building activities. The App will make it fun to share your Path To Zero progress via games and social media. Features here could include options and tips that will speed up your Path To Zero, incentives and badges for successful implementations, and a carbon calculator for making comparisons with your ‘energy peers’.


Our Commitment


It is the independence, ownership, and empowerment of our customers that drives our commitment to building an app that will bring power to the people. We envision the Path To Zero as a platform and BAS as a service provider. Our chief tasks are to match supply and demand through our platform, take away all complexities of gaining energy independence, and ensure a seamless Path To Zero for all energy users.

We currently serve around 5,500 commercial buildings and residences. Four years after our start in 2010, using our own investments, we have annual revenues over €12 million and employ a full time team of 15+ highly skilled co-workers who ensure the delivery and further development of the Path to Zero.  Our efforts were further recognized when our proposal to scale this concept to serve entire communities won the People's Choice and Judge's Special Commendation at the 2014 Climate CoLab Challenge, an international sustainability competition hosted by MIT.

When scaled up to the level of neighbourhoods or communities, the Path to Zero will empower people to have durable ownership over their energy needs and provide a self-financing solution to transit into a world that runs on clean energy. For a city like Rotterdam, our organisation’s home, this would result in 850 million tons of CO2 saved – the equivalent emissions of over 100 million cars per year. Now imagine if we were able to take our solution to your house or your building and then to your community followed by your neighbourhood and eventually your city. 

We will develop an international platform that accelerates the energy transition, facilitate a community that helps its members connect and work together, and provide suppliers and partners with a platform where they will automatically be able to sell their best products for the best prices.  

We are fully committed to investing the time, energy and resources to implement the Path To Zero in households, neighbourhoods and cities across the world.  

                      

Risks & Challenges

If we do not reach our goal of 100K, your money will still be used to push this project forward.  We will work to honour all of the perks awarded to our backers.

We will always, and only, make more money as our customers consume less energy. This business strategy is disruptive and innovative – it is the true blue ocean. The vast majority of all energy produced comes from non-renewable sources and there is a lot of debate and pushback on freeing the world from fossil fuels and giving ownership of the energy assets back to the customer. Our model is based on empowering people to attain energy independence and is driven by the belief that free access to energy is an inalienable right and should be adopted in the Universal Declaration of Human Rights.


Ways You Can Help

•  Fund us as we start the process of developing the Path To Zero App

•  Share this link on Facebook, Twitter and other social media

•  Support us and become our ambassadors as we continue to bring customers on the Path To Zero

•  Tell your family, your friends and the world about what we are doing

•  View and share our Path to Zero video with your social network

story:
Get $ Just For Sharing This Campaign - please go to the bottom of this page for details.

Don’t worry about running out of power again!

The ONE THING is the only charger you need.  It is the most powerful and versatile portable charger and back up battery for ALL your mobile devices.  Charges 2 devices at the same time.  Or one while you talk or walk.

  • Dense Lithium Battery Technology allows extra power in a smaller size. Capacity of 10,000 mAh can power up to 4 smartphones or tablets.
  • Super Charge up to 1% per minute (depending on device battery size)
  • It recharges by flipping out the built-in AC plug and just plugging into any AC outlet (110 to 220 V).  No more begging for USB chargers.

     

  • Built-in micro USB charging cable and extra USB port powers any 2 things with a USB charging cable, such as iPhone, iPad, powered headphones. 

  • Small pocket size package: size of a cigarette pack 4" x 2.5" x 7/8", 7 ounces.

We will now include adapters for All iPhone and iPad connectors, and 1 ONE STIK basic charging cable at N/C. 

  

Comparison ONE THING Power Banks
Dense Lithium Battery Y
Super Charge 1% Per Minute Y
Charge Most Smartphones 300 to 400% 50 to 200%
Charge Tablets Y Y
Built-in Micro USB Output Cable Y
iPhone / iPad Adapters External
Auto On/Off Y *
Walk and Charge Y
LED power indicator Y *
Simultaneous Charging Y
Power check switch Y *
Internal Battery Capacity mAh 10,000 up to 6,000
Recharged Via Flip Out AC Plug USB
Fits inside Pocket Bags
Thickness Cigarette Pack Up to 1 inch
Charge 2 Devices At Once Y *
Extra USB Power Port Y *
Retail Price $59.99 Up to $89.99
* Some

Delivery Schedule

No crazy 6 - 12 month wait for delivery.  We will start shipping 30-45 days after the goal is reached, or campaign ends.

Perks (simple choices) 

The ONE THING Anywhere Charger will retail for $60.  

For Indiegogo contributors, we will now include FREE adapters for all iPhone/iPads ($10 retail), and 1 ONE STIK charging cable ($15 retail).

  • First 100 units @ $35 with free USA shipping.  Outside USA + $10
  • After that, it will be @ $40 
  • Get 2 for $70
  • Bulk 10 pack $350

Development of ONE THING Anywhere Charger

Hi, my name is Michele.  I was in an airport working on my tablet, when the low battery warning came on.  My back up battery charger was good for only 30 minutes, and I didn't have my AC charger to recharge it or my tablet.

Luckily, we work with engineers that specialized in mobile phone power solutions, and they found a new design and stuffed in a Dense Lithium battery that is about 2 -4 X more powerful than other "power banks".   More importantly, it has built-in AC plugs and 2 power outputs.

Right now, we are ready to go and already paid for an initial small run of 500 units, but to get the costs down, we need to make at least 2,000 units.

We need help from you:

  • Get the word out about this amazingly useful charger
  • Your contributions will help us buy more components to make more units and get our costs down
  • Use and test the ONE THING and let us know how to improve it
Who We Are

Smart Qi Power was started by mobile device fanatics, users, and engineers to design and make products that we would use ourselves.

The first products that we designed and produced were the iTablet wireless chargers for iPad Air and iPad Mini.  The first run of 6,000 sets were sold out and then we worked on the 2nd generation wireless charger products for Apple and Samsung Galaxy phones.   Our Indiegogo campaign for the Samsung Galaxy wireless chargers was over 700% of goal after 12 days.  http://igg.me/at/freewirelesschargers/x/7709770

Smart Qi Power in the news

We will be transparent and update regularly.  

Our principle is honesty.  If there are negative comments about any problems with our products, delivery, or anything at all, we will NOT hide them and will address them openly.  

Risks to you

We have been very open and transparent with our other products and campaigns.  We have no fancy claims, disclaimers, videos, etc.  

We will deliver and make good on every contribution and perk because we believe in treating funders and customers just as we like to be treated.

Get $ Just For Sharing This Campaign

We’d love to reward you and give you Wireless Chargers, Car Chargers, Portable Chargers for free-just for a few seconds to help spread the word about our campaign. 

How It Works

Sign up on Indiegogo.com and you will be assigned your own ID number.  Then click the Link button under the video to get your unique link to share online, or click on one of the Facebook or Twitter buttons.  

We will match up your referrals at the end of the campaign and credit you $3 for each contribution referred by you.

For more details: http://www.smartqipower.com/Rewards.html

Thank you for looking and please help us spread the word!

Your contributions will help us buy more components to make more units and get our costs down
Use and test the ONE THING and let us know how to improve it




Who We AreSmart Qi Power was started by mobile device fanatics, users, and engineers to design and make products that we would use ourselves.The first products that we designed and produced were the iTablet wireless chargers for iPad Air and iPad Mini.  The first run of 6,000 sets were sold out and then we worked on the 2nd generation wireless charger products for Apple and Samsung Galaxy phones.   Our Indiegogo campaign for the Samsung Galaxy wireless chargers was over 700% of goal after 12 days.  http://igg.me/at/freewirelesschargers/x/7709770Smart Qi Power in the newsWe will be transparent and update regularly.  Our principle is honesty.  If there are negative comments about any problems with our products, delivery, or anything at all, we will NOT hide them and will address them openly.  Risks to youWe have been very open and transparent with our other products and campaigns.  We have no fancy claims, disclaimers, videos, etc.  We will deliver and make good on every contribution and perk because we believe in treating funders and customers just as we like to be treated.Get $ Just For Sharing This CampaignWe’d love to reward you and give you Wireless Chargers, Car Chargers, Portable Chargers for free-just for a few seconds to help spread the word about our campaign. How It WorksSign up on Indiegogo.com and you will be assigned your own ID number.  Then click the Link button under the video to get your unique link to share online, or click on one of the Facebook or Twitter buttons.  We will match up your referrals at the end of the campaign and credit you $3 for each contribution referred by you.For more details: http://www.smartqipower.com/Rewards.htmlThank you for looking and please help us spread the word!

story:
CellMegaPhone: a new version of handsfree

A simple way to use your phone without the need of extra electronics. Make phone calls or listen to music anywhere.  Put your phone in an easy to find spot in your car.

 

Simplicity

The CellMegaPhone is an all plastic acoustic amplifier that requires no power or cables to enhance the speaker on your phone. The design is not phone specific so that most phones will fit inside. It is molded into a single piece which is then assembled with a belt clip.

 

      

 

Convenient

Easily find your phone in the car, no more digging it out of your pocket or searching through your purse while it is ringing.  Drop the phone in when you get into your car and enjoy your drive while you wait for a call or listen to music.

 

 

 

 

 

Versatile

Since it is lightweight and requires no power of any kind, the CellMegaPhone can be used anywhere to make phone calls or play music. Attach it to your seat belt while in the car or to your side bag while on the run. There are not many limitations on the places it can be used.

 

   

Don’t Strain your neck while doing business on the go or saying farewell to a loved one use your cell megaphone free up your hands, don’t drop your phone and minimize neck strain while using your phone. 

 

    

Hands full carrying your bundles of joy but still need to make a call? No problem!! Attach the cell megaphone to your side bag and speak freely without dropping your phone or even worse your precious cargo. 

 

  

The ALL Clear CellMegaPhone allows you to enjoy videos while amplifying the sound. 

 

Key Features

  • Universal: Most phones, smart or flip, will fit into and be amplified.
  • Amplify: The conical shape amplifies the sound coming from the phone as well as the voice of the user.
  • Clarify: Eliminates road and surrounding noises to create a clearer conversation.
  • Lightweight: The entire assembly weighs less than 3 ounces.
  • Does Not Slide: The belt clip is designed to slip on and off the seatbelt easily without sliding up and down.
  • Ease of Use: Simply put your phone on speakerphone and enjoy the conversation.
  • No Batteries: There is nothing to remember to charge.
  • No Cables: Nothing to plug in or pair up.
  • No Bluetooth: No connection loss between your phone and device.

 

Specs

Dimensions - 5-1/4” tall X 3-1/2” Wide X 2” Deep

Weight – 3oz

 

Who we are

The main developers of the CellMegaPhone are Miguel Orozco and Adam McLaughlin.  All of the people involved in this project work in other jobs and other industries.  We have come together to create a way for everyone to have a hands free option no matter how tech savvy they are.  The original idea came from Miguel Orozco as a way to eliminate all the headaches of Bluetooth and still use the phone hands free.  Adam worked alongside Miguel, designing and modifying until the right shape and sound was found.  After months of prototypes and tens of  thousands of dollars spent in development we are ready to go to production.

 

Why Indiegogo?

We need your help to raise enough money to finish the molds, develop the packaging and produce enough to start selling in stores.

We feel we have a product everyone can benefit from and that everyone needs therefore we like to give you an opportunity to help  raise enough money to finish the molds, finish the development of  the packaging and produce enough to start selling in stores.

 

How we will use the funds

We have already put half the money down on building the molds to produce the CellMegaPhone.  We need to complete the molds, develop the packaging, and make our first run of production units.

We have invested over half of the funds needed to get the CellMegaPhone into the hands of you and your loved ones. We are now creating an opportunity for you to be a part of something exciting. The funds raised will go towards completing the molds, completing the development of the packaging  to then produce the CellMegaPhone and get it to you.

 

Additional Videos

How To

Car Demonstration

Stages of Development

story:
UPDATE

The iTarget campaign was a success!   It's not too late to order iTarget.  You can order yours from our website at www.iTargetPro.com 


The Plastic Injection mold for the iTarget Sled.



The Idea

Like many Americans, I own a gun for home protection.  It usually sits in a gun safe, locked away and out of sight.  I like shooting for fun and practice, but I rarely find time in my busy day to get to the gun range.  Also, as the price of ammo has increased, so has the expense of going to the range.   I was looking for a safe way to train at home, but living in the city of Los Angeles, my options were limited.


Firearm training systems that use lasers instead of live bullets seemed like the answer.   There are multiple Laser Training Systems on the market.  As I researched, I was surprised at how limited and expensive these systems were.  Some of the more complex systems went for well over $1000, while the cheaper hardware targeting systems lacked features and still sold for over $300.

Being an app developer,  I saw an opportunity to build an app capable of functioning like these much more expensive Laser Training systems.  I went to work and created the first iTarget app, "BULLSEYE".


After the first App was created, I started demonstrating it for friends and family.  My wife was able to overcome her fear of guns by using iTarget with a Laser Bullet instead of live ammo.  As I watched my wife and her friends enjoy target shooting for the first time, I knew I had developed a product that everyone could enjoy. 
I also knew that this was a product that gun owners would LOVE!  Using a 3D printer, I built the prototype of the iTarget sled to hold the target and the phone in optimal positions for the App to work.   The sled is designed to acoustically amplify the gun shot sound and allows for multi-directional movement to adjust for the  viewing angle of the phone's camera.  The iTarget System is patent pending.


What You Get and How It Works

A complete iTarget system consists of three parts - A Laser Bullet, the iTarget App and the iTarget Sled.  It works with your actual firearm.  
The iTarget Sled 

The iTarget sled holds the shooting target and your phone in such a way that the phone's camera has a clear full screen view of the target.  The sled adjusts to grip any size phone.  The target distance is adjustable to compensate for different phone cameras.  You adjust the sled to fill the Phone's display with the image of the target.

The sled comes with three different shooting targets, one for each of the upcoming apps.   You can also print out any image you'd like on standard 8.5" x 11" paper and use it for target practice with good results.  


The Laser Bullet
The iTarget Laser Bullet is shaped like a real bullet and is inserted into the chamber of the gun.  The snap-cap style design does not damage the weapon.  The Laser Bullets are rimless, so they are not ejected by the gun after each shot.  When the trigger is pulled, the firing pin strikes the hard rubber back of the Laser Bullet, causing it to fire a laser beam at the target.  

The iTarget Laser Bullets are currently available in
 9mm - .380 ACP - 38 Special - .40 S&W - .45 ACP and .223
If you contribute to this campaign and get a perk that includes a Laser Bullet, we will send out an email asking you which caliber(s) you would like before shipping them.


The Upcoming iTarget App

The iTarget Pro app is now available for Android and IOS.  Search for it on the App Store and Google Play.
There are links to download the app on our website at www.iTargetPro.com
The Bullseye App will be offered free of charge.  Other training modes will be available for $4.99 each through in-app purchase.

BULLSEYE allows you to shoot an unlimited number of shots at a standard scoring target.  It keeps track of the total score while showing you clearly were each shot hit.  It also counts the number of shots fired and lets you enter the distance you are shooting from.  If you shoot well and want to share with your friends, you can save the results to your phone's camera roll.  This app and it's functionality is seen in the demonstration video for this campaign.

QUICK DRAW is meant to test your speed as well as your accuracy.  Once the game starts, the App will wait a random number of seconds before it says "DRAW!"  Once the command to draw is given, a timer starts counting to measure how fast you can react and shoot the target.   Each shot is displayed on the phone's screen, with your reaction time directly under it.  The game ends after 10 shots are fired.  You can also save your fastest times to your phone's camera roll.

HI SCORE is a challenge that will push your limits of consistent shooting skill.  The target consists of 5 numbered circles.  The app will call out a number, and you have 2 seconds to hit that circle.  Each hit adds 1 point to your score.  One miss and it's game over.  The challenge is to see how high you can go before you miss.  Like the other apps, you can save your final score to the camera roll. 
With all of these Apps, one very cool feature is the ability to use an Apple TV or, for Android, a Google Chromecast to see your phone's screen live on your TV as you shoot.  This is demonstrated in the campaign video.  


Successfully Funded

We've reached our campaign goal, and are now shipping products.  It's not too late to order iTarget.  You can order yours from our website at www.iTargetPro.com  

The plastic injection mold for the iTarget Sled.


FAQ

Isn't dry firing bad for your gun?

Dry fire that hurts a weapon is when you pull the trigger and there is nothing for the firing pin to hit.  The retaining pin absorbs the impact and over time, this retaining pin can get worn and eventually break.  When using a snap cap - or in this case, a laser bullet - the firing pin hits the hard rubber back of the laser bullet which absorbs the impact.  There is no damage to the weapon.

How does the Laser Bullet not get ejected?

The Laser Bullet is designed without a rim.  Without a rim, the ejector pin has nothing to grab onto.   To remove the Laser Bullet, you have to push it out with a pencil or cleaning rod.

What about  recoil?

Dry fire training does not have recoil.   Managing recoil is only one aspect of becoming a better marksman.  Trigger control and sight management are two important components that can be improved through dry fire training. 

 Dry fire training is used by the FBI, the US military, police departments and competitive shooters.  In an interview with world champion marksman Robert Vogel, he was asked,  "How often do you dry fire?"

He answers, "In one form or another, just about every day. For sheer skill building I feel it has no equal. For every live round that I actually fire, I probably mimic that round eight to 10 times in dry fire."

Here’s the article:  http://www.personaldefenseworld.com/2014/05/11-questions-shooting-pro-robert-vogel/

Here’s some more info on the benefits of dry fire training:

http://www.thetruthaboutguns.com/2013/09/daniel-zimmerman/seven-suggestions-effective-dry-fire-practice/

https://www.sigsauer.com/upFiles/CmsContent/documents/Dry%20Practice_FINAL.pdf

Do you have to rack the gun each time?

In dry fire practice, there is no explosion of gunpowder so the slide does not get automatically racked.  With a single action weapon like a Glock or a 1911 style weapon, you need to manually charge the weapon for the next shot.

If you use a double action weapon, you can continue to shoot without charging the weapon.  This Video demonstrates using iTarget with a Double Action weapon - the CZ 75B and answers a couple of the FAQ's


How Accurate is it?

There are two factors to the accuracy - the Laser Bullet itself shooting perfectly straight and the App's ability to accurately detect the hit.  The company we are manufacturing Laser Bullets with has been making bore sights and assures me about the quality.  They adjust each laser bullet to make it precise and straight before shipment.  I've had the opportunity to test a few samples and have been pleased with their accuracy so far.

The second factor that determines accuracy is the App's ability to detect the laser hit on the target.  This is determined by the user and how the settings are adjusted.  It can be perfectly accurate when adjusted properly.  We are working on an algorithm to automate this by the time the final version of the app is available.  The accuracy of the App can be seen in this video. 


What is the range?
I can't give you a definite number of yards because there are several factors which affect the range.  I've shot at 60 ft with a handgun, and will be doing tests with a rifle soon to try to try to get a better answer.  The app  doesn't care whether you are 10ft or 100 yards away, it is simply looking for the red laser to show up on the target.  Lasers can go for hundreds of yards and still be seen - so it becomes a factor of how bright that laser is when it hits the target.  Unless you live in a very large mansion, you won't hit the limits of range unless you are outdoors.  Being outdoors creates an additional problem because sunlight on the target washes out the laser light hitting the target and makes it difficult for the app to distinguish the laser mark.  I've used it outdoors, but it must be in the shade.  At night, it would likely work for over a hundred yards, but that hasn't been tested yet.

When will it be shipped?

We are just waiting on delivery of the products, then we will start shipping.  

When will the Android version be available?

The Android version is finished.  It is available on the Google Play store.

Can I use a different Target?

The target is an 8.5x11 sheet of paper.  You could print out anything you want and slide it into the target holder.  In testing, it works best when it's black lines on white paper.  Hits in a dark area, like a solid black bullseye, can be more difficult for the App to detect.  

Please Like and Share this Campaign!

story:
LAVA. The First Protective Case for Apple Watch. 

We all are counting days until Apple Watch launches in early 2015.
Right now we are excited to introduce to you our creation of a premium protective system that accurate engineered and well manufactured to match quality and style of Apple Watch. LAVA case is the product that we will be proud to put our name on as creators and you will be proud to show your friends and explore your favorite sports and physical activities with. 

Apple Watch allows you to keep track of your body's reactions while exercising or in extreme situation, measuring your heartbeat, calories youʼve burned, or another physical activities you perform through the day and Lava Case will help you to get this experience to the new level.

LAVA case transforms Apple Watch into an organic looking, highly-protected device - the system that can read your body's information in any environment while doing casual sport activities, or enjoying your adrenaline rush in extreme situations: underwater while diving, catching the highest waves while surfing, exploring a new hill while mountain biking, checking an amplitude heights of your jump while snowboarding. You can experience even more adrenaline rush and less stress for your Apple Watch knowing that they are protected by LAVA Case.

We are using only the high-quality materials: ballistic polymer, carbon fiber, anodized aluminum, stainless steel, silicon straps and pillow inside of the case to fully protect your Apple Watch from water, dust, scratches.

LAVA case protects display in the front and the sensors in the back with Corning® Gorilla® Glass - the ideal cover sheet with outstanding performance and durability. It allows display respond accurate and sensitive to a touch of your finger while protecting its surface from harsh environment, so you can control your Apple Watch under any circumstances. This means that now you don't need to stop in front of the challenge and you can explore it in any way since display is protected by the strongest polymer available on the market.

The straps are made of a soft premium quality silicon that will keep your LAVA case comfortably fixed on your hand.

We have been living with the dream of engineering this protective case and make the project come to life for the past few months and we decided to make it happen together with the community of people that might want to share our idea and excitement of a new product here on INDIEGOGO. On INDIEGOGO we make our own rules and give chances to amazing products all together believing in something greater than we already have.

We also have created special rewards and an INDIEGOGO Limited Edition LAVA case that will be available only for INDIEGOGO backers and NEVER at the retailers. This is the great opportunity to get an exclusive Limited Edition LAVA Case and stand out from the crowd. This Limited Edition product has a unique bright-green color and we also will engrave by laser your name on it.

We make design, we engineer the case, but because of you, INDIEGOGO, this project is going to happen. You are an important part of it and will be able to follow every step and have exclusive access to behind the scene video materials from the process of engineering to manufacturing.

Apple Watch is the product to wait for, and LAVA Case is the product to be excited about. They compliment each other and work greater together.
The case is environmentally safe, fully waterproof, so you can live even a healthier life. LAVA Case will be available for Apple Watch both sizes 38mm and 42mm.

At this moment we have computer generated render of the product, and with funding we are going to make the first sample and share it with INDIEGOGO community before the mass production. With your support we are targeting to ship LAVA Case to Backers by the end of April 2015, it's about two months since the launch of Apple Watch. So we have time to fully test it in really harsh environment and you will be the only one to see our journey for this product to be made.

You Can Create the Future. If the project get $160,000 funding we have intentions to develop amazing animated watchfaces to match the style of your personal activity and your LAVA Case which you will be the first to able to download from our website. We will ship your case with a unique serial number - personal access to Limited Edition watchfaces as a single download available only to INDIEGOGO backers.

You help us to make this product to come to reality and we say THANK YOU! Every single backer, will be posted on our website. So it makes you one of us - creators of a great product to be involved in life of every person who love physical activities, extreme sports, and just simply healthy life style. LAVA Case is a premium quality product for active, life-curious, technology-lovers.

Our belief is that life can be even more amazing by doing great products and can be more enjoyable by using them. Your support is the most important criteria to us, everything else is to be taken care by us.

We are very excited to announce the beginning of this campaign and hoping that you are inspired to support our project. Also, your friends might not know that in 2015 there will be available LAVA Case - The First Protective System for Apple Watch, please share this news with your friends, that in the next few months we will be turning the product into a reality:

A different case can really change the mood of your day and boost your physical activity.

Which LAVA Case will you chose to reflect your nature?

Thank you very much for your support!


Risks and Challenges 

We take this campaign especially serious because it's our first project on INDIEGOGO, and we believe that the very first project represents the whole future works, and we have a few more very exciting inventions to present and make them a reality.

We believe that the hardest detail in this project is the deadline. Since Apple Watch are coming in early 2015 we are doing everything for the LAVA Case to be launched at the closest day with Apple Watch so you can enjoy both of the most desirable products at the same time. During that period we are going to finish engineering and preparing 98% of our work, so when Apple Watch is being launched, we will need a minimum amount of days (10 - 14) to adjust sizes and finish quality tests to ensure that LAVA Case is manufactured to the highest quality standards.

During the mass production of our product it may be possible to delay our intended delivery to the backers since there is no fixed date of Apple Watch to be launched yet. We well keep our backers with all the updates consistently so you can be in the track of our project.

We would like to thank you in advance for your support, interest and believe in our product. 

Lets make it happen together!


_____________________________________________________________________________Apple Watch not included. Apple Watch, Apple logo are registered trademarks of Apple Inc. Product still in development, some features are subject to change.
story_txt:
LAVA. The First Protective Case for Apple Watch. 






We all are counting days until Apple Watch launches in early 2015.
Right now we are excited to introduce to you our creation of a premium protective system
that accurate engineered and well manufactured to match quality and style of Apple
Watch. LAVA case is the product that we will be proud to put our name on as creators
and you will be proud to show your friends and explore your favorite sports and physical
activities with. 







Apple Watch allows you to keep track of your body's reactions while exercising or in
extreme situation, measuring your heartbeat, calories youʼve burned, or another
physical activities you perform through the day and Lava Case will help you to get this
experience to the new level.

LAVA case transforms Apple Watch into an organic looking, highly-protected device -
the system that can read your body's information in any environment while doing casual
sport activities, or enjoying your adrenaline rush in extreme situations: underwater while
diving, catching the highest waves while surfing, exploring a new hill while mountain
biking, checking an amplitude heights of your jump while snowboarding. You can
experience even more adrenaline rush and less stress for your Apple Watch knowing
that they are protected by LAVA Case.




We are using only the high-quality materials: ballistic polymer, carbon fiber, anodized
aluminum, stainless steel, silicon straps and pillow inside of the case to fully protect
your Apple Watch from water, dust, scratches.

LAVA case protects display in the front and the sensors in the back with Corning®
Gorilla® Glass - the ideal cover sheet with outstanding performance and durability. It
allows display respond accurate and sensitive to a touch of your finger while protecting
its surface from harsh environment, so you can control your Apple Watch under any
circumstances. This means that now you don't need to stop in front of the challenge and
you can explore it in any way since display is protected by the strongest polymer
available on the market.




The straps are made of a soft premium quality silicon that will keep your LAVA case
comfortably fixed on your hand.

We have been living with the dream of engineering this protective case and make the
project come to life for the past few months and we decided to make it happen together
with the community of people that might want to share our idea and excitement of a new
product here on INDIEGOGO. On INDIEGOGO we make our own rules and give
chances to amazing products all together believing in something greater than we
already have.




We also have created special rewards and an INDIEGOGO Limited Edition LAVA case
that will be available only for INDIEGOGO backers and NEVER at the retailers. This is
the great opportunity to get an exclusive Limited Edition LAVA Case and stand out from the crowd. This Limited Edition product has a unique bright-green color and we also will
engrave by laser your name on it.








We make design, we engineer the case, but because of you, INDIEGOGO, this project
is going to happen. You are an important part of it and will be able to follow every step
and have exclusive access to behind the scene video materials from the process of
engineering to manufacturing.

Apple Watch is the product to wait for, and LAVA Case is the product to be excited
about. They compliment each other and work greater together.
The case is environmentally safe, fully waterproof, so you can live even a healthier life.
LAVA Case will be available for Apple Watch both sizes 38mm and 42mm.




At this moment we have computer generated render of the product, and with funding we
are going to make the first sample and share it with INDIEGOGO community before the
mass production. With your support we are targeting to ship LAVA Case to Backers by
the end of April 2015, it's about two months since the launch of Apple Watch. So we
have time to fully test it in really harsh environment and you will be the only one to see
our journey for this product to be made.




You Can Create the Future. If the project get $160,000 funding we have intentions to
develop amazing animated watchfaces to match the style of your personal activity and
your LAVA Case which you will be the first to able to download from our website. We will
ship your case with a unique serial number - personal access to Limited Edition
watchfaces as a single download available only to INDIEGOGO backers.




You help us to make this product to come to reality and we say THANK YOU! Every
single backer, will be posted on our website. So it makes you one of us - creators of a
great product to be involved in life of every person who love physical activities, extreme
sports, and just simply healthy life style. LAVA Case is a premium quality product for
active, life-curious, technology-lovers.




Our belief is that life can be even more amazing by doing great products and can be more
enjoyable by using them. Your support is the most important criteria to us, everything
else is to be taken care by us.

We are very excited to announce the beginning of this campaign and hoping that you
are inspired to support our project. Also, your friends might not know that in 2015 there

into a reality:








A different case can really change the mood of your day and boost your physical activity.

Thank you very much for your support!

Risks and Challenges 
We take this campaign especially serious because it's our first project on INDIEGOGO, and we believe that the very first project represents the whole future works, and we have a few more very exciting inventions to present and make them a reality.


We believe that the hardest detail in this project is the deadline. story:
What is it all about?

We had the idea of giving people a tool that would tell them if a picture is real or fake. So we put some money into developing our app called "Tru-Data Cam" for iOS and Android.

This free app adds image authentication to your smartphone. It provides your photo with a unique fingerprint the moment you take the picture. So you can prove the authenticity of your photo. Important: Tru-Data Cam App works completely on your smartphone. It does NOT transfer any photo or user data to our server. The process is absolutely confidential and anonymous. Check out the website www.tru-data.com.

Try it. The app is online. Go see the App Store or Google Play.

You can use this app for example in a very serious situation like a car accident.


What we need now:

This app is great. But its function needs to be certified to enable people to use it in real life. We need some more security features to combat hackers. And we need to secure the database thru mirroring and multi level backups on several servers. Next step would be to a get a certificate and to make this service audit proof. The aim is to get Tru-Data Cam photos accepted as evidence when dealing with officials, lawyers and in court. 

Our next steps:
- Software enhancement to make the app itself even more tamper-proof.
- Certification for data transfer from app to our server.
- Certification that the data on the server is unviolable.
- Press and media work to spread the news.


The possible future:

Our plans are to make a professional version of Tru-Data Cam. Still keeping the free one but also providing a more complex version and license and/or sell it for a reasonable price. We want to combine it with a membership fee. We will add a video function. We will make it work user-based to have everything linked with the user’s identity. Our final goal is to offer the professional software on a membership basis and also as a simple box product you can buy. There will be different types of memberships, with limitations on the number of pictures and videos, or maybe the length of time picture and video information is stored.

Also, we are planning to have a platform running showing many, many real photos and videos. That will be our “news of the world” with a “no-fake” guarantee.


What successful funding will do:

Basis:
We still have about 2,500 EUR in our start-up fund but that is not enough for step 1. This is why we are asking for your support for step 1.

Step 1:
The initial crowdfunding goal of 2,500 EUR will secure the modifications of the software and server costs for 1 year. During this year we will look for more sponsors and investors to finance the next steps.

Step 2:
If we somehow manage to collect an additional 10,000 EUR then we will be able to get the complete process and the database certified.

Step 3:
Additional 5,000 EUR will make us fly. We could easily have the professional version programmed, sell it to the world and finally give something back to all our supporters.


There are more ways you can help:

Talk about it. Post the app to all your friends. Spread the word. You never know! Maybe there are more people out there who love the idea as much as we do.


Our perks for you:

We will list all backers on our website (but ask them first). We will do this in the three categories “Walk”, “Run” and “Fly” using different font sizes.

We will give them free software once the professional software is available. See the details within the list of perks on the side. Important: Please understand that there will be no software and no counter-value for you if we get stuck before step 3. Therefore our perks are all based on low amounts of money. If you like to get involved with really high numbers, please talk to us.

story:
The charger which is loaded in few minutes!




How does it work?


We have designed a new Plug-in connector.

This is important for an adequate power supply. We need 40Ampere with a switch regulator, to load the battery.

You will get two connectors.

Type A, mostly in the USA

Type C, mostly in EU

Here a list of all types

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mains_electricity_by_country

Switch the connector and take it in the case with you, easy and comfortable.






Development!

We have redesigned our case and the board, and now we are finished with the design-process.

Now we have implemented the power-supply and the connector, this results in a smaller battery.


Here the redesign on the pc.


Then we went to the production of the case and of the board.

Now we are ready for the mass production.

Technical details:




Production:




Why should you support us?


A good question, we have an idea and a functional prototype, what we need is money to enhance our logistic and to produce moul for the mass production the rest is done.

You can be sure we will work, as hard as we can to realize our dream.
Anyone get a chance in his life, we are determined to use this
opportunity.

A huge thanks in advance to all which support us, whether with an order, or with advertising.

Thank you!


Strech goals:


What you get in one package!

  • 1 Hypri.X Charger
  • 2 Connectors (120V and 220V)
  • 1 USB-microUSB cable
  • 1 80pin adapter


Perks

Note, all prices are inclusive shipping!



Timetable

We plan our production in series from our suppliers in overseas, one for the circuit board, another for the case and the third one for the batteries.

The final packaging is done by us.

Our main responsibility is the prototyping process(done), the production templates(not done) and the quality control, especially on the batteries.

What we need to do!

  • production templates

  • organize shipping

  • beta test production

  • production

  • packaging shipping



What the money is used for?



Team:

Our team includes 5 freelancers, everyone of these has his own main competence.

Three of these stand for the project and invest every minute of the day, to push the project forward.


Alexander Schagerl

A chemical process engineer, which later works as software developer. He has the idea for the design of the new accu. Now he is the masterbrain behind Hypri.X.


Gerhard Bachler

An electrical-engineer, which now works as tutor for mechatronics. He is the first person for questions about technicals problems. He is also the centre of our team, every if we think we are at a dead end, he smiles and motivate the hole team to work harder, and bring in the strengthen personal.



Mirko Jahnke

A bachelor of logistic, he brings a lot of knowledge about the organizational part. Without him we would have not the contacts, which we need to bring the project to success.



FAQS

How many charge cycles withstand the Hypri.X?

That's different, on average, are 1000 cycles no problem.

Do I need an adapter if I live in the usa, to use it?

No, there are an adapter included for 110V.

What cost me the shipping?

Shipping is included!

Why cost the Hypri.X more than a compareble charger?

The Hypri.X has a new type of batterie used, which we need
seperatley produced in small series.



Warnings

  • Never try to open the battery case or make your own repairs.

  • Do not expose to rain or moisture.

  • Keep away from moisture and humidity.

  • Do not expose the battery to high temperatures.

  • Do not charge the battery with anything but the recommend AC charger.

Challenge:

Such a project is a challenge, we understand that the backers want her product as quickly as possible. Only is the quality control at the top spot for us.
We are confident to abide by the schedule.

story:
Imagine recording a singing bird with a smartphone app and it tells you what that bird is. With Twigle it's as simple as that! It pretty much does for bird sounds what Shazam or SoundHound do for music by identifying birds by their songs and calls within seconds. 

Development of Twigle  began with a $26,000 grant from AppCampus (a joint project of Microsoft and Aalto University).

We released the minimum viable product of the app on the Apple Store in September 2014 and on Windows Phone Store in April 2014, where it has had thousands of downloads and great reviews with an average of 4+ star ratings.

We will be releasing Twigle on Android in December 2014.

Currently we are now working on refining the the accuracy with which Twigle is able to identify birds.

With your help we can greatly improve the recognition accuracy of Twigle and radically enhance your birding experience. 

The goal of this project is to improve the accuracy of Twigle so that the correct bird is in the top 3 results 90% of the time. Currently for the 50 most common birds Twigle is able to put the correct bird in the top 10.


//// What We Need & What You Get

    Your financial support will help cover the expenses for the optimisations needed to refine our algorithms for audio recognition. These include:
    • Paying developers who will work on increasing the accuracy of our audio processing software.
    • Buying lots of coffee for the geeks!
    • Purchasing high quality recordings of bird songs and calls that we use in the training of the system.
    • Acquiring licences for other algorithms that we can incorporate to improve our own.

    After making your contribution you can claim a perk that matches your level of funding from those listed in the right hand column. 


    //// Twigle in the Media


     

     


    //// Risks & Challenges

    We know that we are working with technology that is at the frontiers of research, which is why we have set a realistic target of identifying birds only among the 50 most common birds for Europe and North America (there two separate sets of 50 birds for each of the regions). 

    We have already published a working app that is in the hands of thousands of real birders who are giving positive feedback about the success of the app. Along the way we have identified ways in which we can improve our original implementation and we are continuing to search for more refinements.


    //// About Avelgood Apps

    Avelgood Apps was incorporated in 2008 and started off developing a commercial package of mathematical and statistically functions targeted at scientific and technical computing programmers. We started developing and publishing mobile apps in 2012 and to date have gotten over 9 million downloads. Our apps are available on several platforms including iPhone, Windows Phone, Nokia Asha and Twigle will soon also be available on Android.


      //// Other Ways You Can Help

      Please help us get the word out about our game changing app and fundraiser by sharing our campaign page!

      1. Share this campaign on Facebook, Twitter or email with others who may be interested in supporting Twigle by using the share tools at the top of this article.
      2. Like our Facebook Page and follow us on Twitter @AvelgoodApps.
      3. Download Twigle from Windows Phone Store or from Apple App Store, try it out and show us some love with a 5 star rating.

        4.  


      //// Twigle Demo Video


      Disclaimer
      Shazam is trademark of Shazam Entertainment Ltd, and SoundHound is a trademark of SoundHound Inc and both are not affiliated in anyway to Avelgood Apps or Twigle.
