story:
Dear visitors and backers !

It is using free energy of your walk.

First of all, let me explain why this campaign started and what is the campaign goal.
My mobile phone and android 8'' tablet run out of battery numerous times. Unfortunately, when I needed them most. It happened so many times that I started walking around equipped with my old Nokia C1 phone as well. I felt stupid to say the least. Of course I carried the phone and android chargers with me. But stopping at restaurant to recharge the batteries I felt obliged to order something.. So I drank and ate (and paid) when not really thirsty or hungry....  Back in 2005 on the beaches in Polynesia I received an idea that my mobile phone could be recharged using power, which is usually dissipated as a heat in shoe's soles during walking. Last summer near Barcelona, when in battery trouble again, and when most needed.... an old idea appeared again... This time I grabbed it and started to think how to really make something out of it. 
  • I studied electronics/telecommunications, automatics and computer science at the University of Ljubljana (Slovenian capital city) in 1990's.  I adore Physics and I am a fan of Nikola Tesla.
  • This campaign will help me buy more precise measurement equipment without which further improvement of working prototype model is very difficult. Our team's goal is to prepare a product prototype ready for a mass production.
  • Every money received trough this campaign will greatly reduce time of working prototype development, it's precision and efficiency. Any kind of, even small contribution, or referral to your friends will help this campaign!
  • Campaign basic requirement is electrical measurement equipment and some basic mechanical tools. In the later stage a 3d printer for making models for carbon and plastic parts molding. Later, if this stage is successful, our team would set up a workshop for development and miniaturization of this apparatus  and following projects.
  • Similar projects can be found on the internet. For example, on kickstarter.com there is a similar project, which I think is not really good founded. Because, not only heel pressure should be used... Also sending 100 pairs to underdeveloped countries is a drop in the sea comparing to low cost availability of Shoe battery charger. Also when you use our product you feel like walking on soft grass and I can walk 3 times longer before I get tired and I don't feel any pain at all in my legs. I am continuously walking for two months at least 10 miles per day in every weather conditions. I have to mention that rain have no interference with functioning of our apparatus.
  •  First I started to work on piezoelectric shoe model made from piezo cigarette lighter igniter common spark-gap capacitor and simple electric circuit. First lighting led diodes was achieved. Later I thought of storing energy for later use. It worked  but efficiency was very low, Two white led emitting diodes on each shoe were blinking constantly, but charging battery would take to much time. Maybe even self-discharging of battery would be faster than charging it... And one major fault was discovered. Piezo ignition has very limited durability. It only works for approximately 50 to 100 thousand sparks. After that quartz crystal deforms and igniter stops sparking, So this idea had been abandoned. Fortunately, in 2005 I started to study Nikola Tesla's patents and everything available internet wide  on that great inventor/discoverer. I decided to use Nikola Tesla's blade-less turbine ( http://www.google.co.uk/patents/US1061206 ) and pneumatic principle for new prototype. Turbine have 20 mm diameter and spins more than 5000 times per second. It has two small magnets in disks and it puts out ac high frequency current, which is transformed  to charge battery. Turbine tested on reference air compressor can give more than 10 W of power. Efficiency greatly improved. USB output added. Overcharging circuit redesigned. Charge full sound warning added. We started to develop version with internal 3,7 V 2000 mAH battery Battery charging shoes started to be much more comfortable. It is more comfortable than walking with classic shoes because pressure on legs is more evenly distributed as shoes soles work as suspension. Now our team is developing shoe inlay compressor that can be used with any shoe and buying shoes will not be necessary. You only buy inlay compressor and snap the turbine generator assembly around ankles enabling its use with any type of shoes. 
  • Every money will be used to buy needed equipment from our teams wish list. First we'll buy most needed things and replace our worn and borowed equipment. After if some money remains we will buy some more advanced/computerized measurement equipment and possibly rent or buy workshop space.

The Impact

  • Mobile devices are depending on battery... I think it's time to surpass that factor, especially needed in distant regions of planet where we have no acess to electric utility grid or similar sources.
  • I have built some interesting Tesla coils in past, tried if scallar signals emitted by it really pass Faraday cage and can be received by AM radio... Yes it can be. Also I tryed to build dynamo electric machine

    (Tesla Patent 406,968 ) .

    But with this machine I was not sucessfull mostly because of lack of money. Dynamo electric machine needs to be precisely machined out and built from quiet expensive metallic mouldings and price of copper rised at that time also...

Risks & Challenges


There were many risks all ready overcame, probably more to follow, Together we can pass any of them.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Our team will be very greatfull for any contribution to this campaign. Not only money contributions will help. Also notifying your friends which need such power source will help us to come to our final goal - mass production of Shoe battery charger !

    • Please notify and invite your friends to check out our idea.
    • Please use the Indiegogo share tools and your preferred comunication methods! ANY help WELCOME !
    • Kind regards and THANK YOU in advance for your contribution to this project. I hope anyone will be able to buy Shoe battery charger before year 2014 ends.

story:
UPDATES: Checkout out FaceBook Page for current progress of the project

This is Anthony, a passionate graphic and industrial designer with 20 years experience introducing my latest invention, MagSavior. Throughout my entire engineering and design career, the MacBook is an indispensable tool. My MacBook has a long history of durability, except for just two items - the Battery and MagSafe power adapter. If you searched the internet for damaged MagSafe, you'll see most of the cable damage in the same way - either the end of the cable connecting to the laptop, or the end of the cable joined to the power adapter. The damage of the cable connecting to the laptop can be easily prevented, unlike the cable connected to the power adapter. Initially, I thought it was just my personal problem, but soon I realized that everyone using MacBook is having the same problems.


Here is the scenario:

Have you ever encountered your MagSafe power adapter for the MacBook blown away suddenly, and you have to buy another one? That will cost you US$79. Have you noticed that the joining part of the adapter and the cable have a kink in it? That is because the negative shielding has worn or torn off. This creates lots of electrical stress on the adapter. Before you know it, you will hear a "POP" sound, and there goes your MagSafe power adapter.

If your MagSafe power adapter is still working and you wish to prolong the life span of your power adapter than to spend US$79 to get a new one, here's what we have created. Back our MagSavior and save your power adapter before it's gone! Forget about Googling "How to fix MagSafe adapter".

MagSavior is invented with an actual need to protect and prolong the usage of the MagSafe adapter. Improved Ideas were created in 3D using Autodesk 123D Design, and multiple prototypes were printed from a 3D printer just to perfect the final product before pre production.


Design Considerations:

  1. Reduce the straining of the cord by increasing the height of the stem, and having a rounded brim to provide a bigger curvature during coiling of the cord.
  2. Secure the breaking point of the joint by having a rigid body attached to the adapter and cord. 
  3. Easy to attach and remove using the clip-on method. 
  4. Light weight using polycarbonate material. 
  5. Cost should be relatively low as compare to the actual price of the MagSafe power adapter.

Previous two beta versions were posted in Thingiverse as a Creative Commons.

Version 1: http://www.thingiverse.com/thing:137534
Version 2: http://www.thingiverse.com/thing:141012

After numerous rugged testing and improvement, the final version is now ready for production. The MagSavior in the photo below is an actual working prototype printed from a 3D Printer.


Illustration of MagSavior in ivory white color 

MagSavior in 4 colors 



Features and specifications:

  • The material is made from durable Polycarbonate treated with a gloss finished
  • Curved brim to prevent cable from straining and sharp folding
  • Comes in 4 colors- Ivory White, Cool Blue, Vogue Pink and Neon Yellow
  • Patented easy and secured clip-on to secure MagSavior
  • 3M adhesive to secure clip onto the MagSafe power adapter
  • Tailored cavity to fit ALL original Magsafe power adapter (MacBook, MacBook Pro & MacBook Air)


Why do we need the funds for?

With your funding, we can :

  • To initiate this project by creating mold and mass produce to reduce product cost and increase material quality
  • Explore more variety of colors and materials to provide more choices for you (e.g. Glow in the dark, matt, eco-friendly, transparent, mixture of TPU and Polycarbonate, etc.)
  • Deliver MagSavior to you at an earlier time
  • Create more protective shields for your other valuable products.

And with the funding goal reached, we expect to launch MagSavior into mass production, and soon the new MagSavior will arrive at your doorstep.

Where is the fund going to when reach our goals?

  • Reaching our goal of US$5,000 and above 
    We'll start sending our 3D drawings to injection mold maker for mass production, get our packaging printed, and finally the delivery of MagSavior to you our backers.

What will you get in the perks:

Single Pack:
1 MagSavior in a pack(Ivory White, Neon Yellow, Cool Blue or Vogue Pink)



Twin Pack Saver:
2 MagSaviors in a pack(Ivory White & Neon Yellow) or (Cool Blue & Vogue Pink)

    

4 Colors Pack Saver:
Comes in a pack of 4(Ivory White, Neon Yellow, Cool Blue and Vogue Pink)


Twin Pack with Retract Winder:
Comes with 2 MagSaviors of selected color (Ivory White & Neon Yellow) or (Cool Blue & Vogue Pink) + 1 Large Retract Winder (Free)
* Retract Winder is an ideal way to organize your MagSafe cord. More information: www.retractwinder.com

Retailer Pack:
Contains one box of 40 MagSavior with 10 units of each color (Ivory White, Neon Yellow, Cool Blue and Vogue Pink). A saving of almost 50%!



THANK YOU!

We would like to thank every backer for any contribution in the realization of our project. Share our MagSavoir amongst friends and relatives on Facebook and Twitter, you'll never know when their Magsafe power adapter is going to "Pop".

Special Thanks to:

Rina - for well designed illustrations and packaging design.
Bruce - for providing advice on marketing and production.


Contact us at sales@designique.co

More information: www.retractwinder.com

story:
What is TECHNOCRASH

TECHNOCRASH is a single-use gadget to face and manage the interaction with technological devices in case of issues. A pocket-sized mockup of your laptop to unleash your fury, saving your money… and your liver as well!

 

Why TECHNOCRASH

Everyday life is always more characterized by frequent interactions with technological devices.

What about us when technology is faulting, hampering our efforts to get the goal?
TECHNOCRASH can help you saving money and avoiding stress!

TECHNOCRASH - THE NEW WAY IN FRONT OF IT ISSUES

 

SIMPLE AND EFFECTIVE, FOR IMMEDIATE RELIEF

 

ALWAYS WITH YOU, READY FOR USE EVERYTIME & EVERYWHERE

 

 

GADGET AS WELL AS GIFT, A SMART IDEA FOR A SOURCE OF RELIEF

 

 

This campaign is focused on the creation of a pilot and 1st limited edition, hence the overall target amount is relatively small. Anyway, the % weight of the pilot mould is quite important and, given the small number of pieces, its impact over the final cost per unit is relevant.

This is a first fundamental step since the success of this campaign will pave the way for the next launch of a wide-scale production of TECHNOCRASH in many thousands pieces. For this reason this first limited edition is so precious and exclusive, as a collection piece.

Additional details about campaign budget allocation are reported here below. 

 

  • PRODUCTION: about 65% of campaign target is directly related to TECHNOCRASH production cost. More precisely: cost of moulds, cost of production process realization (both plants use and human job), cost of material, and finally cost of graphic printing;
  • MARKETING & COMMUNICATION: about 23% of the overall target is related to marketing and communication cost, needed to support the product launch phase, the promotion of TECHNOCRASH brand, the management of communication channels and tools adopted;
  • CROWDFUNDING: about 7% weight is related to crowdfunding campaign, in terms of platform commissions, transaction and currency exchange commissions, cost related to campaign video and pitch realization;
  • SHIPPING & OTHER: about 5% is related to shipping expenses and other expenses. Here included: i) packaging for delivery; ii) a partial contribute to overall shipping cost (limiting the shipping expenses charged to each single contributor when subscribing); iii) residual current expenses supporting the overall project running toward final target.

IMPORTANT NOTE: the overall target campaign DOES NOT include cost related to design phase, already funded and covered by project owners in terms both of incurred expenses and of their own time enthusiastically spent over this wonderful project.

 

All the proposed perks consist of different mix of the following items:

You can choose your preferred option among the different set of perks that have been created trying to offer a wide portfolio able to meet and fit with different needs in terms both of quantity (how many TECHNOCRASH units do I need? for me only? a gift for my friends and colleagues? a gadget for my company employees?) and mix (do I like getting the exclusive TECHNOCRASH T-shirt?).

Finally, if you believe that our idea deserves a glittering future, you can also join us and supporting the campaign via a "only pledge, no reward" contribution.

Anyway, please get any chance to share TECHNOCRASH campaign within your network!!!

 

TECHNOCRASH original concept was born in 2012. From the original seed, the idea has progressively been growing up and taking shape until now, with the prototyping phase run in 2017 and the launch of this crowdfunding campaign in Spring 2018.

TECHNOCRASH 1st limited edition will be delivered no later than November 2018. Afterwards, a new release will be planned with the launch of a wide-scale production of TECHNOCRASH, open to graphic customization for corporate clients as well.

A new generation of products focused on human emotions and mental wellness is rising. 
TECHNOCRASH is the first one! This campaign is the first step along the path towards JUMPINTOP incorporation. Support this campaign and support JUMPINTOP launch as well.

JUMPINTOP creates and distributes unconventional, funny and immediate solutions to overcome the setbacks and hitches often related to the chaotic rush of modern life. A series of situation-based emotional tool for mental wellness will be ready for you as easy source of relief.

 

Everything started from a long-lasting friendship between Guido and Andrea. First many hours spent together at high school. Then the same University, getting the degree in Engineering. And in this way, between a laugh and a drink, between a successful delivery and a job lost due to a PC-crash… TECHNOCRASH starts taking shape!!!

Guido and Andrea follow different career paths but they keep in contact each other and in parallel they go on working on the original idea which progressively grows up. Year after year the working group widens, getting involved friends and other cooperators, until the definition of a path for the incorporation of JUMPINTOP and the first crucial step of TECHNOCRASH launch with this crowdfunding campaign.

 

Here you can find additional information about TECHNOCRASH technical features in terms of design, material, production process.

 

DESIGN

TECHNOCRASH design is studied in order to enable you to get the most from the interaction with this tool. It is linear and compact and it aims to provide the direct and immediate perception of a real technological device. This helps getting the quick and full identification between the mock-up and the real technological device that is not working and that is annoying you.

MATERIAL

TECHNOCRASH material is selected aiming to get the most from the crashing act, both in terms of resistance and of sound. This is crucial to convey the right feeling to the user and to grant the best experience while crashing the tool.

PRODUCTION PROCESS

TECHNOCRASH is created via a specialized production process. Starting from the required parameters in terms of material (type, density, weight, color, etc.) and of shape and size, customized molds was realized to get the best result and the finest details. Moreover, a customized printing plate was created in order to reproduce even the smallest graphics. Everything to get an extraordinary result and offer you a unique experience with a TECHNOCRASH in your hands!

A Social Network to create and share Conspiracies

Conspiracydude.com will be the first social network site that will  focus on allowing users of all ages to create and share their own conspiracies and ideas .All within a graphical interface, users will be able to share in a simple ingredient like format their ideas and theories. 

What We Need 

  • Mobile compatible site for android and ios
  • A Great innovative Design with intuitive easy to use features
  • A Marketing Campaign and SEO

Stretch Goals

If we hit $8,000

  • Online magazine
  • Android game application

if we hit $15,000

  • Weekly book giveaways for top Conspiracies creators
  • More SEO and advertising for the site

    • if we hit $20,000

  • Integrate social game for the site
  • Hire bloggers and site developers to tweak and maintain the site

    • if we hit $30,000

    I get on camera and do my consipiracy videos !!!

    And create a animated series for the yt channel!!


    Why you should Contribute

    Knowledge is power when applied but what happens when  you want to share it with someone in a fun way? This site will allow you to share your knowledge with others in a graphical and easy to digest format. Contributing to this project will help people to spread information about their discoveries which will not only encourage others to question their surroundings , but will allow them to break out of the matrix and begin thinking outside the box and for themselves.

    Other ways you can help

    You can help us out by using Indie GoGo's social media sharing tool. Get involved and tell your friends  about this ambitious project! Every additional person that knows about the building of Conspiracy's Dudes website is important! They will be contributing to  great project

story:
WITHOUT CONNECTION AND PLUG AND PLAY FOR YOUR CAR , FOR YOUR BIKE AND YOU FIX IN 2 MINUTES

                                                        

 

 The system does not need connections, load the application on your smartphone, associate by synchronizing with Motochat or Carchat. Turn on the microphone by saying "on" and you can talk and your messages instantly flash on the LED deck behind your car or motorcycle ! For all languages , AND THAT'S ALL

 

BEFORE YOU WERE FUMING ALONE IN YOUR CAR OR ORDER YOU HELMET , NOW YOU CAN GET THE MESSAGE ACROSS

 

2 SYSTEMS FOR ALL

 

                                                          
 
     SYSTEM OPERATION FOR YOUR CAR 
 

 

COMMUNICATE LIVE WITH PEOPLE RIGHT BEHIND YOU IN THEIR CAR OR ON THEIR BIKE. IT WILL ALLOW YOU TO SEND THEM NICE MESSAGES OR NOT SO NICE ...
 

SYSTEM OPERATION FOR YOUR BIKE​

 

A GREAT F*UCKING IDEA

 

                                                           
 A SHIT WEATHER
 
 
TALK OUT LOUD AND THE DUDE BEHIND YOU CAN REAT IT IMMEDIATELY
 
 
AND THE SAME GOES FOR YOU IN YOUR CAR
 

 

 

ALSO TO FOR THE TROUBLEMAKER TO CHILL OUT

 

YOU WILL ALSO BE MUCH MORE VISIBLE WHEN YOU BRAKE, SO YOU WON'T GET RAMMED IN THE ASS ... IN CASE OF EMERGENCY BRAKING , IT WILL AUTOMATICALLY BLINK .

A 3-AXIS GYRO ACCELEROMETERA MEASURES YOUR SPEED AND ANGLE . A GPRS TRACKER LOCATED YOU .

A PART OF THE TEAM

story:
The Alcohoot Edge is a palm-sized, bluetooth connected breathalyzer that uses police grade breath sensor technology to accurately track and measure your blood alcohol levels. 

It doesn't just help you make smarter drinking decisions, it helps you maintain a healthy lifestyle!


Why is knowing your Blood Alcohol Content (B.A.C.) Important?

- MAKE SAFER AND SMARTER DECISIONS - Alcohol can impair judgement, so knowing your B.A.C. level will give you objective data to decide if you are safe to drive or should find another way to get home.

- IMPROVE YOUR HEALTH - Alcohol affects the body way beyond just the time that you are drinking. There are everyday effects even in the following days. Having the data about your drinking (through B.A.C.) and comparing it to your mood, weight, energy level or athletic performance will help you decide if having that additional drink will really be worth it.

Who Should Use The Alcohoot Edge?

Anyone who drinks! Be it three drinks a week, one drink a month, or going out for the first time at 21, the Alcohoot Edge benefits anyone who wants to make smarter and healthier decisions.

 

The Alcohoot Edge app (works for both iOS and Android) will easily connect to the mobile alcohol tracker via bluetooth. It will seamlessly fit into any user's lifestyle of digitally monitoring B.A.C. and health and well being.

Additional App Features

  • Instant and simple to understand B.A.C. levels. Find out clearly and easily your B.A.C. on the Alcohoot app after blowing into the Alcohoot Edge.

  • Accurate readings. Includes 15:00 timer to ensure B.A.C. % accuracy.

  • SmartLine Graph. Provides users with visible trends in alcohol consumption and allows for notes to be added to better track information.

  • Morning Quiz. Performs qualitative analysis to algorithmically predict optimal alcohol consumption level.

  • Apple Health and Google Fit. Fully supported by Apple Health and Google Fit.With a one button turn-on,  users can automatically connect to their phone's Alcohoot Edge app, blow and instantly get feedback on alcohol level in the body. It's never been easier and more accurate! The Edge employs the same active breath analysis technology found in law enforcement devices to provide users with industry-leading Breath Alcohol Consumption (B.A.C.) readings.


    • Unlock awesome new features and rewards by helping us achieve our stretch goals! Sharing our campaign with your networks to help us spread the word.


    We are a young company with a team dedicated to building products like Alcohoot Edge, with the goal of empowering people to improve their health and well-being. We are bringing world-leading technology from the lab to the individual and having fun in the process!

    How long does the battery last?
    Our battery is rechargeable, but a full charged battery will last about 300 tests.

    How accurate is it?
    Since we use the same technology in police breathalyzers the accuracy is tremendous.

    Why are you crowdfunding?
    We are so ready to launch our product! Crowdfunding on Indiegogo is the perfect way to gauge excitement and get feedback for the Alcohoot Edge before we put it into retail.

    What do your partnerships with Heineken, Sprint and Pernard Ricard mean?
    Our partners help support our mission for delivering awesome technology that enhances safe and responsible drinking by promoting our product, purchasing devices for employees and spending time to help us build a better product and company.

    Does the cost of the perk cover taxes and tariffs?
    No, the perk cost only covers the cost of the item itself. Shipping is separate and is added during checkout. The buyer is responsible for any additional taxes or tariffs imposed. 

    How do I get in touch with your team?  
    You can message us on here or email us at chris@alcohoot.com.

    How do I upgrade my perk?
    https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles...

    I’m having trouble claiming a perk. Who should I reach out to?Email support@indiegogo.com.

    I would like a refund. How do I do this?
    https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/213172367

story:
What is MaskTouch

Turn your iMac into a touchscreen

MaskTouch is a strong, easy to attach frame that fits over the monitor of your iMac, making the screen touch controlled. Cutting edge infrared sensing and multi-touch interface make MaskTouch responsive, smooth, and fun to use. MaskTouch is the third generation of our proprietary technology, meaning that it has been cleared of glitches and optimized for the ultimate user experience. With MaskTouch, the possibilities are limitless. 

 MaskTouch‘s Highlights

  • MaskTouch is programmed to recognize distinct hand gestures that corresponds to actions on your iMac.
  • MaskTouch can identify ten points of contact with the screen at one time, that makes understanding these complex commands possible.

Scroll in any direction, zoom in and out, and swipe through web pages more naturally than ever before. You will be amazed by how much more human your computer using experience feels with MaskTouch.

How You Can Use MaskTouch

MaskTouch’s simple and responsive interface makes it a useful addition to any iMac monitor. 

Music

Use third-party music instrument apps directly on your iMac. You can even use MaskTouch to directly play the keys on a MIDI keyboard on screen.

Parenting

 

Make learning an interactive and engaging experience for kids off all ages. Learning is fun and easy when using MaskTouch 

Exhibiting

Create hands on experience that demonstrates your work. MaskTouch creates a natural flow for presentations and exhibitions. 

Video Games

Push your keyboard aside and interact with video games like never before. MaskTouch gives you the control to take your gaming to the next level. 

Designing

Designers and artists will appreciate the freedom that MaskTouch gives them. The iMac screen is now your canvas, and your finger your brush. 

If it can be done with your hands, MaskTouch lets you do it on an iMac. With technology like this, the possibilities are limitless. 

How It Works 

MaskTouch is easy to install, it doesn’t require any extra software.

  • First of all, move the MaskTouch choser to the iMac, because of the MaskTouch built-in magnets, it will automatically adsorption on the surface of iMac;
  • secondly, the MaskTouch's usb cable interface into iMac,

Just over two steps, complete the installation of the MaskTouch.

MaskTouch is  thin, discreet, and won’t change the appearance of your iMac. MaskTouch attached to the imac, just like iMac wearing a mask.

MaskTouch is smooth means that it responds as fast as a typical mouse. MaskTouch’s multi-touch interface makes the impossible possible. It dramatically improves the experience of gaming, making music, and working on your computer, just to name a few uses. 

What People Say About MaskTouch

Meet Valerie

She loves our product because it’s helping her overcome pain. Valerie suffers from hand weakness because of surgeries that she required in her twenties. This condition renders simple computer tasks like typing and mouse use long and painful ordeals. MaskTouch makes a difference because it’s interface uses natural motions, unlike a traditional keyboard, that put far less strain on her hands. Valerie being able to use her computer for work and entertainment pain-free is just one example of how our technology is making computer use available to more people.  

Our Competition 

Perks

Stretch Goals

Our History 

Our mission to create the world’s best touch screen device began in 2012 with the Zorro Macsk. Groundbreaking in it’s day, the technology behind the Zorro Macsk is simply the foundation for what we build today. 

In 2014 the second generation of Zorro Masck was created. We upgraded the frame with a wear resistant, anti-scratch metal material that significantly improved the under finger feel of the device. The Zorro Macsk II paired more advanced touch technology with expanded compatibility, including all 21.5” and 27” of iMac from 2009 to 2015, as well as Retina 4k 21.5” and Retina 5k 27. 

Now we are releasing the third generation of our technology called the MaskTouch. The great improvement of the MaskTouch over its predecessors is its dynamic interface. Whereas the Zorro Macsk could only compute two points of contact at a time, the MaskTouch can register up to ten points of contact with the screen at a time. The result is a precise, fluid, and exciting user experience. You can now control your digital world as if you truly held it in your hands. Wether you are gaming, working, teaching, or making music, your relationship to your computer is changed forever, and the possibilities are endless. 

Timeline


Why Indiegogo

Due to the global scope of our campaign, Indiegogo has proven to be the perfect partner to deliver our message and help us gain support. Our hope is that this campaign not only raises investments, but also spreads our groundbreaking message to the whole world. The next step is continuing to build the Aogek brand for the benefit of all technology enthusiasts. Any additional funds raised will be used for marketing and next generation product development. The more money we raise, the more we can disseminate our touch screen technology. Television, advertising, gaming, these are all just the beginning. With the MaskTouch, the possibilities for easy, reliable, and fun touch screens are limitless. 

Why MaskTouch

MaskTouch is a third generation product, technologically mature, and ready for mass production. This technology will create a far superior touchscreen experience, and will broaden the uses for touch screens. As for our backers, by supporting us, they will get discounted products, continuous high quality customer service, and our gratitude. 

FAQ 

1.) Dose it come with the monitor? 

No. A purchase of MaskTouch only includes the MaskTouch overlay. It is able to change any iMac into a touchscreen in three seconds without the need to install any software. 

2.) Does this replace the glass screen, or is it attached to it? 

MaskTouch attaches magnetically to the front of the iMac and plugs into the usb port. You do not change anything on the computer or remove the glass. 

3.) It’s plugged in and nothing is happening. How do I troubleshoot? 

To ensure the product is on, put your MaskTouch on a flat surface for testing. Observe the LED status when you touch it. The LED light should be blue, otherwise please contact our technical supporter. 

4.) Does MaskTouch fit a 27’’ Cinema Display also, or only the iMac?

MaskTouch is only made for iMac. We have 27” and 21.5” sizes. 

5.) Can I cancel my perk and/or get a refund? 

Indiegogo policy dictates that campaign owners have no ability to adjust perk selections. That means we cannot upgrade your perk, we cannot change your perk, and we cannot cancel your perk. Please note that contributions made on Indiegogo are also non-refundable. 

6.) When will my MaskTouch be delivered? 

We anticipate delivery in June 2017. 

7.) What happens to my money if you fail? 

In the event that we are not successful, we will communicate the situation to every contributor in a transparent and timely manner. You can choose a refund, or we can still send you our product, even if it costs more than you paid. We promise to do this because we believe in MaskTouch, and we own the manufacturers.

Contact

If you have any questions or need additional information,

If you want to be an agent of our product or have good idea to make MaskTouch worldwide known,

If you have a company want to make your screen touchable,no matter the screen is on CNC machine,ATM machine,television,billboard,arcade game etc,

Please feel free to contact us by:

story:
What is the BB Case?

B stands for Battery; another B stands for Bluetooth Earphone. These are the two most important devices we will need everyday, yet have brought us a lot of headache.

We know--it seems there is never enough battery life for our iPhone, and we're tired of losing the earphones again and again. There should be a product that can help us with these problems, and create a way better experience using iPhone and Bluetooth Earphones.

This is why we created the BB Case.

Who Will Love

BB Case?

As we researched these problems, we identified who would find BB Case the most useful. Business travelers, people who drive a lot, maniacs who can't resist to try new things, and of course, those who use iPhones a lot everyday. 

For these users, the BB Case will provide the following features for you:

Charge Your Bluetooth Earphone Anytime, Anywhere

We redefine the Bluetooth earphone with a dock-in design to keep it charged, and easy-to-access.

Pull it out, and it will reconnect to your phone automatically.

When calls come in, just pull it out, wear it, and the call will automatically pick up in 2 seconds.

Noise-Cancellation Technology Supported

We used a CSR chipset to provide the most stable phone-call experience in a perfect one-piece.

Premium Quality Battery from Apple's Supplier

Built-in high quality Li-ion polymer battery will get you most needed extra battery life. This battery is provided by ATL, one of the most qualified battery manufacturers.

To Extend the Battery Life:
Keep Your Phone Charged All the Time

The battery in BB Case can last for over 500 cycles of charging. This doubles the battery life of your phone, and keeps it in a good condition for a longer period of time.

Smart Stand Fits You Everywhere

The flip-to-go stand allows you to watch movies, video, and pictures from a desirable view.

Easy-to-Install Fully Covered Case

Designed to be simple, yet protective. With its connector dongle design, it's easy to install your iPhone. Made from durable material, and the frame is built higher than the display to prevent scratches.

Looks Great, Sounds Greater

To Build Deluxe User Experience, We Redirect And Amplify The Sound Output To The Front.

1 Micro USB Cable to Charge All

With single micro-USB cable, You can charge BB Case, the earphone and your iPhone simultaneously. Just as easy to use as it is beautiful to look at.

Technical Specification

Exclusive Perk on INDIEGOGO

For our backers on INDIEGOGO, we prepare early bird perks for you!  An exclusive 22% off discounts ONLY ON INDIEGOGO for those who loves our BB Case and support us on this so early stage. Thank you so much!

Have a friend who needs this? Want to share? Just 30 seconds of your time could make the difference! Please help us to share this campaign:)

story:
A 3D printer at VeloCity would be awesome

There have been a few attempts to get one before, but none of them worked out, they all fizzled out for various reasons. I think with Indiegogo, we can finally get the structure we need to get the funds together. A 3D printer would be fantastic for anyone building a hardware project, especially for enclosures. It would also be useful for replacement parts for anything you have that breaks, and of course it can be used to print intricate ornaments and toys. Check out thingiverse.com for more ideas.

What you can build

Here are some of the things that this 3D printer will let you make:

http://www.thingiverse.com/thing:7933 - Catan card holder

http://www.thingiverse.com/thing:36321 - Earbud holder

http://www.thingiverse.com/thing:34343 - Decorations

http://www.thingiverse.com/thing:36561 - Mechanical parts

What We Need & What You Get

I've set the funding goal at $2000. After fees, this is enough to get the basic MakerBot Replicator (http://store.makerbot.com/replicator-404.html) but if we go over that amount, we'll be able to get the mugh higher quality Replicator 2 (http://store.makerbot.com/replicator2.html) so ideally we would get $2500 or more.

Any funds after that will be used to get more plastic to print with in more colors, parts to upgrade or repair the printer, or other things as determined by YOU!

After this term

After the Winter term, the printer will stay in VeloCity, and someone will be appointed to take care of it. They will be responsible for ordering plastic, and keeping the printer working. It will be up to them to decide how to buy the plastic, for example by charging for each print, or by soliciting donations. If no one in the residence is suitable, the priter might move to the VeloCity Garage. People who donate $200+ will help make this decision.
story_txt:
A 3D printer at VeloCity would be awesome
There have been a few attempts to get one before, but none of them worked out, they all fizzled out for various reasons. I think with Indiegogo, we can finally get the structure we need to get the funds together. A 3D printer would be fantastic for anyone building a hardware project, especially for enclosures. It would also be useful for replacement parts for anything you have that breaks, and of course it can be used to print intricate ornaments and toys. Check out thingiverse.com for more ideas.
What you can build
Here are some of the things that this 3D printer will let you make:
http://www.thingiverse.com/thing:7933 - Catan card holder
http://www.thingiverse.com/thing:36321 - Earbud holder
http://www.thingiverse.com/thing:34343 - Decorations
http://www.thingiverse.com/thing:36561 - Mechanical parts


What We Need & What You Get
I've set the funding goal at $2000. After fees, this is enough to get the basic MakerBot Replicator (http://store.makerbot.com/replicator-404.html) but if we go over that amount, we'll be able to get the mugh higher quality Replicator 2 (http://store.makerbot.com/replicator2.html) so ideally we would get $2500 or more.
Any funds after that will be used to get more plastic to print with in more colors, parts to upgrade or repair the printer, or other things as determined by YOU!
After this term
After the Winter term, the printer will stay in VeloCity, and someone will be appointed to take care of it. They will be responsible for ordering plastic, and keeping the printer working. It will be up to them to decide how to buy the plastic, for example by charging for each print, or by soliciting donations. If no one in the residence is suitable, the priter might move to the VeloCity Garage. People who donate $200+ will help make this decision.

story:
please watch video to know how it works


This idea started six months back at our college library  . There are 50 PCs, all of them with wireless mouse  and one or the other mouse's battery surely dies in between exams, presentations or any important work . 

So i started a project with two of my students to make a mouse which generates energy and charges itself. The mechanism for that is pretty simple. Inside the mouse we put a magnet ( one like on your fridge ) between a coil of copper wire . Whenever the mouse moves that magnet moves between the coil, it produces small amount of electricity which charges the internal battery. We made our first prototype with our electrical engineering department and we are working very hard on our final design 

 

 

Making these 55 mouse was easy as it takes 2 hours to make one and we had help from our students but now we want to produce them in large numbers. To decrease the R&D cost per unit, we need to produce minimum 1000 mouse.

final product which we will be shipping will be available in five colors . ( At end of campaign we will be sending email survey to all of funders to decide which color they want . )


 Other important Features:

  • Super thin 2.4GHz wireless Mouse
  • Smooth surface and somatological design
  • 16 wireless working channels, automatic frequency jumping
  • The dongle can be stored inside the mouse when not in use. and it no need driver plug and play
  • With On/Off power switch
  • Frequency:2405MHZ-2475MHZ
  • Max rate: 28inch/s
  • Adjustable DIP: 800/1200/1600


Thanks for taking intrest . We wellcome all the sugetions. 
Do share and tell your friends about this campaign .

story:
The TYLT ENERGI Desktop Charging Station is no ordinary USB charging hub. This Charging Station is your central Fast Charging Solution for your home or office. The Charging Station serves as the heart to your fast charging needs, giving you a place to rapidly recharge your phones, tablets, and your portable battery pack all in one place. Featuring 4 built-in, rapid charging 2.4 Amp USB ports (50 Watts total), as well as the removable, rechargeable battery pack as the 5th USB port, the Charging Station will ensure that battery life is a worry of the past, and charging for your entire family is easier than ever. 


With the TYLT Charging Station, your family has the perfect place to charge their devices together. Don't worry about finding a the fastest USB charger in the house, simply plug into to the SmartDetect™ Port and it will provide maximum rapid charging automatically.

Take your charging on the go with the removable 3200 mAh portable battery pack. Slide it out for charging on the  go, or to simply recharge on the couch. when it's out of juice, simply slide it back in to let it recharge.

Don't think of the portable battery exclusive for traveling; use it to stay charged anywhere you go, whether you're in bed or on the couch, out and about, or traveling abroad. Use the micro-USB on the battery pack to Re-charge it on the go, and when you get back to the Charging Station, simply slide it back in.

Prevent cable clutter with the Charging Station's built-in cable management system. Cables too long? Wrap the longer cables around the Charging Station and make them the perfect length.

With our Rapid SmartDetect™ Technology, our Charging Station will provide the maximum charge your device will safely accept. Our Charging Station will communicate with your phone to detect the maximum charging speed your phone can accept, and provide accordingly. 

               


The first step when developing the ENERGI Charging Station stemmed from the following question: what are the core problems USB hubs are designed to alleviate? We see hubs as the heart of charging everyday devices at home, including a multitude of smartphones, tablets, and other mobile accessories. One pain point was when a device is charging, it’s inconvenient being tethered to the wall. If one of the ports was able to “jump out” and travel around the house with us, that would make using the hub that much more seamless. With that core insight, we looked at the conventional charging station in a different light and developed a product we feel lives up to carrying the TYLT logo. 

When evaluating other USB charging hubs, we noticed the multitude of USB cables cluttering up our countertops at home and workspace at the office. So we developed a new seamless way to aid in cable management – using the top and bottom fins to hold the excess cable for a less cluttered charging experience. 

TYLT takes immense pride in helping set the standard for portable batteries. Since mobile phones are required  to be CTIA Certified for battery safety, we maintain that portable batteries should meet the same standards.  We believe that we need to provide users with portable power products which perform, are reliable and are certified safety standards by meeting the following standards: CTIA - IEEE1725, UL1642, UN38.3, CE, FCC, ETL and RoHS.

The TYLT ENERGI Desktop Charging Station is ready to go. The product has been designed, tested, and refined in our Southern California office. However, we need our backers to help us get this product into final production and available to the public. We can assure that the Charging Station is of the highest quality, and we want you to experience this new charging hub. With your help, we will be able to enter production and have this product available to you and your friends and family by the end of October.

What are the full technical specifications?
Charging Station
Input: AC 100-240V, 50/60Hz, 1.5A
Output: DC 5V=4x2.4A (10A Max)
Battery Pack
Battery Cells: Lithium-Ion
Battery Capacity: 3,200mAh
Battery Input: Micro-USB 5V/1A
Battery Output: 5V/1A

What are the product dimensions?
Length: 4.25 in
Width: 5 in
Height: 1.625 in

What is included in the box?
1 - ENERGI Desktop Charging Station
1 - 3,200mAh Battery Pack
1 - Power Cord
1 - User Guide

How do I select my plug type and cable color/length?

At the end of the campaign, we will send a survey to each backer in order to select the desired plug type (US or EU/UK), as well as the length and color of the ordered cables. 

Does the Charging Station support Quick Charge 2.0?

No. We looked at this technology, but found several tradeoffs we weren’t happy with. The marginally improved charge time wasn’t worth the extra cost to implement this feature, especially since it doesn’t help Apple users. Quick Charge 2.0 is specific to flagship Android phones at this point. It’s not supported by Apple, Windows and many older and entry to mid-level Android phones. That being said we made sure that ALL phones would get their maximum charge from standard 5 Volt power output.  As you may know QC 2.0 ups the output voltage to 9V/12V depending on what the device can accept, most phones only accept 9V with QC 2.0.  We like fast charging, we just want to be sure that the technology we build into our product can be used by the majority and QC 2.0 is still in the minority/early adopters and has no benefit to Apple users.  But Smart Detect Technology is a benefit to both Apple and Android users by providing the fastest charge to ALL.

Will this product work internationally?

Yes. We have both a version with a US cable, as well as a version that includes Type C plugs for Europe and others, and Type G plugs for the UK and others for international users. Check below for countries using each outlet type.

Type C

Type G

story:
台灣朋友看完後可由此訂購, 三個工作天出貨: bit.ly/2iFsPSS, 

Order from our web-store, ship in 3 working days: http://bit.ly/2mHioy6

 

ProView S3 Advantage:

1. Customer proven. Shipped over 3,400 sets.

2. Works great with iPhone & Android phones of small size (iPhone SE) to large size (iPhone 7+).

3. Can take cinematic shots from near ground  level low angle (holding inverted) to high angle (holding upright) in one straight video recording without stopping. Many $300 smartphone stabilizers on the market unable to do this:
     See 0:04 ~ 0:13 (video shared by user)

     How it's done: https://vimeo.com/194641614

4. Very stable performance even when running: http://bit.ly/2fLX4TM (video shared by user chasing dog)

 

Some User Shared Videos Using ProView S3

Come with us to the house of the 7 Rays:  http://bit.ly/2gHzJ6m
Mannequin challenge: http://bit.ly/2gQ7L81
Running after the kids:  http://bit.ly/2fJ8NX7
Dancing in front of Petronas Twin Towers: http://bit.ly/2g7NsaT
Dog playing on the beach of Florida: http://bit.ly/2h4Ky6x

Check out more on our Facebook page.

 

 

 

   

  • Vertical/Portrait shooting mode
  • Auto tuning to find optimal PID parameters to work with various phones and cover cases
  • Foldable design while using balancing weight
  • Video recording on/off via Bluetooth by clicking the control button 

 

ProView S3 is a 3-axis gimbal that allows users to fully unleash the video recording capability of 4K smartphones. Specifically designed for large 4K smartphones (e.g., iPhone 7/7+ or Galaxy S7/Note5), ProView S3 turns a smartphone into an easy-to-use professional video-capturing equipment and enables anyone to capture and share memorable moments in cinematic video quality. 

It is capable of handling mid-size to large-size phones and provide best-in-class stabilization performance.

 

Unlocking the Power of Story 

ProView S3 gives you the ability to shoot ultra-smooth videos like a pro. With your creativity, a great story can be visually told and shared!

Below, we shot a duckling story to share with you all. Take a look at how easy it is to produce a cinematic quality video using a stabilizer without needing any professional experience. (Note: The smaller screen is a comparison video done without a stabilizer.)

 

Contemporary Design

 

ProView S3 has a contemporary look. Rugged and ergonomic design, meeting high reliability requirement. No loose cables, giving professional appearance.

 

Key Features

Adjustable Mount

The adjustable mount works with Android and iOS phones having width dimension ranging from 51mm to 83mm.  

Ergonomically designed allowing single person to easily release phone grip with one hand, and use the other hand to insert or remove phone.

Wind Resistant

Advanced motor control algorithms and mechanical design to provide more stable operation in windy condition.

Wireless Update

Firmware updatable using Bluetooth 4.0.

Dual IMU Sensors

Adopt most advanced dual inertial measurement unit sensing technology to deliver state-of-art camera stabilization performance, much less drift than gimbals using only single IMU. 

Powerful Motors

Use high-torque brushless motors with superior gripping power and control accuracy, capable of supporting larger heavier smartphones.

Underslung Shot

Allow holding ProView S3 upside-down to shoot low angle moving shots from ground level. When changing from upright to underslung position, ProView S3 automatically detects such orientation and will operate correctly.

4-Mode Display

Four versatile operating modes encompassing nearly all usage cases. Easy to understand front panel LED display showing gimbal operating mode.

Single Button

Combined joystick direction control and on/off switch in a single thumb-stick button design. Simple and elegant.

Joystick Control

5-way switch joystick allows fine adjustment of camera shooting angle turning in up/down/left/right direction.

 

Performance

ProView S3 with iPhone 6 PLUS + Olloclip external lens. Most smartphone stabilizer have problem balancing heavy loading, including the latest model of a leading brand selling on Apple Store!

Comparing smartphone shot video without and with ProView S3 stabilization, running at the same time with two cameras.

 

Performing Elevator Test using the 4th and final prototype. The video below is a mirrored footage created with an iPhone 6+ on ProView S3 against a mirror in an elevator. The person taking the video is the person in the video. See how the iPhone 6+ remains stable in this stress test. Also check out the quality of this video taken by the iPhone 6+.

Underslung mode, holding inverted, is useful in near ground low angle video shooting. Most smartphone stabilizers are unable to do this.

Portrait / Vertical Mode, first in the industry for smartphone stabilizer with this feature.

Comparing dynamic behavior with a latest smartphone gimbal model on the market. Each hand holding a gimbal. The smaller screen at the lower right corner is the person holding the two gimbals whose picture was taken without using a gimbal.

Comparing static behavior with a latest smartphone gimbal model on the market. ProView S3 holding the pink phone, alternative brand holding the white phone. (Note: Video playing at accelerated speed to shorten the 5-minute testing time.)

Video recording on/off via Bluetooth by clicking control button.

 

 

Prototyping Before the Campaign

We kicked off the crowdfunding campaign after 12 months of hardware and software development with 4 iterations of CNC-milled hardware prototypes. The design was proven working before the campaign. During the campaign, we continued improve the design while taking valuable inputs from our backers.

 

NAVIN Team

Our team consists of industrial veterans who have many years of experiences in engineering and manufacturing. Our expertise includes embedded software design, application software design, hardware design, and system product manufacturing. We are passionate in creating and delivering products that can bring happiness to the world.

We have designed and sold highly acclaimed miniHomer GPS Position Finder. Now, we have successfully delivered ProView S3.

 

We Need Your Help

Please assist us to spread the word about this crowdfunding/InDemand campaign through Indiegogo sharing tools, Facebook, Twitter, ProView S3 blog, and Youtube. You can also support us by selecting a perk below. Thank you!

 

ProView S3 Perk ($160)

The ProView S3 Package includes ProView S3 3-axis smartphone gimbal, 3 rechargeable batteries, and an USB charger.

 

Carrying Pouch Perk ($16)

A carrying pouch for ProView S3 using neoprene fabric, a material widely used in wet suits and camera lens bags. It is ideal for carrying ProView S3 in a shooting trip or during traveling.

 

Shipping

The perks will be shipped as gifts to your pledge in support of our crowdfunding/InDemand campaign. In case there are additional duties, fees or taxes raised by the authorities in your country, you may need to take care of them by yourself when receiving the shipment. 

 

Schedule

Getting a new product to mass production is a challenge. In addition, we added quite a few features based on backs' inputs during the campaign. As such, there was a delay compared to our original schedule below. The delay is less than 3 months and we started shipping ProView S3 in October.

 

 
Campaign period : Feb 2 ~ April 2
Ordering parts : March ~ May
Tooling preparation : April  ~ May
Pilot production, design verification, test fixture preparation: May ~ June

Mass production : June ~ July

Shipping (pledged before April 2) : July

Shipping (pledged after April 2) : August

 

Risk

Delivery of rewards/perks is subject to best efforts and not guaranteed. (Paypal require us to add this line in order to release fund, although we disagree that there is any risk of not delivering.)

 

Thanks you!

The NAVIN Team

 

Media kit available here:

https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0BwBD1Ww5qpkAeGRQbk9hd2w4WE0&usp=sharing​

 

Email Contact: info@navin.com.tw

 

FAQ

 

Q1: Does it support GoPro?

A1: Balancing is important for optimal stabilizer performance. Currently we are aiming at optimal performance for mid size to large size smartphones, could not accommodate smaller phones and GoPro. Making it usable for sizes, including GoPro, would result in similar poor stabilization problems with large phones that many smartphone gimbals on the market now have. If mainly for GoPro use, it's better to buy a GoPro-only gimbal. Performance will be optimal, size is smaller, and better suited for bike mount or other mounting application where it is typically intended. 

 

Q2: What's battery operating time? What kind of battery used?

A2: About 2 hours operating time. Three 18350 rechargeable batteries are the current design choice.


Q3: Can it work with 6" phone?

A3: The phone grip opens up to 83mm. If phone width within 85mm and weight not exceed 222 gram by too much then would be OK.

 

Q4: Are all mid-size to large-size phones usable?

A4: Some of the smartphones has side buttons not on top part of the phone. If too low, it might come in contact with the phone grip. In case just coming in contact a bit, slide the phone out a little would clear the situation. If buttons are too low, it might be a problem. Such is common issue with all smartphone stabilizer phone grip designs. Please check with below figure to see if your phone has such issue.

 

Q5: How does ProView S3 compare with other InDemand smartphone gimbals?

A5: SMOVE: http://bit.ly/2fT6obW

        FlowMotion One: http://bit.ly/2iAb34b

 


Note * : We have Bluetooth 4.0 inside ProView S3 for setting control and firmware update using Bluetooth Low Energy profile. Video recording on/off via Bluetooth requires additional Human Interface Device (HID) profile. Testing with limited model of phones we have in the office (of Apple, Samsung, Asus, HTC brands), we see that this feature could work with phones from Apple, Samsung, and Asus, but unable to work with HTC phones using this new HID mode. Since the feature is not guaranteed to work with all phones, it's offered as extra bonus feature for user to try. We only have access to limited phone models in our office, unable to know if all other brand/model works or not. Later after receiving ProView S3, you can let us know if it works with your phone, and we'll compile a list of compatible and non-compatible phones.
story_txt:
台灣朋友看完後可由此訂購, 三個工作天出貨: bit.ly/2iFsPSS, Order from our web-store, ship in 3 working days: http://bit.ly/2mHioy6 ProView S3 Advantage:1. Customer proven. Shipped over 3,400 sets.2. Works great with iPhone & Android phones of small size (iPhone SE) to large size (iPhone 7+).3. Can take cinematic shots from near ground  level low angle (holding inverted) to high angle (holding upright) in one straight video recording without stopping. Many $300 smartphone stabilizers on the market unable to do this:     See 0:04 ~ 0:13 (video shared by user)     How it's done: https://vimeo.com/1946416144. Very stable performance even when running: http://bit.ly/2fLX4TM (video shared by user chasing dog) Some User Shared Videos Using ProView S3Come with us to the house of the 7 Rays:  http://bit.ly/2gHzJ6mMannequin challenge: http://bit.ly/2gQ7L81Running after the kids:  http://bit.ly/2fJ8NX7Dancing in front of Petronas Twin Towers: http://bit.ly/2g7NsaTDog playing on the beach of Florida: http://bit.ly/2h4Ky6xCheck out more on our Facebook page.      
Vertical/Portrait shooting mode
Auto tuning to find optimal PID parameters to work with various phones and cover cases
Foldable design while using balancing weight
Video recording on/off via Bluetooth by clicking the control button 
 ProView S3 is a 3-axis gimbal that allows users to fully unleash the video recording capability of 4K smartphones. Specifically designed for large 4K smartphones (e.g., iPhone 7/7+ or Galaxy S7/Note5), ProView S3 turns a smartphone into an easy-to-use professional video-capturing equipment and enables anyone to capture and share memorable moments in cinematic video quality. It is capable of handling mid-size to large-size phones and provide best-in-class stabilization performance. Unlocking the Power of Story ProView S3 gives you the ability to shoot ultra-smooth videos like a pro. With your creativity, a great story can be visually told and shared!Below, we shot a duckling story to share with you all. Take a look at how easy it is to produce a cinematic quality video using a stabilizer without needing any professional experience. (Note: The smaller screen is a comparison video done without a stabilizer.)

 
Contemporary Design ProView S3 has a contemporary look. Rugged and ergonomic design, meeting high reliability requirement. No loose cables, giving professional appearance. Key FeaturesAdjustable MountThe adjustable mount works with Android and iOS phones having width dimension ranging from 51mm to 83mm.  Ergonomically designed allowing single person to easily release phone grip with one hand, and use the other hand to insert or remove phone.Wind ResistantAdvanced motor control algorithms and mechanical design to provide more stable operation in windy condition.Wireless UpdateFirmware updatable using Bluetooth 4.0.Dual IMU SensorsAdopt most advanced dual inertial measurement unit sensing technology to deliver state-of-art camera stabilization performance, much less drift than gimbals using only single IMU. Powerful MotorsUse high-torque brushless motors with superior gripping power and control accuracy, capable of supporting larger heavier smartphones.Underslung ShotAllow holding ProView S3 upside-down to shoot low angle moving shots from ground level. When changing from upright to underslung position, ProView S3 automatically detects such orientation and will operate correctly.4-Mode DisplayFour versatile operating modes encompassing nearly all usage cases. Easy to understand front panel LED display showing gimbal operating mode.Single ButtonCombined joystick direction control and on/off switch in a single thumb-stick button design. Simple and elegant.Joystick Control5-way switch joystick allows fine adjustment of camera shooting angle turning in up/down/left/right direction. PerformanceProView S3 with iPhone 6 PLUS + Olloclip external lens. Most smartphone stabilizer have problem balancing heavy loading, including the latest model of a leading brand selling on Apple Store!Comparing smartphone shot video without and with ProView S3 stabilization, running at the same time with two cameras. Performing Elevator Test using the 4th and final prototype. The video below is a mirrored footage created with an iPhone 6+ on ProView S3 against a mirror in an elevator. The person taking the video is the person in the video. See how the iPhone 6+ remains stable in this stress test. Also check out the quality of this video taken by the iPhone 6+.Underslung mode, holding inverted, is useful in near ground low angle video shooting. Most smartphone stabilizers are unable to do this.Portrait / Vertical Mode, first in the industry for smartphone stabilizer with this feature.Comparing dynamic behavior with a latest smartphone gimbal model on the market. Each hand holding a gimbal. The smaller screen at the lower right corner is the person holding the two gimbals whose picture was taken without using a gimbal.Comparing static behavior with a latest smartphone gimbal model on the market. ProView S3 holding the pink phone, alternative brand holding the white phone. (Note: Video playing at accelerated speed to shorten the 5-minute testing time.)Video recording on/off via Bluetooth by clicking control button.  Prototyping Before the CampaignWe kicked off the crowdfunding campaign after 12 months of hardware and software development with 4 iterations of CNC-milled hardware prototypes. The design was proven working before the campaign. During the campaign, we continued improve the design while taking valuable inputs from our backers. NAVIN TeamOur team consists of industrial veterans who have many years of experiences in engineering and manufacturing. Our expertise includes embedded software design, application software design, hardware design, and system product manufacturing. We are passionate in creating and delivering products that can bring happiness to the world.We have designed and sold highly acclaimed miniHomer GPS Position Finder. Now, we have successfully delivered ProView S3. We Need Your HelpPlease assist us to spread the word about this crowdfunding/InDemand campaign through Indiegogo sharing tools, Facebook, Twitter, ProView S3 blog, and Youtube. You can also support us by selecting a perk below. Thank you! ProView S3 Perk ($160)The ProView S3 Package includes ProView S3 3-axis smartphone gimbal, 3 rechargeable batteries, and an USB charger. Carrying Pouch Perk ($16)A carrying pouch for ProView S3 using neoprene fabric, a material widely used in wet suits and camera lens bags. It is ideal for carrying ProView S3 in a shooting trip or during traveling. ShippingThe perks will be shipped as gifts to your pledge in support of our crowdfunding/InDemand campaign. In case there are additional duties, fees or taxes raised by the authorities in your country, you may need to take care of them by yourself when receiving the shipment.  ScheduleGetting a new product to mass production is a challenge. In addition, we added quite a few features based on backs' inputs during the campaign. As such, there was a delay compared to our original schedule below. The delay is less than 3 months and we started shipping ProView S3 in October.  Campaign period : Feb 2 ~ April 2Ordering parts : March ~ MayTooling preparation : April  ~ MayPilot production, design verification, test fixture preparation: May ~ JuneMass production : June ~ JulyShipping (pledged before April 2) : JulyShipping (pledged after April 2) : August RiskDelivery of rewards/perks is subject to best efforts and not guaranteed. (Paypal require us to add this line in order to release fund, although we disagree that there is any risk of not delivering.) Thanks you!The NAVIN Team Media kit available here:https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0BwBD1Ww5qpkAeGRQbk9hd2w4WE0&usp=sharing​ Email Contact: info@navin.com.tw FAQ Q1: Does it support GoPro?A1: Balancing is important for optimal stabilizer performance. Currently we are aiming at optimal performance for mid size to large size smartphones, could not accommodate smaller phones and GoPro. Making it usable for sizes, including GoPro, would result in similar poor stabilization problems with large phones that many smartphone gimbals on the market now have. If mainly for GoPro use, it's better to buy a GoPro-only gimbal. Performance will be optimal, size is smaller, and better suited for bike mount or other mounting application where it is typically intended.  Q2: What's battery operating time? What kind of battery used?A2: About 2 hours operating time. Three 18350 rechargeable batteries are the current design choice.Q3: Can it work with 6" phone?A3: The phone grip opens up to 83mm. If phone width within 85mm and weight not exceed 222 gram by too much then would be OK. Q4: Are all mid-size to large-size phones usable?A4: Some of the smartphones has side buttons not on top part of the phone. If too low, it might come in contact with the phone grip. In case just coming in contact a bit, slide the phone out a little would clear the situation. If buttons are too low, it might be a problem. Such is common issue with all smartphone stabilizer phone grip designs. Please check with below figure to see if your phone has such issue. Q5: How does ProView S3 compare with other InDemand smartphone gimbals?A5: SMOVE: http://bit.ly/2fT6obW        FlowMotion One: http://bit.ly/2iAb34b Note * : We have Bluetooth 4.0 inside ProView S3 for setting control and firmware update using Bluetooth Low Energy profile. Video recording on/off via Bluetooth requires additional Human Interface Device (HID) profile. Testing with limited model of phones we have in the office (of Apple, Samsung, Asus, HTC brands), we see that this feature could work with phones from Apple, Samsung, and Asus, but unable to work with HTC phones using this new HID mode. Since the feature is not guaranteed to work with all phones, it's offered as extra bonus feature for user to try. We only have access to limited phone models in our office, unable to know if all other brand/model works or not. story:
Introduction

Specimen offers a secure network where you can chat/discuss without being monitored or subjected to sociograms. For all those who believe in free speech and privacy on the Internet, or those just tired of the self-censoring behaviour presented in other online communities.




History

We began discussing Specimen in July 2013 and proceeded with R&D during August 2013. Since then we have created a core which offers very high security, got interests from journalists and organizations, established a non-profit organization (with the same name) and completed the graphical design.



What is Specimen?

Specimen is the name of the communications platform and the non-profit organization developing it. Specimen, AGPLv3 licensed in the future, built from the ground up with security and privacy in mind. Each software component encrypts its data, and user sessions and home directories are isolated and encrypted (technical documentation available at http://specimen.me/papers.php)

Specimen will be accessible using any Internet-connected device so chatting/sending documents on the go is not a problem.


Our humble request

Nearly 75% of Specimen is developed but now we call on you and ask for a donation to complete the project. Donating would help with expenses such as server fees, sealing future [service] deals and paying up front, R&D, expand the network etc. As a token of our huge appreciation we'd send something back to you (see perks).

Any money donated are governed by our public disclaimer, meaning that any surplus donations are invested into future developments of the community and organization.

If everything goes as scheduled, the internal beta would begin in April and the public beta near June. Please keep in mind that during the beta period it's invite-only.


Our calculations 

The goal we have set, USD 10,000 (roughly 64,500 SEK), will include paying IndieGogo (percent), misc. fund-raising costs and shipping for the gifts we send back. USD 4031 (or 25999,95 SEK) is what Specimen will cost during 2014 (current prognosis). 



The impact

Our vision is that people from all over the world, wherever they may be, should be able to discuss and chat, without fear of reprisals or having to engage in mind-numbing conversations.

We aim to provide the tools required to reinstate privacy and sane discussions on the Internet.


Other ways to help

Should you be a designer we'd gladly read from you as more themes and avatars are always interesting.  Please spread the word about this project and what it can do for you (IndieGogo has some really nice sharing tools!)


Why USD?

We've chosen US Dollars as our primary currency because it allows backers to skip PayPal, would they choose too.

story:
PSDWars is a website where you battle other users by altering images in an image editing software of your choice. When you wage a war against another user on the site the voters will decide who will win that particular round.

The video explains this quite well, you should probably watch it if you have a confused look on your face!

On PSDWars you can

Wage a war against your friends on Facebook or Photoshopwars.com users.
Earn experience points for actions you make on the website.
Earn medals to decorate your profile.
Rank up to unlock special priviliges on Photoshopwars!
Spend hours scrolling through wars others have created and vote on which submission you find more funny.

 

 

 

We have a ton of ideas and we can't wait to make them all a reality but we need you to help us achieve this!

If you like entertaining images you stumble on the internet (and who doesn't) you will love PSDWars!

Look at all these fancy medals!
You know you want one!

Quick de-briefing

Our team consists of two programmers/graphics designers. Our names are Arnar and Ivar and we are both from Iceland. We are young men who are very passionate about this project. It has been in "brainstorming-mode" for many months now and we feel it is time to put it to the test.

We are both diving into this head first and would love to get some assistance although the main reason for this campaign is to get you guys to be just as excited as we are for this project.

If we achieve our goal we will be able to put all our efforts for a few months into building this website. Our dream is to build a community of people with common interests.

 

Show your friends who's da boss!

Why the funding?

Rather than begging or asking for funding we want to entice the right crowd for this. We would like to use this to get you excited for the project and start tuning in. That is why we offer you to become a Beta tester for Photoshopwars.com. The website has come pretty far as of right now but we still need a big push. If you decide we are totally worth your precious hard-earned cash we will use the money to:

  • Get better hosting services
  • Start our business
  • Upgrade our out-dated equippment
  • Long lunchbreaks, golfing. (just kidding)
  • And most importantly, work on Photoshopwars.com full time without any pesky distractions.

Now there's a shi(p)load of stuff to be done and we want to get started!

 

Rank up and you get one of these bad boys!
With many more to come!
 
Now remember, our main goal is to get people to talk about this and know it exists, the world is too big for us to just tell our friends. We need you to tell your friends too!
If you can't or won't fund our project you can still do your part and share this with your friends!
 

We hope you love this idea of ours and we seriously cannot wait to see you on the battlefield!
